tika-vin01t2:12_3: Bhaṇḍappayojanauddhārasāraṇādinā kiccenāti ettha vikkāyikabhaṇḍassa vikkiṇanaṃ bhaṇḍappayojanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:12_4: dātuṃ saṅketite divase gantvā gahaṇaṃ uddhāro,
tika-vin01t2:12_9: saddo asamānakattuko yathā “ghataṃ pivitvā balaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:12_13: tathāpi upanissayasampannassapi ajātasattuno viya antarāyo bhavissatīti imassa therassapi katapāpakammamūlavippaṭisāravasena
tika-vin01t2:13_0: Kiṃ pana yesaṃ maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo atthi,
tika-vin01t2:13_1: buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāvepi tesaṃ antarāyo hotīti? Āma hoti,
tika-vin01t2:13_3: Buddhā hi paresaṃ maggaphalādhigamāya ussāhajātā tattha nirantaraṃ yuttapayuttā eva honti,
tika-vin01t2:13_4: tasmā te paṭicca tesaṃ antarāyo na hoti,
tika-vin01t2:13_5: atha kho kiriyāparihāniyā vā pāpamittatāya vā hoti,
tika-vin01t2:13_6: kiriyāparihāni ca desakassa tasseva vā puggalassa tajjapayogābhāvato veditabbā,
tika-vin01t2:13_7: desakavasena panettha parihāni sāvakānaṃ vaseneva veditabbā,
tika-vin01t2:13_9: Tathā hi sace dhammasenāpati dhanañjāniyassa brāhmaṇassa āsayaṃ ñatvā dhammaṃ desayissa,
tika-vin01t2:13_11: Evaṃ tāva desakassa vasena kiriyāparihāniyā antarāyo hoti.
tika-vin01t2:13_12: Sace pesso hatthārohaputto bhagavato sammukhā dhammaṃ suṇanto muhuttaṃ nisīdeyya,
tika-vin01t2:13_13: yāva tassa bhagavā attantapādike cattāro puggale vitthārena vibhajitvā deseti,
tika-vin01t2:13_15: Evaṃ puggalassa vasena kiriyāparihāniyā antarāyo hoti nāma.
tika-vin01t2:13_16: Imassa hi upāsakassa kiriyāparihāni jātā apariniṭṭhitāya desanāya uṭṭhahitvā pakkantattā.
tika-vin01t2:13_17: Sace ajātasattu devadattassa vacanaṃ gahetvā pitughātakammaṃ nākarissa,
tika-vin01t2:13_19: tassa vacanaṃ gahetvā pitughātakammassa katattā pana nāhosi.
tika-vin01t2:13_22: Yadi hi tena mātāpitūnaṃ vacanaṃ gahetvā purāṇadutiyikāya methunadhammo paṭisevito nābhavissa,
tika-vin01t2:14_1: “Dhammaṃ suṇeyya”nti kiriyāpadena vuccamāno eva hi attho “yannūnā”ti nipātapadena jotīyati.
tika-vin01t2:14_4: Yadi panāti idampi hi tena samānatthameva.
tika-vin01t2:14_8: bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā nisīdituṃ araharūpoti āha “pacchā āgatenā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:15_0: Saṅkhepakathāti visuṃ visuṃ paduddhāraṃ akatvā samāsato atthavaṇṇanā.
tika-vin01t2:15_1: Yena yena ākārenāti yena yena pakārena.
tika-vin01t2:15_2: Tena tena me upaparikkhatoti “kāmā nāmete aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamā”ti ca ādinā
tika-vin01t2:15_3: yena yena ākārena kāmesu ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:15_4: tabbipariyāyato nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ guṇaṃ pakāsentaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi avabujjhāmi,
tika-vin01t2:15_5: tena tena pakārena upaparikkhato vīmaṃsantassa mayhaṃ evaṃ hoti evaṃ upaṭṭhāti.
tika-vin01t2:15_8: Akhaṇḍaṃ katvāti dukkaṭamattassapi anāpajjanena akhaṇḍitaṃ katvā,
tika-vin01t2:15_12: Kiñcipi ekadesaṃ asesetvā ekanteneva paripūretabbatāya ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:15_13: Kilesamalena amalīnaṃ katvāti taṇhāsaṃkilesādinā asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ katvā,
tika-vin01t2:15_16: Tato eva saṅkhaṃ viya likhitanti saṅkhalikhitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:15_18: Pariyodātaṭṭhena nimmalabhāvena saṅkhaṃ viya likhitaṃ dhotanti saṅkhalikhitanti āha “dhotasaṅkhasappaṭibhāga”nti.
tika-vin01t2:16_9: minanti vā sabbaguyhesu anto pakkhipantīti mittā.
tika-vin01t2:16_14: Ananuññātaṃ puttaṃ na pabbājetīti “mātāpitūnaṃ lokiyamahājanassa ca cittaññathattaṃ mā hotū”ti na pabbājeti.
tika-vin01t2:16_15: Tatoyeva ca suddhodanamahārājassa tathā varo dinno.
tika-vin01t2:17_7: Atha vā daḷhabhattikadhātijanādiparijanasampattiyā ceva paricchedasampattiyā ca uḷārapaṇītasukhapaccayūpahārehi ca sukhedhito,
tika-vin01t2:18_4: madhuno jānātī”tiādīsu viya karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṃ saddatthavidū icchantīti āha “kiñci dukkhena nānubhosī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:18_7: Ettha ca kiñci dukkhena nānubhosīti kenaci dukkhena karaṇabhūtena visayaṃ nānubhosīti evamattho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:18_8: “Kiñcī”ti etthāpi hi karaṇatthe sāmivacanassa lopo kato.
tika-vin01t2:18_9: Teneva ca vakkhati “vikappadvayepi purimapadassa uttarapadena samānavibhattilopo daṭṭhabbo”ti.
tika-vin01t2:18_14: bhātu jānātī”tiādīsu viya upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ saddasatthavidū vadantīti āha “atha vā kiñci dukkhaṃ nassarasīti attho”ti,
tika-vin01t2:18_15: kassaci dukkhassa ananubhūtattā attanā anubhūtaṃ appamattakampi dukkhaṃ pariyesamānopi abhāvatoyeva nassarasīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:18_20: “Kassaci dukkhassā”ti vattabbe vikappadvayepi purimapade sāmivacanassa lopaṃ katvā “kiñci dukkhassā”ti niddeso kato.
tika-vin01t2:18_22: Evaṃ santeti nanu mayaṃ sudinna sāmādīsu kenacipi upāyena appaṭisādhanena appaṭikārena maraṇenapi tayā akāmakāpi vinā bhavissāma,
tika-vin01t2:18_25: Kiṃ panāti ettha kinti karaṇatthe paccattavacananti dassento āha “kena pana kāraṇenā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:19_4: Paricārehīti ettha parito tattha tattha yathāsakaṃ visayesu cārehīti atthoti āha “indriyāni cārehī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:19_5: Paricārehīti vā sukhūpakaraṇehi attānaṃ paricārehi attano paricaraṇaṃ kārehi.
tika-vin01t2:19_6: Tathābhūto ca yasmā laḷanto kīḷanto nāma hoti,
tika-vin01t2:19_8: Bhuñjitabbato paribhuñjitabbato visesato pañca kāmaguṇā bhogā nāmāti āha “bhoge bhuñjanto”ti.
tika-vin01t2:20_1: Balaṃ gāhetvāti ettha balaggahaṇaṃ nāma kāyabalassa uppādanamevāti āha “kāyabalaṃ janetvā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:20_6: Atirekalābhapaṭikkhepenāti “piṇḍiyālopabhojanaṃ nissāyā”ti evaṃ vuttabhikkhāhāralābhato adhikalābho saṅghabhattādiatirekalābho,
tika-vin01t2:20_9: Saṅghabhattaṃ uddesabhattaṃ nimantanabhattaṃ salākabhattaṃ pakkhikaṃ uposathikaṃ pāṭipadikaṃ āgantukabhattaṃ
tika-vin01t2:20_10: gamikabhattaṃ gilānabhattaṃ gilānupaṭṭhākabhattaṃ vihārabhattaṃ dhurabhattaṃ vārabhattanti imāni cuddasa bhattāni.
tika-vin01t2:20_11: Tattha sakalassa saṅghassa dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ saṅghabhattaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:20_12: Katipaye bhikkhū uddisitvā dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ uddesabhattaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:20_13: Ekasmiṃ pakkhe ekadivasaṃ dātabbaṃ bhattaṃ pakkhikaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:21_2: na ca paṭhamabodhiyaṃ gahapaticīvarassa paṭiggahaṇaṃ anuññātaṃ parato jīvakavatthusmiṃ anuññātattā.
tika-vin01t2:21_3: Teneva vakkhati jīvakavatthusmiṃ “bhagavato hi buddhabhāvappattito paṭṭhāya yāva idaṃ vatthaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:21_4: etthantare vīsati vassāni na koci gahapaticīvaraṃ sādiyi,
tika-vin01t2:21_7: Teneva vakkhati “sudinno hi bhagavato dvādasame vasse pabbajito,
tika-vin01t2:21_11: ananuññātepi gahapaticīvare paṃsukūlikaṅgasamādānavasena gahapaticīvaraṃ paṭikkhittaṃ nāma hotīti katvā vuttaṃ “gahapaticīvaraṃ paṭikkhipitvā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:22_0: Loluppacāraṃ paṭikkhipitvāti kusalabhaṇḍassa bhusaṃ vilumpanaṭṭhena loluppaṃ vuccati taṇhā,
tika-vin01t2:22_5: Ettha ca āraññikaṅgādipadhānaṅgavasena sesadhutaṅgānipi gahitāneva hontīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:23_11: Jātarūparajatasseva pahūtatāyāti piṇḍapiṇḍavasena ceva suvaṇṇamāsakarajatamāsakādivasena ca jātarūparajatasseva pahūtatāya.
tika-vin01t2:23_17: Dhanadhaññassa pahūtatāyāti sattaratanasaṅkhātassa dhanassa sabbapubbaṇṇāparaṇṇasaṅgahitassa dhaññassa ca pahūtatāyāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:24_3: abhidosaṃ vā paccūsakālaṃ gato patto atikkantoti ābhidosiko.
tika-vin01t2:24_6: Chaḍḍanīyasabhāve nicchitepi pucchākāle sandehavohāravaseneva pucchituṃ yuttanti āha “sace”ti.
tika-vin01t2:25_1: “sace taṃ chaḍḍanīyadhamma”nti pariyāyaṃ amuñcitvā vuttattā “payuttavācā vā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:25_8: Hatthapiṭṭhiādīni olokayamānā “sāmiputtassa me sudinnassa viya suvaṇṇakacchapapiṭṭhisadisā imā hatthapādapiṭṭhiyo,
tika-vin01t2:25_10: madhuro saro”ti gihikāle sallakkhitapubbaṃ ākāraṃ aggahesi sañjāni sallakkhesi.
tika-vin01t2:25_11: Kasmā pana sā ñātidāsī disvāva na sañjānīti āha “sudinno hī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:25_14: Gharaṃ pavisitvāti gehasāminiyā nisīditabbaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ antogehaṃ pavisitvā.
tika-vin01t2:25_15: Yaggheti imassa ārocayāmīti ayamatthoti āha “ārocanatthe nipāto”ti.
tika-vin01t2:26_1: Gharesu sālā hontīti gharesu ekamante bhojanasālā honti pākāraparikkhittā susaṃvihitadvārabandhā susammaṭṭhavālikaṅgaṇā.
tika-vin01t2:26_3: Kasmā pana īdisāyameva sālāya aññataraṃ kuṭṭamūlanti ayamattho vuttoti āha “na hi pabbajitā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:26_11: Yesaṃ no tvanti yesaṃ no putto tvaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:26_12: Īdise ṭhāneti kiñcāpi taṃ ṭhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ananurūpaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin01t2:26_13: tathāpi mādisānaṃ mahābhogakulānaṃ puttassa parakule āsanasālāyaṃ nisīditvā bhojanaṃ nāma ayuttarūpanti maññamāno āha.
tika-vin01t2:26_17: Aññenapi pakārena nāmasaddassa pucchanatthatameva dassento āha “tathā atthi nu kho tātā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:26_19: Idāni nāmasaddassa maññanatthataṃ dassento āha “tathā atthi maññe”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:27_10: Taṃ na sundaranti “tadāya”nti pāṭhaṃ sandhāyāha. Alaṃ, gahapati,
tika-vin01t2:27_11: kataṃ me ajja bhattakiccanti thero ukkaṭṭhaekāsanikatāya paṭikkhipanto evamāha.
tika-vin01t2:27_12: Ukkaṭṭhaekāsanikatāyāti ca idaṃ bhūtakathanavasena vuttaṃ therassa tathābhāvadīpanatthaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:27_13: Mudukassapi hi ekāsanikassa yāya nisajjāya kiñcimattampi bhojanaṃ bhuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:27_14: vattasīsenapi tato vuṭṭhitassa puna bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:27_15: Tenāha tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero “āsanaṃ vā rakkheyya bhojanaṃ vā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:27_18: Ukkaṭṭhasapadānacārikopi hi purato ca pacchato ca āhaṭabhikkhampi aggahetvāva gharadvāre ṭhatvā pattavissajjanameva karoti,
tika-vin01t2:27_19: tasmā thero ukkaṭṭhasapadānacārikattāpi svātanāya bhikkhaṃ nādhivāseti.
tika-vin01t2:27_20: Atha kasmā “adhivāsesī”ti āha “sace ekabhattampi na gahessāmī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:27_21: Paṇḍitā hi mātāpitūnaṃ ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ vā kātabbaṃ anuggahaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā dhutaṅgavisuddhikā na bhavanti.
tika-vin01t2:28_3: Tiro karonti etāyāti tirokaraṇīti sāṇipākāravacano ayaṃ tirokaraṇī-
tika-vin01t2:28_7: saddo vā ayaṃ sāṇipākārapariyāyoti dassento āha “atha vā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:28_11: Vibhattipatirūpakopi nipāto hotīti āha “tenāti ayampi vā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:29_1: “Atha kho āyasmato sudinnassa pitā sake nivesane paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā āyasmato sudinnassa kālaṃ ārocesi – ‘kālo,
tika-vin01t2:29_3: niṭṭhitaṃ bhatta’nti” evaṃ kālārocanassa pāḷiyaṃ anāruḷhattā āha –
tika-vin01t2:30_3: Taddhitalopaṃ katvā veditabbanti yathā aññatthāpi “pitāmahaṃ dhanaṃ laddhā,
tika-vin01t2:30_9: Na rājabhītoti aparādhakāraṇā na rājakulā bhīto.
tika-vin01t2:31_1: Taṃnidānanti taṃ dhanaṃ nidānaṃ kāraṇamassāti taṃnidānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:31_6: nāpi “bhāyati etasmā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ ārammaṇabhayanti āha “cittutrāsoti attho”ti.
tika-vin01t2:31_9: Lomahaṃsoti tena bhayena tena chambhitattena sakalasarīralomānaṃ haṭṭhabhāvo,
tika-vin01t2:31_10: so pana nesaṃ bhittiyaṃ nāgadantānaṃ viya uddhaṃmukhatāti āha “lomānaṃ haṃsanaṃ uddhaggabhāvo”ti.
tika-vin01t2:32_6: Samuppannabalavasokā hutvāti ayaṃ loko nāma attānaṃva cinteti,
tika-vin01t2:32_7: tasmā sāpi “idāni ahaṃ anāthā jātā”ti attānaṃva cintayamānā “ayaṃ ajja āgamissati,
tika-vin01t2:32_8: ajja āgamissatī”ti aṭṭha vassāni bahi na nikkhantā etaṃ nissāya mayā dārakopi na laddho,
tika-vin01t2:32_10: ito cāmhi parihīnā aññato cāti samuppannabalavasokā hutvā.
tika-vin01t2:32_11: Kularukkhapatiṭṭhāpane bījasadisattā kulavaṃsappatiṭṭhāpako putto idha bījakoti adhippetoti āha “kulavaṃsabījakaṃ ekaṃ putta”nti.
tika-vin01t2:33_1: Itthīnaṃ kumārībhāvappattito paṭṭhāya pacchimavayato oraṃ asati vibandhe aṭṭhame aṭṭhame sattāhe gabbhāsayasaññite
tika-vin01t2:33_2: tatiye āvatte katipayā lohitapīḷakā saṇṭhahitvā aggahitapubbā eva bhijjanti,
tika-vin01t2:33_12: Suddhe vatthumhīti paggharitalohitattā anāmayattā ca nahānato paraṃ catutthadivasato paṭṭhāya suddhe gabbhāsaye.
tika-vin01t2:33_13: Suddhe pana vatthumhi mātāpitūsu ekavāraṃ sannipatitesu yāva satta divasāni khettameva hoti gabbhasaṇṭhahanassa parittassa lohitalepassa vijjamānattā.
tika-vin01t2:33_15: Bāhāyanti adhikaraṇe bhummanti āha “purāṇadutiyikāya yā bāhā,
tika-vin01t2:33_17: Upayogatthe bhummavacanampi yujjatiyeva yathā “sudinnassa pādesu gahetvā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:34_0: Pubbepi paññattasikkhāpadānaṃ sabbhāvato apaññatte sikkhāpadeti pārājikaṃ sandhāya vuttanti āha –
tika-vin01t2:34_9: Idañca thullaccayādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ lahukāpattikkhandhānaṃ sabbhāvamattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:34_11: Paṭhamabodhiyaṃ pañcannaṃ lahukāpattīnaṃ sabbhāvavacaneneva dhammasenāpatissa sikkhāpadapaññattiyācanā
tika-vin01t2:34_12: visesato garukāpattipaññattiyā pātimokkhuddesassa ca hetubhūtāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-vin01t2:34_13: Keci pana “tasmiṃ tasmiṃ pana vatthusmiṃ avasesapañcakhuddakāpattikkhandhe eva paññapesīti idaṃ dvādasame
tika-vin01t2:34_14: vasse verañjāyaṃ vutthavassena bhagavatā tato paṭṭhāya aṭṭhavassabbhantare paññattasikkhāpadaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin01t2:34_16: taṃ na sundaraṃ tato pubbepi sikkhāpadapaññattiyā sabbhāvato.
tika-vin01t2:34_17: Teneva verañjakaṇḍe “ekabhikkhunāpi ratticchedo vā pacchimikāya tattha vassaṃ upagacchāmāti vassacchedo
tika-vin01t2:34_18: vā na kato”ti ca “sāmampi pacanaṃ samaṇasāruppaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin01t2:35_5: na tveva mātugāmassa aṅgajāte aṅgajātaṃ pakkhitta”ntiādinā yaṃ ādīnavaṃ dassessati.
tika-vin01t2:35_6: Abhiviññāpesīti imassa “pavattesī”ti ayamattho kathaṃ laddhoti āha “pavattanāpi hī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:35_8: Kasmā panesa methunadhammena anatthikopi samāno tikkhattuṃ abhiviññāpesīti āha –
tika-vin01t2:35_10: Tattha tikkhattuṃ abhiviññāpananti muttipāpanavasena tīsu vāresu methunadhammassa pavattanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:36_0: Sabbesampi padānaṃ avadhāraṇaphalattā vināpi evakāraṃ avadhāraṇattho viññāyatīti āha “teneva ajjhācārenā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:39_6: vatthuvasena vā taṃ visuṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:39_8: kathañca tattha sukkasoṇitassa sambhavoti āha “itthiyo hī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:39_13: Gaṇṭhipadesu pana “kāyasaṃsaggādinā sattappakārena gabbhaggahaṇe pitu sukkakoṭṭhāsaṃ vinā chandarāgavasena
tika-vin01t2:39_14: mātu vikārappattaṃ lohitameva gabbhasaṇṭhānassa paccayo hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:39_16: sace so aparena samayena paripuṇṇindriyo hutvā tādisaṃ pitaraṃ manussajātikaṃ jīvitā voropeti,
tika-vin01t2:40_0: Taṃ asuciṃ ekadesaṃ mukhena aggahesīti purāṇacīvaraṃ dhovantī tattha yaṃ asuciṃ addasa,
tika-vin01t2:40_2: “Vaṭṭati tumhākaṃ methunadhammo”ti puṭṭho “kappatu vā mā vā kappatu,
tika-vin01t2:40_3: mayaṃ tena anatthikā”ti dassento āha “anatthikā mayaṃ etenā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:40_5: tathāpi nābhiparāmasanakāle phassasādiyanavasena assādamattaṃ tassā ahosīti gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:40_9: tena caṇḍapajjotassa nibbatti ahosīti āha “eteneva nayenā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:40_10: Purisaṃ upanijjhāyatīti vātapānādinā disvā vā diṭṭhapubbaṃ vā purisaṃ upanijjhāyati.
tika-vin01t2:40_11: Rājorodhā viyāti sīhaḷadīpe kira ekissā itthiyā tathā ahosi,
tika-vin01t2:41_3: Sukkaṃ sandhāya “mātāpitaro ca sannipatitā hontī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:41_4: mātā ca utunī hotīti lohitaṃ sandhāya.
tika-vin01t2:41_5: Tattha sannipatitā hontīti asaddhammavasena ekasmiṃ ṭhāne samāgatā saṅgatā honti.
tika-vin01t2:41_6: Mātā ca utunī hotīti idaṃ utusamayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:41_12: Atha vā gandhanato uppajjanagatiyā nimittupaṭṭhānena sūcanato dīpanato gandhoti laddhanāmena bhavagāmikammunā abbati pavattatīti gandhabbo,
tika-vin01t2:41_15: Ettha ca na mātāpitūnaṃ sannipātaṃ olokayamāno samīpe ṭhito nāma hoti,
tika-vin01t2:41_16: kammayantayantito pana eko satto tasmiṃ okāse nibbattanako purimajātiyaṃ ṭhitoyeva gatinimittādiārammaṇakaraṇavasena
tika-vin01t2:42_2: Gabbhe nibbattanakasattopi hi gabbhoti vuccati. Yathāha –
tika-vin01t2:42_4: aññā itthikā nava vā dasa vā māse gabbhaṃ kucchinā pariharitvā vijāyantī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:42_5: Katthaci pana gabbhoti mātukucchi vutto. Yathāha –
tika-vin01t2:44_0: Abbhuṭṭhitova so yāti, sa gacchaṃ na nivattatī”ti. ; –
tika-vin01t2:45_0: Ettha ca gabbhati attabhāvabhāvena pavattatīti gabbho,
tika-vin01t2:45_2: taṃnissitattā pana sattasantāno “gabbho”ti vutto yathā “mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:45_5: Yathā hi nivāsaṭṭhānatāya sattānaṃ ovarako “gabbho”ti vuccati,
tika-vin01t2:45_6: evaṃ gabbhaseyyakānaṃ sattānaṃ yāva abhijāti nivāsaṭṭhānatāya mātukucchi “gabbho”ti vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:46_2: Tathā nicchāresunti tathā mahantaṃ saddaṃ katvā nicchāresuṃ.
tika-vin01t2:46_3: Kiñcāpi idha pāḷiyaṃ ākāsaṭṭhadevatā visuṃ na āgatā,
tika-vin01t2:46_4: tathāpi saddassa anussāvane ayamanukkamoti dassetuṃ cātumahārājikadevatāyo dvidhā katvā ākāsaṭṭhadevatā visuṃ vuttā.
tika-vin01t2:46_5: Tenettha ākāsaṭṭhakānaṃ visuṃ gahitattā cātumahārājikāti paribhaṇḍapabbataṭṭhakā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:46_6: Itihāti nipātasamudāyo evaṃsaddassa atthe daṭṭhabboti āha “eva”nti.
tika-vin01t2:46_7: Khaṇena muhuttenāti padadvayaṃ vevacanabhāvato samānatthamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:46_9: Kiñcāpi hi so saddo yāva brahmalokā abbhuggacchi,
tika-vin01t2:46_10: tathāpi na so manussānaṃ visayo tesaṃ rūpaṃ viya,
tika-vin01t2:47_2: pitā pana vippaṭisārābhibhūto vihāsī”ti vacanato sudinnassa tasmiṃ attabhāve arahattādhigamo nāhosīti viññāyati.
tika-vin01t2:47_3: Keci pana “pubbekatapuññatāya codiyamānassa bhabbakulaputtassāti vuttattā sudinno taṃ kukkuccaṃ vinodetvā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi,
tika-vin01t2:47_5: Taṃ pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya ca na sameti.
tika-vin01t2:47_6: Pubbekatapuññatā ca appamāṇaṃ tādisassapi antarākatapāpakammassa vasena ajātasattuno viya adhigamantarāyadassanato.
tika-vin01t2:47_8: Kataṃ ajjhācāraṃ paṭicca anusocanavasena virūpaṃ saraṇaṃ cintanaṃ vippaṭisāroti āha “vippaṭisārotipi tasseva nāma”nti.
tika-vin01t2:47_16: Taṃ taṃ cintayīti “yadi ahaṃ taṃ pāpaṃ na karissaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:47_17: ime bhikkhū viya paripuṇṇasīlo assa”ntiādinā taṃ taṃ cintayi.
tika-vin01t2:48_8: Pasādassa pamāṇato ūnādhikattaṃ sabbadā sabbesaṃ natthīti āha “pasādapatiṭṭhānokāsassa sampuṇṇattā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:48_12: saddo viya pucchanatthoti āha “kacci nu tva”nti.
tika-vin01t2:48_13: Tameva anabhiratinti tehi bhikkhūhi pucchitaṃ tameva gihibhāvapatthanākāraṃ anabhiratiṃ.
tika-vin01t2:48_16: Atthīti visayabhāvena citte parivattanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:48_18: atthi visayabhāvena citte parivattatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha –
tika-vin01t2:49_0: Yaṃ tvanti ettha yanti hetuatthe nipāto,
tika-vin01t2:49_5: No rāgena rajjanatthāyāti bhavabhogesuyeva rāgena arañjanatthāya.
tika-vin01t2:49_7: Esa nayo sabbapadesūti adhippāyikamattaṃ sabbapadesu atidissati.
tika-vin01t2:49_13: Na saṅgahaṇatthāyāti etthāpi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:50_5: Nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānena ariyamaggena pahīyamānā rāgamānamadādayo taṃ patvā pahīyanti nāmāti āha “yasmā pana taṃ āgammā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:50_6: Tattha taṃ āgammāti nibbānaṃ āgamma paṭicca ariyamaggassa ārammaṇapaccayabhāvahetu.
tika-vin01t2:50_7: Mānamadapurisamadādayoti ettha jātiādiṃ nissāya seyyassa “seyyohamasmī”tiādinā uppajjanakamānoyeva madajananaṭṭhena madoti mānamado.
tika-vin01t2:50_11: rāgo eva vā purisamado”ti keci. Ādi-
tika-vin01t2:50_13: Mahāgaṇṭhipade pana majjhimagaṇṭhipade ca “purisamado nāma sambhavo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:50_14: taṃ idha yuttaṃ viya na dissati.
tika-vin01t2:50_15: Na hi “bhagavatā sambhavassa vināsāya dhammo desito”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:50_18: Madā nimmadīyanti ettha amadabhāvaṃ vināsaṃ gacchantīti madanimmadano.
tika-vin01t2:51_4: Pañcasu hi kāmaguṇesu chandarāgappahāneneva pañca kāmaguṇāpi pahīnā nāma honti,
tika-vin01t2:51_9: Ālīyanti allīyanti abhiramanavasena sevantīti ālayāti hi taṇhāvicaritānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:51_10: Tebhūmakavaṭṭanti tīsu bhūmīsu kammakilesavipākā vaṭṭanaṭṭhena vaṭṭaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:51_14: Virāgo nirodhoti sāmaññacodanāyapi “taṇhākkhayo”ti adhikatattā taṇhāya eva virajjanaṃ nirujjhanañca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:52_0: Catasso yoniyoti ettha yonīti khandhakoṭṭhāsassapi kāraṇassapi passāvamaggassapi nāmaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:52_1: “Catasso nāgayoniyo catasso supaṇṇayoniyo”ti ettha hi khandhakoṭṭhāso yoni nāma.
tika-vin01t2:52_2: “Yoni hesā bhūmija phalassa adhigamāyā”ti ettha kāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:52_6: Yavanti tāya sattā amissitāpi samānajātitāya missitā hontīti yoni.
tika-vin01t2:52_7: Sā pana atthato aṇḍādiuppattiṭṭhānavisiṭṭho khandhānaṃ bhāgaso pavattiviseso,
tika-vin01t2:52_12: Aṇḍajā yoni jalābujā yoni saṃsedajā yoni opapātikā yonī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:53_3: Vinā etehi kāraṇehi uppatitvā viya nibbattāti opapātikā.
tika-vin01t2:53_4: Ettha ca petaloke tiracchāne manussesu ca aṇḍajādayo catassopi yoniyo sambhavanti,
tika-vin01t2:53_5: manussesu panettha kecideva opapātikā honti mahāpadumakumārādayo viya.
tika-vin01t2:53_11: Jālāvantatāya na tāsaṃ kucchiyaṃ gabbho saṇṭhāti,
tika-vin01t2:53_16: Sabbe nerayikā ca catumahārājikato paṭṭhāya uparidevā ca opapātikāyeva,
tika-vin01t2:54_0: Pañca gatiyoti ettha sukatadukkaṭakammavasena gantabbā upapajjitabbāti gatiyo.
tika-vin01t2:54_1: Yathā hi kammabhavo paramatthato asatipi kārake paccayasāmaggiyā siddho,
tika-vin01t2:54_3: evaṃ upapattibhavalakkhaṇagatiyo paramatthato asatipi gamake taṃtaṃkammavasena yesaṃ tāni kammāni tehi gantabbāti voharīyanti.
tika-vin01t2:54_4: Apica gatigati nibbattigati ajjhāsayagati vibhavagati nipphattigatīti bahuvidhā gati nāma.
tika-vin01t2:54_5: Tattha “taṃ gatiṃ pecca gacchāmī”ti ca “yassa gatiṃ na jānanti,
tika-vin01t2:54_6: devā gandhabbamānusā”ti ca ayaṃ gatigati nāma.
tika-vin01t2:54_7: “Imesaṃ kho panāhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sīlavantānaṃ neva jānāmi āgatiṃ vā gatiṃ vā”ti ayaṃ nibbattigati nāma.
tika-vin01t2:54_8: “Evampi kho te ahaṃ brahme gatiñca pajānāmi cutiñca pajānāmī”ti ayaṃ ajjhāsayagati nāma.
tika-vin01t2:54_10: nibbānaṃ arahato gatī”ti ayaṃ vibhavagati nāma.
tika-vin01t2:54_11: “Dveyeva gatiyo sambhavanti anaññā”ti ayaṃ nipphattigati nāma.
tika-vin01t2:55_3: tato eva ramitabbaṃ assādetabbaṃ tattha natthīti niratiatthena nirassādaṭṭhena ca nirayoti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:55_5: devamanussādayo viya uddhaṃ dīghā ahutvā tiriyaṃ dīghāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:55_7: taṃ peccabhāvaṃ pattānaṃ visayoti pettivisayo, petayoni.
tika-vin01t2:55_10: ayaṃ panattho nippariyāyato jambudīpavāsīvasena veditabbo. Yathāha – “tīhi,
tika-vin01t2:55_12: ṭhānehi jambudīpakā manussā uttarakuruke ca manusse adhiggaṇhanti deve ca tāvatiṃse.
tika-vin01t2:55_15: Tathā hi buddhā ca bhagavanto paccekabuddhā aggasāvakā mahāsāvakā cakkavattino aññe ca mahānubhāvā sattā tattheva uppajjanti,
tika-vin01t2:55_16: tehi samānarūpāditāya pana saddhiṃ parittadīpavāsīhi itaramahādīpavāsinopi manussātveva paññāyiṃsu.
tika-vin01t2:56_0: Apare pana bhaṇanti “lobhādīhi alobhādīhi ca sahitassa manassa ussannatāya manussā.
tika-vin01t2:56_2: tesu visesato lobhādayo alobhādayo ca ussannā.
tika-vin01t2:56_5: tasmā lobhādīhi alobhādīhi ca sahitassa manassa ussannatāya parittadīpavāsīhi saddhiṃ catumahādīpavāsino sattavisesā manussāti vuccantī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:56_7: Manu nāma paṭhamakappiko lokamariyādāya ādibhūto sattānaṃ hitāhitavidhāyako kattabbākattabbatāvasena pituṭṭhāniyo,
tika-vin01t2:56_8: yo sāsane mahāsammatoti vuccati amhākaṃ bodhisatto,
tika-vin01t2:56_9: paccakkhato paramparāya ca tassa ovādānusāsaniyaṃ ṭhitā sattā puttasadisatāya “manussā,
tika-vin01t2:56_11: Tato eva hi te “mānavā manujā”ti ca voharīyanti.
tika-vin01t2:57_0: Pañcahi kāmaguṇehi attano attano devānubhāvasaṅkhātehi iddhivisesehi ca dibbanti kīḷanti laḷanti jotantīti devā.
tika-vin01t2:57_1: Tattha kāmadevā kāmaguṇehi ceva iddhivisesehi ca,
tika-vin01t2:57_3: Saraṇanti vā gamiyanti abhitthavīyantīti vā devā.
tika-vin01t2:57_4: Ettha ca nirayagatidevagatimanussagatīhi saddhiṃ okāsena khandhā vuttā.
tika-vin01t2:57_5: Tiracchānayonipettivisayaggahaṇena khandhānaṃ eva gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ tesaṃ tādisassa paricchinnassa okāsassa abhāvato.
tika-vin01t2:57_6: Yattha yattha vā te araññasamuddapabbatapādādike nibaddhavāsaṃ vasanti,
tika-vin01t2:57_8: Satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo nava sattāvāsā ca heṭṭhā saṃvaṇṇitanayā eva.
tika-vin01t2:57_12: Taṇhāya nikkhantaṃ tattha tassā sabbaso abhāvato,
tika-vin01t2:58_0: Kāmānaṃ pahānanti ettha kāmaggahaṇena kāmīyatīti kāmo,
tika-vin01t2:58_1: kāmetīti kāmoti duvidhassapi kāmassa saṅgaho katoti āha “vatthukāmānaṃ kilesakāmānañca pahāna”nti.
tika-vin01t2:58_5: Pariññāti tividhāpi pariññā idhādhippetāti āha “ñātatīraṇapahānavasena tividhā pariññā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:58_12: na ito bhiyyo”ti bhūtupādāyabhedaṃ rūpaṃ phassādibhedaṃ nāmañca lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānato vavatthapeti,
tika-vin01t2:59_1: Evaṃ ñātaṃ katvā taṃ sabbaṃ tīreti aniccato dukkhato rogatoti dvācattālīsāya ākārehi,
tika-vin01t2:59_4: Evaṃ tīrayitvā aggamaggena sabbasmiṃ chandarāgaṃ pajahati,
tika-vin01t2:59_10: Idha pana kāmasaññānaṃ sabhāvalakkhaṇapaṭivedhavasena aniccādisāmaññalakkhaṇavasena ca pavattamānānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:59_11: ñātatīraṇapariññānampi kiccanipphattiyā maggeneva ijjhanato maggakkhaṇaṃyeva sandhāya tividhāpi pariññā vuttā.
tika-vin01t2:59_12: Teneva “imesu pañcasu ṭhānesu kilesakkhayakaro lokuttaramaggova kathito”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:60_4: Imesu pañcasu ṭhānesūti “kāmānaṃ pahānaṃ akkhāta”ntiādinā vuttesu pañcasu ṭhānesu.
tika-vin01t2:60_11: Vippaṭisāraṃ karotīti evaṃ taṃ pāpaṃ vippaṭisāraṃ uppādeti.
tika-vin01t2:61_1: Neva piyakamyatāyāti attani satthu neva piyabhāvakāmatāya.
tika-vin01t2:61_2: Na bhedapurekkhāratāyāti na satthu tena bhikkhunā bhedanādhippāyapurekkhāratāya.
tika-vin01t2:62_11: Yassa tasmiṃ attabhāve uppajjanārahānaṃ maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo natthi,
tika-vin01t2:62_13: Upanissaye satipi tasmiṃ khaṇe magge vā phale vā asati “moghapurisā”ti vadantiyeva dhaniyaupasenattherādike viya.
tika-vin01t2:62_14: Sudinnassa pana tasmiṃ attabhāve maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo samucchinnoyeva,
tika-vin01t2:63_1: Maggaphalanibbānaggahaṇena paṭivedhasāsanassa gahitattā sāsanānanti paṭipattipariyattisāsanānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:64_8: sakalakāye āsiñcitvā viya ṭhapitaviso parassa ca sarīre āsiñcanavisoti attho.
tika-vin01t2:64_10: Yaṃ yañhi etena asitaṃ hoti paribhuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:64_12: tasmā asitaṃ visaṃ etassāti asitavisoti vattabbe “āsīviso”ti niruttinayena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:64_14: asi viya tikhiṇaṃ parassa mammacchedanasamatthaṃ visaṃ etassāti āsīvisoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:64_17: Sesasappehi kaṇhasappassa mahāvisattā āsīvisassānantaraṃ kaṇhasappo vutto.
tika-vin01t2:64_18: Sappamukhampi aṅgārakāsu viya bhayāvahattā akusaluppattiyā ṭhānaṃ na hotīti akusalakammato nivāraṇādhippāyena
tika-vin01t2:64_19: sīlabhedatopi suddhasīle ṭhitassa maraṇameva varataranti dassetuṃ “āsīvisassa kaṇhasappassa mukhe aṅgajātaṃ
tika-vin01t2:64_21: Pabbajitena hi katapāpakammaṃ bhagavato āṇātikkamanato vatthumahantatāya mahāsāvajjaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:66_0: Puṭṭho me samma akkhāhi, kiṃ kāsuyā karissasī”ti. –
tika-vin01t2:69_1: Idha pana ubhayampi adhippetanti āha “aṅgārapuṇṇakūpe aṅgārarāsimhi vā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:70_0: Idaṃ mātugāmassa aṅgajāte aṅgajātapakkhipanaṃ nidānaṃ kāraṇamassa nirayupapajjanassāti itonidānaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:70_6: saddo “samāpajjissasī”ti iminā sambandhamupagacchamāno atthīti āha “tvanti taṃsaddassa vevacana”nti.
tika-vin01t2:70_7: “Yaṃ tanti pana pāṭho yuttarūpo”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:70_9: yathā loke yaṃ vā taṃ vāti avaññātavacanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:70_11: “yaṃ vā taṃ vā hīḷitaṃ avaññātanti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:71_5: Vasati ettha phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti hi kāraṇaṃ vatthu.
tika-vin01t2:71_8: Dubbharatañceva dupposatañca āpajjatīti attanā paccayadāyakehi ca dukkhena bharitabbataṃ posetabbatañca āpajjati.
tika-vin01t2:71_9: Asaṃvare ṭhito hi ekacco attanopi dubbharo hoti dupposo,
tika-vin01t2:71_11: Yo hi ambilādīni laddhā anambilādīni pariyesati,
tika-vin01t2:71_12: aññassa ghare laddhaṃ aññassa ghare chaḍḍento sabbaṃ gāmaṃ caritvā rittapattova vihāraṃ pavisitvā nipajjati,
tika-vin01t2:71_14: Yo pana sālimaṃsodanādīnaṃ patte pūretvā dinnepi dummukhabhāvaṃ anattamanabhāvameva dasseti,
tika-vin01t2:71_15: tesaṃ vā sammukhāva taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ “kiṃ tumhehi dinna”nti apasādento sāmaṇeragahaṭṭhādīnaṃ deti,
tika-vin01t2:71_17: Etaṃ disvā manussā dūratova parivajjenti “dubbharo bhikkhu na sakkā posetu”nti.
tika-vin01t2:72_4: Mahiccho hi icchācāre ṭhatvā attani vijjamānasīladhutadhammādiguṇe vibhāveti,
tika-vin01t2:72_6: Yaṃ sandhāya vadanti “santaguṇasambhāvanatā paṭiggahaṇe ca amattaññutā,
tika-vin01t2:72_8: Sā panesā mahicchatā “idhekacco saddho samāno ‘saddhoti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchati,
tika-vin01t2:72_9: sīlavā samāno ‘sīlavāti maṃ jano jānātū’ti” iminā nayena āgatāyeva,
tika-vin01t2:75_0: Sattehi kilesehi ca saṅgaṇanaṃ samodhānaṃ saṅgaṇikāti āha –
tika-vin01t2:75_2: Kosajjānugato ca hotīti kusītabhāvena anugato hoti,
tika-vin01t2:75_4: Aṭṭhakusītavatthupāripūriyāti ettha kucchitaṃ sīdatīti kusīto da-
tika-vin01t2:75_10: Vināpi hi bhāvajotanasaddaṃ bhāvattho viññāyati yathā “paṭassa sukka”nti,
tika-vin01t2:76_1: kammaṃ kho pana me karontassa kāyo kilamissati,
tika-vin01t2:76_3: na vīriyaṃ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya,
tika-vin01t2:76_6: kammaṃ kho pana me karontassa kāyo kilanto,
tika-vin01t2:76_9: maggaṃ kho pana me gacchantassa kāyo kilamissati,
tika-vin01t2:76_12: maggaṃ kho pana me gacchantassa kāyo kilanto,
tika-vin01t2:76_14: ahaṃ kho gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya caranto nālatthaṃ lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṃ pāripūriṃ,
tika-vin01t2:76_17: ahaṃ kho gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya caranto alatthaṃ lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṃ pāripūriṃ,
tika-vin01t2:76_18: tassa me kāyo garuko akammañño māsācitaṃ maññe,
tika-vin01t2:76_20: uppanno kho me ayaṃ appamattako ābādho,
tika-vin01t2:76_23: ahaṃ kho gilānā vuṭṭhito aciravuṭṭhito gelaññā,
tika-vin01t2:76_26: na vīriyaṃ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
tika-vin01t2:77_0: Evamāgatāni “handāhaṃ nipajjāmī”ti evaṃ pavattaosīdanāni uparūpari kosajjakāraṇattā aṭṭha kusītavatthūni nāma,
tika-vin01t2:78_0: Subharo hoti suposoti attano upaṭṭhākehi ca sukhena bharitabbo posetabboti attho.
tika-vin01t2:78_1: Saṃvare ṭhito hi ekacco attanopi subharo hoti suposo,
tika-vin01t2:78_3: Yo hi yaṃ kiñci lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā laddhā tuṭṭhacittova bhuñjitvā vihāraṃ gantvā attano kammaṃ karoti,
tika-vin01t2:78_5: Yo pana paresampi appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā dānaṃ ahīḷetvā attamano vippasannamukho hutvā etesaṃ sammukhāva paribhuñjitvā yāti,
tika-vin01t2:78_7: Etaṃ disvā manussā ativiya vissatthā honti,
tika-vin01t2:78_10: mayameva naṃ posessāmā”ti paṭiññaṃ katvā posenti.
tika-vin01t2:78_14: saddo hettha abhāvatthoti sakkā viññātuṃ “appābādhatañca sañjānāmī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin01t2:79_1: catūsu pana paccayesu tayo tayo santosāti dvādasavidho hoti santoso. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin01t2:79_2: Cīvare yathālābhasantoso yathābalasantoso yathāsāruppasantosoti tividho hoti santoso.
tika-vin01t2:79_5: idha bhikkhu cīvaraṃ labhati sundaraṃ vā asundaraṃ vā,
tika-vin01t2:79_6: so teneva yāpeti aññaṃ na pattheti,
tika-vin01t2:79_9: Atha pana pakatidubbalo vā hoti ābādhajarābhibhūto vā,
tika-vin01t2:79_11: so sabhāgena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ taṃ parivattetvā lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhoyeva hoti.
tika-vin01t2:79_13: Pakatidubbalādīnañhi garucīvarāni na phāsubhāvāvahāni sarīrakhedāvahāni ca hontīti payojanavasena anatricchatādivasena
tika-vin01t2:79_16: so paṭṭacīvarādīnaṃ aññataraṃ mahagghacīvaraṃ bahūni vā pana cīvarāni labhitvā “idaṃ therānaṃ cirapabbajitānaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:79_19: idaṃ appalābhānaṃ hotū”ti datvā tesaṃ purāṇacīvaraṃ vā saṅkārakūṭādito vā nantakāni uccinitvā tehi saṅghāṭiṃ katvā dhārentopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
tika-vin01t2:79_21: Mahagghañhi cīvaraṃ bahūni vā cīvarāni labhitvāpi tāni vissajjetvā tadaññassa gahaṇaṃ yathāsāruppanaye ṭhitattā na santosavirodhīti.
tika-vin01t2:80_0: Idha pana bhikkhu piṇḍapātaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā,
tika-vin01t2:80_1: so teneva yāpeti aññaṃ na pattheti,
tika-vin01t2:80_4: Yo pana attano pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā piṇḍapātaṃ labhati,
tika-vin01t2:80_6: so sabhāgassa bhikkhuno taṃ datvā tassa hatthato sappāyabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
tika-vin01t2:80_9: so taṃ cīvaraṃ viya cirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhagilānānaṃ datvā tesaṃ vā sesakaṃ piṇḍāya vā caritvā missakāhāraṃ bhuñjantopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
tika-vin01t2:81_0: Idha pana bhikkhu senāsanaṃ labhati manāpaṃ vā amanāpaṃ vā,
tika-vin01t2:81_5: Yo pana attano pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā senāsanaṃ labhati,
tika-vin01t2:81_7: so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa santake sappāyasenāsane vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
tika-vin01t2:81_9: Aparo mahāpuñño leṇamaṇḍapakūṭāgārādīni bahūni paṇītasenāsanāni labhati,
tika-vin01t2:81_10: so tāni cīvarādīni viya cirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhagilānānaṃ datvā yattha katthaci vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
tika-vin01t2:81_14: niddābhibhūtassa puna paṭibujjhato pāpavitakkā pātubhavantī”ti paṭisañcikkhitvā tādisaṃ senāsanaṃ pattampi na sampaṭicchati,
tika-vin01t2:81_15: so taṃ paṭikkhipitvā abbhokāsarukkhamūlādīsu vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
tika-vin01t2:82_0: Idha pana bhikkhu bhesajjaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā,
tika-vin01t2:82_5: Yo pana telena atthiko phāṇitaṃ labhati,
tika-vin01t2:82_6: so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa hatthato telaṃ gahetvā aññadeva vā pariyesitvā bhesajjaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
tika-vin01t2:82_9: so taṃ cīvaraṃ viya cirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhagilānānaṃ datvā tesaṃ ābhatena yena kenaci yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
tika-vin01t2:82_10: Yo pana ekasmiṃ bhājane muttaharītakaṃ ṭhapetvā ekasmiṃ catumadhuraṃ “gaṇha, bhante,
tika-vin01t2:82_11: yadicchasī”ti vuccamāno sacassa tesu aññatarenapi rogo vūpasammati,
tika-vin01t2:82_12: atha “muttaharītakaṃ nāma buddhādīhi vaṇṇita”nti catumadhuraṃ paṭikkhipitvā muttaharītakeneva bhesajjaṃ karonto paramasantuṭṭhova hoti.
tika-vin01t2:82_14: Evaṃ yathālābhādivasena tippabhedo santoso catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena dvādasavidho hotīti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:83_4: Yathā tathā paṭhamaṃ pavattaabbhussahanañhi upari vīriyārambhassa kāraṇaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:83_5: Anurūpapaccavekkhaṇāsahitāni hi abbhussahanāni tammūlakāni vā paccavekkhaṇāni aṭṭha vīriyārambhavatthūnīti veditabbāni.
tika-vin01t2:84_1: kammaṃ kho pana me karontena na sukaraṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ manasi kātuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:84_2: handāhaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
tika-vin01t2:84_4: kammaṃ kho panāhaṃ karonto nāsakkhiṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ manasi kātuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:84_7: maggaṃ kho pana me gacchantena na sukaraṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ manasi kātuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:84_10: maggaṃ kho panāhaṃ gacchanto nāsakkhiṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ manasi kātuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:84_12: ahaṃ kho gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya caranto nālatthaṃ lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṃ pāripūriṃ,
tika-vin01t2:84_15: ahaṃ kho gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya caranto alatthaṃ lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṃ pāripūriṃ,
tika-vin01t2:84_18: uppanno kho me ayaṃ appamattako ābādho,
tika-vin01t2:84_22: ahaṃ kho gilānā vuṭṭhito aciravuṭṭhito gelaññā,
tika-vin01t2:84_25: handāhaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti –
tika-vin01t2:85_0: Evaṃ pavattaanurūpapaccavekkhaṇāsahitāni abbhussahanāni tammūlakāni vā paccavekkhaṇāni aṭṭha vīriyārambhavatthūni nāma.
tika-vin01t2:86_1: saddo vakkhamānāpekkho ca atītāpekkho ca hotīti āha “yaṃ idāni sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessatī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:86_3: Saṃvarappahānapaṭisaṃyuttanti pañcasaṃvarehi ceva pañcapahānehi ca paṭisaṃyuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:86_4: Pañcavidho hi saṃvaro sīlasaṃvaro satisaṃvaro ñāṇasaṃvaro khantisaṃvaro vīriyasaṃvaroti.
tika-vin01t2:86_5: Pahānampi pañcavidhaṃ tadaṅgappahānaṃ vikkhambhanappahānaṃ samucchedappahānaṃ paṭippassaddhippahānaṃ nissaraṇappahānanti.
tika-vin01t2:87_0: Tattha “iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto”ti evamāgato pātimokkhasaṃvaro sīlasaṃvaro nāma,
tika-vin01t2:87_3: cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī”ti evamāgatā indriyārakkhā satisaṃvaro,
tika-vin01t2:87_4: sā ca atthato tathāpavattā sati eva.
tika-vin01t2:87_7: Ettha hi “sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmī”ti vatvā “paññāyete pidhīyare”ti vacanato sotasaṅkhātānaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhiduccaritaavijjādikilesānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:87_10: sā ca atthato tathāpavattā khandhā adoso vā.
tika-vin01t2:87_13: “Uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī”ti evamāgataṃ kāmavitakkādīnaṃ vinodanavasena pavattaṃ vīriyameva vīriyasaṃvaro.
tika-vin01t2:87_14: Sabbo cāyaṃ saṃvaro yathāsakaṃ saṃvaritabbānaṃ dussīlyasaṅkhātānaṃ kāyavacīduccaritānaṃ muṭṭhassaccasaṅkhātassa
tika-vin01t2:87_15: pamādassa abhijjhādīnaṃ vā akkhanti aññāṇakosajjānañca saṃvaraṇato pidahanato chādanato “saṃvaro”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:87_17: pidahati nivāreti pavattituṃ na detīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:87_18: Paccayasamavāye uppajjanārahānaṃ kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ tathā tathā anuppādanameva hi idha saṃvaraṇaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t2:88_0: Tena tena guṇaṅgena tassa tassa aguṇaṅgassa pahānaṃ tadaṅgappahānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:88_1: Nāmarūpaparicchedādīsu hi vipassanāñāṇesu paṭipakkhabhāvato dīpālokeneva tamassa nāmarūpavavatthānena sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā,
tika-vin01t2:88_8: bhayadassanena sabhaye abhayasaññāyātiādinā nayena tena tena vipassanāñāṇena tassa tassa aguṇaṅgassa pahānaṃ tadaṅgappahānanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:88_9: Yaṃ pana upacārappanābhedena samādhinā pavattinivāraṇato ghaṭappahāreneva udakapiṭṭhe sevālassa tesaṃ tesaṃ nīvaraṇādidhammānaṃ pahānaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:88_12: Yaṃ catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ bhāvitattā taṃtaṃmaggavato attano santāne “diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāyā”tiādinā
tika-vin01t2:88_13: nayena vuttassa samudayapakkhiyassa kilesagaṇassa accantaṃ appavattibhāvena pahānaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:88_15: Yaṃ pana phalakkhaṇe paṭippassaddhattaṃ vūpasantatā kilesānaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:88_20: Evamimehi yathāvuttasaṃvarehi ceva pahānehi ca paṭisaṃyuttā dhammadesanā “saṃvarappahānapaṭisaṃyuttā”ti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:89_4: Atha vā asuttantavinibaddhanti suttābhidhammapāḷiṃ anāruḷhabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:89_6: Okkantikadhammadesanā nāma ñāṇena anupavisitvā antarā kathiyamānā dhammadesanā,
tika-vin01t2:89_10: Vaṭṭabhayena tajjentoti “evaṃ dussīlā nirayādīsu dukkhaṃ pāpuṇantī”ti tajjento.
tika-vin01t2:89_11: Dīghanikāyappamāṇampi majjhimanikāyappamāṇampi dhammadesanaṃ karotīti “tena khaṇena tena muhuttena kathaṃ
tika-vin01t2:89_12: bhagavā tāvamahantaṃ dhammadesanaṃ karotī”ti na vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:89_13: Yāvatā hi lokiyamahājanā ekaṃ padaṃ kathenti,
tika-vin01t2:89_15: Ānandatthere pana ekaṃ padaṃ kathenteyeva bhagavā soḷasa padāni katheti.
tika-vin01t2:89_16: Iminā nayena lokiyajanassa ekapaduccāraṇakkhaṇe bhagavā aṭṭhavīsasataṃ padāni katheti. Kasmā?
tika-vin01t2:89_21: tasmā sace eko bhikkhu kāyānupassanaṃ pucchati,
tika-vin01t2:89_25: “iminā puṭṭhe ahaṃ pucchissāmī”ti eko ekaṃ na oloketi,
tika-vin01t2:89_26: evaṃ santepi tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ “ayaṃ paṭhamaṃ pucchi,
tika-vin01t2:89_27: ayaṃ dutiya”ntiādinā pucchanavāro tādisassa paññavato paññāyati sukhumassa antarassa labbhanato.
tika-vin01t2:89_28: Buddhānaṃ pana desanāvāro aññesaṃ na paññāyateva accharāsaṅghātamatte khaṇe anekakoṭisahassacittappavattisambhavato.
tika-vin01t2:89_29: Daḷhadhammena dhanuggahena khittasarassa vidatthicaturaṅgulaṃ tālacchāyaṃ atikkamanato puretaraṃyeva bhagavā cuddasavidhena kāyānupassanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:89_42: sace aññe sattatiṃsa janā bodhipakkhiyesu pañhe puccheyyuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:90_0: Mūlaṃ nissayo patiṭṭhāti pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ paṭhamassa paṭhamassa vevacananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:90_1: Tattha patiṭṭhāti sampayogavasena upanissayavasena ca okāsabhāvo.
tika-vin01t2:90_2: Sikkhāsaṅkhātānañhi avasesakusaladhammānaṃ methunaviratisampayogavasena vā patiṭṭhā siyā upanissayabhāvena vā.
tika-vin01t2:90_5: Sikkhāpadavibhaṅge niddiṭṭhaviraticetanā taṃsampayuttadhammā ca sikkhāpadanti dassetukāmo āha –
tika-vin01t2:90_7: Sikkhāpadavibhaṅge hi viratiādayo dhammā nippariyāyato pariyāyato ca “sikkhāpada”nti vuttā.
tika-vin01t2:91_1: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ kāmesumicchācārā viramantassa,
tika-vin01t2:91_2: yā tasmiṃ samaye kāmesumicchācārā ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṃ anajjhāpatti velānatikkamo setughāto,
tika-vin01t2:92_1: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ kāmesumicchācārā viramantassa,
tika-vin01t2:92_2: yā tasmiṃ samaye cetanā sañcetanā cetayitattaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:93_1: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ kāmesumicchācārā viramantassa,
tika-vin01t2:94_0: Ettha hi yasmā na kevalaṃ viratiyeva sikkhāpadaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:94_3: Yasmā ca na kevalaṃ eteyeva dve dhammā sikkhāpadaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:94_4: cetanāsampayuttā pana paropaṇṇāsa dhammāpi sikkhitabbakoṭṭhāsato sikkhāpadameva,
tika-vin01t2:94_10: Viramanto ca tāya eva tato tato viramati,
tika-vin01t2:94_14: Tasmā cetanā ceva avasesasampayuttadhammā ca pariyāyasikkhāpadanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:95_0: Idāni na kevalaṃ idha viratiādayo dhammāva sikkhāpadaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:95_1: atha kho tadatthajotikā paññattipīti dassento āha “apicā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:95_2: “Yo tattha nāmakāyo padakāyoti idaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:95_6: tadatthajotakaṃ vacanampi sikkhāpadanti idampi ettha labbhateva.
tika-vin01t2:96_5: dasa atthe dasa kāraṇānīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:96_6: Atha vā attho phalaṃ tadadhīnavuttitāya vaso etassāti atthavaso,
tika-vin01t2:96_10: tesaṃ taṃ assa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti vuttattā “yo ca tathāgatassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchati,
tika-vin01t2:96_11: tassa taṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:96_12: Asampaṭicchane ādīnavanti bhaddālisutte viya asampaṭicchane ādīnavaṃ dassetvā.
tika-vin01t2:96_13: Sukhavihārābhāve sahajīvamānassa abhāvato sahajīvitāpi sukhavihārova vutto.
tika-vin01t2:97_9: Saṅghakammānīti satipi uposathapavāraṇānaṃ saṅghakammabhāve gobalibaddañāyena uposathaṃ pavāraṇañca ṭhapetvā
tika-vin01t2:98_1: diṭṭhadhammikānaṃyeva āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya dhammaṃ desemī”ti ettha vivādamūlabhūtā kilesā āsavāti āgatā.
tika-vin01t2:101_0: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. –
tika-vin01t2:102_0: Ettha tebhūmakaṃ kammaṃ avasesā ca akusalā dhammā.
tika-vin01t2:102_1: Idha pana parūpavādavippaṭisāravadhabandhādayo ceva apāyadukkhabhūtā ca nānappakārā upaddavā āsavāti āha –
tika-vin01t2:102_3: Yadi hi bhagavā sikkhāpadaṃ na paññapeyya,
tika-vin01t2:102_4: tato asaddhammapaṭisevanaadinnādānapāṇātipātādihetu ye uppajjeyyuṃ parūpavādādayo diṭṭhadhammikā nānappakārā anatthā,
tika-vin01t2:102_5: ye ca taṃnimittameva nirayādīsu nibbattassa pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇādivasena mahādukkhānubhavananānappakārā anatthā,
tika-vin01t2:102_6: te sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ “diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:102_12: Atha vā sammukhā parammukhā ca garahaṇaṃ akitti,
tika-vin01t2:103_0: Cuddasa khandhakavattāni nāma vattakkhandhake vuttāni āgantukavattaṃ āvāsikagamikaanumodanabhattaggapiṇḍacārikaāraññikasenāsanajantāgharavaccakuṭiupajjhāyasaddhivihārikaācariyaantevāsikavattanti
tika-vin01t2:103_2: Tato aññāni pana kadāci tajjanīyakammakatādikāleyeva caritabbāni dveasīti mahāvattāni,
tika-vin01t2:103_5: tāni pana “pārivāsikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ paññapessāmī”ti ārabhitvā “na upasampādetabbaṃ…pe…
tika-vin01t2:103_6: na chamāyaṃ caṅkamante caṅkame caṅkamitabba”nti vuttāvasānāni chasaṭṭhi,
tika-vin01t2:103_13: abbhānārahena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekacchanne āvāse vatthabba”ntiādinā vuttavattāni pakatattacaritabbehi
tika-vin01t2:103_14: anaññattā visuṃ agaṇetvā pārivāsikavuḍḍhatarādīsu puggalantaresu caritabbattā tesaṃ vasena sampiṇḍetvā
tika-vin01t2:103_15: ekekaṃ katvā gaṇitāni pañcāti ekasattati vattāni,
tika-vin01t2:103_16: ukkhepanīyakammakatavattesu vuttaṃ “na pakatattassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ…pe…
tika-vin01t2:103_17: nahāne piṭṭhiparikammaṃ sāditabba”nti idaṃ abhivādanādīnaṃ asādiyanaṃ ekaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:103_18: “na pakatatto bhikkhu sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsetabbo”tiādīni dasāti evametāni dvāsīti vattāni.
tika-vin01t2:103_21: aññattha pana aṭṭhakathāpadese appakaṃ ūnamadhikaṃ vā gaṇanūpagaṃ na hotīti “asīti khandhakavattānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:104_0: Saṃvaravinayoti sīlasaṃvaro satisaṃvaro ñāṇasaṃvaro khantisaṃvaro vīriyasaṃvaroti pañcavidhopi saṃvaro
tika-vin01t2:104_1: yathāsakaṃ saṃvaritabbānaṃ vinetabbānañca kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro,
tika-vin01t2:104_3: Pahānavinayoti tadaṅgappahānaṃ vikkhambhanappahānaṃ samucchedappahānaṃ paṭippassaddhippahānaṃ nissaraṇappahānanti
tika-vin01t2:104_9: Sikkhāpadapaññattiyā hi vijjamānāya eva sikkhāpadasambhavato paññattivinayopi sikkhāpadapaññattiyā anuggahito hoti.
tika-vin01t2:113_3: taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāyā”ti iminā anukkamena yaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:113_4: taṃ sandhāya āsannāsannapadānaṃ uparūparipadehi saddhiṃ yojitattā saṅkhalikabandhanasadisattā “saṅkhalikanaya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:113_9: taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāyā”ti evamādinā dasasu padesu ekamekaṃ padaṃ tadavasesehi navanavapadehi yojetvā yaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:113_10: taṃ sandhāya “ekekapadamūlikaṃ dasakkhattuṃ yojanaṃ katvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:114_0: Atthasatantiādīsu saṅkhalikanaye tāva purimapurimapadānaṃ vasena dhammasataṃ veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:114_4: tathāpi teneva nayena baddhacakkassapi nayo dinno,
tika-vin01t2:114_9: taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāyā”tiādiṃ vatvāpi “yaṃ vinayānuggahāya,
tika-vin01t2:114_13: Iminā anukkamena sesapadesupi yojitesu saṅkhalikanayena dasa baddhacakkāni honti.
tika-vin01t2:114_14: Tesu ekekasmiṃ cakke purimapurimapadānaṃ vasena dasa dasa dhammā,
tika-vin01t2:114_15: pacchimapacchimapadānaṃ vasena dasa dasa atthāti saṅkhalikanaye atthasataṃ dhammasatañca sampajjati.
tika-vin01t2:114_19: taṃ dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāyā”ti evamādinā ekameva padaṃ sesehi navahi padehi yojitanti purimapadassa
tika-vin01t2:114_20: ekattā ekameva dhammapadaṃ naveva atthapadāni honti,
tika-vin01t2:114_21: tasmā ekamūlakanaye dasasu padesu ekamekaṃ mūlaṃ katvā dasakkhattuṃ yojanāya katāya dhammapadānaṃ vasena dhammapadāni dasa,
tika-vin01t2:114_22: atthapadāni navutīti atthasataṃ dhammasatañca na sampajjati,
tika-vin01t2:114_23: tasmā ekamūlakanaye saṅkhalikanaye vuttanayena atthasataṃ dhammasatañca aggahetvā yaṃ tattha dasadhammapadānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:114_25: taṃ sabbaṃ dhammasatanti gahetvā tadatthajotanavasena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttāni saṅghasuṭṭhubhāvādīni atthapadāni
tika-vin01t2:114_26: atthasatanti evaṃ gahite atthasataṃ dhammasatañca sampajjati.
tika-vin01t2:114_28: Dve ca niruttisatānīti ettha pana atthajotikānaṃ niruttīnaṃ vasena niruttisataṃ,
tika-vin01t2:114_29: dhammabhūtānaṃ niruttīnaṃ vasena niruttisatanti dve niruttisatāni ca veditabbāni.
tika-vin01t2:114_32: dvīsu niruttisatesu dve ñāṇasatānīti cattāri ñāṇasatāni.
tika-vin01t2:115_3: Kathaṃ panettha “uddiseyyāthā”ti vutte pariyāpuṇeyyāthātiādi atthasambhavoti āha “atirekānayanattho hi ettha ca- saddo”ti.
tika-vin01t2:120_7: Pacuratthe hi vattamānavacananti sabbadā paṭisevanābhāvepi “iha mallā yujjhantī”tiādīsu viya bāhullavuttiṃ upādāya vattamānavacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:121_2: Attano micchāgāhena lesaoḍḍanena vā paripuṇṇatthampi paṭhamapaññattiṃ aññathā karonto “tañca kho manussitthiyā,
tika-vin01t2:121_6: Āmasanaṃ attano sarīrena tassā sarīrassa upari āmasanamattaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:121_8: ghaṭṭanaṃ tatopi daḷhataraṃ katvā sarīrena sarīrassa ghaṭṭanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:122_1: Daḷhataraṃ sikkhāpadamakāsīti imasmiṃ adhikāre anupaññattiyā sikkhāpadassa daḷhīkaraṇaṃ sithilakaraṇañca
tika-vin01t2:122_3: Tattha yassa sacittakassa sikkhāpadassa cittaṃ akusalameva hoti,
tika-vin01t2:122_5: Yassa sacittakācittakapakkhasahitassa acittakassa ca sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hoti,
tika-vin01t2:122_6: tampi surāpānādi lokavajjanti imamatthaṃ sampiṇḍetvā dassetuṃ “yassa sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hoti,
tika-vin01t2:122_8: “Sacittakapakkhe”ti hi idaṃ vacanaṃ acittakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:122_9: Na hi ekaṃsato sacittakassa “sacittakapakkhe”ti visesane payojanaṃ atthi.
tika-vin01t2:122_12: Yadi hi “na vaṭṭatī”ti paṇṇattivijānanacittenapi yassa sikkhāpadassa sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva,
tika-vin01t2:122_14: sabbesaṃ paṇṇattivajjasikkhāpadānampi lokavajjatā āpajjeyya paṇṇattivajjānampi “na vaṭṭatī”ti jānitvā vītikkame akusalacittasseva sambhavato.
tika-vin01t2:122_15: Na hi bhagavato āṇaṃ jānitvā maddantassa kusalacittaṃ uppajjati anādariyavasena paṭighacittasseva uppajjanato.
tika-vin01t2:123_0: Apicettha “sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalamevā”ti vacanato acittakassa vatthuajānanavasena acittakapakkhe
tika-vin01t2:123_1: cittaṃ akusalamevāti ayaṃ niyamo natthīti viññāyati.
tika-vin01t2:123_2: Yadi hi acittakassa acittakapakkhepi cittaṃ akusalameva siyā,
tika-vin01t2:123_5: taṃ lokavajja”nti ettake vutte surāti ajānitvā pivantassa gandhavaṇṇakādibhāvaṃ ajānitvā tāni limpantīnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:123_6: bhikkhunīnañca vināpi akusalacittena āpattisambhavato ekantākusalaṃ sacittakasikkhāpadaṃ ṭhapetvā surāpānādiacittakasikkhāpadānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:123_7: lokavajjatā na siyāti tesampi saṅgaṇhatthaṃ “yassa sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hoti,
tika-vin01t2:123_9: Teneva cūḷagaṇṭhipade majjhimagaṇṭhipade ca vuttaṃ “etaṃ sattaṃ māressāmīti tasmiṃyeva padese nipannaṃ
tika-vin01t2:123_10: aññaṃ mārentassa pāṇasāmaññassa atthitāya yathā pāṇātipāto hoti,
tika-vin01t2:123_11: evaṃ etaṃ majjaṃ pivissāmīti aññaṃ majjaṃ pivantassa majjasāmaññassa atthitāya akusalameva hoti.
tika-vin01t2:123_12: Yathā pana kaṭṭhasaññāya sappaṃ ghātentassa pāṇātipāto na hoti,
tika-vin01t2:123_13: evaṃ nāḷikerapānasaññāya majjaṃ pivantassa akusalaṃ na hotī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:124_0: Keci pana vadanti “sāmaṇerassa surāti ajānitvā pivantassa pārājiko natthi,
tika-vin01t2:124_3: “Bhikkhuno ajānitvāpi bījato paṭṭhāya majjaṃ pivantassa pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:124_5: na ajānitvā”ti ettakameva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:124_7: Aparampi vadanti “ajānitvā pivantassapi sotāpannassa mukhaṃ surā na pavisati kammapathappattaakusalacitteneva pātabbato”ti,
tika-vin01t2:124_9: Bodhisatte kucchigate bodhisattamātu sīlaṃ viya hi idampi ariyasāvakānaṃ dhammatāsiddhanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:125_0: “Bhavantarepi hi ariyasāvako jīvitahetupi neva pāṇaṃ hanati,
tika-vin01t2:125_2: Sacepissa surañca khīrañca missetvā mukhe pakkhipanti,
tika-vin01t2:125_5: Yathā koñcasakuṇānaṃ khīramissake udake khīrameva pavisati,
tika-vin01t2:126_0: Yadi evaṃ surāpānasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vatthuajānanatāya cettha acittakatā veditabbā,
tika-vin01t2:126_5: Imināyeva hi adhippāyena aññesupi lokavajjesu acittakasikkhāpadesu akusalacittatāyeva vuttā,
tika-vin01t2:127_0: “Giraggasamajjaṃ cittāgārasikkhāpadaṃ saṅghāṇi itthālaṅkāro gandhakavaṇṇako vāsitakapiññāko bhikkhunīādīhi
tika-vin01t2:127_1: ummaddanaparimaddanāti imāni dasa sikkhāpadāni acittakāni lokavajjāni akusalacittānī”ti,
tika-vin01t2:128_2: citte pana sati akusaleneva āpajjitabbattā lokavajjāni ceva akusalacittāni cāti.
tika-vin01t2:128_4: bhikkhunīvibhaṅge āgatāni giraggasamajjādīni dasāti imesaṃ terasannaṃ acittakasikkhāpadānaṃ lokavajjatādassanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:128_6: Yasmā pana paṇṇattivajjassa vatthuvītikkamavijānanacittena sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ siyā kusalaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:128_9: tasmā tassa sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalamevāti ayaṃ niyamo natthīti sesaṃ paṇṇattivajjanti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:129_7: Nanu ca lokavajje kāci anupaññatti uppajjamānā sithilaṃ karontī uppajjati,
tika-vin01t2:129_9: gāḷhataraṃ karontī uppajjatī”ti idaṃ kasmā vuttanti āha “aññatra adhimānā aññatra supinantā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:129_13: Uttarimanussadhamme hi “pāpiccho icchāpakato uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapatī”ti vacanato visaṃvādanādhippāyena musā bhaṇanto pārājiko hoti.
tika-vin01t2:129_14: Ayaṃ pana adhimānena adhigatasaññī hutvā ullapati,
tika-vin01t2:129_16: tasmā “aññatra adhimānā”ti ayaṃ anupaññatti uppajjamānā vītikkamābhāvā anāpattikarā jātā.
tika-vin01t2:129_17: Abbohārikattāti supinante vijjamānāyapi cetanāya vītikkamicchāya ca abbohārikattā.
tika-vin01t2:129_20: tathāpi thinamiddhena abhibhūtattā taṃ cittaṃ abbohārikaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:129_23: sā ca kho abbohārikā”ti bhagavatā vuttā,
tika-vin01t2:129_24: tasmā “aññatra supinantā”ti ayaṃ anupaññatti abbohārikattā anāpattikarā jātā.
tika-vin01t2:130_0: Akate vītikkameti “kukkuccāyantā na bhuñjiṃsū”tiādīsu viya vītikkame akate.
tika-vin01t2:130_1: Sithilaṃ karontīti paṭhamaṃ sāmaññato baddhasikkhāpadaṃ mocetvā attano attano visaye anāpattikaraṇavasena sithilaṃ karontī.
tika-vin01t2:130_4: Nanu ca sañcarittasikkhāpade “antamaso taṅkhaṇikāyapī”ti anupaññatti uppajjamānā āpattimeva karontī uppannā,
tika-vin01t2:130_5: atha kasmā “anāpattiṃ kurumānā uppajjatī”ti vuttanti āha “antamaso taṅkhaṇikāyapī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:130_6: Udāyinā bhikkhunā taṅkhaṇikāya sañcarittaṃ āpannavatthusmiṃ paññattattā “kate vītikkame”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:134_3: vajjīnaṃ puttakā vajjiputtakāti āha “vajjiraṭṭhe vesāliyaṃ kulānaṃ puttā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:134_5: So pana ñātīnaṃ vināso rājadaṇḍādikāraṇena hotīti āha “rājadaṇḍabyādhimaraṇavippavāsanimittenā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:134_7: Tañca hiraññasuvaṇṇadāsidāsādīnaṃ upabhogaparibhogavatthūnaṃ rājadaṇḍādinā vināsoti āha “esa nayo dutiyapadepī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:134_8: Na buddhaṃ garahāmāti “asabbaññu buddho”tiādinā buddhaṃ na garahāma.
tika-vin01t2:134_9: Na dhammagarahinoti “aniyyāniko dhammo”tiādinā dhammaṃ na garahāma.
tika-vin01t2:134_10: Na saṅghagarahinoti “duppaṭipanno saṅgho”tiādinā saṅghaṃ na garahāma.
tika-vin01t2:134_11: Aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇesūti dasa kasiṇā dasa asubhā dasānussatiyo cattāro brahmavihārā cattāro āruppā catudhātuvavatthānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:134_12: āhāre paṭikūlasaññāti imesu cattālīsakammaṭṭhānesu pāḷiyaṃ anāgatattā ālokākāsakasiṇadvayaṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-vin01t2:134_14: Vibhattā kusalā dhammāti “imasmiṃ ārammaṇe idaṃ hotī”ti evaṃ vibhattā upacārajjhānena saddhiṃ paṭhamajjhānādayo mahaggatakusalā dhammā.
tika-vin01t2:134_15: Teva dhammeti te eva kusale dhamme.
tika-vin01t2:134_16: Majjhimayāmo bhikkhūnaṃ niddākilamathavinodanokāsattā na gahitoti āha “paṭhamayāmañca pacchimayāmañcā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:134_19: Upakārakattena tassa pakkhe bhavā bodhipakkhiyāti āha “bodhissa pakkhe bhavānaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:134_27: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti ime sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā.
tika-vin01t2:134_28: “Gihipalibodhaṃ āvāsapalibodhañca pahāyā”ti imesaṃyeva dvinnaṃ palibodhānaṃ upacchedassa sudukkarabhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:135_1: Sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya bhikkhubhāve ṭhatvā paṭisevitamethunānaṃ tesaṃ vajjiputtakānaṃ upasampadaṃ anujānanto
tika-vin01t2:135_2: bhagavā “pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso”ti evaṃ paññattasikkhāpadaṃ samūhanati nāmāti āha –
tika-vin01t2:135_5: “Yo pana bhikkhū”ti vuttattā pana sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya paṭisevitamethunassa upasampadaṃ anujānanto na samūhanati nāma.
tika-vin01t2:135_6: Na hi so bhikkhu hutvā paṭisevati.
tika-vin01t2:135_7: “So āgato na upasampādetabbo”ti vacanato sāmaṇerabhūmi anuññātāti āha “sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ pana ṭhito”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:138_2: Tathā hi “pañcahupāli aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā nānuyuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:138_5: suttānulomaṃ na jānātī”ti evamādipariyattisāsanato suttaṃ suttānulomañca nīharitvā pakāsesuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:138_6: “anāpatti evaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyānaṃ uggaho paripucchāti gaṇhātī”ti evamādipariyattisāsanato ācariyavādaṃ nīharitvā pakāsesuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:138_7: bhārukacchakavatthusmiṃ “āyasmā upāli evamāha anāpatti āvuso supinantenā”ti evamādipariyattisāsanato eva attanomatiṃ nīharitvā pakāsesuṃ.
tika-vin01t2:138_8: Tāya hi attanomatiyā thero etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ labhi.
tika-vin01t2:139_2: bhagavatā kaṇṭhādivaṇṇappavattiṭṭhānaṃ āhacca visesetvā bhāsitaṃ padaṃ āhaccapadaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:139_11: taṃ vo na kappatī”tiādinā vuttaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ idha “raso”ti adhippetanti āha “rasoti suttānuloma”nti.
tika-vin01t2:139_12: Dhammasaṅgāhakappabhutiācariyaparamparato ānītā aṭṭhakathātanti idha “ācariyavaṃso”ti adhippetāti āha “ācariyavaṃsoti ācariyavādo”ti.
tika-vin01t2:140_0: Idha vinayavinicchayassa adhikatattā tadanucchavikameva suttaṃ dassento āha –
tika-vin01t2:140_3: mahantāni vinayassa patiṭṭhāpanaṭṭhānāni yesu patiṭṭhāpito vinayo vinicchayati asandehato.
tika-vin01t2:140_7: bhikkhave’tiādinā vuttā sādhippāyā pāḷiyeva mahāpadesā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:140_10: tasmā tesaṃ vinicchayakathā tattheva āvi bhavissatīti idha na vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:140_11: Yadipi tattha tattha bhagavatā pavattitā pakiṇṇakadesanāva aṭṭhakathā,
tika-vin01t2:140_12: sā pana dhammasaṅgāhakehi paṭhamaṃ tīṇi piṭakāni saṅgāyitvā tassa atthavaṇṇanānurūpeneva vācanāmaggaṃ
tika-vin01t2:140_13: āropitattā “ācariyavādo”ti vuccati ācariyā vadanti saṃvaṇṇenti pāḷiṃ etenāti katvā. Tenāha –
tika-vin01t2:140_16: Tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhoyeva ca buddhavacanassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanābhūto kathāmaggo mahāmahindattherena tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ ābhato,
tika-vin01t2:140_17: pacchā tambapaṇṇiyehi mahātherehi sīhaḷabhāsāya ṭhapito nikāyantaraladdhisaṅkarapariharaṇatthaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:140_19: tathāpi sā na suttādīsu visesato niddiṭṭhāti āha “suttasuttānulomaācariyavāde muñcitvā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:141_0: Attanomatiṃ sāmaññato paṭhamaṃ dassetvā idāni tameva visesetvā dassento “apicā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:141_6: Pamādapāṭhavasena ācariyavādassa kadāci suttānulomena asaṃsandanāpi siyā,
tika-vin01t2:141_13: idaṃ na kappatī”ti paricchinditvā āhaccabhāsitaṃ kiñci natthīti āha –
tika-vin01t2:141_17: Buddhānaṃ ṭhitakālasadisanti iminā buddheheva kathitattā dharamānabuddhasadisanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:141_18: Sutte hi paṭibāhite buddhova paṭibāhito hoti.
tika-vin01t2:141_19: Sakavādī suttaṃ gahetvā kathetīti sakavādī attano suttaṃ gahetvā voharati.
tika-vin01t2:141_20: Paravādī suttānulomanti aññanikāyavādī attano nikāye suttānulomaṃ gahetvā katheti.
tika-vin01t2:141_21: Khepaṃ vā garahaṃ vā akatvāti “kiṃ iminā”ti khepaṃ vā “kimesa bālo vadatī”ti garahaṃ vā akatvā.
tika-vin01t2:141_23: Sutte otāretabbanti sakavādinā attano sutte otāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:142_0: Nanu ca “suttānulomato suttameva balavatara”nti heṭṭhā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:142_1: idha pana “suttānulome suttaṃ otāretabba”ntiādi kasmā vuttanti?
tika-vin01t2:142_3: “Suttānulomato suttameva balavatara”nti hi idaṃ sakamateyeva suttaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:142_4: Tattha hi sakamatipariyāpannameva suttādiṃ sandhāya “attanomati sabbadubbalā,
tika-vin01t2:142_8: Idha pana paravādinā ānītaṃ aññanikāye suttaṃ sandhāya “suttānulome suttaṃ otāretabba”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:142_9: Tasmā paravādinā ānītaṃ suttādiṃ attano suttānulomaācariyavādaattanomatīsu otāretvā samentaṃyeva gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:142_10: itaraṃ na gahetabbanti ayaṃ nayo idha vuccatīti na koci pubbāparavirodho.
tika-vin01t2:143_0: Bāhirakasuttanti tisso saṅgītiyo anāruḷhaguḷhavessantarādīni mahāsaṅghikanikāyavāsīnaṃ suttāni.
tika-vin01t2:143_4: Attanomatiyameva ṭhātabbanti iminā aññanikāyato ānītasuttatopi sakanikāye attanomatiyeva balavatarāti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:143_6: paravādīpi suttamevātievamādinā samānajātikānaṃ vasena vāro na vutto,
tika-vin01t2:143_7: suttassa sutteyeva otāraṇaṃ bhinnaṃ viya hutvā na paññāyati,
tika-vin01t2:144_0: Idāni sakavādīparavādīnaṃ kappiyākappiyādibhāvaṃ sandhāya vivāde uppanne tattha paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ dassento āha –
tika-vin01t2:144_2: Tattha sutte ca suttānulome ca otāretabbanti sakavādinā attanoyeva sutte ca suttānulome ca otāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:144_3: Paro kāraṇaṃ na vindatīti paravādī kāraṇaṃ na labhati.
tika-vin01t2:144_4: Suttato bahuṃ kāraṇañca vinicchayañca dassetīti paravādī attano suttato bahuṃ kāraṇaṃ vinicchayañca āharitvā dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:144_5: Sādhūti sampaṭicchitvā akappiyeva ṭhātabbanti iminā attano nikāye suttādīni alabhantena sakavādinā paravādīvacaneyeva ṭhātabbanti vadati.
tika-vin01t2:144_6: Dvinnampi kāraṇacchāyā dissatīti sakavādīparavādīnaṃ ubhinnampi kappiyākappiyabhāvasādhakaṃ kāraṇapatirūpakaṃ dissati.
tika-vin01t2:144_9: “Vinayaṃ patvā”ti vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ katvā dassento āha “kappiyākappiyavicāraṇamāgammā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:144_10: Rundhitabbantiādīsu dubbiññeyyavinicchaye kappiyākappiyabhāve sati kappiyanti gahaṇaṃ rundhitabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:145_0: Bahūhi suttavinicchayakāraṇehīti bahūhi suttehi ceva tato ānītavinicchayakāraṇehi ca.
tika-vin01t2:145_1: Attano gahaṇaṃ na vissajjetabbanti sakavādinā attano akappiyanti gahaṇaṃ na vissajjetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:145_4: Keci pana “sakavādīsuyeva yo koci idhādhippeto”ti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:145_5: evaṃ sante “atha panāyaṃ kappiyanti gahetvā kathetī”tiādīsu sabbattha ubhopi sakavādinoyeva siyuṃ heṭṭhā
tika-vin01t2:145_8: Atirekakāraṇaṃ labhatīti ettha suttādīsu purimaṃ purimaṃ atirekakāraṇaṃ nāma,
tika-vin01t2:145_9: yo vā suttādīsu catūsu bahutaraṃ kāraṇaṃ labhati,
tika-vin01t2:146_6: Ettha ca “suttaṃ nāma sakalaṃ vinayapiṭaka”nti vuttattā pāḷitoti tadatthadīpikā aññāyeva pāḷi veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:146_7: Anubyañjanasoti imassa vivaraṇaṃ “paripucchato ca aṭṭhakathāto cā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:146_8: Pāḷiṃ anugantvā atthassa byañjanato pakāsanato anubyañjananti hi paripucchā aṭṭhakathā ca vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:146_9: Ettha ca aṭṭhakathāya visuṃ gahitattā paripucchāti theravādo vutto.
tika-vin01t2:146_11: Kukkuccakoti aṇumattesupi vajjesu bhayadassanavasena kukkuccaṃ uppādento.
tika-vin01t2:147_2: Santiṭṭhituṃ na sakkotīti ekasmiṃyeva atthe patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-vin01t2:147_7: tadubhayavinimutto ca ucchu nāma visuṃ natthi,
tika-vin01t2:147_8: tasmā ucchupi vikāle vaṭṭatī”ti paravādinā vutte tampi gaṇhāti.
tika-vin01t2:148_0: Ācariyaparamparā kho panassa suggahitā hotīti ettha ācariyaparamparāti ācariyānaṃ vinicchayaparamparā.
tika-vin01t2:148_1: Teneva vakkhati “yathā ācariyo ca ācariyācariyo ca pāḷiñca paripucchañca vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:148_8: Dve tayo parivaṭṭāti dve tisso paramparā.
tika-vin01t2:149_0: Imehi ca pana tīhi lakkhaṇehīti “suttamassa svāgataṃ hotī”tiādinā heṭṭhā vuttehi tīhi lakkhaṇehi.
tika-vin01t2:149_1: Ettha ca paṭhamena lakkhaṇena vinayassa suṭṭhu uggahitabhāvo vutto,
tika-vin01t2:149_3: tatiyena yaṃ pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya ca natthi,
tika-vin01t2:149_5: Otiṇṇe vatthusminti codanāsaṅkhāte vītikkamasaṅkhāte vā vatthusmiṃ saṅghamajjhe otiṇṇe,
tika-vin01t2:149_7: Vuttameva vibhāvento “codakena ca cuditakena ca vutte vattabbe”ti āha.
tika-vin01t2:149_8: Keci pana “codakena otiṇṇe vatthusmiṃ cuditakena ca vutte vattabbe”ti evaṃ yojenti.
tika-vin01t2:149_9: Apare pana “codakena ca cuditakena ca vutte vinayadharena ca vattabbe”ti evampi yojenti.
tika-vin01t2:149_10: “Codakena ca cuditakena ca vutte vattabbe”ti ayameva pana yojanā sundaratarāti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:149_11: Vatthu oloketabbanti tassa tassa sikkhāpadassa vatthu oloketabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:149_14: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti hi idaṃ nissaggiye aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadassa vatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:149_15: thullaccayadubbhāsitāpattīnaṃ mātikāya anāgatattā “pañcannaṃ āpattīnaṃ aññatara”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:149_16: Aññataraṃ vā āpattinti “kāle vikālasaññī āpatti dukkaṭassa,
tika-vin01t2:149_17: kāle vematiko āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti evamādinā āgataṃ dukkaṭaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:150_0: Sukhumāti attanopi duviññeyyasabhāvassa lahuparivattino cittassa sīghaparivattitāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:150_4: Taṃvatthukanti te adinnādānamanussaviggahavītikkamā vatthu adhiṭṭhānaṃ kāraṇametassāti taṃvatthukaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:150_7: Pākaṭabhāvato sukhavaḷañjanatāya ca “dvattiṃsākāraṃ tāva manasi karohī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:150_8: Aññasmiṃ pana kammaṭṭhāne kataparicayena tadeva manasi kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:150_9: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ ghaṭayatīti antarantarā khaṇḍaṃ adassetvā cittena saddhiṃ ālambanabhāvena cirakālaṃ ghaṭayati.
tika-vin01t2:150_10: Saṅkhārā pākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhahantīti vipassanākammaṭṭhāniko ce,
tika-vin01t2:150_13: tassa satipi asaritukāmatāya vippaṭisāravatthuvasena punappunaṃ taṃ upaṭṭhahatīti cittekaggataṃ na vindati.
tika-vin01t2:150_18: Aññā ca devatā jānantīti ārakkhadevatāhi aññā paracittaviduniyo devatā ca jānanti.
tika-vin01t2:154_5: saddasseva atthaṃ pakāsento “yo kocīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti āha.
tika-vin01t2:154_6: Yo koci nāmāti yo vā so vā yo kocīti vutto.
tika-vin01t2:155_1: Labhanto vā alabhanto vāti yo koci bhikkhati bhikkhaṃ esati gavesati,
tika-vin01t2:155_2: so taṃ labhatu vā mā vā,
tika-vin01t2:155_5: esā ariyāna yācanā”ti evaṃ vuttāya ariyayācanāya,
tika-vin01t2:155_6: na kapaṇaddhikavaṇibbakayācakānaṃ viya “dehi dehī”ti evaṃ pavattayācanāya.
tika-vin01t2:156_1: Yo hi cīvarādike aṭṭha parikkhāre pattacīvarameva vā sotāpannādiariyassa puthujjanasseva vā sīlasampannassa
tika-vin01t2:156_2: datvā “idaṃ parikkhāradānaṃ anāgate ehibhikkhubhāvāya paccayo hotū”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi,
tika-vin01t2:156_3: tassa taṃ sati adhikārasampattiyaṃ buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāve iddhimayaparikkhāralābhāya saṃvattatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:156_15: Buddhova pabbajjācariyo upasampadācariyo ca assāti buddhācariyako.
tika-vin01t2:156_16: Paṭhamabodhiyampi paṭhamakāleyeva sesaupasampadānaṃ abhāvoti āha “paṭhamabodhiyaṃ ekasmiṃ kāle”ti.
tika-vin01t2:156_20: Eko ca theroti aṅgulimālattheraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:157_0: Veḷuvanamahāvihāre gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnoyeva bhagavā mahākassapattherassa attānaṃ uddissa pabbajitabhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t2:157_1: viditvā tassa paccuggamanaṃ karonto tigāvutaṃ maggaṃ ekakova gantvā bahuputtanigrodhamūle pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā
tika-vin01t2:157_2: nisinno attano santikaṃ āgantvā paramanipaccakāraṃ dassetvā “satthā me bhante bhagavā,
tika-vin01t2:157_5: sāvakohamasmī”ti tikkhattuṃ attano sāvakattaṃ sāvetvā ṭhitassa mahākassapattherassa nipaccakāramahattataṃ
tika-vin01t2:157_6: attano ca mahānubhāvataṃ dīpetuṃ yassa aññassa ajānaṃyeva “jānāmī”ti paṭiññassa bāhirakassa satthuno
tika-vin01t2:157_7: evaṃ sabbacetasā samannāgato pasannacitto sāvako evarūpaṃ paramanipaccakāraṃ kareyya,
tika-vin01t2:157_8: tassa vaṇṭacchinnatālapakkaṃ viya gīvato muddhāpi vipateyya,
tika-vin01t2:157_9: sattadhā vā phaleyyāti dassento “yo kho, kassapa,
tika-vin01t2:157_10: evaṃ sabbacetasā samannāgataṃ sāvakaṃ ajānaṃyeva vadeyya ‘jānāmī’ti,
tika-vin01t2:157_13: sattadhā vā phaleyya, ahaṃ kho, kassapa,
tika-vin01t2:157_15: passaṃyeva vadāmi ‘passāmī”’ ti vatvā jātimadamānamadarūpamadappahānatthaṃ tīhi ovādehi mahākassapattheraṃ ovadanto “tasmātiha te kassapā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:158_0: Tattha tasmātihāti tasmā icceva vuttaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:158_1: yasmā ahaṃ jānantova “jānāmī”ti passanto eva ca “passāmī”ti vadāmi,
tika-vin01t2:158_9: Paccupaṭṭhitaṃ bhavissatīti upasaṅkamanato paṭhamatarameva upaṭṭhitaṃ bhavissati.
tika-vin01t2:158_10: Tathā hi sati tesaṃ purato assa sagāravasappatissavatā saṇṭhāti.
tika-vin01t2:158_11: Yo ca therādīsu hirottappaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā upasaṅkamati,
tika-vin01t2:158_12: therādayopi taṃ sahirikā saottappā ca hutvā upasaṅkamantīti ayamettha ānisaṃso.
tika-vin01t2:158_15: Aṭṭhiṃ katvāti attānaṃ tena dhammena aṭṭhikaṃ katvā,
tika-vin01t2:158_16: taṃ vā dhammaṃ “esa mayhaṃ dhammo”ti aṭṭhiṃ katvā.
tika-vin01t2:158_18: Sabbacetasā samannāharitvāti cittassa thokampi bahi gantuṃ adento sabbena samannāhāracittena samannāharitvā.
tika-vin01t2:158_21: Evañhi te sikkhitabbanti ñāṇasotañca pasādasotañca odahitvā “mayā desitaṃ dhammaṃ sakkaccameva suṇissāmī”ti evañhi te sikkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:158_22: Sātasahagatā ca me kāyagatāsatīti asubhesu ceva ānāpāne ca paṭhamajjhānavasena sukhasampayuttā kāyagatāsati.
tika-vin01t2:158_24: therassa ayameva pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca ahosi.
tika-vin01t2:159_3: Sopākasāmaṇero bhagavatā puṭṭho “ete dve rūpāvacarabhāvena ekatthā,
tika-vin01t2:159_6: Garudhammapaṭiggahaṇādiupasampadā upari vitthārato sayameva āvi bhavissati.
tika-vin01t2:160_0: Kalyāṇaputhujjanādayoti ettha bahūnaṃ nānappakārānaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīnaṃ avihatattā janeti,
tika-vin01t2:160_2: kalyāṇo ca so puthujjano cāti kalyāṇaputhujjano,
tika-vin01t2:160_3: so ādi yesaṃ sotāpannādīnaṃ te kalyāṇaputhujjanādayo.
tika-vin01t2:163_7: Kalyāṇaputhujjanassa hi sīlādayo tayo eva sambhavanti,
tika-vin01t2:163_9: Sāro bhikkhūtipi kalyāṇaputhujjanādayova vuttāti āha “tehiyeva sīlasārādīhī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:163_10: Atha vā nippariyāyato khīṇāsavova sāro bhikkhu nāmāti āha “vigatakilesapheggubhāvato vā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:164_0: Yopi kalyāṇaputhujjano anulomapaṭipadāya paripūrakārī sīlasampanno indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññū
tika-vin01t2:164_1: jāgariyānuyogamanuyutto pubbarattāpararattaṃ bodhipakkhiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanānuyogamanuyutto viharati
tika-vin01t2:164_2: “ajja vā sve vā aññataraṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ adhigamissāmī”ti,
tika-vin01t2:164_3: sopi vuccati sikkhatīti sekhoti āha “puthujjanakalyāṇakena saddhi”nti.
tika-vin01t2:164_5: heṭṭhimā ca tayo phalaṭṭhāti ime satta ariyā.
tika-vin01t2:164_8: Ariyapuggalo hi ariyāya jātiyā jāyamāno sikkhāsu jāyati,
tika-vin01t2:164_11: puggalādhiṭṭhānāya vā kathāya sekhassa ayanti anaññasādhāraṇā maggaphalattayadhammā sekhapariyāyena vuttā.
tika-vin01t2:164_14: Sīlasamādhipaññāsaṅkhātā hi sikkhā attano paṭipakkhakilesehi vimuttattā parisuddhā,
tika-vin01t2:164_15: upakkilesānaṃ ārammaṇabhāvampi anupagamanato etā sikkhāti vattuṃ yuttā,
tika-vin01t2:164_17: tasmā catumaggaheṭṭhimaphalattayasamaṅgino viya arahattaphalasamaṅgīpi tāsu sikkhāsu jātoti taṃsamaṅgino
tika-vin01t2:164_18: arahato itaresaṃ viya sekhatte sati sekhassa ayanti,
tika-vin01t2:164_19: sikkhā sīlaṃ etassāti ca sekhoti vattabbo siyāti taṃ nivattanatthaṃ “asekho”ti yathāvuttasekhabhāvapaṭisedho kato.
tika-vin01t2:164_20: Arahattaphalehi pavattamānā sikkhā pariniṭṭhitasikkhākiccattā na sikkhākiccaṃ karonti,
tika-vin01t2:164_26: heṭṭhimaphalesu pana sikkhā sakadāgāmimaggavipassanādīnaṃ upanissayabhāvato sikkhākiccaṃ karontīti sikkhāvacanaṃ arahanti,
tika-vin01t2:164_28: sikkhāsu jātāti ca vattabbataṃ arahanti “sikkhantīti sekhā”ti apariyositasikkhānaṃ dassitattā,
tika-vin01t2:164_33: Vuddhippattasikkho vā asekhoti etasmiṃ atthe sekhadhammesu eva ṭhitassa kassaci ariyassa asekhabhāvāpattīti
tika-vin01t2:164_34: arahattamaggadhammā vuddhippattā ca yathāvuttehi atthehi sekhāti katvā taṃsamaṅgino aggamaggaṭṭhassa
tika-vin01t2:164_37: Arahattamaggato hi ninnānākaraṇaṃ arahattaphalaṃ ṭhapetvā pariññākiccakaraṇaṃ vipākabhāvañca,
tika-vin01t2:164_38: tasmā te eva sekhā aggaphaladhammabhāvaṃ āpannāti sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-vin01t2:164_39: Kusalasukhato ca vipākasukhaṃ santataratāya paṇītataranti vuddhippattā ca te dhammā hontīti taṃsamaṅgī asekhoti vuccatīti.
tika-vin01t2:165_6: Kammappattāti kammārahā pārājikaṃ anāpannā anukkhittā ca.
tika-vin01t2:165_7: Upasampadākammassa pañcavaggakaraṇīyattā pañceva bhikkhū kammappattā ettakehipi kammasiddhito,
tika-vin01t2:165_9: Ñatticatutthenāti ettha kiñcāpi ñatti sabbapaṭhamaṃ vuccati,
tika-vin01t2:165_10: tissannaṃ pana anussāvanānaṃ atthabyañjanabhedābhāvato atthabyañjanabhinnā ñatti tāsaṃ catutthāti katvā “ñatticatuttha”nti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:165_11: Byañjanānurūpameva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tīhi anussāvanāhi ekāya ca ñattiyā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:165_12: atthappavattikkamena pana “ekāya ñattiyā tīhi anussāvanāhī”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:165_14: so ṭhapetvā ūnavīsativassaṃ antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannapubbaṃ paṇḍakādayo ca ekādasa abhabbapuggale veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:165_15: Ūnavīsativassādayo hi terasa puggalā upasampadāya avatthu,
tika-vin01t2:165_16: ime pana ṭhapetvā aññasmiṃ upasampadāpekkhe sati upasampadākammaṃ vatthusampattisampannaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin01t2:166_0: Vatthusaṅghapuggalañattīnaṃ aparāmasanāni pacchā ñattiṭṭhapanañcāti ime tāva pañca ñattidosā.
tika-vin01t2:166_1: Tattha “ayaṃ itthannāmo”ti upasampadāpekkhassa akittanaṃ vatthuaparāmasanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t2:166_6: Sabbena sabbaṃ ñattiyā anuccāraṇaṃ ñattiaparāmasanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t2:166_7: Paṭhamaṃ kammavācaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā “esā ñattī”ti vatvā “khamati saṅghassā”ti evaṃ ñattikittanaṃ pacchā ñattiṭṭhapanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t2:166_8: Iti imehi dosehi vimuttāya ñattiyā sampannaṃ ñattisampattisampannaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t2:167_0: Vatthusaṅghapuggalānaṃ aparāmasanāni sāvanāya hāpanaṃ akāle sāvananti ime pañca anussāvanadosā.
tika-vin01t2:167_2: Tīsu pana anussāvanāsu yattha katthaci etesaṃ aparāmasanaṃ aparāmasanameva,
tika-vin01t2:167_3: sabbena sabbaṃ pana kammavācaṃ avatvā catukkhattuṃ ñattikittanameva.
tika-vin01t2:167_4: Atha vā pana kammavācabbhantare akkharassa vā padassa vā anuccāraṇaṃ vā duruccāraṇaṃ vā sāvanāya hāpanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t2:167_5: Sāvanāya anokāse paṭhamaṃ ñattiṃ aṭṭhapetvā anussāvanakaraṇaṃ akāle sāvanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t2:167_6: Iti imehi dosehi vimuttāya anussāvanāya sampannaṃ anussāvanasampattisampannaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t2:168_0: Vipattisīmālakkhaṇaṃ samatikkantāya pana sīmāya kataṃ sīmāsampattisampannaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t2:168_4: sammukhībhūtānaṃ paṭikkosananti ime pana tayo parisadosā,
tika-vin01t2:168_5: tehi vimuttāya parisāya kataṃ parisasampattisampannaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t2:169_0: Upasampadākammavācāsaṅkhātaṃ bhagavato vacanaṃ upasampadākammakaraṇassa kāraṇattā ṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:169_1: yathā ca taṃ kattabbanti bhagavatā anusiṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:169_2: tathā katattā tadanucchavikaṃ yathāvuttaṃ anūnaṃ ñattianussāvanaṃ uppaṭipāṭiyā ca avuttaṃ ṭhānārahaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:169_4: tathā akate upasampadākammassa kāraṇaṃ na hotīti na taṃ ṭhānārahaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:169_9: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana akuppalakkhaṇaṃ ekattha sampiṇḍetvā dassetuṃ akuppenāti imassa “vatthuñattianussāvanasīmāparisasampattisampannattā
tika-vin01t2:169_11: Keci pana “ṭhānārahenātiettha ‘na hatthacchinno pabbājetabbo’tiādi satthusāsanaṃ ṭhāna”nti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:170_0: “Ñatticatutthena kammenā”ti imasmiṃ adhikāre pasaṅgato āharitvā yaṃ kammalakkhaṇaṃ sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu papañcitaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:170_1: taṃ yathāāgataṭṭhāneyeva dassetukāmo idha tassa avacane tattha vacane ca payojanaṃ dassetuṃ “imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:171_0: Aṭṭhasu upasampadāsu ehibhikkhūpasampadā saraṇagamanūpasampadā ovādapaṭiggahaṇūpasampadā pañhabyākaraṇūpasampadāti
tika-vin01t2:171_1: imāhi upasampadāhi upasampannānaṃ lokavajjasikkhāpadavītikkame abhabbattā garudhammapaṭiggahaṇūpasampadā
tika-vin01t2:171_2: dūtenūpasampadā aṭṭhavācikūpasampadāti imāsañca tissannaṃ upasampadānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃyeva anuññātattā
tika-vin01t2:171_7: na ca te bhabbā pārājikādilokavajjaṃ āpajjituṃ,
tika-vin01t2:171_10: tasmā ettha ñatticatutthena upasampannova gahitoti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:172_0: Paṇṇattivajjesu pana sikkhāpadesu aññepi ehibhikkhūpasampadāya upasampannādayo saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
tika-vin01t2:172_2: Yadi evaṃ paṇṇattivajjesupi sikkhāpadesu “ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhū”ti ñatticatuttheneva kammena upasampanno kasmā vuttoti?
tika-vin01t2:172_4: Ehibhikkhūpasampadādayo hi na sabbasikkhāpadavītikkamārahā asabbakālikā ca.
tika-vin01t2:172_5: Tathā hi aṭṭhasu upasampadāsu ñatticatutthakammūpasampadā dūtenūpasampadā aṭṭhavācikūpasampadāti imā tissoyeva thāvarā,
tika-vin01t2:172_7: Teneva ca bhikkhunīvibhaṅgepi “tatra yāyaṃ bhikkhunī samaggena ubhatosaṅghena ñatticatutthena kammena akuppena ṭhānārahena upasampannā,
tika-vin01t2:172_8: ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī”ti dūtenūpasampadāya aṭṭhavācikūpasampadāya ca upasampannaṃ antokatvā
tika-vin01t2:172_9: ubhatosaṅghena ñatticatuttheneva kammena upasampannā bhikkhunī vuttā,
tika-vin01t2:172_10: na garudhammapaṭiggahaṇūpasampadāya upasampannā tassā upasampadāya pāṭipuggalikabhāvato asabbakālikattā.
tika-vin01t2:172_11: Garudhammapaṭiggahaṇūpasampadā hi mahāpajāpatiyā eva anuññātattā pāṭipuggalikāti,
tika-vin01t2:172_12: tasmā sabbasikkhāpadavītikkamārahaṃ sabbakālikāya ñatticatutthakammūpasampadāya upasampannameva gahetvā sabbasikkhāpadāni paññattānīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:172_13: Yadi evaṃ paṇṇattivajjesu sikkhāpadesu ca ehibhikkhūpasampannādīnampi saṅgaho kathaṃ viññāyatīti?
tika-vin01t2:172_15: Tathā hi “dve puggalā abhabbā āpattiṃ āpajjituṃ buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca,
tika-vin01t2:172_16: dve puggalā bhabbā āpattiṃ āpajjituṃ bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo cā”ti sāmaññato vuttattā ehibhikkhūpasampannādayopi
tika-vin01t2:172_17: asañcicca assatiyā acittakaṃ paṇṇattivajjaṃ sahaseyyādiāpattiṃ āpajjantīti atthato āpannanti ayamettha sāro.
tika-vin01t2:172_18: Yaṃ panettha ito aññathā kenaci papañcitaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:173_4: Ettha ca bhindati pāpake akusale dhammeti bhikkhūti nibbacanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:176_3: Yathā hi omakatarappamāṇaṃ chattaṃ vā dhajaṃ vā upādāya atirekappamāṇaṃ “atichattaṃ atidhajo”ti vuccati,
tika-vin01t2:176_5: tathā anukkaṭṭhaṃ cittaṃ paññañca upādāya adhicittena adhipaññāya ca bhavitabba”nti manasi katvā sīlādiṃ
tika-vin01t2:176_7: Aṭṭhaṅgasīlaṃ dasaṅgasīlesveva antogadhattā visuṃ aggahetvā “pañcaṅgadasaṅgasīla”nti ettakameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:176_10: taṃ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi dukkhehīti pātimokkhanti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:177_1: kilesānaṃ balavabhāvato pāpakiriyāya sukarabhāvato puññakiriyāya ca dukkarabhāvato bahukkhattuṃ apāyesu patanasīloti pātī,
tika-vin01t2:177_3: Aniccatāya vā bhavābhavādīsu kammavegakkhitto ghaṭiyantaṃ viya anavaṭṭhānena paribbhamanato gamanasīloti pātī,
tika-vin01t2:177_4: maraṇavasena vā tamhi tamhi sattanikāye attabhāvassa patanasīloti pātī,
tika-vin01t2:177_8: Cittassa hi vimokkhena satto vimuttoti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:178_0: Atha vā avijjādinā hetunā saṃsāre patati gacchati pavattatīti pāti.
tika-vin01t2:178_1: “Avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarata”nti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:178_2: Tassa pātino sattassa taṇhādisaṃkilesattayato mokkho etenāti pātimokkho.
tika-vin01t2:179_0: Atha vā pāteti vinipāteti dukkhehīti pāti, cittaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:179_4: Patati vā etena apāyadukkhe saṃsāradukkhe cāti pāti,
tika-vin01t2:181_0: Atha vā pāto vinipāto assa atthīti pātī, saṃsāro. Tato mokkhoti pātimokkho.
tika-vin01t2:182_0: Atha vā sabbalokādhipatibhāvato dhammissaro bhagavā patīti vuccati,
tika-vin01t2:182_4: Sabbaguṇānaṃ vā mūlabhāvato uttamaṭṭhena pati ca so yathāvuttena atthena mokkho cāti patimokkho,
tika-vin01t2:182_6: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “pātimokkhanti mukhametaṃ pamukhameta”nti vitthāro.
tika-vin01t2:183_4: Idañhi sīlaṃ sayaṃ tadaṅgavasena samādhisahitaṃ paññāsahitañca vikkhambhanavasena samucchedavasena ca accantaṃ mokkheti mocetīti pātimokkho.
tika-vin01t2:184_1: tamhā tamhā vītikkamadosato paccekaṃ mokkhetīti attho,
tika-vin01t2:184_5: Sīlasaṃvaro hi sūriyassa aruṇuggamanaṃ viya nibbānassa udayabhūto tappaṭibhāgo ca yathārahaṃ kilesanibbāpanato,
tika-vin01t2:184_8: patimokkhameva pātimokkhanti evaṃ tāvettha pātimokkhasaddassa attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:185_3: atthato pana tato tato vītikkamitabbato viratiyo ceva cetanā ca.
tika-vin01t2:186_0: Adhisīlanti vuccatīti anavasesato kāyikavācasikasaṃvarabhāvato ca maggasīlassa padaṭṭhānabhāvato ca pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ
tika-vin01t2:186_3: Nanu ca paccekabuddhāpi dhammatāvasena pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlena samannāgatāva honti,
tika-vin01t2:186_5: na vinā buddhuppādā”ti niyametvā vuttanti āha –
tika-vin01t2:186_8: na pana tesaṃ vasena vitthāritaṃ hutvā pavattatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:186_9: “Imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ imasmiṃ vītikkame idaṃ nāma hotī”ti paññapanaṃ aññesaṃ avisayo,
tika-vin01t2:186_13: Lokiyasīlassa adhisīlabhāvo pariyāyenāti nippariyāyameva taṃ dassetuṃ “pātimokkhasaṃvaratopi ca maggaphalasampayuttameva sīlaṃ adhisīla”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:186_14: Na hi taṃ samāpanno bhikkhūti gahaṭṭhesu sotāpannānaṃ sadāravītikkamasambhavato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:186_15: Tathā hi te saputtadārā agāraṃ ajjhāvasanti.
tika-vin01t2:187_0: Samādāpanaṃ samādānañcāti aññesaṃ samādāpanaṃ sayaṃ samādānañca.
tika-vin01t2:187_1: Adhicittanti vuccatīti maggasamādhissa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato adhicittanti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:187_2: Na vinā buddhuppādāti kiñcāpi paccekabuddhānaṃ vipassanāpādakaṃ aṭṭhasamāpatticittaṃ hotiyeva,
tika-vin01t2:187_3: na pana te tattha aññe samādāpetuṃ sakkontīti na tesaṃ vasena vitthāritaṃ hutvā pavattatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:187_4: Vipassanāpaññāyapi adhipaññatāsādhane “na vinā buddhuppādā”ti vacanaṃ imināva adhippāyena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:187_5: Lokiyacittassa adhicittatā pariyāyenāti nippariyāyameva taṃ dassetuṃ “tatopi ca maggaphalacittameva adhicitta”nti āha.
tika-vin01t2:187_6: Taṃ pana idha anadhippetanti iminā aṭṭhakathāvacanena lokiyacittassa vasena adhicittasikkhāpi idha adhippetāti viññāyati.
tika-vin01t2:187_7: Na hi taṃ samāpanno bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevatīti ca iminā lokiyaadhicittaṃ samāpanno methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevatīti āpannaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:187_8: Adhipaññāniddese ca “tatopi ca maggaphalapaññāva adhipaññā”ti vatvā “sā pana idha anadhippetā.
tika-vin01t2:187_9: Na hi taṃ samāpanno bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevatī”ti vuttattā lokiyapaññāvasena adhipaññāsikkhāyapi
tika-vin01t2:187_10: idhādhippetabhāvo taṃ samāpannassa methunadhammapaṭisevanañca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ anuññātanti viññāyati.
tika-vin01t2:187_12: ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā sikkhā”ti imāya pāḷiyā na sameti.
tika-vin01t2:187_15: tasmā pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya ca evamadhippāyo veditabbo –
tika-vin01t2:187_16: lokiyaadhicittaadhipaññāsamāpannassa tathārūpapaccayaṃ paṭicca “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevissāmī”ti citte
tika-vin01t2:187_17: uppanne tato adhicittato adhipaññato ca parihāni sambhavatīti taṃ dvayaṃ samāpannena na sakkā methunaṃ
