tika-vin01t2:187_21: Na hi cittuppādamattena pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ bhinnaṃ nāma hotīti.
tika-vin01t2:187_22: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana lokiyaadhicittato adhipaññato ca parihāyitvāpi bhikkhuno methunadhammapaṭisevanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:187_23: kadāci bhaveyyāti taṃ dvayaṃ appaṭikkhipitvā maggaphaladhammānaṃ akuppasabhāvattā taṃ samāpannassa bhikkhuno
tika-vin01t2:187_24: tato parihāyitvā methunadhammapaṭisevanaṃ nāma na kadāci sambhavatīti lokuttarādhicittaadhipaññānaṃyeva
tika-vin01t2:189_10: atthi loke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sammaggatā sammā paṭipannā,
tika-vin01t2:189_11: ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī’ti yā evarūpā paññā pajānanā…pe…
tika-vin01t2:189_14: Ṭhapetvā saccānulomikaṃ ñāṇaṃ sabbāpi sāsavā kusalā paññā kammassakataññāṇa”nti –
tika-vin01t2:191_0: Tattha atthi dinnantiādīsu dinnapaccayā phalaṃ atthīti iminā upāyena attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:191_6: atthi pitāti mātāpitūsu sammāpaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattiādīnaṃ phalasambhavo vutto.
tika-vin01t2:191_7: Idaṃ vuccatīti yaṃ ñāṇaṃ “idaṃ kammaṃ sakaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:191_10: Tattha tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ catubbidhaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ tividhaṃ manoduccaritanti idaṃ na sakakammaṃ nāma,
tika-vin01t2:191_11: tīsu dvāresu dasavidhampi sucaritaṃ sakakammaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t2:191_13: sabbampi akusalaṃ na sakakammaṃ nāma. Kasmā?
tika-vin01t2:191_18: Evaṃ jānanasamatthe imasmiṃ kammassakataññāṇe ṭhatvā bahuṃ dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ pūretvā uposathaṃ samādiyitvā
tika-vin01t2:191_19: sukhena sukhaṃ sampattiyā sampattiṃ anubhavitvā nibbānaṃ pattānaṃ sattānaṃ gaṇanaparicchedo natthi.
tika-vin01t2:191_20: Ṭhapetvā saccānulomikaṃ ñāṇanti maggasaccassa paramatthasaccassa ca anulomanato saccānulomikanti laddhanāmaṃ
tika-vin01t2:191_21: vipassanāñāṇaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā sabbāpi sāsavā kusalā paññā kammassakataññāṇamevāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:192_1: Adhipaññāti vuccatīti maggapaññāya adhiṭṭhānabhāvato vipassanāñāṇaṃ adhipaññāti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:195_0: Evaṃ atīte anāgate ca vaṭṭamūlakadukkhasallakkhaṇavasena saṃvegavatthutāya vimuttiākaṅkhāya paccayabhūtā kammassakatapaññā adhipaññātipi vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:195_1: Lokiyapaññāya adhipaññābhāvo pariyāyenāti nippariyāyameva taṃ dassetuṃ “tatopi ca maggaphalapaññāva adhipaññā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:196_0: Saha ājīvanti etthāti sājīvoti sabbasikkhāpadaṃ vuttanti āha –
tika-vin01t2:196_3: Tattha sikkhāpadanti “nāmakāyo padakāyo niruttikāyo byañjanakāyo”ti vuttaṃ bhagavato vacanasaṅkhātaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:196_6: Tasmiṃ sikkhatīti ettha ādheyyāpekkhattā adhikaraṇassa kimādheyyamapekkhitvā “tasmi”nti adhikaraṇaṃ niddiṭṭhanti āha –
tika-vin01t2:196_8: taṃ sājīvasaṅkhātaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ “yathāsikkhāpadaṃ nu kho sikkhāmi,
tika-vin01t2:196_9: na sikkhāmī”ti evaṃ pavattivasena sikkhāpadavisayattā tadādheyyabhūtassa cittassa adhikaraṇaṃ katvāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:196_10: Nanu ca “sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno”ti imassa padabhājanaṃ karontena “yaṃ sikkhaṃ sājīvañca samāpanno,
tika-vin01t2:196_14: tena vuccati sājīvasamāpanno”ti ettakameva kasmā vuttanti antolīnacodanaṃ sandhāyāha “na kevalañcāyametasmi”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t2:197_0: Tassā ca sikkhāyāti tassā adhisīlasaṅkhātāya sikkhāya. Sikkhaṃ paripūrentoti
tika-vin01t2:198_1: vārittasīlavasena viratisampayuttaṃ cetanaṃ cārittasīlavasena virativippayuttaṃ cetanañca attani pavattentoti attho.
tika-vin01t2:198_2: Tasmiñca sikkhāpade avītikkamanto sikkhatīti “nāmakāyo padakāyo niruttikāyo byañjanakāyo”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t2:198_3: bhagavato vacanasaṅkhātaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ avītikkamanto hutvā tasmiṃ yathāvuttasikkhāpade sikkhatīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:198_4: Sīlasaṃvarapūraṇaṃ sājīvānatikkamanañcāti idameva ca dvayaṃ idha sikkhanaṃ nāmāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:198_6: Sājīvānatikkamato hi yāva maggā sikkhāpāripūrī hoti.
tika-vin01t2:198_7: Apicettha “sikkhaṃ paripūrento sikkhatī”ti iminā viraticetanāsaṅkhātassa sīlasaṃvarassa visesato santāne pavattanakālova gahito,
tika-vin01t2:198_9: Sikkhañhi paripūraṇavasena attani pavattentopi niddādivasena appavattentopi vītikkamābhāvā “avītikkamanto sikkhatī”ti vuccatīti.
tika-vin01t2:201_0: “Appaccakkhāya appaccakkhātāyā”ti ubhayathāpi pāṭho tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vutto.
tika-vin01t2:201_1: Dubbalye āvikatepīti “yaṃnūnāhaṃ buddhaṃ paccakkheyya”ntiādinā dubbalabhāve pakāsitepi.
tika-vin01t2:201_2: Sikkhāya pana paccakkhātāyāti “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”tiādinā sikkhāya paccakkhātāya.
tika-vin01t2:201_3: Yasmā dirattavacane gahite tena purimapacchimapadāni saṃsiliṭṭhāni honti,
tika-vin01t2:201_6: Mukhāruḷhatāyāti yasmā evarūpaṃ vacanaṃ lokassa mukhamāruḷhaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:202_0: Byañjanaṃ sampādetīti tassa visuṃ atthābhāvato vuttamevatthaṃ aññapadena dīpento byañjanaṃ sampādeti.
tika-vin01t2:203_3: dubbalyāvikammañceva hoti sikkhā ca paccakkhātā”ti vuttattā ubhayampi hotīti āha –
tika-vin01t2:203_6: tathāpi “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti vutte sikkhāparipūraṇe dubbalyāvibhāvassapi gamyamānattā “sikkhāpaccakkhānassa
tika-vin01t2:203_8: Naṃ sandhāyāti naṃ atthabhūtaṃ dubbalyāvikammaṃ sandhāya.
tika-vin01t2:204_12: Anabhiratiyā pīḷito vikkhittacitto hutvā sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā uddhaṃmukho ito cito ca olokento āhiṇḍatīti āha “uddhaṃ kaṇṭhaṃ katvā viharamāno”ti.
tika-vin01t2:205_0: Aṭṭīyamānoti ettha aṭṭamiva attānamācarati aṭṭīyatīti aṭṭīyasaddassa antogadhaupamānabhūtakammattā upameyyabhūtena attanāva sakammakattaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:205_2: Na hi so bhikkhubhāvaṃ aṭṭamiva ācarati,
tika-vin01t2:205_3: kiñcarahi attānaṃ tasmā bhikkhubhāvena karaṇabhūtena attānaṃ aṭṭīyamānoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabboti āha “karaṇatthe upayogavacana”nti.
tika-vin01t2:205_4: Kaṇṭhe āsattena aṭṭīyeyyāti ettha pana karaṇattheyeva karaṇavacananti āha –
tika-vin01t2:205_9: Imasmiṃ panatthe aṭṭaṃ karotīti aṭṭīyatīti aṭṭīya-
tika-vin01t2:205_14: Jigucchamānoti iminā pana sambandhe kariyamāne bhikkhubhāvanti upayogatthe eva upayogavacananti āha –
tika-vin01t2:206_0: Paccakkhānākārena vuttānīti “paccakkheyyaṃ paccakkheyya”nti vuttattā paccakkhānākārasambandhena vuttāni.
tika-vin01t2:206_1: Bhāvavikappākārenāti “assaṃ assa”nti āgatattā yaṃ yaṃ bhavitukāmo,
tika-vin01t2:207_1: Na ussahāmīti attano tattha tattha ussahābhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:207_3: Na ramāmīti “pabbajjāmūlakaṃ natthi me sukha”nti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:208_0: Idāni sikkhāpaccakkhānavāre ṭhatvā ayaṃ vinicchayo veditabbo –
tika-vin01t2:208_3: Yathā hi loke sassānaṃ ruhanaṭṭhānaṃ “khetta”nti vuccati,
tika-vin01t2:208_10: sumuttāhaṃ buddhenā”tiādīhi anāmaṭṭhakālavasenapi paccakkhānaṃ hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:208_13: ummattakassa santike sikkhaṃ paccakkhātī”tiādīhi puggalaniyamaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:208_16: appaccakkhātā hoti sikkhā”tiādīhi puggalādiniyame satipi vijānananiyamāsambhavaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:208_18: appaccakkhātā hoti sikkhā”tiādīhi khettādiniyame satipi cittaniyamābhāvena na ruhatīti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:208_20: apaccakkhātā hoti sikkhā”ti iminā cittaniyamepi sati payoganiyamābhāvena na ruhatīti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:208_22: viññussa na sāvetī”ti etehi cittakhettakālapayogapuggalavijānananiyamepi sati yaṃ puggalaṃ uddissa sāveti,
tika-vin01t2:208_26: appaccakkhātā hoti sikkhā”ti idaṃ pana cittādiniyameneva sikkhā paccakkhātā hoti,
tika-vin01t2:208_28: Tasmā cittakhettakālapayogapuggalavijānananiyamavasena sikkhāya paccakkhānaṃ ñatvā tadabhāvena appaccakkhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:209_2: na davā vā ravā vā bhaṇantassa.
tika-vin01t2:210_9: sabrahmacāriṃ paccakkhāmī”ti evaṃ vuttānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ catuddasannaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:210_10: “gihīti maṃ dhārehi, upāsako, ārāmiko, sāmaṇero, titthiyo,
tika-vin01t2:210_12: asakyaputtiyoti maṃ dhārehī”ti evaṃ vuttānaṃ gihiādīnaṃ aṭṭhannañcāti imesaṃ dvāvīsatiyā khettapadānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:210_13: yassa kassaci savevacanassa vasena tesu ca yaṃkiñci vattukāmassa yaṃkiñci vadatopi sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:210_14: na rukkhādīnaṃ aññatarassa nāmaṃ gahetvā sikkhaṃ paccakkhantassa.
tika-vin01t2:211_0: Tattha yadetaṃ “paccakkhāmī”ti ca “maṃ dhārehī”ti ca vuttaṃ vattamānakālavacanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:211_4: sumuttāhaṃ buddhenā”tiādinā nayena ākhyātavasena kālaṃ anāmasitvā purimehi cuddasahi padehi saddhiṃ yojetvā vuttāni “alaṃ me”tiādīni cattāri padāni,
tika-vin01t2:211_5: tesaṃyeva ca savevacanānaṃ vasena paccakkhānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:211_6: na “paccakkhāsi”nti vā “paccakkhissa”nti vā “maṃ dhāresī”ti vā “dhāressasī”ti vā “yanūnāhaṃ paccakkheyya”nti
tika-vin01t2:211_8: Evaṃ vattamānakālavasena ceva anāmaṭṭhakālavasena ca paccakkhānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:212_1: Tattha “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”tiādinā nayena yāya kāyaci bhāsāya vacībhedaṃ katvā vācasikapayogeneva paccakkhānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:212_2: na akkharalikhanaṃ vā hatthamuddādidassanaṃ vā kāyapayogaṃ karontassa.
tika-vin01t2:213_0: Puggalo pana duvidho yo ca paccakkhāti,
tika-vin01t2:213_3: so sace ummattakakhittacittavedanāṭṭānaṃ aññataro na hoti.
tika-vin01t2:213_8: Na hi asammukhībhūtassa dūtena vā paṇṇena vā ārocanaṃ ruhati.
tika-vin01t2:214_1: Tattha yassa yesaṃ vā niyametvā “imassa imesaṃ vā ārocemī”ti vadati,
tika-vin01t2:214_2: sace te yathā pakatiyā loke manussā vacanaṃ sutvā āvajjanasamaye jānanti,
tika-vin01t2:214_3: evaṃ tassa vacanānantarameva tassa “ayaṃ ukkaṇṭhito”ti vā “gihibhāvaṃ patthayatī”ti vā yena kenaci ākārena sikkhāpaccakkhānabhāvaṃ jānanti,
tika-vin01t2:214_5: Atha aparabhāge “kiṃ iminā vutta”nti cintetvā jānanti,
tika-vin01t2:214_8: Aniyametvā ārocentassa pana sace vuttanayena yo koci manussajātiko vacanatthaṃ jānāti,
tika-vin01t2:214_12: Iti imesaṃ vuttappakārānaṃ cittādīnaṃ vaseneva sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:215_1: “Vadatī”ti vacībhedappayogaṃ dassetvā tadanantaraṃ “viññāpetī”ti vuttattā teneva vacībhedena adhippāyaviññāpanaṃ idhādhippetaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:215_2: na yena kenaci upāyenāti āha “teneva vacībhedenā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:215_6: pattaṃ āharā”ti aniyamitena padappayogena tadatthaviññāpanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:215_8: paccakkhāmi buddha”nti aniyamitena padappayogena tadatthaviññāpanaṃ hotiyevāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:215_10: na saddappadhānoti āha “milakkhabhāsāsu vā aññatarabhāsāya tamatthaṃ vadeyyā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:215_11: Māgadhabhāsato avasiṭṭhā sabbāpi andhadamiḷādibhāsā milakkhabhāsāti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:215_12: Khettapadesu ekaṃ vattukāmo sacepi aññaṃ vadeyya,
tika-vin01t2:215_13: khettapadantogadhattā paccakkhātāva hoti sikkhāti dassento āha “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmīti vattukāmo”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:215_14: Yadipi “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti vattuṃ anicchanto cittena taṃ paṭikkhipitvā aññaṃ vattukāmo puna virajjhitvā tameva vadeyya,
tika-vin01t2:215_15: tathāpi sāsanato cavitukāmatācitte sati khettapadasseva vuttattā aṅgapāripūrisambhavato hotveva sikkhāpaccakkhānanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:215_16: Khettameva otiṇṇanti sikkhāpaccakkhānassa ruhanaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ khettameva otiṇṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:216_1: nevatthi sikkhāpaccakkhānanti dassento āha “sace pana buddhaṃ paccakkhinti vā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:216_2: Vadati viññāpetīti ettha vadatīti iminā payogassa niyamitattā ekassa santike attano vacībhedappayogeneva sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:216_3: na dūtasāsanādippayogenāti dassento āha “dūtaṃ vā pahiṇātī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:216_4: Tattha “mama sikkhāpaccakkhānabhāvaṃ kathehī”ti mukhasāsanavasena “dūtaṃ vā pahiṇātī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:216_5: Paṇṇe likhitvā pahiṇanavasena “sāsanaṃ vā pesetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:216_6: Rukkhādīsu akkharāni likhitvā dassanavasena “akkharaṃ vā chindatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:216_7: Hatthamuddāya vā tamatthaṃ ārocetīti hatthena adhippāyaviññāpanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:216_9: saddo cettha tadekadesesu aṅgulīsu daṭṭhabbo “na sabbaṃ hatthaṃ mukhe pakkhipissāmī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin01t2:216_10: Tasmā adhippāyaviññāpakena aṅgulisaṅkocādinā hatthavikārena tamatthaṃ ārocetīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t2:217_1: Idāni vijānanavasena sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ niyamitāniyamitavasena dvidhā veditabbanti dassento āha –
tika-vin01t2:217_3: Ayañca vibhāgo “vadati viññāpetīti ekavisayattā yassa vadati,
tika-vin01t2:217_5: na aññassā”ti iminā nayena laddhoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:217_8: Soyeva jānātīti avadhāraṇena tasmiṃ avijānanteyeva aññassa jānanaṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-vin01t2:217_13: Tasmā “ayameva jānātū”ti ekaṃ niyametvā ārocite yadipi sopi jānāti aññopi,
tika-vin01t2:217_14: niyamitassa pana niyamitavasena vijānanasambhavato sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hotiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ “añño mā jānātū”ti aniyamitattā.
tika-vin01t2:217_15: Dvinnampi niyametvāti idaṃ “dve vā jānantu eko vā,
tika-vin01t2:217_16: imesaṃyeva dvinnaṃ ārocemī”ti evaṃ niyametvā ārocanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:217_20: eko mā jānātū”ti evaṃ dvinnaṃ niyametvā ārocite dvīsuyeva jānantesu sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:218_4: idha pana tadadhippāyajānanamattenapi samayaññū nāma hoti.
tika-vin01t2:218_8: Tasmā “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti imassa atthaṃ ñatvāpi sace “ayaṃ bhikkhubhāvato cavitukāmo,
tika-vin01t2:218_11: Sace pana “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti vacanassa atthaṃ ajānitvāpi “ukkaṇṭhito gihī hotukāmo”ti adhippāyaṃ jānāti,
tika-vin01t2:218_16: Na hi ekasmiṃyeva khaṇe saddasavanaṃ tadatthavijānanañca sambhavati.
tika-vin01t2:218_17: Tathā hi “ghaṭo”ti vā “paṭo”ti vā kenaci vutte tattha gha-
tika-vin01t2:218_18: saddaṃ paccuppannaṃ gahetvā ekā sotaviññāṇavīthi uppajjitvā nirujjhati,
tika-vin01t2:218_19: tadanantaraṃ ekā manoviññāṇavīthi tameva atītaṃ gahetvā uppajjati.
tika-vin01t2:218_20: Evaṃ tena vuttavacane yattakāni akkharāni honti,
tika-vin01t2:218_21: tesu ekamekaṃ akkharaṃ paccuppannamatītañca gahetvā sotaviññāṇavīthiyā manoviññāṇavīthiyā ca uppajjitvā
tika-vin01t2:218_22: niruddhāya avasāne tāni akkharāni sampiṇḍetvā akkharasamūhaṃ gahetvā ekā manoviññāṇavīthi uppajjitvā
tika-vin01t2:218_24: Tadanantaraṃ “ayamakkharasamūho etassa nāma”nti nāmapaññattiggahaṇavasena aparāya manoviññāṇavīthiyā
tika-vin01t2:218_25: uppajjitvā niruddhāya tadanantaraṃ uppannāya manoviññāṇavīthiyā “ayametassa attho”ti pakatiyā tadatthavijānanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:219_5: Teneva vacībhedena adhippāyaviññāpanassa idhādhippetattā aparabhāge “kiṃ iminā vutta”nti taṃ kaṅkhantassa
tika-vin01t2:219_6: cirena adhippāyavijānanaṃ aññenapi kenaci upāyantarena sambhavati,
tika-vin01t2:219_10: “Gihī bhavissāmī”ti vutte atthabhedo kālabhedo ca hotīti appaccakkhātā hoti sikkhā.
tika-vin01t2:219_11: “Dhārehī”ti hi imassa yo attho kālo ca,
tika-vin01t2:219_16: gihīmhī”ti etthāpi atthassa ceva kālassa ca bhinnattā appaccakkhātā hoti sikkhā.
tika-vin01t2:219_17: “Ajja paṭṭhāyā”ti idaṃ tathā vuttepi dosabhāvato paripuṇṇaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:219_18: “Dhārehī”ti atthappadhānattā niddesassa pariyāyavacanehipi sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hotiyevāti dassento āha “jānāhī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:219_19: Dhārehi jānāhi sañjānāhi manasi karohīti hi etāni padāni atthato kālato ca abhinnāni.
tika-vin01t2:221_0: 53. Vaṇṇapaṭṭhānanti mahāsaṅghikānaṃ buddhaguṇaparidīpakaṃ ekaṃ suttanti vadanti. Upāligāthāsūti –
tika-vin01t2:283_2: Yasmā “sammāsambuddhaṃ anantabuddhiṃ anomabuddhiṃ bodhipaññāṇa”nti imāni vaṇṇapaṭṭhāne āgatanāmāni,
tika-vin01t2:283_5: taṃ sañjānanahetuttā paññāṇaṃ etassāti bodhipaññāṇo, bhagavā.
tika-vin01t2:283_9: Sabbaputhujjane vijiniṃsu vijayanti vijinissanti cāti vijayā. Ke te?
tika-vin01t2:283_11: Te vijitā vijayā etenāti vijitavijayo, bhagavā.
tika-vin01t2:283_12: Kilesamāramaccumāravijayeneva panettha abhisaṅkhārakkhandhamārāpi vijitāva hontīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:284_2: Yathā hi aññatitthiyānaṃ dhammassa attho vipallāsaṃ āpajjati “antarāyikā”ti vuttadhammānaṃ antarāyikattābhāvato,
tika-vin01t2:284_5: na tathā bhagavato dhammassa attho vipallāsaṃ āpajjati “ime dhammā antarāyikā niyyānikā”ti evaṃ vuttadhammānaṃ tathābhāvānatikkamanatoti.
tika-vin01t2:285_0: Lokuttaradhammo pana nibbānānurūpāya paṭipattiyā paṭipadānurūpassa ca nibbānassa akkhātattā svākkhāto. Yathāha –
tika-vin01t2:286_0: “Supaññattā kho pana tena bhagavatā sāvakānaṃ nibbānagāminī paṭipadā saṃsandati nibbānañca paṭipadā ca.
tika-vin01t2:286_1: Seyyathāpi nāma gaṅgodakaṃ yamunodakena saṃsandati sameti,
tika-vin01t2:286_2: evameva supaññattā tena bhagavatā sāvakānaṃ nibbānagāminī paṭipadā saṃsandati nibbānañca paṭipadā cā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:287_0: Ariyamaggo cettha antadvayaṃ anupagamma majjhimāpaṭipadābhūtova “majjhimā paṭipadā”ti akkhātattā svākkhāto.
tika-vin01t2:287_2: Nibbānaṃ sassatāmatatāṇaleṇādisabhāvameva sassatādisabhāvavasena akkhātattā svākkhātanti evaṃ lokuttaradhammopi svākkhāto.
tika-vin01t2:288_0: Ariyamaggo attano santāne rāgādīnaṃ abhāvaṃ karontena ariyapuggalena sāmaṃ daṭṭhabbo “ariyamaggena mama
tika-vin01t2:288_1: rāgādayo pahīnā”ti sayaṃ attanā anaññaneyyena passitabboti sandiṭṭhi,
tika-vin01t2:288_3: Apica navavidho lokuttaradhammo yena yena adhigato hoti,
tika-vin01t2:288_4: tena tena ariyasāvakena parasaddhāya gantabbataṃ hitvā paccakkhañāṇena sayaṃ daṭṭhabboti sandiṭṭhiko.
tika-vin01t2:288_11: evaṃ navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo sandiṭṭhiyā jayatīti sandiṭṭhiko.
tika-vin01t2:288_16: Lokuttaradhammo hi bhāvanābhisamayavasena sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena ca dissamānoyeva vaṭṭabhayaṃ nivatteti,
tika-vin01t2:289_0: Attano phaladānaṃ sandhāya nāssa āgametabbo kālo atthīti akālo.
tika-vin01t2:289_1: Yathā hi lokiyakusalassa upapajjaaparāpariyāyetiādinā phaladānaṃ pati āgametabbo kālo atthi,
tika-vin01t2:289_4: na pañcāhasattāhādibhedaṃ kālaṃ khepetvā phalaṃ deti,
tika-vin01t2:289_5: attano pana pavattisamanantarameva phaladoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:289_6: Atha vā attano phalappadāne vippakaṭṭho dūro kālo patto upanīto assāti kāliko,
tika-vin01t2:289_9: Ayaṃ pana samanantaraphaladāyakattā na kālikoti akāliko.
tika-vin01t2:290_0: “Ehi passa imaṃ dhamma”nti evaṃ pavattaṃ ehipassavidhiṃ arahatīti ehipassiko.
tika-vin01t2:290_3: Rittamuṭṭhiyañhi hiraññaṃ vā suvaṇṇaṃ vā atthīti vatvāpi “ehi passa ima”nti na sakkā vattuṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin01t2:290_5: Vijjamānampi ca gūthaṃ vā muttaṃ vā manuññabhāvappakāsanena cittasampahaṃsanatthaṃ “ehi passa ima”nti na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:290_6: apica kho naṃ tiṇehi vā paṇṇehi vā paṭicchādetabbameva hoti. Kasmā?
tika-vin01t2:290_8: Ayaṃ pana navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo sabhāvato ca vijjamāno vigatavalāhake ca ākāse sampuṇṇacandamaṇḍalaṃ
tika-vin01t2:290_9: viya paṇḍukambale nikkhittajātimaṇi viya ca parisuddho,
tika-vin01t2:290_10: tasmā vijjamānattā parisuddhattā ca ehipassavidhiṃ arahatīti ehipassiko.
tika-vin01t2:291_3: ādittaṃ celaṃ vā sīsaṃ vā ajjhupekkhitvāpi bhāvanāvasena attano citte upanayanaṃ uppādanaṃ arahatīti opaneyyiko.
tika-vin01t2:291_5: asaṅkhato pana attano citte ārammaṇabhāvena upanayanaṃ arahatīti opaneyyiko,
tika-vin01t2:291_7: Atha vā nibbānaṃ upaneti ariyapuggalanti ariyamaggo upaneyyo,
tika-vin01t2:292_2: sacchikato nirodho”ti attani attani veditabboti paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhi.
tika-vin01t2:292_3: Na hi upajjhāyena bhāvitena maggena saddhivihārikassa kilesā pahīyanti,
tika-vin01t2:292_4: na so tassa phalasamāpattiyā phāsu viharati,
tika-vin01t2:292_6: tasmā na esa parassa sīse ābharaṇaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo,
tika-vin01t2:293_0: Asaṅkhatanti saṅgamma samāgamma paccayasamodhānalakkhaṇena saṅgamena sannipatitvā anurūpehi paccayehi akataṃ anibbattitanti asaṅkhataṃ.
tika-vin01t2:293_2: etasmiṃ vā adhigate natthi puggalassa mataṃ maraṇanti amataṃ.
tika-vin01t2:293_3: Kiñcāpi ettha “svākkhātaṃ dhammaṃ paccakkhāmī”tiādinā sabbattha dhamma-
tika-vin01t2:293_6: saddena ayojetvā vutte vevacane na paccakkhānaṃ nāma na hotīti “svākkhātaṃ paccakkhāmī”tiādinā vuttepi sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hotiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:294_0: Suppaṭipannanti svākkhāte dhammavinaye yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipannattā suppaṭipannaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:294_1: Majjhimāya paṭipadāya antadvayaṃ anupagamma paṭipannattā kāyavacīmanovaṅkakuṭilajimhadosappahānāya paṭipannattā ca ujuppaṭipannaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:294_2: Ñāyo vuccati nibbānaṃ ariyamaggādīhi ñāyati paṭivijjhīyati sacchikarīyatīti katvā,
tika-vin01t2:294_4: Yathā paṭipannā guṇasambhāvanāya parehi kariyamānaṃ paccuṭṭhānādisāmīcikammaṃ arahanti,
tika-vin01t2:295_0: Yugaḷavasena paṭhamamaggaṭṭho phalaṭṭhoti idamekaṃ yugaḷanti evaṃ cattāri purisayugāni honti.
tika-vin01t2:295_1: Ettha pana “catupurisayugaṃ saṅgha”nti vattabbe “cattārī”ti vibhattilopaṃ akatvā niddeso katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:295_2: Cattāri purisayugāni etthāti catupurisayugoti hi saṅgho vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:295_4: eko phalaṭṭhoti iminā nayena aṭṭheva purisapuggalā honti.
tika-vin01t2:295_6: Ettha ca purisoti vā puggaloti vā ekatthānetāni padāni,
tika-vin01t2:296_1: dūratopi ānetvā sīlavantesu dātabbānaṃ catunnaṃ paccayānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:296_2: Taṃ āhunaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ yutto tassa mahapphalabhāvakaraṇatoti āhuneyyo, saṅgho.
tika-vin01t2:296_3: Atha vā dūratopi āgantvā sabbasāpateyyampi ettha hunitabbanti āhavanīyo,
tika-vin01t2:297_0: “Yo ca vassasataṃ jantu, aggiṃ paricare vane;
tika-vin01t2:299_0: Sāyeva pūjanā seyyo, yañce vassasataṃ huta”nti. ;
tika-vin01t2:300_0: Tadetaṃ nikāyantare “āhavanīyo”ti padaṃ idha “āhuneyyo”ti iminā padena atthato ekaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:301_0: Pāhuneyyanti ettha pana pāhunaṃ vuccati disāvidisato āgatānaṃ piyamanāpānaṃ ñātimittānaṃ atthāya sakkārena paṭiyattaṃ āgantukadānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:301_1: Tampi ṭhapetvā te tathārūpe piyamittādike pāhunake saṅghasseva dātuṃ yuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:301_5: abbokiṇṇañca piyamanāpattakarehi sīlādidhammehi samannāgatoti evaṃ pāhunamassa dātuṃ yuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:302_0: Dakkhanti etāya sattā yathādhippetāhi sampattīhi vaḍḍhantīti dakkhiṇā,
tika-vin01t2:302_3: dakkhiṇāya vā hito yasmā naṃ mahapphalakaratāya visodhetīti dakkhiṇeyyo.
tika-vin01t2:302_4: Ubho hatthe sirasi patiṭṭhāpetvā sabbalokena kariyamānaṃ añjalikammaṃ arahatīti añjalikaraṇīyo.
tika-vin01t2:302_6: Yathā hi rañño vā amaccassa vā sālīnaṃ vā yavānaṃ vā viruhanaṭṭhānaṃ rañño sālikkhettaṃ yavakkhettanti vuccati,
tika-vin01t2:302_8: Saṅghaṃ nissāya hi lokassa nānappakārahitasukhasaṃvattanikāni puññāni viruhanti,
tika-vin01t2:302_13: tasmā “suppaṭipannaṃ paccakkhāmī”tiādinā vuttepi sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hotiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:303_3: saddo ca sikkhāya adhivacanaṃ na hotīti “bhikkhusikkhaṃ bhikkhunīsikkha”nti vutteyeva sīsaṃ eti,
tika-vin01t2:303_4: adhisīlādayo pana sikkhā evāti “adhisīlaṃ paccakkhāmī”tiādinā vuttepi sīsaṃ eti.
tika-vin01t2:304_0: Upajjhāyavevacanesu upajjhāyo hutvā yo pabbājesi ceva upasampādesi ca,
tika-vin01t2:304_2: Yassa mūlenāti yassa padhānabhāvena kāraṇabhāvena vā.
tika-vin01t2:304_3: Yassa mūlaṃ padhānabhāvo kāraṇabhāvo vā etissāti yassamūlikā,
tika-vin01t2:304_5: saddassa sāpekkhabhāvepi niccasāpekkhatāya gamakattā taddhitavutti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-vin01t2:305_0: Ācariyavevacanesu pana yo upajjhaṃ adatvā ācariyova hutvā pabbājesi,
tika-vin01t2:305_4: Imehi dvīhi vacanehi pabbajjācariyo ca upasampadācariyo ca dassito.
tika-vin01t2:305_10: Tassa mūleti ettha pana tassa santiketi attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t2:306_0: Okallakoti khuppipāsādidukkhaparetānaṃ khīṇasukhānaṃ nahānādisarīrapaṭijagganarahitānaṃ kapaṇamanussānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:306_3: tathāpi tadā labbhamānanāmaṃ gahetvā vuttepi sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hotiyevāti dassanatthaṃ “dvevāciko upāsako”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:306_5: tasmā “dvevācikoti maṃ dhārehī”ti ettakepi vutte sīsaṃ eti.
tika-vin01t2:308_2: Asucisaṅkassarasamācāroti aparisuddhakāyakammāditāya asuci hutvā saṅkāya saritabbasamācāro.
tika-vin01t2:308_3: Dussīlo hi kiñcideva asāruppaṃ disvā “idaṃ asukena kataṃ bhavissatī”ti paresaṃ āsaṅkanīyo hoti.
tika-vin01t2:308_4: Kenacideva karaṇīyena mantayante bhikkhū disvā “kacci nu kho ime mayā katakammaṃ jānitvā mantentī”ti attanoyeva saṅkāya saritabbasamācāro.
tika-vin01t2:308_10: pūtinā kammena sīlavipattiyā anto anupaviṭṭhattā antopūti,
tika-vin01t2:309_0: “Yāni vā panaññānipi atthi buddhavevacanāni vā”tiādinā yaṃ-
tika-vin01t2:309_5: Kathaṃ pana tāni ākārādisaddehi voharīyantīti āha “vevacanāni hī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:309_7: saṇṭhānarahitānaṃ pana dhammasikkhādīnaṃ kathanti āha “sikkhāpaccakkhānasaṇṭhānattā eva vā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:309_9: Evaṃ khoti ettha khoti avadhāraṇatthe nipātoti āha “evamevā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:310_4: Na hi sabbāpi devatā tihetukapaṭisandhikāva honti dvihetukānampi sambhavato.
tika-vin01t2:310_5: Atikhippaṃ jānantīti devatānaṃ bhavaṅgaparivāsassa manussānaṃ viya adandhabhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:311_5: Aññaṃ bhaṇissāmīti aññaṃ bhaṇanto buddhaṃ paccakkhāmīti bhaṇatīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:311_6: Akkharasamayānabhiññatāya vā karaṇasampattiyā abhāvato vā kathetabbaṃ kathetuṃ asakkonto hutvā aññaṃ kathento ravā bhaṇati nāma.
tika-vin01t2:311_7: Ubhayathāpi aññaṃ bhaṇitukāmassa aññabhaṇanaṃ samānanti āha “purimena ko viseso”ti.
tika-vin01t2:312_0: Vācetīti pāḷiṃ kathento aññaṃ uggaṇhāpento vā vāceti.
tika-vin01t2:312_1: Paripucchatīti pāḷiyā atthaṃ paripucchanto pāḷiṃ paripucchati.
tika-vin01t2:312_4: Vaṇṇetīti pāḷiyā atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇento pāḷiṃ vaṇṇeti.
tika-vin01t2:312_5: Mahallakassa kiñci ajānanato aviditindriyatāya vā “potthakarūpasadisassā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:312_7: Garumedhassāti ārammaṇesu lahuppavattiyā abhāvato dandhagatikatāya garupaññassa,
tika-vin01t2:312_9: Sabbaso vāti iminā “idaṃ padaṃ sāvessāmi ‘sikkhaṃ paccakkhāmī”’ti evaṃ pavattacittuppādassa abhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:312_10: Yasmā pana asati evarūpe cittuppāde kenaci pariyāyena tathāvidhaṃ vacībhedaṃ katvā sāvanaṃ nāma neva sambhavati,
tika-vin01t2:316_0: Dvīhi dvīhi samāpajjitabbā dvayaṃdvayasamāpattīti āha “dvayena dvayena samāpajjitabbato”ti.
tika-vin01t2:317_1: tasmā “paṭisevati nāmāti kasmā uddhaṭa”nti yo maññati,
tika-vin01t2:317_4: Itthiyā nimittenāti idaṃ “maggena gacchatī”tiādi viya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:317_7: evaṃ “itthiyā nimittena pavesetī”ti vutte “itthiyā nimittaṃ paveseti,
tika-vin01t2:317_11: Pavesanaṃ nāma na bahi chupanamattanti āha “vātena asamphuṭṭhe allokāse”ti.
tika-vin01t2:317_14: Abbhantaranti ca pakatiyā sabbaso pihitassa nimittassa vātena asamphuṭṭhokāso vuccatīti.
tika-vin01t2:318_0: Idāni sabbathā lesokāsapidahanatthaṃ itthinimitte purisanimitte ca labbhamānaṃ pavesakāle aññamaññaṃ
tika-vin01t2:318_1: phassārahaṃ padesavisesaṃ vibhajitvā dassento “itthinimitte cattāri passānī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:318_2: Vātena hi asamphuṭṭhe allokāse yattha katthaci ekenapi padesena chupitvā pavesento “pavesetī”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:318_3: Vemajjhanti yathā cattāri passāni asamphusanto paveseti,
tika-vin01t2:318_5: purisanimitte pana majjhanti aggakoṭiṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin01t2:318_7: Idañca majjhena samiñjitvā pavesentassa majjhimapabbasamiñjitaṅguliṃ katthaci pavesentassa aṅguliyā majjhimapabbapiṭṭhisadisaṃ
tika-vin01t2:318_9: Heṭṭhā pavesentoti itthinimittassa heṭṭhimabhāgena chupantaṃ pavesento.
tika-vin01t2:318_10: Majjhena pavesentoti abbhantaratalaṃ chupitvā majjhena pavesento.
tika-vin01t2:318_11: Katthaci acchupantaṃ pavesetvā nīharantassa hi natthi pārājikaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:318_12: dukkaṭaṃ pana hoti chinnasīsavatthusmiṃ vaṭṭakate mukhe acchupantaṃ pavesetvā nīharantassa viya.
tika-vin01t2:318_13: Majjheneva chupantaṃ pavesentoti aggakoṭiyā chupantaṃ pavesento.
tika-vin01t2:318_15: Atha vā samiñjitaṅguliṃ majjhimapabbapiṭṭhiyā pavesento viyāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:318_18: Idāni purisanimittassa heṭṭhā vuttesu chasu ṭhānesu uparīti vuttaṭṭhānantarassa vasena visuṃ cattāri
tika-vin01t2:318_19: passāni gahetvā purisanimitte dasadhā ṭhānabhedaṃ dassento “tatthā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:318_20: Heṭṭhā pana visuṃ tāni aggahetvā “cattāri passānī”ti vacanasāmaññatopi visuṃ visuṃ labbhamānāni ekaccaṃ gahetvā cha ṭhānāni vuttāni.
tika-vin01t2:319_3: Nimitte jātampi cammakhīlādi nimittamevāti āha “āpatti pārājikassā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:319_7: Sati hi upādinnabhāve upahatepi kāyappasāde upahatindriyavatthusmiṃ viya pārājikāpattiyeva siyā,
tika-vin01t2:319_8: matacammaṃ pana sukkhapīḷakañca anupādinnakaṃ upādinnakeyeva ca pārājikāpatti.
tika-vin01t2:319_10: Na ca evaṃ karontassa anāpatti sakkā vattunti dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:319_12: Mate akkhāyite yebhuyyena akkhāyite pārājikāpattivacanato methunassādenāti iminā kāyasaṃsaggarāgaṃ nivatteti.
tika-vin01t2:319_14: bījānipi nimittasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchantīti dukkaṭameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:320_0: Idāni imissā methunakathāya asabbhirūpattā “īdisaṃ ṭhānaṃ kathentehi suṇantehi ca evaṃ paṭipajjitabba”nti
tika-vin01t2:320_2: Methunakathāya rāgavuddhihetuttā hāsavisayattā ca tadubhayanivattanatthaṃ paṭikūlamanasikārādīsu niyojeti.
tika-vin01t2:321_1: yena kenaci pamādena kadāci mandahāso bhaveyya,
tika-vin01t2:321_3: tasmā tādise kāle garubhāvassa avikopanatthaṃ bījakena mukhaṃ paṭicchādetvā nisīditabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:321_4: Atha vā mukhaṃ apidhāyāti mukhaṃ pidahitvāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:321_5: Bījakena mukhaṃ paṭicchādetvā hasamānena na nisīditabbanti ayamettha adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:321_6: Dantavidaṃsakanti dante dassetvā vivaritvā cāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:321_9: Yadi hi “īdisaṃ nāma asabbhiṃ kathemī”ti saṅkocaṃ āpajjeyya,
tika-vin01t2:321_12: kimaṅgaṃ panāhaṃ kathemī”ti evaṃ ussāhajātena kathetabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:324_3: tasmā na sabbāva tiracchānagatitthiyo pārājikavatthubhūtāti pavesanappahonakavasena labbhamānakatiracchānagatitthiyo
tika-vin01t2:324_5: Apadānaṃ ahimacchātiādigāthā pārājikavatthūnaṃ heṭṭhimaparicchedadassanatthaṃ porāṇehi ṭhapitā.
tika-vin01t2:324_6: Tattha ahīti jātiniddesena sabbāpi sappajāti saṅgahitāti āha –
tika-vin01t2:324_14: Teneva maṇḍūkakacchapānaṃ sapādakattepi odakajātikattā saṅgaho kato.
tika-vin01t2:325_1: Vaṇasaṅkhepaṃ gacchatīti vaṇasaṅgahaṃ gacchati navasu vaṇamukhesu saṅgahitattāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:325_4: Tasmiñhi sutte dvīsu sambhinnavaṇesu ekena vaṇena pavesetvā dutiyena nīharantassa thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:325_5: Vakkhati ca “imassa suttassa anulomavasena sabbattha vaṇasaṅkhepe thullaccayaṃ veditabba”nti.
tika-vin01t2:326_3: kāraṃ katvā pārājikoti niddiṭṭhoti āha “pārājikoti parājito”ti.
tika-vin01t2:326_5: katthaci sikkhāpadanti idaṃ pana disvā jānitabba”nti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:326_8: saddena sikkhāpadaṃ āpatti ca vuccatīti dassento āha “yo taṃ atikkamatī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:326_10: saddena vuccatīti dassento āha “puggalo yasmā parājito”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:327_0: Etameva hi atthaṃ sandhāyāti “taṃ āpattiṃ āpanno puggalo parājito hoti parājayamāpanno”ti etamatthaṃ sandhāya.
tika-vin01t2:327_1: Cuto paraddhotiādinā hi taṃ āpattiṃ āpannapuggalo cuto hoti parājito parājayaṃ āpannoti ayamattho viññāyati,
tika-vin01t2:327_2: na pana puggalo pārājiko nāma hotīti etamatthaṃ sandhāyāti evamattho gahetabbo.
tika-vin01t2:327_3: Na hi parivārepi gāthā puggalavuttipārājikasaddanibbacanadassanatthaṃ vuttā āpattivuttīnaṃ pārājikā-
tika-vin01t2:327_7: taṃ āpajjanto puggalo yasmā parājito parājayamāpanno saddhamā cuto paraddho bhaṭṭho niraṅkato ca hoti,
tika-vin01t2:327_8: anīhaṭe tasmiṃ puggale puna uposathapavāraṇādibhedo saṃvāso natthi,
tika-vin01t2:327_9: tenetaṃ iti vuccati tena kāraṇena etaṃ āpattipārājikaṃ iti vuccatīti.
tika-vin01t2:328_3: Pakatattā nāma pārājikaṃ anāpannā anukkhittā ca.
tika-vin01t2:328_5: Nahāpitapubbakānaṃ viya odhisaanuññātaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ sabbampi sikkhāpadaṃ sabbehipi lajjīpuggalehi
tika-vin01t2:328_10: Sāmaññasikkhāpadesu “idaṃ tayā na sikkhitabba”nti evaṃ abahikātabbato “na ekopi tato bahiddhā sandissatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:329_1: Na kevalaṃ itthiyā eva nimittaṃ pārājikavatthūti iminā kevalaṃ itthiyā eva nimittaṃ pārājikavatthu na hoti,
tika-vin01t2:329_2: atha kho ubhatobyañjanakapaṇḍakapurisānampi nimittaṃ pārājikavatthūti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:329_3: Na ca manussitthiyā evāti iminā pana manussitthiyā eva nimittaṃ pārājikavatthu na hoti,
tika-vin01t2:329_5: “Vatthumeva na hotīti amanussitthipasaṅgena āgataṃ suvaṇṇarajatādimayaṃ paṭikkhipatī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:329_7: Na hi ito pubbe amanussitthiggahaṇaṃ kataṃ atthi,
tika-vin01t2:329_10: na ca amanussitthiggahaṇena suvaṇṇarajatādimayānaṃ pasaṅgo yutto.
tika-vin01t2:329_11: Manussāmanussatiracchānajātivasena tividhā katvā pārājikavatthubhūtasattānaṃ niddesena suvaṇṇarajatādimayānaṃ pasaṅgassa nivattitattā.
tika-vin01t2:329_12: Tathā hi itthipurisādīsu manussāmanussādīsu vā kañci anāmasitvā avisesena “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyā”ti ettakameva mātikāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:329_13: Tassa padabhājane ca “paṭisevati nāmā”ti mātikaṃ padaṃ uddharitvā “yo nimittena nimittaṃ aṅgajātena aṅgajātaṃ antamaso tilaphalamattampi paveseti,
tika-vin01t2:329_15: na pana pārājikavatthubhūtanimittanissayā manussāmanussatiracchānagatā itthipurisapaṇḍakaubhatobyañjanakā niyametvā dassitā,
tika-vin01t2:329_16: tasmā “itthiyā eva nu kho nimittaṃ pārājikavatthu,
tika-vin01t2:329_24: Tasmā tadāsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ pārājikavatthubhūtasattaniyamanatthañca jātivasena manussāmanussādito tidhā
tika-vin01t2:329_25: katvā pārājikavatthubhūte satte bhagavā vibhajitvā dasseti,
tika-vin01t2:329_26: tasmā “vatthumeva na hotī”ti nimittasāmaññato pasaṅgāgataṃ suvaṇṇarajatādimayānaṃ nimittaṃ paṭikkhipatīti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:330_0: Tayo maggeti bhummatthe upayogavacananti āha “tīsu maggesūti attho veditabbo”ti.
tika-vin01t2:330_1: Evaṃ sabbatthāti iminā “dve magge”ti etthāpi dvīsu maggesūti attho veditabboti atidissati.
tika-vin01t2:333_1: Assāti ākhyātikapadanti tassa atthaṃ dassento “hotī”ti āha.
tika-vin01t2:333_2: Gaṇṭhipadesu pana “assāti puggalaṃ parāmasitvā hotīti vacanaseso dassito”tipi atthavikappo dassito,
tika-vin01t2:333_6: teneva aññasmiṃ atthavikappe hotīti vacanaseso kato.
tika-vin01t2:334_1: Sādiyantassevāti ettha sādiyanaṃ nāma sevetukāmatācittassa upaṭṭhāpananti āha “paṭisevanacittasamaṅgissā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:334_2: “Paṭipakkhaṃ atthayantīti sikkhākāmānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭipakkhaṃ dussīlabhāvaṃ atthayantī”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:334_3: Attano veripuggalassa pana paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ kañci amittaṃ atthayanti gavesantīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t2:334_4: Paccatthikā hi attano veriṃ nāsetukāmā tassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ kañci amittaṃ attano sahāyabhāvamupagacchantaṃ icchanti.
tika-vin01t2:334_5: Rājapaccatthikādīnaṃ upari vakkhamānattā tadanurūpavasena atthaṃ dassento “bhikkhū eva paccatthikā bhikkhupaccatthikā”ti āha.
tika-vin01t2:334_6: “Bhikkhussa paccatthikā bhikkhupaccatthikā”ti evaṃ pana vuccamāne bhikkhussa paccatthikā rājādayopi ettheva
tika-vin01t2:334_7: saṅgayhantīti rājapaccatthikādayo visuṃ na vattabbā siyuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:334_8: aññattha pana bhikkhussa paccatthikā bhikkhupaccatthikāti ayamattho labbhateva “sāsanapaccatthikā”ti yathā.
tika-vin01t2:335_2: Sādiyanaṃ nāma sevanacittassa uppādananti āha “sevanacittaṃ upaṭṭhāpetī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:335_5: Evaṃ paviṭṭhassa uddharaṇārambhato antarā ṭhitakālo ṭhitaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t2:335_6: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana mātugāmassa sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ patvā sabbathā vāyamato oramitvā ṭhitakālaṃ sandhāya “sukkavissaṭṭhisamaye”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:335_7: Uddharaṇaṃ nāma yāva aggā nīharaṇakāloti āha –
tika-vin01t2:335_10: Evarūpe kāle asādiyanaṃ nāma na sabbesaṃ visayoti āha “imañhi evarūpaṃ āraddhavipassaka”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t2:335_16: Bhagavatā ca dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggaho icchitoyevāti āha –
tika-vin01t2:339_5: Evaṃ vinayagarukānanti iminā upari tehi vuccamānavinicchayassa garukaraṇīyatāya kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:339_6: Sabbaṃ pariyādiyitvāti sabbaṃ pārājikakkhettaṃ anavasesato gahetvā.
tika-vin01t2:339_8: Apaññattabhāvato yuttiabhāvato ca “pārājikacchāyā panettha na dissatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:339_9: Keci pana “upaḍḍhakkhāyitabhāvassa dubbinicchayattā tattha pārājikaṃ na paññapesī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:339_11: na ca dubbinicchayatā apaññattikāraṇaṃ yebhuyyakkhāyitādīsupi dubbinicchayabhāvassa samānattā.
tika-vin01t2:339_12: Upaḍḍhakkhāyitato hi kiñcideva adhikaṃ ūnaṃ vā yadi khāyitaṃ siyā,
tika-vin01t2:339_13: tampi yebhuyyena khāyitaṃ akkhāyitanti saṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti upaḍḍhakkhāyitamiva yebhuyyakkhāyitādīnipi dubbinicchayāneva.
tika-vin01t2:339_14: Apica upaḍḍhakkhāyitaṃ yadi sabhāvato pārājikakkhettaṃ siyā,
tika-vin01t2:339_15: na tattha bhagavā dubbinicchayanti pārājikaṃ na paññapeti.
tika-vin01t2:340_0: Idāni therena katavinicchayameva upatthambhetvā aparampi tattha kāraṇaṃ dassento “apicā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:340_1: Nimitte appamattikāpi maṃsarāji sace avasiṭṭhā hoti,
tika-vin01t2:340_3: tato paraṃ pana sabbaso khāyite nimitte dukkaṭamevāti dassento āha “tato paraṃ thullaccayaṃ natthī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:340_4: Atha vā yebhuyyena khāyitaṃ nāma vaccamaggapassāvamaggamukhānaṃ catūsu koṭṭhāsesu dve koṭṭhāse atikkamma yāva tatiyakoṭṭhāsassa pariyosānā khāditaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:340_5: tato paraṃ pana tatiyakoṭṭhāsaṃ atikkamma yāva catutthakoṭṭhāsassa pariyosānā khāditaṃ dukkaṭavatthūti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:340_7: “Yadipi nimittaṃ sabbaso khāyitantiādi sabbaṃ jīvamānakasarīrameva sandhāya vutta”nti mahāgaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:340_9: Kimettha vīmaṃsitabbaṃ jīvamānakasarīrasseva adhikatattā matasarīre labbhamānassa vinicchayassa visuṃ vakkhamānattā ca.
tika-vin01t2:341_0: “Jīvamānakasarīrassa vuttappakāre magge sacepi tacādīni anavasesetvā sabbaso chinne nimittasaṇṭhānamattaṃ paññāyati,
tika-vin01t2:341_1: tattha antamaso aṅgajāte uṭṭhikaṃ anaṭṭhakāyappasādaṃ pīḷakaṃ vā cammakhīlaṃ vā pavesentassapi sevanacitte sati pārājikaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:341_2: naṭṭhakāyappasādaṃ sukkhapīḷakaṃ vā matacammaṃ vā lomaṃ vā pavesentassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:341_3: Sace nimittasaṇṭhānamattampi anavasesetvā sabbaso maggo uppāṭito,
tika-vin01t2:343_0: Sabbaso khāyitanti nimittappadese bahiṭṭhitaṃ chavicammaṃ sabbaso chinditvā soṇasiṅgālādīhi khāyitasadisaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin01t2:343_2: Nimittamaṃsassa pana abbhantare chavicammassa ca vijjamānattā “nimittasaṇṭhānaṃ paññāyatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:343_4: Nimittasaṇṭhānaṃ pana anavasesetvāti nimittākārena ṭhitaṃ chavicammamaṃsādiṃ anavasesetvā.
tika-vin01t2:343_5: Jīvamānakasarīre labbhamānavisesaṃ dassetvā idāni matasarīre labbhamānavisesaṃ dassento āha “matasarīre panā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:344_0: Manussānaṃ jīvamānakasarīretiādinā pana akkhiādayopi vaṇasaṅgahaṃ gacchantīti vaṇena ekaparicchedaṃ katvā akkhiādīsupi thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:344_2: Tiracchānagatānaṃ akkhikaṇṇavaṇesu dukkaṭaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāppamāṇena gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:344_3: Yathā hi manussāmanussatiracchānagatesu vaccamaggapassāvamaggamukhānaṃ pārājikavatthubhāve nānākaraṇaṃ natthi,
tika-vin01t2:344_8: Yadi ca tiracchānagatānaṃ vaṇesu thullaccayena na bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:344_9: pataṅgamukhamaṇḍūkassa mukhasaṇṭhāne vaṇasaṅkhepato thullaccayaṃ na vattabbaṃ, vuttañca,
tika-vin01t2:344_12: Teneva vuttaṃ “buddhena dhammo vinayo ca vutto,
tika-vin01t2:344_16: Matasarīraṃ yāva uddhumātakādibhāvena kuthitaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin01t2:344_19: Pārājikavatthuñca thullaccayavatthuñca vijahatīti ettha pārājikavatthubhāvaṃ thullaccayavatthubhāvañca vijahatīti attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:345_0: Methunarāgena vatthikosaṃ pavesentassa thullaccayaṃ vuttanti āha “patthikosaṃ appavesento”ti.
tika-vin01t2:345_3: Pavesanādhippāyena bahi chupantassa pana methunassa pubbapayogattā dukkaṭeneva bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:345_9: āpatti thullaccayassā”ti imassa suttassa vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:345_10: Tattha ca kesañci aññathāpi atthavikappassa vidhiṃ dassento “mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ panā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:345_12: tathāpi sesaaṭṭhakathāsu “methunarāgena mukhenā”ti vacanassa abhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ panā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:346_0: Idāni mahāaṭṭhakathaṃ pāḷiyā saṃsanditvā dassento “yaṃ tāva mahāaṭṭhakathāya”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:346_1: Itarathā hi dukkaṭaṃ siyāti pakatimukhena chupantassa visāṇādiggahaṇe viya dukkaṭaṃ siyā.
tika-vin01t2:346_2: Evaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathaṃ pāḷiyā saṃsanditvā idāni tattha kesañci aññathā atthavikappaṃ dassento “keci panā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:346_5: “Nimittamukhenā”ti vuttattā tiracchānagatitthiyā passāvamaggaṃ methunarāgena pakatimukhena chupantassa dukkaṭanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:346_6: Kāyasaṃsaggarāgena dukkaṭanti nimittamukhena vā pakatimukhena vā kāyasaṃsaggarāgena chupantassa dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin01t2:349_3: Upādinnakena phusatīti upādinnakena phusīyati ghaṭṭīyatīti evaṃ kammani ya-
tika-vin01t2:349_5: Atha vā evaṃ karonto kiñci upādinnakaṃ upādinnakena na phusati na ghaṭṭetīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t2:350_1: Tathā hi paṭassa ekadesepi daḍḍhe “paṭo daḍḍho”ti voharanti,
tika-vin01t2:350_2: evaṃ itthiyā vaccamaggādīsu kismiñci magge santhate itthī “santhatā”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:350_4: Vatthādīni anto appavesetvā bahi ṭhapetvā bandhanaṃ sandhāya “paliveṭhetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:350_5: Ekadese samudāyavohāravaseneva bhikkhupi “santhato”ti vuccatīti āha “santhato nāmā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:351_0: Khāṇuṃ ghaṭṭentassa dukkaṭanti itthinimittassa anto khāṇuṃ pavesetvā samatalaṃ atirittaṃ vā khāṇuṃ ghaṭṭentassa dukkaṭaṃ pavesābhāvato.
tika-vin01t2:351_1: Sace pana īsakaṃ anto pavisitvā ṭhitaṃ khāṇukameva aṅgajātena chupati,
tika-vin01t2:351_4: Vinītavatthūsu “tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu sīvathikaṃ gantvā chinnasīsaṃ passitvā vaṭṭakate mukhe acchupantaṃ aṅgajātaṃ pavesesi.
tika-vin01t2:351_7: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vuttattā tassa suttassa anulomato “ākāsagatameva katvā pavesetvā nīharati,
tika-vin01t2:351_10: Methunarāgena indriyabaddhaānindriyabaddhasantānesu yattha katthaci upakkamantassa na sakkā anāpattiyā bhavitunti “dukkaṭamevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:351_11: Teneva vinītavatthumhi aṭṭhikesu upakkamantassa dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:354_2: Idāni sāmaññatopi atthasambhavaṃ dassento “itthidhuttasurādhuttādayo vā”ti āha.
tika-vin01t2:357_2: Na hi dūsako “kena cittena vītikkamaṃ akāsi,
tika-vin01t2:357_6: Sabbaṅgagatanti ṭhapetvā kesalomadantanakhānaṃ maṃsavinimuttaṭṭhānañceva thaddhasukkhacammañca udakamiva
tika-vin01t2:357_10: Pittakosake ṭhitanti hadayapapphāsānaṃ antare yakanamaṃsaṃ nissāya patiṭṭhite mahākosātakīkosasadise pittakose ṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:358_1: Yakkhummattakoti yakkhā kira yassa cittaṃ khipitukāmā honti,
tika-vin01t2:358_2: tassa setamukhaṃ nīlodaraṃ surattahatthapādaṃ mahāsīsaṃ pajjalitanettaṃ bheravaṃ vā attabhāvaṃ nimminitvā dassenti,
tika-vin01t2:358_4: kathentasseva vā mukhena hatthaṃ pakkhipitvā hadayamaṃsaṃ maddanti,
tika-vin01t2:358_5: tena so satto ummattako hoti khittacitto.
tika-vin01t2:358_7: Tattha bheravānīti dassanamatteneva sattānaṃ bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃsaṃ uppādetuṃ samatthāni.
tika-vin01t2:358_8: Niccameva ummattako hotīti yassa pittakosato pittaṃ calitvā bahi nikkhantaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:358_10: Yassa pana pittaṃ calitvā pittakoseyeva ṭhitaṃ hoti bahi anikkhantaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:362_7: Cha sikkhāpadasamuṭṭhānānīti kāyo vācā kāyavācā kāyacittaṃ vācācittaṃ kāyavācācittanti evaṃ vuttāni cha āpattisamuṭṭhānāni.
tika-vin01t2:362_11: imesu pana chasu samuṭṭhānesu purimāni tīṇi acittakāni,
tika-vin01t2:362_13: Tesu ekena vā dvīhi vā tīhi vā catūhi vā chahi vā samuṭṭhānehi āpattiyo samuṭṭhahanti,
tika-vin01t2:362_15: Tattha ekasamuṭṭhānā catutthena ca pañcamena ca chaṭṭhena ca samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin01t2:362_17: Dvisamuṭṭhānā paṭhamacatutthehi ca dutiyapañcamehi ca tatiyachaṭṭhehi ca catutthachaṭṭhehi ca pañcamachaṭṭhehi ca samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin01t2:362_22: Catusamuṭṭhānā paṭhamatatiyacatutthachaṭṭhehi ca dutiyatatiyapañcamachaṭṭhehi ca samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin01t2:363_0: Sikkhāpadaṃ nāma atthi chasamuṭṭhānanti etthāpi sikkhāpadasīsena āpatti vuttāti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:363_5: Atthi catusamuṭṭhānanti kāyo kāyavācā kāyacittaṃ kāyavācācittanti imāni cattāri,
tika-vin01t2:363_6: vācā kāyavācā vācācittaṃ kāyavācācittanti imāni vā cattāri samuṭṭhānāni etassāti catusamuṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:363_7: Atthi tisamuṭṭhānanti kāyo vācā kāyavācāti imāni tīṇi,
tika-vin01t2:363_8: kāyacittaṃ vācācittaṃ kāyavācācittanti imāni vā tīṇi samuṭṭhānāni etassāti tisamuṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:363_10: Terasa hi samuṭṭhānasīsāni paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ adinnādānasamuṭṭhānaṃ sañcarittasamuṭṭhānaṃ samanubhāsanasamuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:364_1: “Atthi catusamuṭṭhāna”nti iminā pana addhānasamuṭṭhānaṃ ananuññātasamuṭṭhānañca saṅgahitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:364_11: “Atthi kathinasamuṭṭhāna”ntiādinā pana avasesasamuṭṭhānasīsena dvisamuṭṭhānaṃ ekasamuṭṭhānañca saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin01t2:365_0: Evaṃ samuṭṭhānasīsena sabbasikkhāpadāni terasadhā dassetvā idāni kiriyāvasena pañcadhā dassento “tatrāpi kiñci kiriyato samuṭṭhātī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:365_2: Tasmā yā kāyena vā vācāya vā pathavīkhaṇanādīsu viya vītikkamaṃ karontassa hoti,
tika-vin01t2:365_4: Yā kāyavācāya kattabbaṃ akarontassa hoti paṭhamakathināpatti viya,
tika-vin01t2:365_6: Yā karontassa ca akarontassa ca hoti aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato cīvarapaṭiggahaṇāpatti viya,
tika-vin01t2:365_8: Yā siyā karontassa ca siyā akarontassa ca hoti rūpiyapaṭiggahaṇāpatti viya,
tika-vin01t2:365_9: ayaṃ siyā kiriyato siyā akiriyato samuṭṭhāti nāma.
tika-vin01t2:365_10: Yā siyā karontassa ca siyā karontassa ca akarontassa ca hoti kuṭikārāpatti viya,
tika-vin01t2:365_11: ayaṃ siyā kiriyato siyā kiriyākiriyato samuṭṭhāti nāma.
tika-vin01t2:366_0: Idāni sabbasikkhāpadāni saññāvasena dvidhā katvā dassento “tatrāpi atthi saññāvimokkha”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:366_1: Saññāya abhāvena vimokkho assāti saññāvimokkhanti majjhepadalopasamāso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t2:367_0: Puna sabbasikkhāpadāni cittavasena dvidhā dassento “puna atthi sacittaka”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:367_1: Yaṃ saheva cittena āpajjatīti yaṃ sacittakeneva samuṭṭhānena āpajjati,
tika-vin01t2:367_9: sacittakadukaṃ āpattimukhena vuttanti idametesaṃ nānākaraṇanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:368_0: Lokavajjadukassa heṭṭhā vuttalakkhaṇattā taṃ avibhajitvā idāni sabbasikkhāpadāni kammavasena duvidhāni,
tika-vin01t2:368_1: kusalādivasena vedanāvasena ca tividhāni hontīti dassento “kammakusalavedanāvasenā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:368_2: Ettha pana kiñcāpi aṭṭhakathāsu āgatanayena kāyakammaṃ vacīkammanti kammavasena dukaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:368_4: Sabbameva hi sikkhāpadaṃ kāyadvāre āpajjitabbato vacīdvāre āpajjitabbato kāyavacīdvāre āpajjitabbato ca tividhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:368_5: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “sabbāva kāyakammavacīkammatadubhayavasena tividhā honti.
tika-vin01t2:368_9: Tatoyeva ca adinnādānasikkhāpadādīsu kāyakammavacīkammanti tadubhayavasena dassitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:369_0: Atthi pana sikkhāpadaṃ kusalantiādinā āpattiṃ āpajjanto kusalacittasamaṅgī vā āpajjati akusalacittasamaṅgī vā abyākatacittasamaṅgī vāti dasseti,
tika-vin01t2:369_2: Na hi kusalā āpatti nāma atthi “āpattādhikaraṇaṃ siyā akusalaṃ siyā abyākataṃ,
tika-vin01t2:369_4: Dasa kāmāvacarakiriyacittānīti hasituppādavoṭṭhabbanehi saddhiṃ aṭṭha mahākiriyacittāni.
tika-vin01t2:369_5: Dvinnaṃ abhiññācittānaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhāpakattaṃ paññattiṃ ajānantassa iddhivikubbanādīsu daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:369_6: Yaṃ kusalacittena āpajjatīti yaṃ sikkhāpadasīsena gahitaṃ āpattiṃ kusalacittasamaṅgī āpajjati.
tika-vin01t2:369_7: Iminā pana vacanena taṃ kusalanti āpattiyā vuccamāno kusalabhāvo pariyāyatova,
tika-vin01t2:369_9: Kusalacittena hi āpattiṃ āpajjanto saviññattikaṃ aviññattikaṃ vā sikkhāpadavītikkamākārappavattaṃ rūpakkhandhasaṅkhātaṃ abyākatāpattiṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin01t2:369_10: Itarehi itaranti itarehi akusalābyākatacittehi yaṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin01t2:369_13: Idañca āpattiṃ āpajjanto akusalacittasamaṅgī vā āpajjati kusalābyākatacittasamaṅgī vāti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:369_14: Evaṃ santepi sabbasikkhāpadesu kiñci akusalacittameva kiñci kusalābyākatavasena dvicittaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:369_15: kiñci sabbesaṃ vasena ticittanti ayameva pabhedo labbhati,
tika-vin01t2:370_0: Tivedanaṃ dvivedanaṃ ekavedananti idañca yathāvuttavedanāvaseneva labbhati,
tika-vin01t2:370_2: Nipajjitvā nirodhaṃ samāpannassa sahaseyyavasena tadākārappavattarūpakkhandhasseva āpattibhāvato “atthi avedana”ntipi vattabbametaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:370_3: kadāci karahaci yadicchakaṃ sambhavatīti aggahetvā yebhuyyavasena labbhamānaṃyeva gahetvā vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:371_0: Idāni yathāvuttasamuṭṭhānādīni imasmiṃ saṃvaṇṇiyamānasikkhāpade vibhajitvā dassento “imaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ viditvā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:371_1: Tattha viditvāti imassa “veditabba”nti iminā aparakālakiriyāvacanena sambandho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:371_2: Kiriyasamuṭṭhānanti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ parūpakkame sati sādiyantassa akiriyasamuṭṭhānabhāvato.
tika-vin01t2:371_3: “Manodvāre āpatti nāma natthīti idampi bāhullavaseneva vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:371_4: Cittaṃ panettha aṅgamattaṃ hotīti paṭhamapārājikaṃ kāyacittato samuṭṭhātīti cittamettha āpattiyā aṅgameva hoti.
tika-vin01t2:371_5: Na tassa vasena kammabhāvo labbhatīti viññattijanakavasena kāyadvāre pavattattā tassa cittassa vasena
tika-vin01t2:371_6: imassa sikkhāpadassa manokammabhāvo na labbhatīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:371_7: Sikkhāpadassa heṭṭhā vuttanayena paññattibhāvato “sabbañcetaṃ āpattiyaṃ yujjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:374_2: Tāni hi “āpattiṃ tvaṃ bhikkhu āpanno pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:374_9: Vatthugāthāti “tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhū”tiādikā nidānavatthudīpikā vinītavatthupāḷiyeva
tika-vin01t2:374_12: Gāthānaṃ vatthu vatthugāthāti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t2:374_17: Yaṃ passitvā passitvā cittakārādayo cittakammādīni uggaṇhantā karonti,
tika-vin01t2:375_3: tathāpi bhagavatā sayaṃ vinicchitavatthubhāvato adinnādānādīsu anupaññattiyaṃ āgatāni rajakādivatthūni viya puna vinītavatthūsu pakkhittāni.
tika-vin01t2:375_4: Yadi evaṃ “tassa kukkuccaṃ ahosī”ti idaṃ virujjheyya,
tika-vin01t2:375_5: anupaññattiyañhi aññe bhikkhū disvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ codesunti?
tika-vin01t2:375_7: tehi pana bhikkhūhi anupaññattiyaṃ vuttanayena codetvā “nanu, āvuso,
tika-vin01t2:375_8: tatheva taṃ hotī”ti vutte tassa kukkuccaṃ ahosīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:375_9: “Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesī”ti idañca tehi bhikkhūhi anupaññattiyaṃ vuttanayena bhagavato ārocite “saccaṃ
tika-vin01t2:375_10: kira tvaṃ bhikkhu makkaṭiyā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevī”ti bhagavatā puṭṭho samāno “saccaṃ bhagavā”ti bhagavato
tika-vin01t2:376_0: Vajjiputtakavatthumhi pana sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitvā vibbhamitvā
tika-vin01t2:376_1: ye ānandattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā puna pabbajjaṃ upasampadañca yāciṃsu,
tika-vin01t2:376_4: yaṃ tathāgato vajjīnaṃ vā vajjiputtakānaṃ vā kāraṇā sāvakānaṃ pārājikaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ samūhaneyyā”tiādi anupaññattiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:376_5: Ye pana avibbhamitvā saliṅge ṭhitāyeva uppannakukkuccā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:376_9: Keci pana imaṃ adhippāyaṃ ajānantāva “aññameva makkaṭivatthu vajjiputtakavatthu ca vinītavatthūsu āgata”nti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:377_5: kāyasaṃsaggarāgasikkhāpadassa vinītavatthūsu avatvā idha kasmā vuttanti? Vuccate –
tika-vin01t2:377_7: tassa pana bhikkhuno pārājikakkhette katupakkamattā “pārājikaṃ nu kho ahaṃ āpanno”ti pārājikavisayaṃ kukkuccaṃ ahosīti idha vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:378_1: Atidassanīyāti divasampi passantānaṃ atittikaraṇato ativiya dassanayoggā.
tika-vin01t2:378_10: tasmā vaṇṇapokkharatāyāti parisuddhena vaṇṇena ceva sarīrasaṇṭhānasampattiyā cāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:378_11: Atha vā vaṇṇasampannaṃ pokkharaṃ vaṇṇapokkharanti uttarapadalopo pubbapadassa daṭṭhabbo,
tika-vin01t2:379_4: yathā ca sūcimukhe sāsapo na santiṭṭhati,
tika-vin01t2:379_5: evameva yo abbhantare duvidhenapi kāmena na limpati,
tika-vin01t2:380_2: itthisaṇṭhānaṃ uppannanti phalassa vināsuppādadassanena kāraṇassapi vināsuppādā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:380_9: No”ti yamakapakaraṇe vuttattā indriyadvayassa ekasmiṃ santāne sahapavattiyā asambhavato yasmiṃ khaṇe itthindriyaṃ pātubhavati,
tika-vin01t2:380_10: tato pubbe sattarasamacittato paṭṭhāya purisindriyaṃ nuppajjati.
tika-vin01t2:380_11: Tato pubbe uppannesu ca purisindriyesu sahajarūpehi saddhiṃ kamena niruddhesu tasmiṃ santāne itthindriyaṃ uppajjati.
tika-vin01t2:380_12: Tato purisasaṇṭhānākārena pavattesu kammajarūpesu sesarūpesu ca kañci kālaṃ pavattitvā niruddhesu itthisaṇṭhānākārena
tika-vin01t2:381_1: itthiliṅgaṃ hīnanti iminā ca purisindriyassa uttamabhāvo,
tika-vin01t2:381_3: Na hi indriyassa hīnukkaṭṭhabhāvaṃ vinā tannissayassa liṅgassa hīnukkaṭṭhatā sambhavati.
tika-vin01t2:381_4: Purisaliṅgaṃ balavaakusalena antaradhāyatītiādināpi indriyasseva vināsuppādā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:381_5: Indriye hi vinaṭṭhe uppanne ca tannissayassa liṅgassapi antaradhānaṃ patiṭṭhānañca sambhavati.
tika-vin01t2:381_8: paṭisandhiyaṃ tāva purisindriyuppādakaṃ anupahatasāmatthiyaṃ balavakusalakammaṃ yāvatāyukaṃ purisindriyameva uppādeti,
tika-vin01t2:381_9: antarā pana kenaci laddhapaccayena pāradārikattādinā balavaakusalakammena upahatasāmatthiyaṃ tadeva paṭisandhidāyakaṃ
tika-vin01t2:381_10: kusalakammaṃ dubbalībhūtaṃ purisindriyaṃ anuppādetvā attano sāmatthiyānurūpaṃ itthindriyaṃ pavatte uppādeti.
tika-vin01t2:381_11: Yadā pana paṭisandhidānakāleyeva kenaci laddhapaccayena pāradārikattādinā balavaakusalakammena purisindriyuppādanasāmatthiyaṃ upahataṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:381_12: tadā dubbalībhūtaṃ kusalakammaṃ purisindriyaṃ anuppādetvā paṭisandhiyaṃyeva itthindriyaṃ uppādeti.
tika-vin01t2:382_1: dubbalabhāve sati antaradhāyantaṃ itthiliṅgaṃ dubbalaakusalena antaradhāyatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:382_2: Tathā hi pāradārikattādinā balavaakusalakammena bāhitattā purisindriyuppādane asamatthaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:382_4: purisattapatthanāvasena vā katupacitabalavakusalakammena āhitasāmatthiyaṃ purisindriyuppādane samatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:382_5: itthindriyaṃ anuppādetvā attano sāmatthiyānurūpaṃ purisindriyaṃ uppādeti,
tika-vin01t2:382_6: tadā purisindriyuppādanavibandhakassa balavaakusalakammassa dubbalabhāve sati taṃ itthindriyaṃ antarahitanti
tika-vin01t2:382_8: Yathāvuttanayeneva balavatā kusalakammena purisindriyassa uppāditattā “purisaliṅgaṃ balavakusalena patiṭṭhātī”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:382_9: Pubbe itthibhūtassa paṭisandhiyaṃ purisindriyuppādepi ayaṃ nayo veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:382_11: kusalena paṭilabbhatīti idaṃ sugatibhavaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:382_12: duggatiyaṃ pana ubhinnaṃ uppatti vināso ca akusalakammenevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:383_0: Ubhinnampi sahaseyyāpatti hotīti “yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya,
tika-vin01t2:383_2: Yā pana bhikkhunī purisena sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya,
tika-vin01t2:383_3: pācittiya”nti vuttattā ubhinnampi sahaseyyavasena pācittiyāpatti hoti.
tika-vin01t2:383_13: Bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya addhānagamane āpatti pariharitabbāti dassento “saṃvidahanaṃ parimocetvā”ti āha.
tika-vin01t2:383_14: “Mayaṃ asukaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ gacchāmā”ti vatvā “ehi saddhiṃ gamissāmā”tiādinā asaṃvidahitattā anāpatti.
tika-vin01t2:384_1: Gāmantaranadīpārarattivippavāsagaṇaohīyanāpattīhi anāpattīti “dutiyikā bhikkhunī pakkantā vā hotī”tiādinā vuttaanāpattilakkhaṇehi saṃsandanato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:384_5: labbhatīti “saṅgahe asati ukkaṇṭhitvā vibbhameyyāpī”ti saṅgahavaseneva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:384_9: vaṭṭatīti idaṃ pana imissā āveṇikaṃ katvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ anuññātanti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:384_11: Parisāvacaroti upajjhāyo ca ācariyo ca hutvā parisupaṭṭhāko.
tika-vin01t2:384_12: Aññassa santike nissayo gahetabboti tassa santike upasampannehi saddhivihārikehi aññassa ācariyassa santike nissayo gahetabbo.
tika-vin01t2:384_13: Taṃ nissāya vasantehipīti antevāsike sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin01t2:385_5: bhikkhūnaṃ sannidhi bhikkhunīhi paṭiggāhāpetvā paribhuñjitu”nti vacanato puna paṭiggahitaṃ tadahu sāmisampi vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:385_6: Sattame divaseti idaṃ tañca nissaggiyaṃ anāpajjitvāva punapi sattāhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:385_7: Yasmā pana bhikkhuniyā nissaggiyaṃ bhikkhussa vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:385_9: tasmā aṭṭhamepi divase liṅgaparivatte sati anissajjitvāva antosattāhe paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:385_10: Taṃ pakatatto rakkhatīti aparivattaliṅgo taṃ paṭiggahaṇavijahanato rakkhati,
tika-vin01t2:385_12: Sāmaṃ gahetvāna nikkhipeyyāti paṭiggahetvā sayaṃ nikkhipeyya.
tika-vin01t2:385_13: Paribhuñjantassa āpattīti liṅgaparivatte sati paṭiggahaṇavijahanato puna paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantassa āpatti.
tika-vin01t2:386_0: “Hīnāyāvattanenāti pārājikaṃ āpannassa gihibhāvūpagamanenā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:386_2: Na hi pārājikaṃ anāpannassa sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya “vibbhamissāmī”ti gihiliṅgaggahaṇamattena bhikkhubhāvo vinassati.
tika-vin01t2:386_3: Pārājikaṃ āpanno ca bhikkhuliṅge ṭhito yāva na paṭijānāti,
tika-vin01t2:386_6: Tathā hi so saṃvāsaṃ sādiyantopi theyyasaṃvāsako na hoti,
tika-vin01t2:386_9: Teneva “asuddho hoti puggalo aññataraṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpanno,
tika-vin01t2:386_10: tañce suddhadiṭṭhi samāno okāsaṃ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadeti,
tika-vin01t2:386_13: sati ca bhikkhubhāve paṭiggahitassa paṭiggahaṇavijahanaṃ nāma ayuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:386_14: tasmā sabbaso bhikkhubhāvassa abhāvato pārājikaṃ āpajjitvā gihiliṅgaggahaṇena gihibhāvūpagamanaṃ idha “hīnāyāvattana”nti adhippetaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:386_16: Teneva katthaci sikkhāpaccakkhānena samānagatikattā hīnāyāvattanaṃ visuṃ na gaṇhanti.
tika-vin01t2:386_17: Sikkhāpaccakkhānena paṭiggahaṇavijahane vutte pārājikaṃ āpannassa gihibhāvūpagamanena sabbaso bhikkhubhāvassa abhāvato vattabbameva natthīti.
tika-vin01t2:394_1: Yadi ca pakatattassa gihiliṅgaggahaṇamattenapi paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijaheyya,
tika-vin01t2:394_4: tato viññāyati “pakatattassa gihiliṅgaggahaṇamattaṃ idha hīnāyāvattananti nādhippeta”nti.
tika-vin01t2:394_5: Bhikkhuniyā pana sikkhāpaccakkhānassa abhāvato gihiliṅgaggahaṇamattenapi paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati.
tika-vin01t2:395_0: Anapekkhavissajjanenāti aññassa adatvāva anatthikatāya “natthi iminā kammaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:395_1: na idāni naṃ paribhuñjissāmī”ti vatthūsu vā “puna paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjissāmī”ti paṭiggahaṇe vā anapekkhavissajjanena.
tika-vin01t2:396_4: Kāmaṃ purimikāya pacchimikāya ca senāsanaggāho paṭippassambhatiyeva,
tika-vin01t2:396_5: purimikāya pana senāsanaggāhe paṭippassaddhe pacchimikāya aññattha upagantuṃ sakkāti purimikāya senāsanaggāhapaṭippassaddhiṃ
tika-vin01t2:396_6: visuṃ dassetvā pacchimikāya senāsanaggāhe paṭippassaddhe na sakkā aññattha upagantunti tattha bhikkhūhi
tika-vin01t2:397_0: Pakkhamānattameva dātabbanti bhikkhunīnaṃ paṭicchannāyapi āpattiyā mānattacārasseva anuññātattā.
tika-vin01t2:397_2: Bhikkhunīhi abbhānakammaṃ kātabbanti bhikkhukāle ciṇṇamānattatāya bhikkhunīkālepi ciṇṇamānattā icceva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:397_4: chārattaṃ mānattameva dātabbanti mānattaṃ carantassa liṅgaparivattādhikārattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:397_5: Sace pana bhikkhukāle paṭicchannāya sādhāraṇāpattiyā parivasantassa asamādiṇṇaparivāsassa vā liṅgaṃ parivattati,
tika-vin01t2:397_6: tassa bhikkhunīkāle pakkhamānattaṃ carantassa akusalavipāke parikkhīṇe puna liṅge parivattite parivāsaṃ
tika-vin01t2:397_7: datvā parivutthaparivāsassa chārattaṃ mānattaṃ dātabbanti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:398_2: Bhikkhunīkāle pana ārocitāpi sādhāraṇāpatti sace bhikkhukāle anārocitā,
tika-vin01t2:398_4: Bhikkhūhi mānatte adinneti aciṇṇamānattāya liṅgaparivatte sati.
tika-vin01t2:398_5: Bhikkhunībhāve ṭhitāyapi tā suppaṭippassaddhā evāti sambandho.
tika-vin01t2:398_6: Yā āpattiyo pubbe paṭippassaddhāti yā asādhāraṇāpattiyo pubbe bhikkhubhāve paṭippassaddhā.
tika-vin01t2:398_7: “Pārājikaṃ āpannassa liṅgaparivatte sati santānassa ekattā na puna so upasampadaṃ labhati,
tika-vin01t2:398_8: tathā vibbhantāpi bhikkhunī liṅgaparivatte sati puna upasampadaṃ na labhatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:399_1: “Anupādinnakesūti adhikārattā upādinnakepi eseva nayoti vutta”nti cūḷagaṇṭhipade majjhimagaṇṭhipade ca vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:399_3: Na hi upādinnakesu nimitte upakkamantassa dukkaṭaṃ dissati.
tika-vin01t2:399_4: Tathā hi upādinnakesu nimitte appavesetvā bahi upakkamantassa thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ “na ca,
tika-vin01t2:399_12: Tathevāti muccatu vā mā vāti imamatthaṃ atidissati.
tika-vin01t2:400_0: Avisayoti asādiyanaṃ nāma evarūpe ṭhāne dukkaranti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:400_3: Ubhayavāyāmeneva āpattīti saññāya “tvaṃ mā vāyamī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:401_2: “Pārājikabhayena ākāsagatameva katvā pavesanādīni karontassa sahasā tālukaṃ vā passaṃ vā aṅgajātaṃ phusati ce,
tika-vin01t2:401_6: Antomukhe okāso natthīti dantānaṃ supihitabhāvato antomukhe pavesetuṃ okāso natthi.
tika-vin01t2:401_7: Uppāṭite pana oṭṭhamaṃse dantesuyeva upakkamantassa thullaccayanti pataṅgamukhamaṇḍūkassa mukhasaṇṭhāne viya vaṇasaṅkhepavasena thullaccayaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:401_9: thullaccaya”nti iminā vā lakkhaṇena samānattā idha thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:402_4: Allīyitumpi na sakkāti nijjhāmataṇhikānaṃ lomakūpehi samuṭṭhitaaggijālāhi niccaṃ pajjalitasarīratāya
tika-vin01t2:402_6: Devatā viya sampattiṃ anubhontīti ettha yāsanti sāmivacanaṃ yāti paccattavacanena vipariṇāmetvā yojetabbaṃ “yā devatā viya sampattiṃ anubhontī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:402_7: Dassanādīsu dassanaṃ nāma bhikkhunā tāsaṃ dassanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:402_10: Tattha āmasanaṃ nāma attano sarīrena bhikkhuno sarīrassa upari āmasanamattaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:402_12: ghaṭṭanaṃ tatopi daḷhataraṃ katvā sarīrena sarīrassa ghaṭṭanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:402_13: Visaññaṃ katvāti yathā so katampi upakkamanaṃ na jānāti,
tika-vin01t2:402_16: tathāpi teneva anāpattiṃ avatvā “taṃ puggalaṃ visaññaṃ katvā”ti vacanato akatavisañño jānitvā sādiyati ce,
tika-vin01t2:402_18: Bhikkhuno pana dassanagahaṇesu sati asādiyanaṃ nāma na hotīti dassanagahaṇesu paññāyamānesu anāpatti na vuttā.
tika-vin01t2:402_19: Yadi pana paṭhamaṃ dassanagahaṇesu sati pacchā taṃ puggalaṃ visaññaṃ katvā āmasanādīni karontī attano manorathaṃ pūretvā gacchati,
tika-vin01t2:403_0: Upahatakāyappasādoti anaṭṭhepi kāyappasāde kāyaviññāṇuppādane asamatthatāpādanavasena vātapittādīhi upahatakāyappasādo.
tika-vin01t2:403_1: Sevanacittavasena āpattīti yathā santhatanimittavasena upādinnaphassaṃ avindantassapi sevanacittavasena āpatti,
tika-vin01t2:403_2: evamidhāpi pittavātādinā upahatakāyappasādattā avediyantassapi sevanacittavasena āpatti.
tika-vin01t2:404_0: Nanu ca chupitamattavatthusmiṃ “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevissāmīti chupitamatte vippaṭisārī ahosī”ti vuttattā
tika-vin01t2:404_2: atha kasmā “āpatti saṅghādisesassā”ti vuttanti imaṃ antolīnacodanaṃ manasikatvā taṃ pariharituṃ “yo methuna”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:404_4: Tañhi payogānaṃ matthakasadisattā “sīsa”nti vuttaṃ tato paraṃ payogābhāvato.
tika-vin01t2:404_6: Dukkaṭañhi janentā hatthaggāhādayo payogā “dukkaṭe tiṭṭhantī”ti vuttā aññissā āpattiyā janakavasena appavattanato.
tika-vin01t2:405_4: Tena vātupatthambhenāti “aṅgamaṅgāni vātupatthaddhāni hontī”ti evaṃ vuttavātupatthambhena.
tika-vin01t2:406_1: Saṅgāmasīsayodho bhikkhūti yasmā kilesārīhi anabhibhūto hutvā te parājesi,
tika-vin01t2:407_2: Parivattakadvāramevāti saṃvaraṇavivaraṇavasena ito cito ca parivattanayoggadvārameva.
tika-vin01t2:407_5: Yaṃ ubhosu passesu rukkhathambhe nikhaṇitvā tattha vijjhitvā majjhe dve tisso rukkhasūciyo pavesetvā karonti,
tika-vin01t2:407_10: Cakkalakayuttadvāranti heṭṭhā etaṃ cakkaṃ yojetvā kataṃ mahādvāraṃ,
tika-vin01t2:407_11: yaṃ na sakkā ekena saṃvarituṃ vivarituñca.
tika-vin01t2:407_13: Ekaṃ dussasāṇidvāramevāti ettha kilañjasāṇidvārampi saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin01t2:408_0: Yattha dvāraṃ saṃvaritvā nipajjituṃ na sakkā hoti,
tika-vin01t2:408_1: tattha kattabbavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “sace bahūnaṃ vaḷañjanaṭṭhānaṃ hotī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:408_2: Bahūnaṃ avaḷañjanaṭṭhānepi ekaṃ āpucchitvā nipajjituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin01t2:408_4: nisinnā hontīti idaṃ tattha bhikkhūnaṃ sannihitabhāvasandassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:408_6: yena kenaci iriyāpathena samannāgato sace tattha sannihito hoti,
tika-vin01t2:408_7: ābhogaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:408_8: Keci pana “nisinnā hontīti vacanato sace nipannā honti,
tika-vin01t2:408_11: Yadi hi “nisinnā hontī”ti vacanato nipanne ābhogaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:408_12: ṭhitepi caṅkamantepi ābhogaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:408_14: tasmā “nisinnā hontī”ti idaṃ tattha tesaṃ atthitāmattasandassanatthaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:408_16: Evaṃ santepi nipajjitvā niddāyanto asantapakkhe ṭhitattā ābhogāraho na hotīti amhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin01t2:408_17: Asantapakkhe ṭhitattāyeva hi raho nisajjāya nipajjitvā niddāyanto anāpattiṃ na karotīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:408_19: “bhikkhuniṃ vā mātugāmaṃ vā āpucchituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:408_21: Mātugāmassa antogabbhe ṭhitabhāvaṃ jānitvāpi dvāre yathāvuttavidhiṃ katvā nipajjantassa anāpatti.
tika-vin01t2:408_22: Nisseṇiṃ āropetvāti uparitalaṃ āropetvā visaṅkharitvā bhūmiyaṃ pātetvā chinditvā vā nipajjitumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:408_23: Dvepi dvārāni jaggitabbānīti ettha sace ekasmiṃ dvāre kavāṭaṃ vā natthi,
tika-vin01t2:408_24: heṭṭhā vuttanayena saṃvarituṃ vā na sakkā,
tika-vin01t2:409_1: Dvārapālassāti dvārakoṭṭhake mahādvāre nisseṇimūle vā ṭhatvā dvārarakkhaṇakassa.
tika-vin01t2:409_2: Pacchimānaṃ bhāroti ekānubandhavasena āgacchante sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:409_6: vaṭṭatiyevāti ettha “dvārajagganakassa tadadhīnattā tadā tassa tattha sannihitāsannihitabhāvaṃ anupadhāretvāpi ābhogaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatiyevā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:410_0: Yena kenaci parikkhitteti pākārena vā vatiyā vā yena kenaci parikkhitte.
tika-vin01t2:410_1: “Parikkhepassa uccato pamāṇaṃ sahaseyyappahonake vuttanayena veditabba”nti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:410_2: Yadi pana ekasmiṃ padese parikkhepo vuttappamāṇato nīcataro hoti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:410_7: anāpattīti suddhacittena nipannassa niddāyantasseva aruṇe uggateyeva niddāvaseneva anāpatti.
tika-vin01t2:410_9: āpattīti aruṇe uggate pabujjhitvā aruṇuggamanaṃ ajānitvāpi anuṭṭhahitvāva sayitasantānena sayantassa āpatti,
tika-vin01t2:410_10: purāruṇe pabujjhitvāpi ajānitvā sayitasantānena sayantassapi aruṇe uggate āpattiyeva.
tika-vin01t2:410_12: Tassa āpattīti asuddhacitteneva nipannattā niddāyantassapi aruṇe uggate divāpaṭisallānamūlikā āpatti.
tika-vin01t2:410_13: “Evaṃ nipajjanto anādariyadukkaṭāpi na muccatī”ti vuttattā asuddhacittena nipajjanto aruṇuggamanato puretaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:410_15: divāpaṭisallānamūlikaṃ pana dukkaṭaṃ aruṇe uggateyeva āpajjati.
tika-vin01t2:411_0: Yaṃ panettha tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ “rattiṃ dvāraṃ saṃvaritvā nipanno sace aruṇuggamanavelāyaṃ dvāre vivaṭepi nipajjati,
tika-vin01t2:411_2: Aruṇuggamanavelāyaṃ vivaṭepi dvāre “nipajjissāmī”ti rattiṃ dvāraṃ saṃvaritvāpi nipannassa akhette pihitattā nipajjanakāle anādariyadukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:411_4: Rattiṃ pihitepi apihitepi dvāre nipannassa aruṇuggamanakkhaṇeyeva apihitadvāre pihite pihitadvāre ca
tika-vin01t2:411_5: puna vivaritvā pihite khette pihitattā anāpattī”ti,
tika-vin01t2:411_7: Rattiṃ dvāraṃ asaṃvaritvā nipannasseva hi aruṇuggamane āpatti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dassitā,
tika-vin01t2:411_8: tasmā khette vā pihitaṃ hotu akhette vā,
tika-vin01t2:412_1: evaṃ pana nipanno nipanno nāma na hotīti anāpatti vuttā.
tika-vin01t2:412_2: Apassāya supantassāti kaṭiyā piṭṭhivemajjhassa ca antare appamattakampi padesaṃ bhūmiṃ aphusāpetvā thambhādiṃ apassāya supantassa.
tika-vin01t2:412_3: Sahasāva vuṭṭhātīti pakkhalitvā patito viya sahasā vuṭṭhāti.
tika-vin01t2:412_4: Tattheva sayati na vuṭṭhātīti niddābhibhūtatāya supanto na vuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin01t2:412_6: Teneva “avisayattā āpatti na dissatī”ti na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:413_1: heṭṭhā vuttanayena pāde bhūmito amocetvāva ekaṃ passaṃ bhañjitvā nāmetvā nipannoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:413_3: Mucchitvā patitattā therena “avisayattā āpatti na dissatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:413_4: Ācariyā pana yathā yakkhagahitako bandhitvā nipajjāpito ca paravaso hoti,
tika-vin01t2:413_5: evaṃ aparavasattā mucchitvā patito kañci kālaṃ jānitvāpi nipajjatīti anāpattiṃ na vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:413_7: yo ca bandhitvā nipajjāpitoti imassa mahāaṭṭhakathāvādassa pacchimattā soyeva pamāṇato gahetabbo.
tika-vin01t2:413_8: Tathā ca vakkhati “sabbattha yo yo aṭṭhakathāvādo vā theravādo vā pacchā vuccati,
tika-vin01t2:413_11: Ekabhaṅgena nipanno pana atthato anipannattā muccatiyevāti mahāaṭṭhakathāvādena so appaṭikkhittova hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:413_12: Divā saṃvaritvā nipannassa kenaci vivaṭepi dvāre anāpatti nipajjanakāle saṃvaritvā nipannattā.
tika-vin01t2:413_13: Sace divā saṃvaritvā dvārasamīpe nipanno pacchā sayameva dvāraṃ vivarati,
tika-vin01t2:413_15: Acittakā cāyaṃ āpatti kiriyā ca akiriyā ca.
tika-vin01t2:414_1: “Apade padaṃ karonto viyā”ti vatvā puna tamevatthaṃ āvikaronto “ākāse padaṃ dassento viyā”ti āha.
tika-vin01t2:420_0: Adutiyena jinena yaṃ dutiyaṃ pārājikaṃ pakāsitaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:420_4: taṃ sabbaṃ vajjayitvā assa dutiyassa ayaṃ saṃvaṇṇanā hotīti sambandho.
tika-vin01t2:422_1: Rājagaheti ettha duggajanapadaṭṭhānavisesasampadādiyogato padhānabhāvena rājūhi gahitaṃ pariggahitanti rājagahanti āha “mandhātu…pe…
tika-vin01t2:422_3: Tattha mahāgovindena mahāsattena pariggahitaṃ reṇunā pariggahitameva hotīti mahāgovindaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:422_14: suvihitārakkhatāya anatthāvahabhāvena upagatānaṃ paṭirājūnaṃ gahaṃ gehabhūtantipi rājagahaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:422_15: rājūhi disvā sammā patiṭṭhāpitattā tesaṃ gahaṃ gehabhūtantipi rājagahaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:422_17: nivāsasukhatādinā sattehi mamattavasena gayhati pariggayhatīti vā rājagaha”nti edise pakāre.
tika-vin01t2:422_18: So padeso ṭhānavisesabhāvena uḷārasattaparibhogoti āha “taṃ paneta”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t2:422_19: Tattha buddhakāle cakkavattikāle cāti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:423_0: Tato paraṃ saṅghoti tiṇṇaṃ janānaṃ upari saṅgho catuvaggakaraṇīyādikammappattattā.
tika-vin01t2:423_1: Tasmiṃ pabbate sannipatitvā samāpattiyā vītināmentīti yathāphāsukaṭṭhāne piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakiccā
tika-vin01t2:423_2: āgantvā cetiyagabbhe yamakamahādvāraṃ vivarantā viya taṃ pabbataṃ dvidhā katvā anto pavisitvā rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni
tika-vin01t2:424_1: Atīte kira anuppanne tathāgate bārāṇasiṃ upanissāya ekasmiṃ gāmake ekā kuladhītā khettaṃ rakkhati,
tika-vin01t2:424_2: tassā khettakuṭiyā vīhayo bhajjantiyā tattha mahākarañjapupphappamāṇā mahantamahantā manoharā pañcasatamattā lājā jāyiṃsu.
tika-vin01t2:424_3: Sā te gahetvā mahati paduminipatte ṭhapesi.
tika-vin01t2:424_4: Tasmiñca samaye eko paccekasambuddho tassā anuggahatthaṃ avidūre khettapāḷiyā gacchati.
tika-vin01t2:424_5: Sā taṃ disvā pasannamānasā supupphitaṃ mahantaṃ ekaṃ padumaṃ gahetvā tattha lāje pakkhipitvā paccekabuddhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:424_6: upasaṅkamitvā pañcahi lājasatehi saddhiṃ taṃ padumapupphaṃ datvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā “imassa,  bhante,
tika-vin01t2:424_7: puññassa ānubhāvena ānubhāvasampanne pañcasataputte labheyya”nti pañca puttasatāni patthesi.
tika-vin01t2:424_8: Tasmiṃyeva khaṇe pañcasatā migaluddakā sambhatasambhārā paripakkapaccekabodhiñāṇā tasseva paccekabuddhassa
tika-vin01t2:424_10: Atītāsu anekāsu jātīsu tassā puttabhāvena āgatattā tathā tesaṃ ahosi.
tika-vin01t2:424_14: Tassā padasā vicarantiyā paduddhāre paduddhāre bhūmito padumāni uṭṭhahanti.
tika-vin01t2:424_19: sesā bahi nikkhantaṃ gabbhamalaṃ nissāya saṃsedajabhāvena nibbattā.
tika-vin01t2:424_21: Te vayappattā uyyāne padumassare kīḷantā ekekasmiṃ padume nisīditvā khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ nibbattayiṃsu.
tika-vin01t2:426_0: Aniccatāyaṃ vayataṃ viditvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti. –
tika-vin01t2:428_2: “Vassaṃ upagacchiṃsū”ti vacanato vassūpagamanārahā sadvārabandhā eva veditabbāti āha “tiṇacchadanā sadvārabandhā kuṭiyo”ti.
tika-vin01t2:428_4: Nālakapaṭipadanti “moneyyaṃ te upaññissa”ntiādinā satthārā nālakattherassa desitaṃ puthujjanakālato pabhuti
tika-vin01t2:428_6: Taṃ pana paṭipadaṃ sutvā nālakatthero tīsu ṭhānesu appiccho ahosi dassane savane pucchāyāti.
tika-vin01t2:428_7: So hi desanāpariyosāne pasannacitto bhagavantaṃ vanditvā vanaṃ paviṭṭho.
tika-vin01t2:428_8: Puna “aho vatāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ passeyya”nti lolabhāvaṃ na janesi,
tika-vin01t2:428_10: Tathā “aho vatāhaṃ puna dhammadesanaṃ suṇeyya”nti lolabhāvaṃ na janesi,
tika-vin01t2:428_12: Tathā “aho vatāhaṃ puna moneyyapaṭipadaṃ puccheyya”nti lolabhāvaṃ na janesi,
tika-vin01t2:429_0: So evaṃ appiccho samāno pabbatapādaṃ pavisitvā ekavanasaṇḍe dve divasāni na vasi,
tika-vin01t2:429_2: ekasmiṃ gāme dve divasāni piṇḍāya na pāvisi.
tika-vin01t2:429_5: gāmato gāmaṃ āhiṇḍanto anurūpapaṭipadaṃ paṭipajjitvā aggaphale patiṭṭhāsi.
tika-vin01t2:429_6: Ekassa bhagavato kāle ekoyeva naṃ pūreti.
tika-vin01t2:429_7: Imañhi moneyyapaṭipadaṃ ukkaṭṭhaṃ katvā pūrento bhikkhu satteva māsāni jīvati,
tika-vin01t2:429_10: Ayaṃ pana thero ukkaṭṭhaṃ katvā pūresi,
tika-vin01t2:429_11: tasmā satta māse ṭhatvā attano āyusaṅkhārassa parikkhayaṃ ñatvā nahāyitvā nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā
tika-vin01t2:429_12: diguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ pārupitvā dasabalābhimukho pañcapatiṭṭhitena taṃ vanditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā hiṅgulakapabbataṃ
tika-vin01t2:429_14: Tassa parinibbutabhāvaṃ ñatvā bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ tattha gantvā sarīrakiccaṃ katvā dhātuyo gāhāpetvā cetiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā agamāsi.
tika-vin01t2:429_15: Evarūpaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipannenapi vassaṃ upagacchantena channe sadvārabandheyeva ṭhāne upagantabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:429_16: Appicchataṃ nissāyapi sikkhāpadassa anatikkamanīyattaṃ dassetuṃ “nālakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannenapī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:430_2: asenāsanikena vassaṃ upagantabbanti vacībhedaṃ katvā vassūpagamanaṃ sandhāyeva paṭikkhepo,
tika-vin01t2:430_4: Pāḷiyaṃ pana avisesattā aṭṭhakathāyañca “nālakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannenapī”tiādinā aviseseneva daḷhaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t2:430_5: vuttattā asenāsanikassa nāvādiṃ vinā aññattha ālayo na vaṭṭatīti amhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin01t2:430_8: nāvāyaṃ vassaṃ upagantu”ntiādinā sati asati vā senāsane vassūpagamanassa visuṃ anuññātattā “na,
tika-vin01t2:430_10: asenāsanikena vassaṃ upagantabba”nti ayaṃ paṭikkhepo tattha na labbhatīti asati senāsane ālayavasenapi nāvādīsu upagamanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:431_0: Katikavattāni ca khandhakavattāni ca adhiṭṭhāyāti pariyattidhammo nāma tividhampi saddhammaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti,
tika-vin01t2:431_3: padhānaghare vasantānaṃ saṅghaṭṭanaṃ akatvā antovihāre nisīditvā uddisatha uddisāpetha,
tika-vin01t2:431_9: Ekopi hi kulaputto pabbajjañca upasampadañca labhitvā sakalaṃ sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti.
tika-vin01t2:431_12: antovassaṃ nāmetaṃ sakaladivasaṃ rattiyā ca paṭhamapacchimayāmesu appamattehi bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:431_14: Porāṇakamahaātherāpi sabbapalibodhe chinditvā antovasse ekacariyavattaṃ pūrayiṃsu.
tika-vin01t2:431_15: Bhasse mattaṃ jānitvā dasavatthukakathaṃ dasaasubhadasānussatiaṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇakathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:431_19: divase divase sīlāni āvajjentā caturārakkhaṃ ahāpentā manasikārabahulā viharatha,
tika-vin01t2:431_20: cetiyaṃ vā bodhiṃ vā vandantena gandhamālaṃ vā pūjentena pattaṃ vā thavikāya pakkhipantena na kathetabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:431_21: antogāme manussehi saddhiṃ paccayasaṃyuttakathā vā visabhāgakathā vā na kathetabbā,
tika-vin01t2:431_23: khandhakavattañca sekhiyavattañca pūretabbanti evamādinā katikavattāni khandhakavattāni ca adhiṭṭhahitvā.
tika-vin01t2:432_2: vassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ tīhi ṭhānehi pavāretu”nti vuṭṭhavassānaṃ pavāraṇāya anuññātattā imassa suttassa vasena
tika-vin01t2:432_4: Kiñcāpi “imaṃ temāsaṃ vassaṃ upemī”ti vacanato pavāraṇādivasassa temāsantogadhattā taṃ divasaṃ yāva na pavārenti,
tika-vin01t2:432_6: tathāpi ekadesena avuṭṭhampi taṃ divasaṃ vuṭṭhabhāgāpekkhāya vuṭṭhameva hotīti katvā evaṃ vuttaṃ katākatabhāgāpekkhāya
tika-vin01t2:432_11: vassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ kathinaṃ attharitu”nti imassa pana suttassa vasena nippariyāyato mahāpavāraṇāya pavāritā
tika-vin01t2:432_12: pāṭipadadivasato paṭṭhāya “vuṭṭhavassā”ti vuccantīti dassetuṃ “mahāpavāraṇāya pavāritā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:432_13: Pāṭipadadivasato paṭṭhāya hi vassānassa pacchime māse kathinatthāro anuññāto parivāre “kathinassa atthāramāso
tika-vin01t2:432_14: jānitabboti vassānassa pacchimo māso jānitabbo”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin01t2:433_0: “Āpucchitabbā”ti vatvā idāni āpucchanavidhiṃ dassento “sace imaṃ kuṭi”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:433_1: Paṭijagganakaṃ vā na labhatīti vihārapaccante kate paṭijagganakaṃ na labhati.
tika-vin01t2:433_2: Te pana bhikkhū janapadacārikaṃ pakkamiṃsūti sambandho.
tika-vin01t2:433_4: Kiñcāpi ayaṃ cārikā nāma mahājanasaṅgahatthaṃ buddhānaṃyeva labbhati,
tika-vin01t2:433_5: buddhe upādāya pana ruḷhīsaddavasena sāvakānampi vuccati kilañjādīhi katabījanīnampi tālavaṇṭavohāro viya.
tika-vin01t2:433_7: Idāni tameva saṅgopanavidhiṃ dassento “yathā ca ṭhapita”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:433_11: Yathā ca ṭhapitaṃ na ovassīyati na temīyatīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:434_1: Natthi etassa attano sippe vayo ūnatāti avayoti āha “anūno paripuṇṇasippo”ti.
tika-vin01t2:435_3: saddayoge anāgatavacanassa icchitattā vuttaṃ “tassa lakkhaṇaṃ saddasatthato pariyesitabba”nti.
tika-vin01t2:435_9: ayaṃ pana anuddayāsaddo anurakkhaṇamatthaṃ antonītaṃ katvā pavattamāno mettāya karuṇāya ca pavattatīti idha mettāya pavattamāno vutto,
tika-vin01t2:435_13: tassa maddanaṃ udakaṃ āsiñcitvā hatthādīhi parimaddanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:435_15: Kiñcāpi therena sañcicca khuddānukhuddakā pāṇā maraṇādhippāyena na byābādhitā,
tika-vin01t2:435_16: tathāpi karuṇāya abhāvena “evaṃ kate ime pāṇā vinassissantī”ti anupaparikkhitvā katattā theraṃ vigarahi.
tika-vin01t2:435_19: Pāṇātipātaṃ karontānanti therena akatepi pāṇātipāte parehi sallakkhaṇākāraṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:435_25: “Mā pacchimā janatā pāṇesu pātabyataṃ āpajjī”ti vacanato yo bhikkhu iṭṭhakapacanapattapacanakuṭikaraṇavihārakārāpanavihārasammajjanapaṭaggidānakūpapokkharaṇīkhaṇāpanādīsu
tika-vin01t2:435_27: tena tādise padese kappiyavacanaṃ vatvāpi na taṃ kammaṃ kāretabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:436_0: Tattha tattha vuttameva āpattinti pathavīkhaṇanabhūtagāmapātabyatādīsu vuttapācittiyādiāpattiṃ.
tika-vin01t2:436_7: Yadi aññena kataṃ labhitvā vasantassa anāpatti siyā,
tika-vin01t2:436_8: na bhagavā taṃ kuṭikaṃ bhindāpeyyāti āha –
tika-vin01t2:436_10: Yathā vā tathā vā missā hotūti heṭṭhā mattikā upari dabbasambhārātiādinā yena kenaci ākārena missā hotu.
tika-vin01t2:436_14: Taṃ kira āvasathaṃ yathā sudhāparikammena payojanaṃ natthi,
tika-vin01t2:436_15: evaṃ iṭṭhakāhi eva cinitvā chādetvā karonti,
tika-vin01t2:437_3: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttakāraṇesu attano adhippetakāraṇadvayaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā aparānipi tattha vuttakāraṇāni dassento āha –
tika-vin01t2:437_5: Tattha sattānuddayāyāti tādisāya kuṭikāya karaṇapaccayā vinassamānasattesu anuddayāya.
tika-vin01t2:437_7: tasmā tattha ṭhapitaṃ pattacīvarādi aguttaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:437_11: tādisassa vā senāsanassa abhisaṅkharaṇe bhikkhūnaṃ uddesaparipucchādīni sesakammāni pariccajitvā niccabyāvaṭatānisedhanatthaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:439_4: Ghaṭakampi vāḷarūpampi bhinditvā dhāretabbanti sace tādisaṃ akappiyachattaṃ labhati,
tika-vin01t2:439_6: Suttakena vā daṇḍo veṭhetabboti yathā chattadaṇḍe lekhā na paññāyati,
tika-vin01t2:439_12: Sā vaṭṭatīti yadipi rajjukehi na bandhanti,
tika-vin01t2:440_10: Agghiyagayamuggarādīnīti ettha agghiyaṃ nāma cetiyasaṇṭhānena sibbanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:440_11: mūle tanukaṃ agge mahantaṃ katvā gadākārena sibbanaṃ gayā,
tika-vin01t2:440_12: mūle ca agge ca ekasadisaṃ katvā muggarākārena sibbanaṃ muggaro.
tika-vin01t2:440_13: Kakkaṭakkhīni ukkirantīti gaṇṭhikapaṭṭapāsakapaṭṭānaṃ ante pāḷibaddhaṃ katvā kakkaṭakānaṃ akkhisaṇṭhānaṃ uṭṭhapenti,
tika-vin01t2:440_15: “Koṇasuttapiḷakāti gaṇṭhikapāsakapaṭṭānaṃ koṇehi nīhaṭasuttānaṃ koṭiyo”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:440_16: Kathaṃ pana tā piḷakā duviññeyyarūpā kātabbāti?
tika-vin01t2:440_17: Koṇehi nīhaṭasuttānaṃ antesu ekavāraṃ gaṇṭhikakaraṇena vā puna nivattetvā sibbanena vā duviññeyyasabhāvaṃ katvā suttakoṭiyo rassaṃ katvā chinditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:444_0: Vuttaṃ. Tasmā tesaṃ matena koṇasuttā ca piḷakā ca koṇasuttapiḷakāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t2:446_1: maṇivaṇṇaṃ pana pattaṃ aññena kataṃ labhitvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:446_4: citrāni pattamaṇḍalāni dhāretabbāni rūpakākiṇṇāni bhittikammakatānī”ti vuttattā “bhittikammaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:446_7: makaradantakaṃ chinditu”nti vacanato “makaradantakaṃ pana vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:447_3: Rajjukakāyabandhanaṃ ekameva vaṭṭatīti rajjukaṃ bandhantena ekaguṇameva katvā bandhituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:447_4: majjhe bhinditvā diguṇaṃ katvā bandhituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:447_5: diguṇaṃ pana akatvā ekarajjukameva satavārampi punappunaṃ āvijjitvā bandhituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:447_6: Ekampi na vaṭṭatīti ekaguṇampi katvā bandhituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:452_2: uccāvacāni kāyabandhanāni dhāretabbāni kalābukaṃ deḍḍhubhakaṃ murajaṃ maddavīṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:452_5: Kiṃ pana bahurajjuke ekato katvā ekena nirantaraṃ veṭhetvā kataṃ murajasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchatīti?
tika-vin01t2:452_7: Murajañhi nāma nānāvaṇṇehi suttehi murajavaṭṭisaṇṭhānaṃ veṭhetvā kataṃ.
tika-vin01t2:452_8: Keci pana “murajanti bahurajjuke ekato saṅkaḍḍhitvā ekāya rajjuyā paliveṭhetvā katarajjū”ti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:452_11: “bahurajjuke ekato katvā ekena nirantaraṃ veṭhetvā kataṃ bahurajjuka”nti na vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:452_13: Murajaṃ pana pāmaṅgasaṇṭhānañca dasāsu vaṭṭati “kāyabandhanassa dasā jīranti.
