tika-vin01t2:453_3: vidha”nti vuttattā kāyabandhanassa pāsante dasāmūle tassa thirabhāvatthaṃ kattabbe dantavisāṇādimaye vidhe.
tika-vin01t2:453_4: “Aṭṭha maṅgalāni nāma saṅkho cakkaṃ puṇṇakumbho gayā sirīvaccho aṅkuso dhajaṃ sovatthika”nti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:454_2: Aññaṃ vā vaṇṇamaṭṭhanti iminā piḷakādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin01t2:454_5: “Imasmiṃ adhikāre avuttattā lekhaniyaṃ yaṃ kiñci vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:454_7: Maṇḍalaṃ hotīti uttarāraṇiyā pavesanatthaṃ āhaṭamaṇḍalaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:456_5: vaṭṭatīti yathāvuttesu mañcapīṭhādīsu itthirūpaṃ vinā sabbaṃ mālākammalatākammādi vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuno vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:456_6: Senāsane kiñci paṭisedhetabbaṃ natthi aññatra viruddhasenāsanāti etthāyamadhippāyo –
tika-vin01t2:456_10: Rājavallabhā paranikāyikāpi ekanikāyikāpi uposathapavāraṇānaṃ antarāyakarā alajjino rājakulūpagā vuccanti.
tika-vin01t2:456_11: Tesaṃ lajjiparisāti tesaṃ sīmasāmikānaṃ pakkhā hutvā anubalaṃ dātuṃ samatthā lajjiparisā.
tika-vin01t2:456_12: Sukatamevāti aññesaṃ santakepi attano sīmāya antovuttavidhinā kataṃ sukatameva.
tika-vin01t2:458_3: Khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ karontoti khuddakaṃ mahantañca khaṇḍaṃ karonto.
tika-vin01t2:459_1: Kulabhogaissariyādīhi mahatī mattā pamāṇaṃ etassāti mahāmatto. Tenāha –
tika-vin01t2:460_5: Kathentīti “kiṃ nāmetaṃ kiṃ nāmeta”nti aññamaññaṃ kathenti.
tika-vin01t2:461_0: Kathaṃ panettha “dārūnī”ti bahuvacanaṃ “adinna”nti ekavacanena saddhiṃ sambandhamupagacchatīti āha –
tika-vin01t2:461_3: Satipi panettha gopakena dinnadārūnaṃ gahaṇe ujukaṃ avatvā lesena gahitattā thero “adinnaṃ ādiyī”ti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:462_1: Sabbā catuparisasaṅkhaātā pajā ettha atthīti sabbāvantā, parisā.
tika-vin01t2:462_4: Bimbisāroti tassa nāmanti ettha bimbīti suvaṇṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:462_6: Catuttho bhāgo pādoti veditabboti imināva sabbajanapadesu kahāpaṇassa vīsatimo bhāgo māsakoti idañca vuttameva hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:462_11: tatthāpi nīlakahāpaṇānaṃ vaḷañjanaṭṭhāne ca avaḷañjanaṭṭhāne ca samānaagghavasena pavattamānaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin01t2:464_1: vuttanayeneva veditabboti iminā “bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ evaṃ paññattaṃ hoti ca,
tika-vin01t2:464_2: idañca aññaṃ vatthu udapādī”ti evaṃ paṭhamapārājikavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena tassattho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:464_4: taṃ dassetuṃ ‘tena kho pana samayenā’tiādimāhā”ti evaṃ anupaññattisambandho ca tattha vuttanayeneva veditabboti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:467_1: “Abhinavaniviṭṭho ekakuṭikādigāmo yāva manussā pavisitvā vāsaṃ na kappenti,
tika-vin01t2:467_8: tasmā yakkhanagarampi pavisantena āpaṇādīsu dissamānesu sabbaṃ gāmappavesanavattaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:467_10: Punapi āgantukāmāti iminā tesaṃ tattha sāpekkhabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:468_0: Nanu ca “gāmā vā araññā vā”ti ettakameva mātikāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:468_1: tasmā gāmalakkhaṇaṃ dassetvā araññameva dassetabbaṃ siyā,
tika-vin01t2:468_2: gāmūpacāro nāmātiādi pana kasmā vuttanti āha –
tika-vin01t2:468_4: Gāmūpacāre hi dassite ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca avasesaṃ araññaṃ nāmāti araññaparicchedo sakkā dassetuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:468_6: Mātikāyaṃ pana gāmaggahaṇeneva gāmūpacāropi saṅgahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:468_8: Evañca katvā mātikāya anavasesaavaharaṇaṭṭhānapariggaho siddho hoti.
tika-vin01t2:468_10: Araññasaṅkhepaṃ gacchatīti “nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā sabbametaṃ arañña”nti abhidhamme vuttattā.
tika-vin01t2:468_11: Vemajjhameva indakhīloti vuccatīti indakhīlaṭṭhāniyattā asatipi indakhīle vemajjhameva tathā vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:468_13: tattha ubhosu passesu vatiyā vā pākārassa vā koṭivemajjhameva indakhīlaṭṭhāniyattā “indakhīlo”ti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:469_1: Iminā pana vacanena suppamusalapātopi baladassanavaseneva katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:469_2: Kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ mahāpaccariyañca gharūpacāro gāmoti adhippāyena “gharūpacāre ṭhitassa leḍḍupāto gāmūpacāro”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:469_3: Dvāreti nibbakosassa udakapatanaṭṭhānato abbhantaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:469_4: Antogeheti ca pamukhassa abbhantarameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:469_5: Kataparikkhepoti imināva gharassa samantato tattako paricchedo gharūpacāro nāmāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:469_6: Yassa pana gharassa samantato gorūpānaṃ pavesananivāraṇatthaṃ pākāravatiādīhi parikkhepo kato hoti,
tika-vin01t2:469_8: suppapātādiparicchedo pana aparikkhittagharaṃ sandhāya vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:469_9: Idamettha pamāṇanti vikālagāmappavesanādīsu gāmagāmūpacārānaṃ asaṅkarato vinicchayassa veditabbattā.
tika-vin01t2:469_10: Kurundīādīsu vuttanayena hi gharūpacārassa gāmoti āpannattā gharagharūpacāragāmagāmūpacārānaṃ saṅkaro siyā.
tika-vin01t2:469_11: Evaṃ sabbatthāti iminā ito pubbepi pacchimasseva vādassa pamāṇabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:469_12: Keci pana “ito paṭṭhāya vakkhamānavādaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:470_2: Tassa gāmaparicchedadassanatthanti tassa aparicchedassa gāmassa gāmaparicchedaṃ dassetunti attho.
tika-vin01t2:470_3: Yadi evaṃ “gāmo nāmā”ti padaṃ uddharitvā “aparikkhittassa gāmassa gharūpacāre ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti kasmā na vuttanti?
tika-vin01t2:470_4: “Gāmo nāmāti idha avuttampi adhikāravasena labbhatiyevā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:470_5: Apare pana bhaṇanti “gāmūpacāro nāmāti imināva gāmassa ca gāmūpacārassa ca saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin01t2:470_6: ‘Gāmassa upacāro gāmūpacāro’ti evaṃ viggahe kariyamāne ‘parikkhittassa gāmassa indakhīle ṭhitassa majjhimassa
tika-vin01t2:470_7: purisassa leḍḍupāto’ti iminā parikkhittassa gāmassa gāmūpacāralakkhaṇaṃ dassitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:470_8: ‘gāmasaṅkhāto upacāro gāmūpacāro’ti evaṃ pana gayhamāne ‘aparikkhittassa gāmassa gharūpacāre ṭhitassa
tika-vin01t2:470_9: majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto’ti iminā aparikkhittassa gāmassa gāmaparicchedo dassitoti sakkā viññātu”nti.
tika-vin01t2:470_10: “Gharūpacāre ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti iminā parikkhittassapi gāmassa sace leḍḍupātato dūre parikkhepo hoti,
tika-vin01t2:471_2: “Vikāle gāmappavesane parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ atikkamantassa āpatti pācittiyassa,
tika-vin01t2:471_3: aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ okkamantassa āpatti pācittiyassā”ti vuttattā gāmagāmūpacārānaṃ asaṅkaratā icchitabbāti āha –
tika-vin01t2:471_6: aparikkhittassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃ atikkamantassa vikālagāmappavesanāpatti hotī”ti keci vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:471_7: taṃ na gahetabbaṃ padabhājaniyaṃ pana “parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ atikkamantassa āpatti pācittiyassa,
tika-vin01t2:471_8: aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ okkamantassa āpatti pācittiyassā”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin01t2:471_9: Aparikkhittassa gāmassa gharūpacārato paṭṭhāya dutiyaleḍḍupātasaṅkhātassa gāmūpacārassa okkamane āpatti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:471_10: Teneva vikālagāmappavesanasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāro adinnādāne vuttanayeneva veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:471_11: Mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi vuttaṃ “yvāyaṃ aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāro dassito,
tika-vin01t2:471_13: Yadi evaṃ “vikāle gāmaṃ paviseyyā”ti iminā virujjhatīti?
tika-vin01t2:471_16: aparikkhittassa upacāraṃ okkamantassa vikālagāmappavesanāpatti hotīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:472_0: Nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlāti indakhīlato bahi nikkhamitvāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:472_1: Ettha ca vinayapariyāyena tāva “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca avasesaṃ arañña”nti āgataṃ,
tika-vin01t2:472_2: suttantapariyāyena āraññikaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya “āraññakaṃ nāma senāsanaṃ pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima”nti āgataṃ.
tika-vin01t2:472_5: Nippariyāyato ca gāmavinimuttaṃ ṭhānaṃ araññameva hotīti abhidhammapariyāyena araññaṃ dassetuṃ “nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:472_10: ghare vā gharūpacāresu vā gāmūpacāresu vā aññatarasmi”nti vattuṃ mā labhatūti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:473_3: Pariccāgādimhi akate “idaṃ mayhaṃ santaka”nti aviditampi parapariggahitameva mātāpitūnaṃ accayena mandānaṃ uttānaseyyakānaṃ dārakānaṃ santakamiva.
tika-vin01t2:474_11: “Eko cittakoṭṭhāsoti yañca pubbabhāge avaharissāmīti pavattaṃ cittaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:474_12: yañca gamanādisādhakaṃ parāmasanādisādhakaṃ vā majjhe pavattaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:474_14: tesu ayameveko pacchimo cittakoṭṭhāso idhādhippeto”ti keci vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:474_16: “Anekappabhedattā cittassa eko cittakoṭṭhāsoti vutta”nti mahāgaṇṭhipade majjhimagaṇṭhipade ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:475_4: Suṅkaghātanti ettha rājūnaṃ deyyabhāgassa etaṃ adhivacanaṃ suṅkoti,
tika-vin01t2:475_5: so ettha haññati adatvā gacchantehīti suṅkaghāto.
tika-vin01t2:475_6: “Ettha paviṭṭhehi suṅko dātabbo”ti rukkhapabbatādisaññāṇena niyamitappadesassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:477_5: garuko ca hoti parikkhāro pañcamāsako vā atirekapañcamāsako vā,
tika-vin01t2:477_11: āpatti pārājikassā”ti evaṃ vuttapañcaavahāraṅgāni ekaṃ pañcakanti dassitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:477_12: Dve pañcakāni dassitānīti “chahākārehi adinnaṃ ādiyantassa āpatti pārājikassa.
tika-vin01t2:477_16: garuko ca hoti parikkhāro pañcamāsako vā atirekapañcamāsako vā,
tika-vin01t2:477_22: āpatti pārājikassā”ti evaṃ vuttesu chasu padesu ekaṃ apanetvā avasesāni pañca padāni ekaṃ pañcakanti
tika-vin01t2:477_23: dassetvā heṭṭhā vuttapañcakañca gahetvā dve pañcakāni dassitāni.
tika-vin01t2:478_4: Sāhatthikādi pañcakaṃ sāhatthikapañcakanti ādipadavasena nāmalābho daṭṭhabbo kusalādittikassa kusalattikavohāro viya.
tika-vin01t2:478_8: Labbhamānapadavasenāti sāhatthikapañcake labbhamānassa nissaggiyāvahārapadassa vasena theyyāvahārapañcake
tika-vin01t2:478_9: labbhamānassa parikappāvahārapadassa ca vasena yojetabbanti attho.
tika-vin01t2:479_2: suṅkaghātaṭṭhāne parikappitokāse vā ṭhatvā bhaṇḍassa bahi pātanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:479_4: Kiriyāsiddhito puretarameva pārājikāpattisaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sādhetīti atthasādhako.
tika-vin01t2:479_6: tadā avaharā”ti evarūpo hi āṇāpanapayogo parassa telakumbhiyā pādagghanakaṃ telaṃ avassaṃ pivanakānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:479_7: upāhanādīnaṃ nikkhepapayogo ca āṇattassa bhaṇḍaggahaṇato upāhanādīnaṃ telapātanato ca puretarameva pārājikāpattisaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin01t2:480_2: Tattha sace paro anantarāyiko hutvā taṃ avaharati,
tika-vin01t2:480_4: Parassa vā pana telakumbhiyā pādagghanakaṃ telaṃ avassaṃ pivanakāni upāhanādīni pakkhipati,
tika-vin01t2:481_1: Ārāmābhiyuñjanādīsu attano ca parassa ca dānaggahaṇesu nirussāhabhāvāpajjanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:481_3: “Asukassa bhaṇḍaṃ avaharā”ti aññaṃ āṇāpetīti etthāpi āṇāpakassa āṇattikkhaṇeyeva āpatti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-vin01t2:481_7: kālantarena gahaṇatthaṃ niyogo atthasādhakoti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-vin01t2:481_12: sāhatthikavasenapi atthasādhakapayogo pana upari āvi bhavissati.
tika-vin01t2:481_13: Dhuranikkhepo pana upanikkhittabhaṇḍavasena veditabboti idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:482_0: “Āṇattivasena pubbapayogo veditabbo”ti vuttattā anantarāyena gaṇhantassa ‘asukassa bhaṇḍaṃ avaharā’ti āṇāpanaṃ bhaṇḍaggahaṇato pubbattā pubbapayogo,
tika-vin01t2:482_2: “asukaṃ nāma bhaṇḍaṃ harissāmā”ti saṃvidahitvā sammantayitvā avaharaṇaṃ saṃvidāvahāro.
tika-vin01t2:482_5: Ṭhānācāvanavasena sahapayogoti idaṃ pana nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:482_6: khilasaṅkamanādīsupi asati ca ṭhānācāvane sahapayogo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t2:482_7: Vuttañhetaṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ṭhānācāvanavasena khilādīni saṅkāmetvā khettādiggahaṇavasena ca sahapayogo veditabbo”ti.
tika-vin01t2:483_3: Yo hi sandhicchedādīni katvā adissamāno avaharati,
tika-vin01t2:483_7: Yo hi pasayha balakkārena paresaṃ santakaṃ gaṇhāti gāmaghātakādayo viya,
tika-vin01t2:483_8: attano pattabalito vā vuttanayena adhikaṃ gaṇhāti rājabhaṭādayo viya,
tika-vin01t2:483_10: Bhaṇḍavasena ca okāsavasena ca parikappetvā avaharaṇaṃ parikappāvahāro.
tika-vin01t2:483_11: Tiṇapaṇṇādīhi aṅgulimuddikādiṃ paṭicchādetvā pacchā tassa paṭicchannassa avaharaṇaṃ paṭicchannāvahāro.
tika-vin01t2:484_5: “Idañca kāsāvaṃ attano santakaṃ katvā etasseva bhikkhuno dehī”ti kiṃkāraṇā evamāha?
tika-vin01t2:484_7: tasmā tassa adinnaṃ gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:484_8: Avahārakopi vippaṭisārassa uppannakālato paṭṭhāya cīvarasāmikaṃ pariyesanto vicarati “dassāmī”ti,
tika-vin01t2:484_9: cīvarasāmikena ca “mameta”nti vutte etenapi avahārakena ālayo pariccatto,
tika-vin01t2:484_11: Yadi evaṃ cīvarasāmikoyeva “attano santakaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti kasmā na vuttoti?
tika-vin01t2:484_15: itarassa “mayā paṭhamaṃ dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā pacchā adinnaṃ gahita”nti kukkuccaṃ uppajjeyyāti.
tika-vin01t2:485_2: Mayi santetiādi sabbaṃ raññā pasādena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:486_0: Ekadivasaṃ dantakaṭṭhacchedanādinā yā ayaṃ agghahāni vuttā, sā sabbā bhaṇḍasāminā
tika-vin01t2:487_3: Dhāreyyatthaṃ vicakkhaṇoti imasseva vivaraṇaṃ “āpattiṃ vā anāpattiṃ vā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:489_2: Tattha nisīditvā vajjāvajjaṃ passantīti akkhadassā vuccanti dhammavinicchanakā.
tika-vin01t2:489_3: Haneyyunti ettha hananaṃ nāma hatthapādādīhi pothanañceva sīsādicchedanañca hotīti āha –
tika-vin01t2:489_5: Teneva padabhājaniyañca “hatthena vā pādena vā kasāya vā vettena vā aḍḍhadaṇḍakena vā chejjāya vā haneyyu”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:489_6: Tattha aḍḍhadaṇḍakenāti dvihatthappamāṇena rassamuggarena veḷupesikāya vā.
tika-vin01t2:489_10: thenosīti ettha “paribhāseyyu”nti padaṃ ajjhāharitvā attho veditabboti āha “corosīti evamādīni ca vatvā paribhāseyyu”nti.
tika-vin01t2:490_2: Yattha yattha ṭhitanti bhūmiādīsu yattha yattha ṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:490_3: Yathā yathā ādānaṃ gacchatīti bhūmiādīsu ṭhitaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ sabbaso aggahaṇepi yena yena ākārena gahaṇaṃ upagacchati.
tika-vin01t2:492_2: sabbattha dukkaṭamevāti ettha “uṭṭhahissāmī”ti phandāpetvā puna anuṭṭhahitvā tattheva sayantassapi aṅgapaccaṅgaṃ
tika-vin01t2:492_4: Aññasmiṃ vā gamanassa anupakāreti yathā dvārapidahane kumbhiṭṭhānagamanassa anupakārattā anāpatti,
tika-vin01t2:492_5: evaṃ aññasmiṃ vā gamanassa anupakāre kāyavacīkamme anāpatti.
tika-vin01t2:492_8: Puññāni ca karissāmāti ettha “musāvādaṃ katvā puññāni karissāmāti vadantassa dukkaṭamevā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:492_11: tattha tattha pācittiya”nti ca “na hi adinnādānassa pubbapayoge pācittiyaṭṭhāne dukkaṭaṃ nāma atthī”ti ca vakkhati.
tika-vin01t2:492_12: Evaṃ pana vutte na virujjhati “musāvādaṃ katvā puññāni ca karissāmāti vadantassa pācittiyena saddhiṃ dukkaṭa”nti.
tika-vin01t2:492_13: Tathā hi “akappiyapathaviṃ khaṇantānaṃ dukkaṭehi saddhiṃ pācittiyānīti mahāpaccariyaṃ vutta”nti ca “yathā ca idha,
tika-vin01t2:492_14: evaṃ sabbattha pācittiyaṭṭhāne dukkaṭā na muccatī”ti ca vakkhati.
tika-vin01t2:492_16: anāpatti “buddhapūjaṃ vā dhammapūjaṃ vā saṅghabhattaṃ vā karissāmāti kusalaṃ uppādeti,
tika-vin01t2:492_17: kusalacittena gamane anāpattī”ti ca “yathā ca idha,
tika-vin01t2:492_18: evaṃ sabbattha atheyyacittassa anāpattī”ti ca vakkhamānattā.
tika-vin01t2:493_0: Pamādalikhitanti veditabbanti aparabhāge potthakāruḷhakāle pamajjitvā likhitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:493_1: Pāḷiyaṃ sesaaṭṭhakathāsu ca “kudālaṃ vā piṭakaṃ vā”ti idameva dvayaṃ vatvā vāsipharasūnaṃ avuttattā tesampi
tika-vin01t2:493_2: saṅkhepaṭṭhakathādīsu āgatabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “saṅkhepaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana mahāpaccariyañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:493_4: Tato paraṃ sabbakiriyāsūti bījaggahaṇato paraṃ kattabbakiriyāsu.
tika-vin01t2:493_5: Sabbaṃ purimanayenevāti yāva piṭakapariyosānā hatthavārapadavāresu dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:494_0: Therehi dassitanti pubbapayogasahapayogadukkaṭesu asammohatthaṃ samodhānetvā dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi dassitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:494_1: “Sabbesampi dukkaṭānaṃ imesuyeva aṭṭhasu saṅgahetabbabhāvato itarehi sattahi dukkaṭehi vinimuttaṃ vinayadukkaṭeyeva saṅgahetabba”nti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:494_2: Dasavidhaṃ ratananti “muttā maṇi veḷuriyo saṅkho silā pavāḷaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ lohitaṅgo masāragalla”nti evamāgataṃ dasavidhaṃ ratanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:500_0: Sattavidhaṃ dhaññanti sāli vīhi yavo kaṅgu kudrūso varako godhumoti idaṃ sattavidhaṃ dhaññaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:500_4: Durupaciṇṇadukkaṭanti “na kattabba”nti vāritassa katattā duṭṭhu āciṇṇaṃ caritanti durupaciṇṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:500_7: “Saṅghabhedāya parakkamatī”ti sutvā taṃnivāraṇatthāya ñāte atthe avadantassa ñātadukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:500_8: Ekādasa samanubhāsanā nāma bhikkhupātimokkhe cattāro yāvatatiyakā saṅghādisesā,
tika-vin01t2:500_13: Vassāvāsādiṃ paṭissuṇitvā na sampādentassa paṭissavanimittaṃ dukkaṭaṃ paṭissavadukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:502_0: Vinaye ceva ñāte ca, ñattiyā ca paṭissave;
tika-vin01t2:504_0: Sahapayogato paṭṭhāya cettha purimā purimā āpattiyo paṭippassambhantīti āha “atha dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:504_1: Tattha “dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā”ti vuttattā dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā khaṇantassa purimāpattiyo na paṭippassambhantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:504_3: uddharaṇadukkaṭe patiṭṭhātīti idaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatānukkamena dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:504_4: Yadi pana paṃsuṃ uddharitvā saussāhova puna khaṇati,
tika-vin01t2:505_0: Kataṃ karaṇaṃ kiriyāti atthato ekanti āha “virūpā sā kiriyā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:505_2: Tattha aparaddhaṃ viraddhaṃ khalitanti sabbametaṃ yañca dukkaṭanti ettha vuttassa dukkaṭassa pariyāyavacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:505_10: Yaṃ manusso kareti idaṃ panettha opammanidassanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:505_12: yathā yaṃ loke manusso āvi vā yadi vā raho pāpaṃ karoti,
tika-vin01t2:506_1: kucchitā vā gati dugatīti vattabbe “duggatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:506_2: yathā ca kaṭukaṃ phalametassāti kaṭukaphalanti vattabbe “kaṭukapphala”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:506_3: evamidhāpi thūlattā accayattā ca thūlaccayanti vattabbe “thullaccaya”nti vuttanti dassetuṃ “samparāye ca duggatī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:506_4: Saṃyoge pana kate saṃyogaparassa rassattaṃ siddhamevāti manasi katvā “saṃyogabhāvo veditabbo”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:506_6: Accayo tena samo natthīti desanāgāmīsu accayesu tena samo thūlo accayo natthi.
tika-vin01t2:506_7: Tenetaṃ iti vuccatīti thūlattā accayassa etaṃ thullaccayanti vuccatīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:507_0: “Sabbatthāpi āmasane dukkaṭaṃ phandāpane thullaccayañca visuṃ visuṃ theyyacittena āmasanaphandāpanapayogaṃ karontasseva hoti,
tika-vin01t2:507_3: Sahapayogaṃ pana akatvāti ettha “pubbapayoge āpannāpattīnaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā abhāvato sahapayogaṃ katvāpi
tika-vin01t2:507_4: lajjidhammaṃ okkantena pubbapayoge āpannāpattiyo desetabbā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:507_5: Aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ pana kate sahapayoge pubbapayoge āpannāpattīnampi paṭippassaddhiṃ dīpeti,
tika-vin01t2:507_6: aññathā “sahapayogaṃ pana akatvā”ti idaṃ visesanameva niratthakaṃ siyā.
tika-vin01t2:507_7: Yañca heṭṭhā vuttaṃ “sace panassa tatthajātake tiṇarukkhalatādimhi chinnepi lajjidhammo okkamati,
tika-vin01t2:507_10: tampi sahapayoge kate pubbapayoge āpannāpattīnaṃ paṭippassaddhimeva dīpeti sahapayoge chedanapaccayā āpannadukkaṭasseva desanāya vuttattā.
tika-vin01t2:507_11: Sahapayogato paṭṭhāyevāti ca idaṃ sahapayogaṃ pattassa tato pubbe āpannānaṃ pubbapayogāpattīnampi paṭippassaddhiṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin01t2:507_12: Tena hi ayamattho viññāyati “yāva sahapayogaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin01t2:507_13: tāva pubbe āpannāpattīnaṃ paṭippassaddhi na hoti,
tika-vin01t2:507_14: sahapayogaṃ pattakālato pana paṭṭhāya tāsampi paṭippassaddhi hotī”ti,
tika-vin01t2:508_2: sace khaṇanaviyūhanuddharaṇesu dasa dasa katvā āpattiyo āpannā,
tika-vin01t2:508_3: tāsu uddharaṇe dasa āpattiyo desetvā muccati visabhāgakiriyaṃ patvā purimāpurimāpattīnaṃ paṭippassaddhattāti.
tika-vin01t2:508_4: Jātivasena pana samānakiriyāya āpannāpattiyo ekattena gahetvā “ekameva desetvā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:508_5: tasmā imināpi kurundaṭṭhakathāvacanena paṭhamaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttapurimāpattipaṭippassaddhimeva samatthayati,
tika-vin01t2:508_6: na pana ubhinnaṃ aṭṭhakathānaṃ atthato nānākaraṇaṃ atthi.
tika-vin01t2:508_7: Aparampettha pakāraṃ vaṇṇayanti “samānakiriyāsupi purimapurimakhaṇanapaccayā āpannāpattiyo pacchimapacchimakhaṇanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:508_8: patvā paṭippassambhantīti iminā adhippāyena ‘paṃsukhaṇanādīsu ca lajjidhamme uppanne bahukāpi āpattiyo hontu,
tika-vin01t2:508_10: “Evañca sati ‘bahukāpi āpattiyo hontū’ti na vattabbaṃ bhaveyya, vuttañca,
tika-vin01t2:508_11: tasmā visabhāgakiriyameva patvā purimāpattīnaṃ paṭippassaddhiṃ icchanteneva bahukāsupi āpattīsu ekameva
tika-vin01t2:508_12: desetvā muccatīti imasmiṃ ṭhāne visuṃyeveko desanākkamo dassito”tipi vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:508_14: yathā idha purimāpattīnaṃ paṭippassaddhi aṭṭhakathācariyappamāṇena gahitā,
tika-vin01t2:508_15: evaṃ bahukāsupi āpattīsu ekameva desetvā muccatīti idampi idha aṭṭhakathācariyappamāṇatoyeva veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:508_16: Yathā ca pāḷiyaṃ pācittiyaṭṭhānepi dukkaṭameva hotīti idha āveṇikaṃ katvā āpattiviseso dassito,
tika-vin01t2:508_17: evaṃ purimāpattīnaṃ paṭippassaddhiviseso ca desanāviseso ca aṭṭhakathācariyehi dassitoti.
tika-vin01t2:509_0: Heṭṭhato osīdentoti “sāmikesu āgantvā apassitvā gatesu gaṇhissāmī”ti theyyacittena heṭṭhābhūmiyaṃ osīdento.
tika-vin01t2:509_2: Evaṃ ekaṭṭhāne ṭhitāya kumbhiyā ṭhānācāvanaṃ chahi ākārehi veditabbanti sambandho.
tika-vin01t2:509_4: pārājikanti ākāsagataṃ akatvā ghaṃsitvā nīharantassa chinnakoṭito nīhaṭamatte pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:509_5: Ito cito ca sāretīti ghaṃsantoyeva ākāsagataṃ akatvā sāreti.
tika-vin01t2:510_3: Apabyūhantoti “heṭṭhā ṭhitaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti hatthena dvidhā karonto.
tika-vin01t2:510_5: Nanu ca aṭṭhakathācariyappamāṇena saṅkhepaṭṭhakathādīsu vuttampi kasmā na gahetabbanti āha –
tika-vin01t2:510_8: Vinayagarukā hi vinayavinicchaye āgate garuke tiṭṭhanti.
tika-vin01t2:510_11: vinayassa vā esā dhammatā tesaṃ garugāravaṭṭhānassa vinayavisayattā.
tika-vin01t2:511_0: Idāni saṅkhepaṭṭhakathādīsu vuttaṃ pāḷiyāpi na sametīti dassento āha “apicā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:511_2: Pattādiṃ apūretvā gaṇhantassa anuddhaṭepi mukhavaṭṭiparicchedo hoti,
tika-vin01t2:511_3: pūretvā gaṇhantassa pana uddharaṇakāle hotīti āha “mukhavaṭṭiparicchedena vā uddhārena vā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:511_4: Yadā pana telakumbhīādīsu telādīnaṃ abahubhāvato bhājanaṃ nimujjāpetvā gaṇhituṃ na sakkā hoti,
tika-vin01t2:511_10: Hatthato muttamatte pārājikanti theyyacittena parasantakaggahaṇapayogassa katattā.
tika-vin01t2:511_11: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyameva “sacepi mariyādaṃ dubbalaṃ katvā sukkhataḷākassa udakanibbahanaṭṭhānaṃ udakaniddhamanatumbaṃ vā pidahati,
tika-vin01t2:511_12: aññato ca gamanamagge vā pāḷiṃ bandhati,
tika-vin01t2:511_14: pacchā deve vuṭṭhe udakaṃ āgantvā mariyādaṃ bhindati,
tika-vin01t2:511_15: sabbattha bhaṇḍadeyya”nti vuttattā “taṃ pana tattheva sukkhataḷāke sukkhamātikāya ujukaraṇavinicchayena virujjhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:512_7: Suddhacittova uddharatīti kumbhiyaṃ telassa ākiraṇato puretarameva suddhacitto nikkhipitvā pacchā suddhacittova uddharati.
tika-vin01t2:512_12: Atha vā anāpattimattameva vuttanti imināpi tattha “gīvā”ti vacanābhāvato “na gīvā”ti pubbe vuttamahāaṭṭhakathāvādameva patiṭṭhāpeti,
tika-vin01t2:512_14: Attano bhaṇḍanti telākiraṇato puretarameva attano kumbhiyaṃ suddhacittena ṭhapitaṃ pītatelaṃ attano parikkhāraṃ.
tika-vin01t2:513_0: Bahigataṃ nāma hotīti tato paṭṭhāya telassa aṭṭhānabhāvato adhomukhabhāvato ca bahigataṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin01t2:513_1: Anto paṭṭhāya chidde kariyamāne telassa nikkhamitvā gatagataṭṭhānaṃ bhājanasaṅkhyameva gacchatīti āha –
tika-vin01t2:513_3: Yathā tathā vā katassāti bāhirantato abbhantarato vā paṭṭhāya katassa.
tika-vin01t2:513_4: Majjhe ṭhapetvā katachiddeti majjhe thokaṃ kapālaṃ ṭhapetvā pacchā taṃ chindantena katachidde.
tika-vin01t2:513_5: “Mariyādacchedane anto ṭhatvā bahimukho chindanto bahi antena kāretabbo,
tika-vin01t2:513_6: bahi ṭhatvā antomukho chindanto anto antena kāretabbo,
tika-vin01t2:513_7: anto ca bahi ca chinditvā majjhe ṭhapetvā taṃ chindanto majjhena kāretabbo”ti vuttattā “taḷākassa ca mariyādabhedena sametī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:513_8: Idamettha yuttanti anto ca bahi ca paṭṭhāya katachidde majjhena kāretabbo.
tika-vin01t2:513_10: bahi paṭṭhāya kate abbhantarena kāretabboti ayaṃ tippakāropi ettha vemaṭṭhachidde yutto.
tika-vin01t2:514_1: Patthinnassa khādanaṃ itarassa pānañca sappiādīnaṃ paribhogoti āha –
tika-vin01t2:514_3: Kathaṃ pana tathā karotīti āha “uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:514_4: Kasmā panettha dukkaṭaṃ vuttanti āha “ṭhānācāvanassa natthitāya dukkaṭa”nti.
tika-vin01t2:514_9: Ekalakkhaṇanti bhedanaṃ kumbhijajjarakaraṇena chaḍḍanaṃ mātikāya ujukaraṇena saddhiṃ ekasabhāvaṃ ṭhānācāvanapayogasabbhāvato.
tika-vin01t2:515_0: Ettha evaṃ vinicchayaṃ vadantīti ettha mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutte eke ācariyā evaṃ vinicchayaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:515_1: Pacchimadvayaṃ sandhāya vuttanti ettha purimadvaye vinicchayo heṭṭhā vuttānusārena sakkā viññātunti tattha
tika-vin01t2:515_2: kiñci avatvā pacchimadvayaṃ sandhāya ṭhānācāvanassa natthitāya dukkaṭanti idaṃ vuttanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:515_3: Theyyacittenāti attano vā parassa vā kātukāmatāvasena uppannatheyyacittena.
tika-vin01t2:515_4: Vināsetukāmatāyāti hatthapādādiṃ chindanto viya kevalaṃ vināsetukāmatāya.
tika-vin01t2:515_6: kiṃ adhippāyena na kiñci vuttanti āha –
tika-vin01t2:515_9: Tattha vuttanayena bhindantassa vā chaḍḍentassa vāti muggarena pothetvā bhindantassa udakaṃ vā vālikaṃ vā ākiritvā uttarāpentassāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:515_10: Ayuttanti ceti pāḷiyaṃ purimapadadvayepi dukkaṭasseva vuttattā “purimadvaye…pe…
tika-vin01t2:515_11: pārājikanti idaṃ ayutta”nti yadi tumhākaṃ siyāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:515_12: Nāti ayuttabhāvappasaṅgaṃ nisedhetvā tattha kāraṇamāha “aññathā gahetabbatthato”ti.
tika-vin01t2:515_13: Kathaṃ panettha attho gahetabboti āha “pāḷiyaṃ hī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:515_14: Nāsetukāmatāpakkhe heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva atthassa avirujjhanato “theyyacittapakkhe”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:515_15: “Evaṃ vinicchayaṃ vadantī”ti ito paṭṭhāya vuttassa sabbassapi ekasseva vacanattā “evameke vadantī”ti nigamanavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:516_0: Idāni yathāvuttavasena pāḷiyā atthe gayhamāne mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ catunnampi sāmaññato vuttassa pacchimadvayaṃ
tika-vin01t2:516_1: sandhāya vuttanti vacane visesābhāvato pāḷiyaṃ vuttesu catūsu padesu “chaḍḍeti vā aparibhogaṃ vā karotī”ti
tika-vin01t2:516_2: imesaṃ padānaṃ visesābhāvappasaṅgato ca sayaṃ aññathā pāḷiṃ aṭṭhakathañca saṃsanditvā atthaṃ dassetukāmo
tika-vin01t2:516_4: Vinītavatthumhi “saṅghassa puñjakitaṃ tiṇaṃ theyyacitto jhāpesī”si vuttattā vinītavatthumhi tiṇajjhāpako
tika-vin01t2:516_5: viyāti imināva ṭhānā acāvetukāmovāti etthāpi theyyacittena ṭhānā acāvetukāmoti idaṃ vuttameva hotīti
tika-vin01t2:516_8: Idañhi theyyacittapakkhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ nāsetukāmatāpakkhassa vakkhamānattā.
tika-vin01t2:516_10: Itarathāpi yujjatīti theyyacittābhāvā ṭhānā cāvetukāmassapi dukkaṭaṃ yujjatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:519_4: Aggahetvā vāti leḍḍuādīhi paharitvā nayanavasena aggahetvā vā.
tika-vin01t2:519_5: Ākāsaṭṭhavinicchaye vuccamānepi tappasaṅgena ākāsaṭṭhassa vehāsaṭṭhādibhāvamupagatepi asammohatthaṃ “yasmiṃ aṅge nilīyatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:519_11: Rakkhatīti tena payogena tassa icchitaṭṭhānaṃ agatattā rakkhati.
tika-vin01t2:522_1: Vehāsaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana cīvaravaṃse ṭhapitassa cīvarassa ākaḍḍhane yathāvuttappadesātikkamo ekadvaṅgulamattākaḍḍhanena
tika-vin01t2:522_3: Idañca tādisaṃ nātimahantaṃ cīvaravaṃsadaṇḍakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:522_5: Rajjukena bandhitvāti ekāya rajjukoṭiyā cīvaraṃ bandhitvā aparāya koṭiyā cīvaravaṃsaṃ bandhitvā ṭhapitacīvaraṃ.
tika-vin01t2:523_0: Ekamekassa phuṭṭhokāsamatte atikkante pārājikanti bhittiṃ aphusāpetvā ṭhapitattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:523_1: Bhittiṃ nissāya ṭhapitanti paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitesu nāgadantādīsuyeva āropetvā bhittiṃ phusāpetvā ṭhapitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:523_2: Paṇṇantaraṃ āropetvā ṭhapitāti aññehi ṭhapitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:526_1: Udakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ sandamānaudake nikkhittaṃ na tiṭṭhatīti āha “asandanake udake”ti.
tika-vin01t2:526_2: Anāpattīti hatthavārapadavāresu dukkaṭāpattiyā abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:526_10: Atha vā rattaṃ vā hotu setaṃ vā satapattaṃ padumaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:526_13: Tasmiṃ chinnamatte pārājikanti udakato accuggatassa udakavinimuttaṭṭhānato chedanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:526_14: Yaṃ vatthuṃ pūretīti yaṃ pupphaṃ pārājikavatthuṃ pūreti.
tika-vin01t2:526_17: Rajjukesu tiṇāni santharitvāti ettha “dve rajjukāni udakapiṭṭhe ṭhapetvā tesaṃ upari tiriyato tiṇāni
tika-vin01t2:526_18: santharitvā tesaṃ upari bandhitvā vā abandhitvā vā tiriyatoyeva pupphāni ṭhapetvā heṭṭhato gatāni dve
tika-vin01t2:527_3: Na udakaṃ ṭhānanti attanā kataṭṭhānassa aṭṭhānattā.
tika-vin01t2:528_0: Bahi ṭhapiteti udakato bahi ṭhapite. Hatthakavasena khuddakaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t2:529_2: Pattaṃ vā pupphaṃ vāti idaṃ kaddamassa anto pavisitvā ṭhitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:529_6: Na avahāroti idaṃ pubbasadisaṃ na hotīti āha –
tika-vin01t2:529_12: tiṭṭhantīti ettha “matamacchānaṃyeva tesaṃ santakattā amate gaṇhantassa natthi avahāro”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:532_1: Nāvaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana yā bandhanā muttamatte ṭhānā na cavatīti iminā caṇḍasote baddhanāvaṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-vin01t2:532_3: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti evaṃ mocentassa paññattaṃ dukkaṭaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:532_4: Thullaccayampi pārājikampi hotīti ettha paṭhamaṃ ṭhānā acāvetvā mutte thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:532_5: paṭhamaṃ ṭhānā cāvetvā mutte pārājikanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:533_0: “Pāse baddhasūkaro viyā”tiādinā vuttaṃ sandhāyāha “tattha yutti pubbe vuttā evā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:533_1: Vippanaṭṭhā nāvāti visamavātādīhi vināsaṃ patvā udake nimujjitvā heṭṭhā bhūmitalaṃ appatvā majjhe ṭhitaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin01t2:533_3: nāvātalena phuṭṭhokāsaṃ mukhavaṭṭiṃ atikkantamatte pārājika”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:535_2: Balavā ca vāto āgammāti iminā asati vāte ayaṃ payogo katoti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:535_4: Sati pana vāte kato payogo ṭhānācāvanapayogoyevāti mātikāujukaraṇe viya attheva avahāroti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:535_5: Ṭhānācāvanapayogo na hotīti sukkhamātikāujukaraṇe viya asati vāte katapayogattā.
tika-vin01t2:535_6: Bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ pana hotīti nāvāsāmikassa bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:538_3: Kappakatāti yathā dvīhi bhāgehi heṭṭhā patiṭṭhāti,
tika-vin01t2:538_5: Tīṇi vā cattāri vā ṭhānānīti akappakatāya upatthambhaniyā vasena tīṇi ṭhānāni,
tika-vin01t2:538_7: Tathā pathaviyaṃ ṭhapitassa tīṇi ṭhānānīti sambandho.
tika-vin01t2:538_8: Tanti phalakassa vā dārukassa vā upari ṭhapitaṃ pathaviyaṃ ṭhapitañca.
tika-vin01t2:538_10: Dārūnaṃ upari ṭhapitassāti dvinnaṃ dārūnaṃ upari dvīhi akkhakoṭīhi olambetvā sakaṭasālāyaṃ ṭhapitassa.
tika-vin01t2:538_11: Heṭṭhimatalassāti sakaṭabāhāya bhūmiṃ phusitvā ṭhitassa heṭṭhimabhāgassa.
tika-vin01t2:538_12: Sesaṃ nāvāyaṃ vuttasadisanti iminā “yadi pana taṃ evaṃ gacchantaṃ pakatigamanaṃ upacchinditvā aññaṃ disābhāgaṃ neti,
tika-vin01t2:538_14: Sayameva yaṃ kañci gāmaṃ sampattaṃ ṭhānā acāventova vikkiṇitvā gacchati,
tika-vin01t2:538_16: bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ pana hotī”ti imaṃ nayaṃ atidissati.
tika-vin01t2:541_4: Yo cāyaṃ sīsabhāre vuttoti yo cāyaṃ vinicchayo sīsabhāre vutto.
tika-vin01t2:544_10: natthi avahāroti āha “sace sayampi katadhuranikkhepo hotī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:544_12: Katadhuranikkhepoti “na dāni naṃ imassa dassāmī”ti evaṃ tassa dāne katadhuranikkhepo.
tika-vin01t2:544_13: Kiṅkārappaṭissāvibhāveti “kiṃ karomi kiṃ karomī”ti evaṃ kiṅkārameva paṭissuṇanto vicaratīti kiṅkārapaṭissāvī,
tika-vin01t2:545_2: “Gaṇhā”ti avatvā “asāmikassa sāmiko aya”ntiādinā pariyāyena vuttepi tassa santakabhāvaṃ paricchinditvā
tika-vin01t2:545_4: Asatipi cettha ṭhānācāvane ubhinnaṃ dhuranikkhepoyeva ṭhānācāvanaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin01t2:545_5: Imasmiṃ dhuranikkhepe pārājike sāmikassa vimatuppādanapayoge kate thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:545_7: Sayaṃ parājayaṃ pāpuṇātīti kūṭaḍḍakārako parājayaṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin01t2:548_1: Vihāraṭṭhakathāyaṃ vihāropi pariveṇampi āvāsopi vihārotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatīti āha “vihāraṃ vā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:548_3: Pariveṇanti mahāvihārassa abbhantare visuṃ visuṃ pākāraparicchinnaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:548_5: Abhiyoge katepi avahārassa asijjhanato vuttaṃ “abhiyogo na ruhatī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:548_6: Gaṇasantake pana paricchinnasāmikattā sakkā dhuraṃ nikkhipāpetunti āha “dīghabhāṇakādibhedassa pana gaṇassā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:548_7: Idhāpi sace ekopi dhuraṃ na nikkhipati,
tika-vin01t2:551_1: Khettaṭṭhakathāyaṃ satta dhaññānīti sālivīhiyavakaṅgukudrūsavarakagodhumānaṃ vasena satta dhaññāni.
tika-vin01t2:551_3: Tattha nirumbhitvā gahaṇaṃ nāma vīhisīsaṃ acchinditvā yathāṭhitameva hatthena gahetvā ākaḍḍhitvā bījamattasseva gahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:551_6: Yasmiṃ bīje vātiādi nirumbhitvā gahaṇādīsu yathākkamaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:551_7: Sālisīsādīni nirumbhitvā gaṇhantassa yasmiṃ bīje vatthu pūrati,
tika-vin01t2:551_8: ekamekaṃ hattheneva chinditvā gaṇhantassa yasmiṃ sīse vatthu pūrati,
tika-vin01t2:551_9: asitena lāyitvā gaṇhantassa yassaṃ muṭṭhiyaṃ vatthu pūrati,
tika-vin01t2:551_10: bahūni ekato uppāṭetvā gaṇhantassa yasmiṃ muggamāsādiphale vatthu pūratīti evamettha yathākkamo veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:551_11: “Tasmiṃ bandhanā mocitamatte”ti vacanato tasmiṃ bījādimhi bandhanā mocite sati tato anapanītepi pārājikamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:551_13: Jaṭitānīti chinditāni acchinnehi saddhiṃ jaṭitāni hontīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:552_1: Ettha ca khīlasaṅkamanādīsu ubhayaṃ sambhavati sahapayogo dhuranikkhepo ca.
tika-vin01t2:552_2: Yadā hi parassa khettādīsu ekadesaṃ khīlasaṅkamanādivasena attano santakaṃ karoti,
tika-vin01t2:552_3: tadā satipi paṭhamataraṃ sāmikānaṃ dhuranikkhepe khīlasaṅkamanādisahapayogaṃ vinā na hotīti sahapayogeneva pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:552_4: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “ṭhānācāvanavasena khīlādīni saṅkāmetvā khettādiggahaṇavasena ca sahapayogo veditabbo”ti.
tika-vin01t2:552_5: Yadā pana asati dhuranikkhepe khīlasaṅkamanādimattaṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin01t2:552_6: tadā vinā dhuranikkhepena na hotīti dhuranikkhepeneva pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:553_2: tasmiṃ āgate pārājikanti ettha sace dārūni nikhaṇitvā tattakeneva gaṇhitukāmo hoti,
tika-vin01t2:553_4: Sace tattha sākhāyopi katvā gahetukāmo hoti,
tika-vin01t2:553_6: Tattakena asakkontoti dārūni nikhaṇitvā vatiṃ kātuṃ asakkonto.
tika-vin01t2:553_8: Vitthataṃ karotīti pubbe vijjamānameva mariyādaṃ vitthiṇṇaṃ karoti.
tika-vin01t2:553_9: Akataṃ vā pana patiṭṭhapetīti pubbe akataṃ vā mariyādaṃ ṭhapeti.
tika-vin01t2:556_1: Vatthuṭṭhakathāyaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pākārānanti iṭṭhakasilādārūnaṃ vasena tiṇṇaṃ pākārānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:558_0: 106. Gāmaṭṭhakathāyaṃ gāmo nāmāti pāḷiyaṃ na vuttaṃ sabbaso gāmalakkhaṇassa pubbe vuttattā.
tika-vin01t2:560_1: Araññaṭṭhakathāyaṃ araññaṃ nāmāti idaṃ pana na kevalaṃ pubbe vuttaaraññalakkhaṇappattimattena araññaṃ idhādhippetaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:560_2: kintu yaṃ attano araññalakkhaṇena araññaṃ parapariggahitañca hoti,
tika-vin01t2:560_5: Na pariggahitabhāvo araññassa lakkhaṇanti yadi hi pariggahitabhāvo araññalakkhaṇaṃ siyā,
tika-vin01t2:560_6: “araññaṃ nāma yaṃ manussānaṃ pariggahita”nti ettakameva vadeyyāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:560_7: Yanti iminā pubbe vuttalakkhaṇameva araññaṃ parāmaṭṭhanti āha “yaṃ pana attano araññalakkhaṇena arañña”nti.
tika-vin01t2:561_3: Na gahetabboti ettha pana yo parehi araññasāmikānaṃ hatthato kiṇitvā tacchetvā tattheva ṭhapito,
tika-vin01t2:561_5: Sāmikehi chaḍḍitoti gahetuṃ vaṭṭatīti paṃsukūlasaññāya gahaṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:561_6: Lakkhaṇacchinnassāpīti araññasāmikānaṃ hatthato kiṇitvā gaṇhantehi katasaññāṇassa.
tika-vin01t2:561_7: Challiyā pariyonaddhaṃ hotīti iminā sāmikānaṃ nirapekkhataṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin01t2:561_11: Tāni katāni ajjhāvutthāni ca hontīti tāni gehādīni katāni pariniṭṭhitāni manussehi ca ajjhāvutthāni honti.
tika-vin01t2:562_1: Dehīti vutte dātabbamevāti ettha “dehī”ti vutte “dassāmī”ti ābhogasabbhāvato “dehī”ti avutte adatvāpi gantuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin01t2:562_6: Yattha katthaci nītānampi dārūnaṃ araññasāmikānaṃyeva santakattā suddhacittena nikkhantopi puna theyyacittaṃ uppādetvā gacchati,
tika-vin01t2:565_4: Nibbahanaudakanti “mahodakaṃ āgantvā taḷākamariyādaṃ mā chindī”ti taḷākarakkhaṇatthaṃ tassa ekapassena vissajjitaudakaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:565_6: Mariyādaṃ dubbalaṃ katvāti idaṃ avassaṃ chinnasabhāvadassanatthaṃ bhaṇḍadeyyavisayadassanatthañca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:565_7: Mariyādaṃ dubbalaṃ akatvāpi yathāvuttappayoge kate mariyādaṃ chinditvā nikkhantaudakagghānurūpena avahārena kāretabbameva.
tika-vin01t2:566_1: Asampattevāti taḷākato nikkhamitvā mahāmātikāya eva ṭhite.
tika-vin01t2:566_5: taḷākato nikkhamitvā paresaṃ khuddakamātikāmukhaṃ apāpuṇitvā mahāmātikāyaṃyeva ṭhite baddhā ce,
tika-vin01t2:566_8: nikkhante baddhā bhaṇḍadeyya”nti hi idaṃ dvayaṃ heṭṭhā vuttavikappadvayassa yathākkamena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:566_11: taḷākagataudakassa sabbasādhāraṇattā taṃ ayuttaṃ viya dissati,
tika-vin01t2:566_12: “anikkhante baddhā subaddhā”ti iminā ca aṭṭhakathāvacanena na sameti.
tika-vin01t2:566_14: na sametīti ettha taḷākagataudakassa sabbasādhāraṇattā apariggahitaṃ idha vatthunti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:569_1: Dantakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ tato paṭṭhāya avahāro natthīti “yathāsukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅgho paribhuñjatū”ti yathāsukhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:569_2: paribhogatthāya ṭhapitattā vassaggena abhājetabbattā arakkhitabbattā sabbasādhāraṇattā ca aññaṃ saṅghikaṃ
tika-vin01t2:569_3: viya na hotīti theyyacittena gaṇhantassapi natthi avahāro.
tika-vin01t2:569_6: “Puna sāmaṇerā āharissantī”ti keci therā vadeyyunti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:572_1: Vanappatikathāyaṃ “ujukameva tiṭṭhatīti rukkhabhārena kiñcideva bhassitvā ṭhitattā hotiyeva ṭhānācāvananti adhippāyena vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:572_2: Vātamukhaṃ sodhetīti yathā vāto āgantvā rukkhaṃ pāteti,
tika-vin01t2:572_3: evaṃ vātassa āgamanamaggaṃ rundhitvā ṭhitāni sākhāgumbādīni chinditvā apanento sodheti.
tika-vin01t2:572_4: “Maṇḍūkakaṇṭakaṃ vā visanti maṇḍūkānaṃ naṅguṭṭhe aggakoṭiyaṃ ṭhitakaṇṭaka”nti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:575_5: pārājikamevāti ettha antaṃ na gaṇhāmīti asallakkhitattā antassa ca gaṇhissāmīti sallakkhitasseva paṭassa ekadesattā pārājikaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:576_0: Soti bhaṇḍahārako. Anajjhāvutthakanti apariggahitakaṃ, asāmikanti attho.
tika-vin01t2:577_0: Āharāpente dātabbanti ettha “chaḍḍetvā dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā gatānampi nirālayānaṃ puna āharāpanassa vuttattā
tika-vin01t2:577_1: bhikkhūnampi attano santake parikkhāre acchinditvā parehi gahite tattha dhuranikkhepaṃ katvāpi puna taṃ
tika-vin01t2:577_2: balakkārenapi āharāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti desavāsino ācariyā vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:577_3: sīhaḷadīpavāsino pana taṃ keci ācariyā na icchanti.
tika-vin01t2:577_4: Teneva mahāgaṇṭhipade majjhimagaṇṭhipade ca vuttaṃ “amhākaṃ pana taṃ na ruccatī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:577_6: Vicāraṇā eva natthīti tatthāpi paṭikkhepābhāvato ayamevatthoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:580_1: Upanidhikathāyaṃ “saṅgopanatthāya attano hatthe nikkhittassa bhaṇḍassa guttaṭṭhāne paṭisāmanapayogaṃ
tika-vin01t2:580_2: vinā aññasmiṃ payoge akatepi rajjasaṅkhobhādikāle ‘na dāni tassa dassāmi,
tika-vin01t2:580_3: na mayhaṃ dāni dassatī’ti ubhohipi sakasakaṭṭhāne nisīditvā dhuranikkhepe kate pārājikameva paṭisāmanapayogassa katattā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:580_4: Attano hatthe nikkhittattāti ettha attano hatthe saṅgopanatthāya nikkhittakālato paṭṭhāya tappaṭibaddhattā
tika-vin01t2:580_5: ārakkhāya bhaṇḍasāmikaṭṭhāne ṭhitattā ṭhānassa ca tadāyattatāya ṭhānācāvanassa alabbhanato natthi avahāroti
tika-vin01t2:581_3: “Aññaṃ tādisameva gaṇhante yujjatīti idaṃ saññāṇaṃ kathenteneva ‘asukasmiṃ ṭhāne’ti okāsassa ca niyamitattā
tika-vin01t2:581_4: tasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitaṃ pattaṃ apanetvā tasmiṃ okāse aññaṃ tādisameva pacchā ṭhapitaṃ pattaṃ sandhāya kathita”nti
tika-vin01t2:581_6: Corena sallakkhitapattassa gahaṇābhāvepi “idaṃ thenetvā gaṇhissāmī”ti tasmiṃ okāse ṭhite tādise vatthumatte
tika-vin01t2:581_7: tassa theyyacittasabbhāvato aññaṃ tādisameva gaṇhante yujjatīti corassa avahāro dassito.
tika-vin01t2:581_8: Padavārenāti therena nīharitvā dinnaṃ pattaṃ gahetvā gacchato corassa padavārena.
tika-vin01t2:581_9: Taṃ atādisameva gaṇhante yujjatīti “mamāyaṃ patto na hotī”ti vā “mayā kathito ayaṃ patto na hotī”ti vā
tika-vin01t2:581_10: jānitvā theyyacittena gaṇhantassa “idaṃ thenetvā gaṇhissāmī”ti vatthumatte theyyacittaṃ uppādetvā gaṇhantassa
tika-vin01t2:582_2: Vuttanayeneva therassa pārājikanti theyyacitteneva parasantakassa gahitattā uddhāreyeva therassa pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:582_3: Corassa dukkaṭanti asuddhacittena gahitattā gahitakāle corassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:582_4: Vuttanayeneva ubhinnampi dukkaṭanti corassa sāmikena dinnattā pārājikaṃ natthi,
tika-vin01t2:582_6: therassa pana attano santakepi asuddhacittatāya dukkaṭanti.
tika-vin01t2:583_1: asukaṃ nāma gāmaṃ gantvā piṇḍāya carissāmā”ti evaṃ therena kataāṇattiyā vihārassa parabhāge upacārato paṭṭhāya yāva tassa gāmassa parato upacāro,
tika-vin01t2:583_3: Maggato okkammāti ettha ubhinnaṃ sakaṭacakkamaggānaṃ antarāḷampi maggoyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:583_4: Aṭṭhatvā anisīditvāti ettha vihāraṃ pavisitvā sīsādīsu bhāraṃ bhūmiyaṃ anikkhipitvāva tiṭṭhanto nisīdanto
tika-vin01t2:583_5: vā vissamitvā theyyacitte vūpasante puna theyyacittaṃ uppādetvā gacchati ce,
tika-vin01t2:583_7: Sace bhūmiyaṃ nikkhipitvā puna taṃ gahetvā gacchati,
tika-vin01t2:583_11: Keci pana “purimasmiṃ theyyacitte avūpasantepi vuttanayeneva vissamitvā gacchato pāduddhārena uddhārena vā kāretabbo”ti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:583_12: “asukaṃ nāma gāmanti aniyametvā ‘antogāmaṃ pavisissāmā’ti avisesena vutte vihārasāmantā sabbopi gocaragāmo khettamevā”tipi vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:583_14: Purimasadisamevāti anāṇattiyā gahitepi sāmikassa kathetvā gahitattā heṭṭhā vuttavihārūpacārādi sabbaṃ khettamevāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:584_0: Eseva nayoti “antarāmagge theyyacittaṃ uppādetvā”tiādinā vuttanayaṃ atidisati.
tika-vin01t2:584_2: ko nu kho rajitvā dassatī”tiādinā nimitte kate.
tika-vin01t2:584_3: Vuttanayenevāti anāṇattassa therena saddhiṃ pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā gamanavāre vuttanayeneva.
tika-vin01t2:584_4: Ekapasse vāti vihārassa mahantatāya attānaṃ adassetvā ekasmiṃ passe vasanto vā.
tika-vin01t2:584_5: Theyyacittena paribhuñjanto jīrāpetīti theyyacitte uppanne ṭhānācāvanaṃ akatvā nivatthapārutanīhāreneva paribhuñjanto jīrāpeti,
tika-vin01t2:584_6: ṭhānā cāventassa pana theyyacitte sati pārājikameva sīse bhāraṃ khandhe karaṇādīsu viya.
tika-vin01t2:584_7: Yathā tathā vā nassatīti aggiādinā vā upacikādīhi khāditaṃ vā nassati.
tika-vin01t2:585_0: Añño vā kocīti iminā pana yena ṭhapitaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:585_2: Tava thūlasāṭako laddhotiādinā musāvāde dukkaṭaṃ adinnādānapayogattā.
tika-vin01t2:585_3: Itaraṃ gaṇhato uddhāre pārājikanti ettha “pavisitvā tava sāṭakaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti imināva upanidhibhāvato muttattā
tika-vin01t2:585_4: sāmikassa itaraṃ gaṇhatopi attano sāṭake ālayassa sabbhāvato ca uddhāre pārājikaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:585_5: Na jānantīti tena vuttaṃ vacanaṃ asuṇantā na jānanti.
tika-vin01t2:585_6: Eseva nayoti ettha sace jānitvāpi cittena na sampaṭicchanti,
tika-vin01t2:585_8: Paṭikkhipantīti ettha cittena paṭikkhepopi saṅgahitovāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:585_9: Yācitā vā ayācitā vāti ettha yācitā yadi cittenapi sampaṭicchanti,
tika-vin01t2:586_0: Gahetvā ṭhapetīti ettha cāletvā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne ṭhapitepi naṭṭhe gīvā.
tika-vin01t2:586_1: Upacāre vijjamāneti bhaṇḍāgārassa samīpe uccārapassāvaṭṭhāne vijjamāne.
tika-vin01t2:586_2: Mayi ca mate saṅghassa ca senāsane vinaṭṭheti ettha “kevalaṃ saṅghassa senāsanaṃ mā nassīti imināva adhippāyena vivaritumpi vaṭṭatiyevā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:586_3: Sahāyehi bhavitabbanti tehipi kiñci kiñci dātabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:586_4: Ayaṃ sāmīcīti bhaṇḍāgāre vasantānaṃ idaṃ vattaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:587_0: Lolamahātheroti mando momūho hasitakīḷitappasuto vā mahāthero.
tika-vin01t2:587_1: Attano attano vasanagabbhesu sabhāgabhikkhūnaṃ parikkhāraṃ ṭhapentīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:587_6: Paṭipathaṃ gatesūti corānaṃ āgamanaṃ ñatvā “paṭhamataraṃyeva gantvā saddaṃ karissāmā”ti corānaṃ abhimukhaṃ gatesu.
tika-vin01t2:587_7: Nissitake jaggentīti attano attano nissitake sikkhācariyāya posentāpi nissitake vihāraṃ jaggāpenti.
tika-vin01t2:587_10: Asahāyassa vā attadutiyassa vāti imasmiṃ pana pāṭhe ekena ānītaṃ dvinnaṃ nappahotīti attadutiyassapi vāro nivāritoti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:587_11: taṃ “yassa sabhāgo bhikkhu bhattaṃ ānetvā dātā natthī”ti iminā na sametīti vīmaṃsitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:587_12: Upajīvantena ṭhātabbanti abbhokāsikena rukkhamūlikenapi pākavaṭṭaṃ upanissāya jīvantena pattacīvararakkhaṇatthāya vihāravāre sampatte ṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:587_14: Diguṇanti vassaggena pāpitaṃ vināva dve koṭṭhāseti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:590_1: Suṅkaghātakathāyaṃ tato hanantīti tato nīharantā hananti.
tika-vin01t2:590_7: Dutiyaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmetīti ettha “paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ paricchedato bahi ṭhapetvā dutiye pāde uddhaṭamatte
tika-vin01t2:590_8: pārājika”nti vadanti uddharitvā bahi aṭṭhapitopi bahi ṭhitoyeva nāma hotīti katvā.
tika-vin01t2:590_10: tattha tattha sabbatthāpi eseva nayoti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:590_12: Avassaṃ patanakanti avassaṃ suṅkaghātato bahi patanakaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:590_13: Pubbe vuttanayenevāti avassaṃ patanake hatthato muttamatteti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:590_14: Vaṭṭantaṃ puna anto pavisatīti mahāaṭṭhakathāvacanassa kurundisaṅkhepaṭṭhakathāhi adhippāyo pakāsito.
tika-vin01t2:590_15: Anto ṭhatvā bahi gacchantaṃ rakkhatīti bhikkhuno payogena gamanavegassa antoyeva vūpasantattā.
tika-vin01t2:590_16: Parivattetvā abbhantarimaṃ bahi ṭhapetīti abbhantare ṭhitaṃ puṭakaṃ parivattetvā bahi ṭhapeti.
tika-vin01t2:590_17: Ettha ca “abbhantarime puṭake bhūmito mocitamatte pārājika”nti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:591_1: ṭhapetīti suṅkaghātaṃ apavisitvā bahiyeva ṭhapetī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ suṅkaṭṭhānassa bahi ṭhapitanti vakkhamānattā.
tika-vin01t2:591_2: Ācariyā pana “suṅkaṭṭhānassa bahi ṭhita”nti pāṭhaṃ vikappetvā “paṭhamaṃ antosuṅkaghātaṃ paviṭṭhesuyeva
tika-vin01t2:591_3: yānādīsu ṭhapitaṃ pacchā yānena saddhiṃ nīhaṭaṃ suṅkaghātassa bahi ṭhitaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:591_4: na ca tena nīta”nti atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:591_6: suṅkaṭṭhānassa anto paviṭṭhayānādīsu ṭhapitepi bhikkhussa payogaṃ vinā aññena nīhaṭattā nevatthi pārājikaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:591_7: “atra paviṭṭhassa suṅkaṃ gaṇhantū”ti vuttattā aññena nīhaṭassa bahi ṭhite bhaṇḍadeyyampi na hotīti.
tika-vin01t2:591_8: Ayameva ca nayo “vaṭṭitvā gamissatīti vā añño naṃ vaṭṭessatīti vā anto ṭhapitaṃ pacchā sayaṃ vā vaṭṭamānaṃ aññena vā vaṭṭitaṃ bahi gacchati,
tika-vin01t2:591_9: rakkhatiyevā”ti iminā vacanena sametīti yuttataro viya dissati.
tika-vin01t2:591_10: Suṅkaṭṭhānassa anto pavisitvā puna paccāgacchatopi tena passena paricchedaṃ atikkamantassa yadi tatopi gacchantānaṃ hatthato suṅkaṃ gaṇhanti,
tika-vin01t2:592_2: Anāpattīti tattha “sahatthā”ti vacanato aññena nīharāpentassa anāpatti.
tika-vin01t2:592_9: Idha anāpattīti imasmiṃ sikkhāpade avahārābhāvā anāpatti.
tika-vin01t2:592_10: Upacāranti suṅkaghātaparicchedato bahi samantā dvinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ abbhantaraṃ vatiāsannappadesasaṅkhātaṃ upacāraṃ.
tika-vin01t2:592_11: Tādisaṃ upacāraṃ okkamitvā pariharaṇe sādīnavattā dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:592_13: “Dvīhi leḍḍupātehīti ayaṃ niyamo ācariyaparamparābhato”ti mahāgaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:595_1: Pāṇakathāyaṃ tiracchānagatassa ekantena pādagghanakatā na sambhavatīti āha –
tika-vin01t2:595_5: Āṭhapitoti mātāpitūhi iṇaṃ gaṇhantehi “yāva iṇadānā ayaṃ tumhākaṃ santike hotū”ti iṇadāyakānaṃ niyyātito.
tika-vin01t2:595_6: Yasmā mātāpitaro dāsānaṃ viya puttānaṃ na sāmino.
tika-vin01t2:595_10: Dhanaṃ pana gataṭṭhāne vaḍḍhatīti ettha “āṭhapetvā gahitadhanaṃ vaḍḍhiyā saha avahārakassa gīvā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:596_1: avahāro hotīti ettha padesacārittavasena attanāva attānaṃ niyyātetvā dāsabyaṃ upagataṃ avaharantassapi pārājikamevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:596_2: Gehadāsiyā kucchimhi dāsassa jātoti evampi sambhavatīti sambhavantaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:596_3: Gehadāsiyā kucchismiṃ pana aññassa jātopi ettheva saṅgahito.
tika-vin01t2:596_6: Tattha paradesato paharitvāti paradesaṃ vilumpakehi rājarājamahāmattādīhi mahācorehi paradesato paharitvā.
tika-vin01t2:596_7: Anāpatti pārājikassāti yadi tassa vacanena tato adhikaṃ vegaṃ na vaḍḍheti, anāpatti.
tika-vin01t2:596_9: Manussaviggahe “maraṇavaṇṇaṃ vā saṃvaṇṇeyyā”ti vuttattā pariyāyakathāyapi na muccati,
tika-vin01t2:596_10: idha pana “adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyeyyā”ti ādānasseva vuttattā pariyāyakathāya muccati.
tika-vin01t2:599_0: Apadakathāyaṃ nāmenāti sappanāmena vā sāmikena katanāmena vā.
tika-vin01t2:601_1: Catuppadakathāyaṃ bhiṅkacchāpanti bhiṅkabhiṅkāti saddāyanato evaṃladdhanāmaṃ hatthipotakaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:601_6: aparikkhittanagare pana antonagare ṭhitassapi ṭhitaṭṭhānameva ṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:604_2: “Oṇirakkhassa santike ṭhapitaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ upanidhi viya saṅgopanatthāya anikkhipitvā muhuttaṃ olokanatthāya
tika-vin01t2:604_3: ṭhapitattā tassa ṭhānācāvanamattena pārājikaṃ janetī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:606_1: āpatti sabbesaṃ pārājikassā”ti pāḷiyaṃ avisesena vuttattā āṇāpakānaṃ āṇattikkhaṇe āpatti,
tika-vin01t2:606_2: avahārakassa uddhāreti yathāsambhavaṃ yojetvā attho gahetabbo āṇattikathāyaṃ “so taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharati,
tika-vin01t2:606_4: Etthāpi hi āṇāpakassa āṇattikkhaṇeyeva āpatti vuttā.
tika-vin01t2:606_5: Tathā ca vakkhati “atha taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avassaṃ hāriyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:606_6: yaṃ parato sabbesaṃ āpatti pārājikassāti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:606_7: tato imassa taṅkhaṇeyeva pārājikaṃ hotīti ayaṃ yutti sabbattha veditabbā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:606_8: Saṃvidāvahāre ca “āṇatti natthī”ti na vattabbā “antevāsikesu ekamekassa ekeko māsako sāhatthiko hoti,
tika-vin01t2:606_10: Āṇattiyā ca sati āṇāpakassa āṇattikkhaṇeyeva āpatti icchitabbā,
tika-vin01t2:607_3: Ettha hi sabbesaṃyeva āpattidassanatthaṃ avahārakassapi āpattisambhavaṭṭhānaṃ dassento “tassuddhāre sabbesaṃ pārājika”nti āha,
tika-vin01t2:607_4: na pana āṇāpakānampi uddhāreyeva āpattidassanatthanti evamattho gahetabbo.
tika-vin01t2:607_6: tassuddhāre sabbesaṃ pārājika”ntiādīsupi evameva attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin01t2:607_7: Atha vā saṃvidāvahāre āṇāpakānampi uddhāreyeva āpatti,
tika-vin01t2:607_8: na āṇattikkhaṇeti āveṇikamidaṃ lakkhaṇanti aṭṭhakathācariyappamāṇena gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:607_9: ito vā aññena pakārena yathā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pubbenāparaṃ na virujjhati,
tika-vin01t2:608_1: Tena nesaṃ dukkaṭāpattiyoti āṇattivasena pārājikāpattiyā asambhave sati vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:608_2: Yadi hi te āṇattā avassaṃ taṃ haranti,
tika-vin01t2:608_5: Sāhatthikaṃ vā āṇattikassa āṇattikaṃ vā sāhatthikassa aṅgaṃ na hotīti bhinnakālavisayattā aññamaññassa aṅgaṃ na hoti.
tika-vin01t2:608_6: Tathā hi sahatthā avaharantassa ṭhānācāvane āpatti,
tika-vin01t2:608_7: āṇattiyā pana āṇattikkhaṇeyevāti bhinnakālavisayā sāhatthikāṇattikehi āpajjitabbāpattiyo.
tika-vin01t2:611_1: Saṅketakammakathāyaṃ ocarake vuttanayenevāti “avassaṃ hāriye bhaṇḍe”tiādinā vuttanayena.
tika-vin01t2:611_2: Pāḷiyaṃ taṃ saṅketaṃ pure vā pacchā vāti ettha taṃ saṅketanti sāmiatthe upayogavacananti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:611_4: Atha vā taṃ saṅketaṃ asampatvā pure vā taṃ saṅketaṃ atikkamma pacchā vāti evamettha yojanā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:611_7: Taṃ nimittaṃ pure vā pacchā vāti etthāpi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:614_2: tasmā taṅkhaṇeyeva taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharituṃ na sakkā.
tika-vin01t2:614_3: Tathā hi kiñci bhaṇḍaṃ dūre hoti kiñci bhāriyaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:614_7: Evaṃ santepi nimittakammato paṭṭhāya gaṇhituṃ āraddhattā teneva nimittena avaharatīti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:614_8: Yadi evaṃ “purebhattapayogova eso”ti vādo pamāṇabhāvaṃ āpajjatīti?
tika-vin01t2:614_10: Na hi saṅketakammaṃ viya nimittakammaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:614_15: “Taṃ nimittaṃ pure vā pacchā vā taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharati,
tika-vin01t2:614_16: mūlaṭṭhassa anāpattī”ti idaṃ pana tena nimittakamme kate gaṇhituṃ anārabhitvā sayameva gaṇhantassa vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:617_1: Āṇattikathāyaṃ asammohatthanti yasmā saṅketakammanimittakammāni karonto eko purebhattādīsu vā akkhinikhaṇanādīni vā disvā “gaṇhā”ti vadati,
tika-vin01t2:617_2: eko gahetabbabhaṇḍanissitaṃ katvā “purebhattaṃ evaṃvaṇṇasaṇṭhānaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhā”ti vadati,
tika-vin01t2:617_4: so aññassa pāvadatū”tiādinā puggalapaṭipāṭiyā ca āṇāpeti,
tika-vin01t2:617_5: tasmā kālavasena kiriyāvasena bhaṇḍavasena puggalavasena ca āṇatte visaṅketāvisaṅketavasena etesu saṅketakammanimittakammesu asammohatthaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:617_6: Nimittasaññaṃ katvāti “īdisaṃ nāma bhaṇḍa”nti vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivasena gahaṇassa nimittabhūtaṃ saññāṇaṃ katvā.
tika-vin01t2:618_1: tatiyo catutthassāti evaṃ paṭipāṭiyā ce vadantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:618_3: na yathādhippāyaṃ āṇatti gatāti nevatthi thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:618_5: Tadeva hotīti bhaṇḍaggahaṇaṃ vinā kevalaṃ sāsanappaṭiggahaṇamattasseva siddhattā tadeva thullaccayaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:620_1: ācariyā pana “visaṅketattā eva mūlaṭṭhassāti pāḷiyaṃ avuttattā paṭiggaṇhantasseva taṃ dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:620_2: imināva heṭṭhā āgatavāresupi paṭiggaṇhantānaṃ paṭiggahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:620_3: taṃ pana tattha okāsābhāvato avatvā idha vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:621_0: Evaṃ puna āṇattiyāpi dukkaṭameva hotīti paṭhamaṃ atthasādhakattābhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:621_1: Āṇattikkhaṇeyeva pārājikoti maggānantaraphalaṃ viya atthasādhikāṇatticetanākkhaṇeyeva pārājiko.
tika-vin01t2:621_2: Badhiratāyāti uccaṃ bhaṇanto badhiratāya vā na sāvetīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:621_3: “Āṇatto ahaṃ tayā”ti imasmiṃ vāre puna paṭikkhipitabbābhāvena atthasādhakattābhāvato mūlaṭṭhassa natthi pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:621_4: “Paṇṇe vā silāya vā yattha katthaci ‘coriyaṃ kātabba’nti likhitvā ṭhapite pārājikamevā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:621_5: Taṃ pana yasmā adinnādānato pariyāyakathāya muccati,
tika-vin01t2:621_7: Yadi pana “asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne asukaṃ nāma bhaṇḍaṃ ṭhitaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:621_8: taṃ avaharā”ti paṇṇe likhitvā kassaci peseti,
tika-vin01t2:621_10: āṇattiyā avahaṭaṃ nāma hotīti yuttaṃ āṇāpakassa pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:625_1: Na ca sakasaññīti iminā pana parapariggahitaṃ vatthu kathitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:625_3: na ca tāvakālikanti iminā pana parapariggahitasaññā kathitā.
tika-vin01t2:625_5: Na tāvakālikatāti pacchā dātabbataṃ katvā aggahitabhāvo.
tika-vin01t2:625_7: Chaḍḍitanti kaṭṭhahārādīhi atibhārāditāya anatthikabhāvena araññādīsu chaḍḍitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:625_8: Chinnamūlakanti naṭṭhaṃ pariyesitvā ālayasaṅkhātassa mūlassa chinnattā chinnamūlaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:625_9: Asāmikanti anajjhāvutthakādīhi tīhi ākārehi dassitaṃ asāmikavatthu.
tika-vin01t2:628_3: “Cittena pana adhivāsetī”ti vuttamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “na kiñci vadatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:628_4: Pākatikaṃ kātunti yattakaṃ gahitaṃ paribhuttaṃ vā,
tika-vin01t2:629_1: tadeva vā aññaṃ vā tādisaṃ puna dassāmīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:629_2: Saṅghasantake saṅghaṃ anujānāpetumasakkuṇeyyattā kassaci vatthuno ananujānitabbato ca “saṅghasantakaṃ pana paṭidātumeva vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:630_0: Tasmiṃyeva attabhāve nibbattāpīti tasmiṃyeva matasarīre uppannāpi.
tika-vin01t2:630_1: Vinītavatthūsu sāṭakataṇhāya tasmiṃyeva matasarīre nibbattapeto viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:630_2: Rukkhādīsu laggitasāṭake vattabbameva natthīti manussehi apariggahitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:630_3: Sace pana taṃ ārakkhakehi pariggahitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:634_2: ahaṃ ekapassaṃ ukkhipāmī”ti ubhayesaṃ payogena ekassa vatthuno ṭhānācāvanaṃ sandhāya “sāhatthikāṇattika”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:634_3: Idañca kāyavācānaṃ īdise ṭhāne aṅgabhāvamattadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:634_4: Yāya pana cetanāya samuṭṭhāpito payogo sāhatthiko āṇattiko vā padhānabhāvena ṭhānācāvanaṃ sādheti,
tika-vin01t2:634_6: Aññathā sāhatthikaṃ vā āṇattikassa aṅgaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin01t2:639_1: Yathākammaṃ gatoti iminā tassa matabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:639_2: Abbhuṇheti imināpi vuttameva pariyāyantarena vibhāvetuṃ “allasarīre”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:639_4: Visabhāgasarīrattā accāsannena na bhavitabbanti āha “sīse vā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:639_5: Vaṭṭatīti visabhāgasarīrepi attanāva vuttavidhiṃ kātuṃ sāṭakañca gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:640_8: Tāni hi gaṇhanto heṭṭhāchiddena mānena “saṇikaṃ āsiñcā”ti vatvā antobhājane bahuṃ paggharāpetvā gaṇhāti,
tika-vin01t2:640_9: dadanto chiddaṃ pidhāya sīghaṃ pūretvā deti.
tika-vin01t2:640_11: Tāni hi gaṇhanto saṇikaṃ sikhaṃ ussāpetvā gaṇhāti,
tika-vin01t2:640_12: dento vegena pūretvā sikhaṃ chindanto deti.
tika-vin01t2:640_14: Khettādiṃ minantā hi amahantampi mahantaṃ katvā minanti,
tika-vin01t2:641_0: Tulākūṭaṃ pana rūpakūṭaṃ aṅgakūṭaṃ gahaṇakūṭaṃ paṭicchannakūṭanti catubbidhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:641_1: Tattha rūpakūṭaṃ nāma dve tulā sarūpā katvā gaṇhanto mahatiyā gaṇhāti,
tika-vin01t2:641_3: Aṅgakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto pacchābhāge hatthena tulaṃ akkamati,
tika-vin01t2:641_5: Gahaṇakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto mūle rajjuṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin01t2:641_7: Paṭicchannakūṭaṃ nāma tulaṃ susiraṃ katvā anto ayacuṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā gaṇhanto taṃ pacchābhāge karoti,
tika-vin01t2:642_2: Ekaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ katvā aññā dve tisso lohapātiyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇā karonti,
tika-vin01t2:642_3: tato janapadaṃ gantvā kiñcideva aḍḍhaṃ kulaṃ pavisitvā “suvaṇṇabhājanāni kiṇathā”ti vatvā agghe pucchite samagghataraṃ dātukāmā honti.
tika-vin01t2:642_4: Tato tehi “kathaṃ imesaṃ suvaṇṇabhāvo jānitabbo”ti vutte “vīmaṃsitvā gaṇhathā”ti suvaṇṇapātiṃ pāsāṇe ghaṃsitvā sabbapātiyo datvā gacchanti.
tika-vin01t2:643_0: Vañcanaṃ nāma tehi tehi upāyehi paresaṃ vañcanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:643_2: eko kira luddako migañca migapotakañca gahetvā āgacchati.
tika-vin01t2:643_7: migapotako eka”nti ca vutte ekaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ datvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā thokaṃ gantvā nivatto “na me, bho,
tika-vin01t2:643_10: Tena hi dve kahāpaṇe dehīti. So āha – “nanu, bho,
tika-vin01t2:643_15: ayañca kahāpaṇagghanako migapotakoti dve kahāpaṇā bhavissantī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:643_16: So “kāraṇaṃ vadatī”ti sallakkhetvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā migaṃ adāsīti.
tika-vin01t2:644_3: Tattha yaṃ himapātasamaye himena paṭicchannā hutvā maggappaṭipannaṃ janaṃ mūsanti,
tika-vin01t2:645_1: gaṇhissāmī”ti parikappassa pavattattā sāṭakassa ca tattha sabbhāvato.
tika-vin01t2:645_2: Padavārena kāretabboti bhūmiyaṃ anikkhipitvāva vīmaṃsitattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:645_4: Disvā haṭattā parikappāvahāro na dissatīti iminā parikappāvahārassa asambhavaṃ dassento mahāpaccariādīsu vuttassa ayuttabhāvaṃ vibhāveti.
tika-vin01t2:645_5: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyantiādinā pana parikappāvahārasambhavaṃ pāḷiyā saṃsandanabhāvañca vibhāvento mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttameva suvuttanti dīpeti.
tika-vin01t2:646_3: Tena kecivādo mahāpaccarivādenapi na sametīti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:646_4: Mahāaṭṭhakathānayo eva ca mahāpaccarivādenapi saṃsandanato yuttataroti vibhāveti.
tika-vin01t2:647_1: Kusaṃ pātetvāti vilīvamayaṃ vā tālapaṇṇamayaṃ vā katasaññāṇaṃ yaṃ kiñci kusaṃ pātetvā.
tika-vin01t2:647_3: Parakoṭṭhāsato kuse uddhaṭepi na tāva kusassa parivattanaṃ jātanti vuttaṃ “uddhāre rakkhatī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:648_1: Jantāgharavatthusmiṃ yasmā ānandatthero tattha anāpattibhāvaṃ jānāti,
tika-vin01t2:649_4: Jighacchābhibhūtā hi sīhādayo attanā khādiyamānaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ anatthampi kareyyuṃ.
tika-vin01t2:649_6: Jighacchāvinodanatthañhi tehi khādiyamānaṃ te palāpetvā gaṇhato tesu anukampā nāma na bhavissati.
tika-vin01t2:650_4: Aparassa bhāgaṃ dehīti asantaṃ puggalaṃ dassetvā gahitattā “bhaṇḍadeyya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:650_6: “Aparampi bhāgaṃ dehī”ti vuttepi saṅghasantakattā amūlakameva gahitanti “uddhāreyeva bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:650_9: Evaṃ gaṇhatoti “aparampi bhāgaṃ dehī”ti vatvā vā kūṭavassāni gaṇetvā vā gaṇhato.
tika-vin01t2:650_11: tena āṇattena vā dīyamānaṃ gihisantakaṃ “aparassa bhāgaṃ dehī”ti vatvā gaṇhato aparassa abhāvato sāmisantakameva hotīti bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ jātaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:650_12: Idha pana tehi evaṃ dīyamānaṃ “aparampi bhāgaṃ dehīti vatvā vā kūṭavassāni gaṇetvā vā gaṇhato dehī”ti
tika-vin01t2:650_13: vuttattā aññātakaviññattimattaṃ ṭhapetvā neva pārājikaṃ na bhaṇḍadeyyanti sudinnameva hoti.
tika-vin01t2:651_1: Parikkhāravatthūsu vuttaparikkhārassa heṭṭhā vuttabhaṇḍassa ca ko viseso?
tika-vin01t2:651_2: Yaṃ paribhogayoggaṃ ābharaṇādirūpaṃ akatvā yathāsabhāvato ṭhapitaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:651_4: Yaṃ pana tathā katvā paribhuñjituṃ anucchavikākārena ṭhapitaṃ ābharaṇādikaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:652_3: Āharāpentesu bhaṇḍadeyyanti “gahite attamano hotī”ti vacanato anattamanassa santakaṃ gahitampi puna dātabbamevāti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:652_4: “Sammukhībhūtehi bhājetabba”nti vacanato bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṃ upacārasīmaṭṭhānaṃyeva pāpuṇātīti āha “upacārasīmāyaṃ ṭhitasseva gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:653_1: “Bhaṇḍadeyyanti ubhinnaṃ sālayabhāve sati corassa vā sāmikassa vā sampattassa kassaci dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:653_7: Puna āvasante janapadeti jānapadikesu puna āgantvā vasantesu.
tika-vin01t2:654_0: Avisesena vuttanti “saussāhā vā nirussāhā vā”ti visesaṃ aparāmasitvā sāmaññato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:654_1: Na hi katipayānaṃ anussāhe sati saṅghikaṃ asaṅghikaṃ hotīti ayamettha adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:654_5: catūsu paccayesu yassa kassaci atthāya niyamitepi vuttanayameva.
tika-vin01t2:654_6: Issaravatāyāti paraṃ āpucchitvā vā anāpucchitvā vā dātabbakiccaṃ natthi,
tika-vin01t2:654_8: Agghena kāretabboti agghānurūpaṃ dukkaṭena thullaccayena vā kāretabbo.
tika-vin01t2:654_9: Issaravatāya paribhuñjato gīvāti na kevalaṃ ettheva gīvā,
tika-vin01t2:654_10: heṭṭhā kulasaṅgahatthāya issaravatāya vā dinnepi gīvāyeva.
tika-vin01t2:654_11: Sukhāditamevāti antovihāre nisīditvā ghaṇṭippaharaṇādivuttavidhānassa katattā sukhāditaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:654_12: Saṅghikañhi vebhaṅgiyabhaṇḍaṃ antovihāre vā bahisīmāya vā hotu,
tika-vin01t2:654_13: bahisīmāyaṃ ṭhitehi apaloketvā bhājetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:654_14: ubhayattha ṭhitampi pana antosīmāyaṃ ṭhitehi apaloketvā bhājetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin01t2:654_15: Teneva tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ “vihāreyeva nisīditvā evaṃ katattā sukhāditanti āhā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:655_5: tattakaṃ agghavasena vā cīvarādipaccayavasena vā paricchedaṃ katvā.
tika-vin01t2:655_6: Upārambhāti “bhadantā aparicchedaṃ katvā vadantī”ti evaṃ dosāropanato.
tika-vin01t2:656_5: Yaṭṭhiyā saha pātetīti sūkarassa āgamanato puretarameva tattha abajjhanatthāya pāteti.
tika-vin01t2:656_8: Na hi tena maggena gacchantā sabbeva sūkarā tena pāsena bajjhanti,
tika-vin01t2:656_11: Pacchā gacchatīti tena katapayogena agantvā pacchā sayameva gacchati.
tika-vin01t2:656_12: Heṭṭhā vuttesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu eseva nayo.
tika-vin01t2:656_15: Rakkhaṃ yācitvāti rājarājamahāmattādīnaṃ santikaṃ gantvā anuddissa rakkhaṃ yācitvā.
tika-vin01t2:657_2: bhaṇḍadeyyamevāti kumīnassa anto pavisitabbānaṃ macchānaṃ agghena bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:658_9: Bhājetvā khādantīti āgantukānampi sampattānaṃ bhājetvā khādantīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:658_10: Catūsu paccayesu sammā upanentīti ambaphalādīni vikkiṇitvā cīvarādīsu catūsu paccayesu sammā upanenti.
tika-vin01t2:658_11: Cīvaratthāya niyametvā dinnāti “imesaṃ rukkhānaṃ phalāni vikkiṇitvā cīvaresuyeva upanetabbāni,
tika-vin01t2:658_12: na bhājetvā khāditabbānī”ti evaṃ niyametvā dinnā.
tika-vin01t2:658_13: Tesupi āgantukā anissarāti paccayaparibhogatthāya niyametvā dinnattā bhājetvā khādituṃ anissarā.
tika-vin01t2:659_1: ṭhātabbanti ettha āgantukehi heṭṭhā vuttanayena bhājetvā khāditabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:659_2: Tesaṃ katikāya ṭhātabbanti “bhājetvā na khāditabba”nti vā “ettakesu rukkhesu phalāni gaṇhissāmā”ti vā
tika-vin01t2:659_3: “ettakāni phalāni gaṇhissāmā”ti vā “ettakānaṃ divasānaṃ abbhantare gaṇhissāmā”ti vā “na kiñci gaṇhissāmā”ti
tika-vin01t2:659_4: vā evaṃ katāya āvāsikānaṃ katikāya āgantukehi ṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:659_5: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “anissarā”ti vacanena dīpitoyeva attho mahāpaccariyaṃ “catunnaṃ paccayāna”ntiādinā vitthāretvā dassito.
tika-vin01t2:660_4: Mūlavatthucchedaṃ pana katvā na upanetabbanti iminā kiṃ vuttaṃ hotīti?
tika-vin01t2:660_5: Tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu tāva idaṃ vuttaṃ “sabbāni senāsanāni na vissajjetabbānīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:660_6: Lāmakakoṭiyā vissajjentehipi senāsanabhūmiyo na vissajjetabbāti ayamattho vutto hotīti no khanti,
tika-vin01t2:661_3: “Tathāgatassa kho etaṃ vāseṭṭha adhivacanaṃ dhammakāyo itipīti ca yo kho, vakkali,
tika-vin01t2:661_5: so maṃ passatī”ti ca vacanato vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:661_9: so gilānaṃ upaṭṭhaheyyā’ti vacanato buddhasantakena gilānassapi bhesajjaṃ kātuṃ yuttanti āpajjeyya,
tika-vin01t2:661_15: so gilānaṃ upaṭṭhaheyyā”ti iminā attano ca gilānassa ca ekasadisatā tadupaṭṭhānassa vā samaphalatā vuttā.
tika-vin01t2:661_19: Bhagavato ca gilānassa ca upaṭṭhānaṃ ekasadisanti evaṃ panettha attho na gahetabbo.
tika-vin01t2:661_21: mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto,
tika-vin01t2:661_22: so vo mamaccayena satthā”ti vacanato “ahañca panidāni eko ovadāmi anusāsāmi,
tika-vin01t2:661_23: mayi parinibbute imāni caturāsīti buddhasahassāni tumhe ovadissanti anusāsissantī”ti vuttattā ca bahussutaṃ bhikkhuṃ pasaṃsantena ca “yo bahussuto,
tika-vin01t2:661_25: buddho nāma esa cundā”ti vuttattā dhammagarukattā ca tathāgatassa pubbanayo eva pasatthataroti amhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin01t2:662_0: Paṇṇaṃ āropetvāti “ettakeheva rukkhehi ettakameva gahetabba”nti paṇṇaṃ āropetvā,
tika-vin01t2:662_6: Sabbatthāpi gihīnaṃ gopakadāne yattakaṃ gopakā denti,
tika-vin01t2:662_8: Saṅghike pana yathāparicchedameva gahetabbanti dīpitattā “atthato eka”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:663_2: Taṃ sabbampi āharitvāti anāpucchitvāpi tāvakālikaṃ āharitvā.
tika-vin01t2:663_4: Ayameva bhikkhu issaroti ekassa bhikkhuno pāpuṇanaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:663_6: na ca so tato uṭṭhāpetabboti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:664_5: kiṃ taṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ na hotīti? Na hoti.
tika-vin01t2:664_6: Arakkhitaagopitaṭṭhāne hi vinassakabhāvena ṭhitaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin01t2:664_7: tasmā tādisaṃ sandhāya “tiṇamattaṃ pana dātabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:665_3: Tato āharitvā senāsanaṃ kataṃ hotīti sāmantagāmavāsīhi bhikkhūhi chaḍḍitavihārato dārusambhārādiṃ āharitvā senāsanaṃ kataṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:667_1: Ayyā attanā kātuṃ yuttampi na karonti,
tika-vin01t2:667_2: ativiya thaddhāti pasādaṃ bhinditvā cittena kuppanti,
tika-vin01t2:667_5: Sakaṭṭhāneyeva aṭṭhāsīti iddhiyā vissajjitattā eva “pāsādo puna āgacchatū”ti anadhiṭṭhitepi sayameva āgantvā sakaṭṭhāneyeva aṭṭhāsi.
tika-vin01t2:667_7: tāva pāsādo tesaṃ santike hotū”ti pubbe adhiṭṭhitattā eva ca kālaparicchedaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhitena tato
tika-vin01t2:667_8: paraṃ iddhi vissajjitā nāma hotīti katvā vuttaṃ “thero iddhiṃ paṭisaṃharī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:667_9: Yasmā te dārakā evaṃ gahetvā gatānaṃ santakā na honti,
tika-vin01t2:667_10: yasmā ca īdisena payogena therena te ānītā nāma na honti,
tika-vin01t2:667_13: Attano pakativaṇṇaṃ avijahitvā bahiddhā hatthiādidassanaṃ “ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotī”ti āgatañca adhiṭṭhānavasena nipphannattā adhiṭṭhāniddhi nāma.
tika-vin01t2:667_14: “So pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā kumārakavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti nāgavaṇṇaṃ vā…pe…
tika-vin01t2:667_15: vividhampi senābyūhaṃ dassetī”ti evaṃ āgatā iddhi pakativaṇṇavijahanavikāravasena pavattattā vikubbaniddhi nāma.
tika-vin01t2:667_16: Attānaṃ adassetvā bahiddhā hatthiādidassanampi ettheva saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:667_17: Pakativaṇṇavijahanañhi nāma attano pakatirūpassa aññesaṃ adassanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:667_19: Evañca katvā “attānaṃ adassetvā bahiddhā hatthiādidassanampi ettheva saṅgahita”nti idaṃ “pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā”ti vuttamūlapadena na virujjhati.
tika-vin01t2:672_0: Parājitakilesenāti santāne puna anuppattidhammatāpādanena catūhi maggañāṇehi saha vāsanāya samucchinnasabbakilesena.
tika-vin01t2:672_2: Tena sikkhāpadena samaṃ aññaṃ anekanayavokiṇṇaṃ gambhīratthavinicchayaṃ kiñci sikkhāpadaṃ na vijjatīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:672_7: sayameva vā āgantvā attano katavītikkame ārociteti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:673_0: Vinicchayaṃ karontena sahasā “pārājika”nti avatvā yaṃ kattabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:673_4: Kappiyepi ca vatthusminti avatvāpi gaṇhituṃ kappiye mātupitusantakepi vatthusmiṃ.
tika-vin01t2:677_0: Tīhīti kāyavacīmanodvārehi. Vibhāvitanti pakāsitaṃ, desitaṃ paññattanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:679_1: Tikkhattuṃ pākāraparikkhepavaḍḍhanenāti tikkhattuṃ pākāraparikkhepena nagarabhūmiyā vaḍḍhanena.
tika-vin01t2:679_3: Bārāṇasirañño kira aggamahesiyā kucchimhi gabbho saṇṭhāsi,
tika-vin01t2:679_6: Sā sammā parihariyamānā gabbhaparipākakāle vijāyanagharaṃ pāvisi.
tika-vin01t2:679_11: aggamahesī maṃsapesinti rañño purato mama avaṇṇo uppajjeyyā”ti cintetvā tena avaṇṇabhayena taṃ maṃsapesiṃ
tika-vin01t2:679_12: ekasmiṃ bhājane pakkhipitvā paṭikujjitvā rājamuddikāya lañchetvā gaṅgāya sote pakkhipāpesi.
tika-vin01t2:679_14: Suvaṇṇapaṭṭikañcettha jātihiṅgulakena “bārāṇasirañño aggamahesiyā pajā”ti likhitvā bandhiṃsu.
tika-vin01t2:679_15: Tato taṃ bhājanaṃ ūmibhayādīhi anupaddutaṃ gaṅgāsotena pāyāsi.
tika-vin01t2:680_0: Tena ca samayena aññataro tāpaso gopālakakulaṃ nissāya gaṅgātīre viharati.
tika-vin01t2:680_1: So pātova gaṅgaṃ otiṇṇo taṃ bhājanaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā paṃsukūlasaññāya aggahesi.
tika-vin01t2:680_2: Athettha taṃ akkharapaṭṭikaṃ rājamuddikālañchanañca disvā muñcitvā taṃ maṃsapesiṃ addasa.
tika-vin01t2:680_6: usmā ca nāma īdisāya saviññāṇakatāya bhaveyyāti “siyā gabbho”ti cintesi.
tika-vin01t2:680_7: Puññavantatāya pana duggandhaṃ nāhosi sausumagatāya pūtibhāvo ca.
tika-vin01t2:680_8: Evaṃ pana cintetvā assamaṃ netvā naṃ suddhe okāse ṭhapesi.
tika-vin01t2:680_11: Tato puna aḍḍhamāsaccayena ekamekissā pesiyā hatthapādasīsānamatthāya pañca pañca piḷakā uṭṭhahiṃsu.
tika-vin01t2:680_12: Atha tato aḍḍhamāsaccayena ekā maṃsapesi suvaṇṇabimbasadiso dārako,
tika-vin01t2:680_15: dārakānaṃ puññupanissayato aṅguṭṭhakato cassa khīraṃ nibbatti.
tika-vin01t2:680_17: Tāpaso bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā khīraṃ dārakānaṃ mukhe āsiñcati.
tika-vin01t2:680_18: Tesaṃ pana yaṃ yaṃ udaraṃ pavisati,
tika-vin01t2:680_20: Carimabhave bodhisatte kucchigate bodhisattamātu viya udaracchaviyā acchavippasannatāya evaṃ te nicchavī ahesuṃ.
tika-vin01t2:680_21: Apare āhu “sibbitvā ṭhapitā viya nesaṃ aññamaññaṃ līnā chavi ahosī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:680_22: Evaṃ te nicchavitāya vā līnacchavitāya vā “licchavī”ti paññāyiṃsu.
tika-vin01t2:681_0: Tāpaso dārake posento ussūre gāmaṃ bhikkhāya pavisati,
tika-vin01t2:681_2: Tassa taṃ byāpāraṃ ñatvā gopālakā āhaṃsu – “bhante,
tika-vin01t2:681_8: Gopālakā dutiyadivase maggaṃ samaṃ katvā pupphehi okiritvā dhajapaṭākā ussāpetvā tūriyehi vajjamānehi assamaṃ āgatā.
tika-vin01t2:681_12: pañcagorasena rājānaṃ tosetvā bhūmibhāgaṃ gahetvā nagaraṃ māpetha,
tika-vin01t2:681_13: tattha kumāraṃ abhisiñcathā”ti vatvā dārake adāsi.
tika-vin01t2:681_15: Dārakā vuḍḍhimanvāya kīḷantā vivādaṭṭhānesu aññe gopālakadārake hatthenapi pādenapi paharanti,
tika-vin01t2:681_17: “Kissa rodathā”ti ca mātāpitūhi vuttā “ime nimmātāpitikā tāpasapositā amhe atīva paharantī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:681_18: Tato nesaṃ posakamātāpitaropi “ime dārakā aññe dārake vihesenti dukkhāpenti,
tika-vin01t2:681_21: Tato pabhuti kira so padeso “vajjī”ti vuccati yojanasataparimāṇena.
tika-vin01t2:682_0: Atha taṃ padesaṃ gopālakā rājānaṃ tosetvā aggahesuṃ.
tika-vin01t2:682_1: Tattha ca nagaraṃ māpetvā soḷasavassuddesikaṃ kumāraṃ abhisiñcitvā rājānaṃ akaṃsu.
tika-vin01t2:682_2: Rajjasampattidāyakassa kammassa katattā asambhinne eva rājakule uppannattā ca rājakumārassa puññānubhāvasañcoditā devatādhiggahitā akaṃsūti keci.
tika-vin01t2:682_3: Dārakassa dārikāya saddhiṃ vāreyyaṃ katvā katikaṃ akaṃsu “bāhirato dārikā na ānetabbā,
tika-vin01t2:682_5: Tesaṃ paṭhamasaṃvāsena dve dārakā jātā dhītā ca putto ca.
tika-vin01t2:682_7: Tato tesaṃ dārakānaṃ yathākkamaṃ vaḍḍhantānaṃ ārāmuyyānanivāsaṭṭhānaparivārasampattiṃ gahetuṃ appahontaṃ
tika-vin01t2:683_0: Idampi ca nagaranti na kevalaṃ rājagahasāvatthiyo yevāti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:683_3: Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “mahāvaneti bahinagare himavantena saddhiṃ ekābaddhaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ sayaṃjātaṃ vanaṃ atthi,
tika-vin01t2:683_7: Tattha kaṇṇikaṃ yojetvā thambhānaṃ upari kūṭāgārasālāsaṅkhepena devavimānasadisaṃ pāsādaṃ akaṃsu,
tika-vin01t2:683_8: taṃ upādāya sakalopi saṅghārāmo kūṭāgārasālāti paññāyitthā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:684_2: ayaṃ kāyo aviññāṇakopi saviññāṇakopi evampi asubho evampi asubhoti nānāvidhehi kāraṇehīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:684_3: Asubhākārasandassanappavattanti kesādivasena tatthāpi vaṇṇādito asubhākārassa sabbaso dassanavasena pavattaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:684_4: Kāyavicchandaniyakathanti attano parassa ca karajakāye vicchandanuppādanakathaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:684_5: Muttaṃ vātiādinā byatirekamukhena kāyassa amanuññataṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:684_6: Tattha ādito tīhi padehi adassanīyatāya asārakatāya majjhe catūhi duggandhatāya,
tika-vin01t2:684_8: Atha khotiādinā anvayato sarūpeneva amanuññatāya dassanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:684_11: “Kesā lomādī”ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ “yepi hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:684_14: Paṭikūlāti nāgarikassa asucikaṭṭhānaṃ viya jigucchanīyattā paṭikūlā.
tika-vin01t2:685_1: saṇṭhānatopi gandhatopi āsayatopi okāsatopi paṭikūlāti dassento “so ca nesaṃ…pe…
tika-vin01t2:685_3: Manuññepi hi yāgupatte vā bhattapatte vā kesavaṇṇaṃ kiñci disvā “kesamissakamidaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:685_6: Rattiṃ paribhuñjantāpi kesasaṇṭhānaṃ akkavākaṃ vā makacivākaṃ vā chupitvā tatheva jigucchanti,
tika-vin01t2:685_12: Yathā hi daharassa kumārakassa vaccaṃ vaṇṇato haliddivaṇṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:685_16: dāṭhāpissa sumanamakuḷasadisāti ubhayampi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato siyā appaṭikūlaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:686_0: Yathā pana asuciṭṭhāne gāmanissandena jātāni sūpeyyapaṇṇāni nāgarikamanussānaṃ jegucchāni honti aparibhogāni,
tika-vin01t2:686_1: evaṃ kesāpi pubbalohitamuttakarīsapittasemhādinissandena jātattā jegucchāti idaṃ tesaṃ āsayato pāṭikulyaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:686_2: Ime ca kesā nāma gūtharāsimhi uṭṭhitakaṇṇakaṃ viya ekatiṃsakoṭṭhāsarāsimhi jātā,
tika-vin01t2:686_3: te susānasaṅkāraṭṭhānādīsu jātasākaṃ viya parikhādīsu jātakamalakuvalayādipupphaṃ viya ca asuciṭṭhāne
tika-vin01t2:686_4: jātattā paramajegucchāti idaṃ tesaṃ okāsato pāṭikulyaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:686_6: evaṃ sabbakoṭṭhāsānañca vaṇṇasaṇṭhānagandhāsayokāsavasena pañcadhā paṭikūlatā veditabbāti āha “evaṃ lomādīna”nti.
tika-vin01t2:686_7: Pañcapañcappabhedenāti ettha bāhiratthasamāso daṭṭhabbo pañca pañca pabhedā etassāti pañcapañcappabhedoti.
tika-vin01t2:687_3: Pañcaṅgavippahīnaṃ pañcaṅgasamannāgatanti ettha kāmacchando byāpādo thinamiddhaṃ uddhaccakukkuccaṃ vicikicchāti
tika-vin01t2:687_4: imesaṃ pañcannaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ pahānavasena pañcaṅgavippahīnatā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:687_5: Na hi etesu appahīnesu jhānaṃ uppajjati,
tika-vin01t2:687_7: Kiñcāpi hi jhānakkhaṇe aññepi akusalā dhammā pahīyanti,
tika-vin01t2:687_9: Kāmacchandena hi nānāvisayapalobhitaṃ cittaṃ na ekattārammaṇe samādhiyati,
tika-vin01t2:687_10: kāmacchandābhibhūtaṃ vā cittaṃ na kāmadhātuppahānāya paṭipadaṃ paṭipajjati,
tika-vin01t2:687_11: byāpādena ca ārammaṇe paṭihaññamānaṃ na nirantaraṃ pavattati,
tika-vin01t2:687_15: Iti visesena jhānantarāyakarattā etāneva pahānaṅgānīti vuttāni.
tika-vin01t2:688_0: Yasmā pana vitakko ārammaṇe cittaṃ abhiniropeti,
tika-vin01t2:688_2: tehi avikkhepāya sampāditapayogassa cetaso payogasampattisambhavā pīti pīnanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:688_4: atha naṃ sasampayuttadhammaṃ etehi abhiniropanānubandhanapīnanaupabrūhanehi anuggahitā ekaggatā ekattārammaṇe samaṃ sammā ādhiyati,
tika-vin01t2:688_5: tasmā vitakko vicāro pīti sukhaṃ cittekaggatāti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ uppattivasena pañcaṅgasamannāgatatā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:688_6: Uppannesu hi etesu pañcasu jhānaṃ uppannaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin01t2:688_8: Tasmā na etehi samannāgataṃ aññadeva jhānaṃ nāma atthīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:688_10: pañcaṅgikaṃ tūriyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgiko ca maggoti vuccati,
tika-vin01t2:688_11: evamidampi aṅgamattavaseneva “pañcaṅgika”nti vā “pañcaṅgasamannāgata”nti vā vuccatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:689_0: Etāni ca pañcaṅgāni kiñcāpi upacārakkhaṇepi atthi,
tika-vin01t2:689_3: Ettha hi vitakko suvisadena ākārena ārammaṇe cittaṃ abhiniropayamāno uppajjati,
tika-vin01t2:689_6: Teneva vuttaṃ “nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa vivekajena pītisukhena apphuṭaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:689_7: Cittekaggatāpi heṭṭhimamhi samuggapaṭale uparimaṃ samuggapaṭalaṃ viya ārammaṇe suphusitā hutvā uppajjati.
tika-vin01t2:690_0: Tividhakalyāṇaṃ dasalakkhaṇasampannanti ettha pana jhānassa ādimajjhapariyosānavasena tividhakalyāṇatā,
tika-vin01t2:691_0: Dasalakkhaṇavibhāvaneneva tividhakalyāṇatāpi vibhāvitā hotīti dasalakkhaṇaṃ tāva dassento “tatrimānī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:691_1: Tattha pāripanthikato cittavisuddhītiādīnaṃ padānaṃ attho “tatrāyaṃ pāḷī”tiādinā vuttapāḷivaṇṇanāyameva āvi bhavissati.
tika-vin01t2:691_7: Sā panāyaṃ yasmā jhānassa uppādakkhaṇe labbhati,
tika-vin01t2:691_9: Upekkhānubrūhanāti visodhetabbatādīnaṃ abhāvato jhānapariyāpannāya tatramajjhattupekkhāya kiccanipphattiyā anubrūhanā.
tika-vin01t2:691_10: Sā panāyaṃ yasmā visesato jhānassa ṭhitikkhaṇe labbhati,
tika-vin01t2:691_12: Sampahaṃsanāti tattha dhammānaṃ anativattanādisādhakassa ñāṇassa kiccanipphattivasena pariyodapanā.
tika-vin01t2:691_13: Sā pana yasmā jhānassa osānakkhaṇe pākaṭā hoti,
tika-vin01t2:691_15: Imāni tīṇi lakkhaṇānīti paripanthato cittassa visujjhanākāro,
tika-vin01t2:691_17: tattha pakkhandanākāroti imāni tīṇi jhānassa ādito uppādakkhaṇe appanāppattilakkhaṇāni.
tika-vin01t2:691_18: Tehi ākārehi vinā appanāppattiyā abhāvato asati ca appanāyaṃ tadabhāvato ādikalyāṇañceva visuddhipaṭipadattā
tika-vin01t2:692_4: Tathā hi sati ajhānadhammehi jhānassa guṇasaṃkittanaṃ nāma kataṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:692_7: “Ekattagataṃ cittaṃ paṭipadāvisuddhipakkhandañceva hoti upekkhānubrūhitañca ñāṇena ca sampahaṃsita”nti hi pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:692_8: Ettha hi ekattagataṃ cittanti indriyānaṃ ekarasabhāvena ekaggatāya ca sikhāppattiyā tadanuguṇaṃ ekattagataṃ
tika-vin01t2:692_11: Tasmā pāḷiyaṃ ekasmiṃyeva appanācittakkhaṇe paṭipadāvisuddhiādīnaṃ vuttattā antoappanāyameva parikammāgamanavasena paṭipadāvisuddhi,
tika-vin01t2:692_13: dhammānaṃ anativattanādibhāvasādhanena pariyodāpakassa ñāṇassa kiccanipphattivasena sampahaṃsanā ca veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:693_2: tasmiṃ yo nīvaraṇasaṅkhāto kilesagaṇo tassa jhānassa paripantho,
tika-vin01t2:693_4: visuddhattā āvaraṇavirahitaṃ hutvā majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjati.
tika-vin01t2:693_9: Tassa pana appanācittassa anantarapaccayabhūtaṃ gotrabhucittaṃ satipi parittamahaggatabhāvabhede paccayapaccayuppannabhāvabhede
tika-vin01t2:693_10: ca ekissāyeva santatiyā pariṇāmūpagamanato ekasantatipariṇāmanayena tathattaṃ appanāsamādhivasena samāhitabhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t2:693_12: Evaṃ paṭipannattā tathattupagamanena tattha pakkhandati nāma.
tika-vin01t2:693_13: Yasmiñhi khaṇe tathattaṃ majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjati,
tika-vin01t2:693_14: tasmiṃyeva khaṇe tathattupagamanena appanāsamādhinā samāhitabhāvūpagamanena tattha pakkhandati nāma.
tika-vin01t2:693_16: āgamanavasena nipphajjamānā paṭhamassa jhānassa uppādakkhaṇeyeva paṭipadāvisuddhīti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:693_17: Teyeva hi ākārā paccayavisesato jhānakkhaṇe nipphajjamānā paṭipadāvisuddhīti vuttā.
tika-vin01t2:694_0: Evaṃ visuddhassa pana tassa cittassa puna sodhetabbābhāvato visodhane byāpāraṃ akaronto visuddhaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhati nāma.
tika-vin01t2:694_1: Samathabhāvūpagamanena samathappaṭipannassa puna samādhāne byāpāraṃ akaronto samathappaṭipannaṃ ajjhupekkhati nāma.
tika-vin01t2:694_2: Samathappaṭipannabhāvato eva cassa kilesasaṃsaggaṃ pahāya ekattena upaṭṭhitassa puna ekattupaṭṭhāne byāpāraṃ
tika-vin01t2:695_0: Ye panete evaṃ upekkhānubrūhite tasmiṃ jhānacitte jātā samādhipaññāsaṅkhātā yuganaddhadhammā aññamaññaṃ anativattamānā hutvā pavattā,
tika-vin01t2:695_1: yāni ca saddhādīni indriyāni nānākilesehi vimuttattā vimuttirasena ekarasāni hutvā pavattāni,
tika-vin01t2:695_2: yañcesa tadupagaṃ tesaṃ anativattanaekarasasabhāvānaṃ anucchavikaṃ vīriyaṃ vāhayati,
tika-vin01t2:695_3: yā cassa tasmiṃ khaṇe pavattā āsevanā,
tika-vin01t2:695_4: sabbepi te ākārā yasmā ñāṇena saṃkilesavodānesu taṃ taṃ ādīnavañca ānisaṃsañca disvā tathā tathā sampahaṃsitattā
tika-vin01t2:695_6: tasmā dhammānaṃ anativattanādibhāvasādhanena pariyodāpakassa ñāṇassa kiccanipphattivasena sampahaṃsanā veditabbāti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:696_2: Yasmā tasmiṃ bhāvanācitte upekkhāvasena ñāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:696_4: Tathā hi appanākāle bhāvanāya samappavattiyā paṭipakkhassa ca suppahānato paggahādīsu byāpārassa akātabbato ajjhupekkhanāva hoti.
tika-vin01t2:696_5: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “samaye cittassa ajjhupekkhanā visuddhaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhatī”ti ca ādi.
tika-vin01t2:696_6: Sā panāyaṃ ajjhupekkhanā ñāṇassa kiccasiddhiyā hoti visesato ñāṇasādhanattā appanābyāpārassa,
tika-vin01t2:696_8: Evaṃ tividhāya paṭipadāvisuddhiyā laddhavisesāya tividhāya upekkhānubrūhanāya sātisayaṃ paññindriyassa
tika-vin01t2:696_9: adhimattabhāvena catubbidhāpi sampahaṃsanā sijjhatīti āgamanupekkhāñāṇakiccavasena dasapi ākārā jhāne
tika-vin01t2:697_0: Evaṃ tividhattagataṃ cittantiādīni tasseva cittassa thomanavacanāni.
tika-vin01t2:697_1: Tattha evaṃ tividhattagatanti evaṃ yathāvuttena vidhinā paṭipadāvisuddhipakkhandanaupekkhānubrūhanañāṇasampahaṃsanāvasena tividhabhāvaṃ gataṃ.
