tika-vin01t2:697_3: Cittassa adhiṭṭhānasampannanti tasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe cittassa nirantarappavattisaṅkhātena adhiṭṭhānena sampannaṃ anūnaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:697_5: tathā idhāpi cittassa adhiṭṭhānanti cittekaggatāpi yujjati.
tika-vin01t2:697_6: Tena hi ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāti,
tika-vin01t2:697_8: Samādhisampannanti visuṃ vuttattā pana vuttanayeneva gahetabbo.
tika-vin01t2:697_9: Atha vā samādhisseva jhānaṅgasaṅgahitattā “cittassa adhiṭṭhānasampanna”nti jhānaṅgapañcakavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:698_0: Asubhasaññāparicitenāti sakalaṃ kāyaṃ asubhanti pavattāya saññāya sahagatattā jhānaṃ asubhasaññā,
tika-vin01t2:698_7: Paṭilīyatīti ekapassena nilīyati nilīnaṃ viya hoti.
tika-vin01t2:698_12: Atha vā paṭilīyatīti saṅkucati tattha paṭikūlatāya saṇṭhitattā.
tika-vin01t2:699_1: Paṭisallīyitunti yathāvuttakālaṃ paṭi paṭi divase divase samāpattiyaṃ dhammacintāya cittaṃ nilīyituṃ.
tika-vin01t2:699_3: buddhā imesu divasesu piṇḍāya na caranti,
tika-vin01t2:700_4: pavattiajānanaṃ ārocayitābhāvo ñāte nivāraṇañcāti idaṃ tesaṃ icchāmattaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:700_6: Apare pana vadanti “etasmiṃ kira aḍḍhamāse na koci buddhaveneyyo ahosi,
tika-vin01t2:700_7: atha satthā imaṃ aḍḍhamāsaṃ phalasamāpattisukhena vītināmessāmi,
tika-vin01t2:700_9: anāgate ca pacchimā janatā ‘satthāpi gaṇaṃ pahāya ekako vihāsi,
tika-vin01t2:700_11: tadassa bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyāti iminā kāraṇena evamāhā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:700_12: Neva koci bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamatīti ṭhapetvā piṇḍapātanīhārakaṃ añño koci neva bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamati,
tika-vin01t2:700_13: bhikkhusaṅgho pana satthu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ adāsi.
tika-vin01t2:700_14: So pātova gandhakuṭipariveṇasammajjanamukhodakadantakaṭṭhadānādīni sabbakiccāni tasmiṃ tasmiṃ khaṇe katvā apagacchati.
tika-vin01t2:701_3: koci yuvāpi maṇḍanakajātiko na hoti yathā upasantasabhāvo ālasiyabyasanādīhi vā abhibhūto,
tika-vin01t2:701_4: idha pana daharo ceva yuvā ca maṇḍanakajātiko ca adhippeto.
tika-vin01t2:701_5: Paṭhamayobbanaṃ nāma pannarasavassato yāva dvattiṃsa saṃvaccharāni,
tika-vin01t2:701_10: Atipaṭikūlajigucchanīyasabhāvato cettha imāneva tīṇi vuttānīti veditabbāni.
tika-vin01t2:701_11: Aññesañhi sasasūkarādīnaṃ kuṇapaṃ manussā kaṭukabhaṇḍādīhi abhisaṅkharitvā paribhuñjantipi,
tika-vin01t2:701_15: sā ca ahīnaṃ tikhiṇakopatāya kukkuramanussānaṃ odanakummāsūpacayatāya ca sarīrassa hotīti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:702_3: Sabbamakaṃsūti puthujjanā sāvajjepi tattha anavajjasaññino hutvā karaṇakārāpanasamanuññatādibhedaṃ sabbamakaṃsu.
tika-vin01t2:702_6: Puññasammatāti pujjabhavaphalanibbattanena sattānaṃ punanena visodhanena puññanti sammatā.
tika-vin01t2:703_4: Māro vā ettha dhiyati tiṭṭhati pavattatīti māradheyyaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:703_7: Māravisayaṃ nātikkamissatīti cintetvāti evamayaṃ saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhitvā māravisayaṃ atikkameyyāpi,
tika-vin01t2:703_8: mayā pana evaṃ vutte uppannaṃ saṃvegaṃ paṭippassambhetvā māravisayaṃ nātikkamissatīti evaṃ cintetvā.
tika-vin01t2:703_11: Niyojentīti ettha ayaṃ andhabālā devatā evaṃ uppannasaṃvegamūlakaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ katvā “ayaṃ māravisayaṃ
tika-vin01t2:703_12: atikkameyyāpī”ti cintetvā attano aññāṇatāya “matā saṃsārato muccantī”ti evaṃladdhikāpi samānā attano
tika-vin01t2:703_13: laddhivasena matā bhikkhū saṃsārato muccantīti imamatthaṃ anupaparikkhitvā taṃ tattha niyojesīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:704_0: Kiñcāpi asubhakathaṃ kathentena bhagavatā yathā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ maraṇabhayaṃ na bhavissati,
tika-vin01t2:704_1: tathā desitattā bhikkhūnañca taṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā asubhabhāvanānuyogena kāye vigatachandarāgatāya maraṇassa abhipatthitabhāvato bhayaṃ natthi,
tika-vin01t2:704_2: taṃ pana asihatthaṃ tathā vicarantaṃ disvā tadaññesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ uppajjanakabhayaṃ sandhāya “hotiyeva bhaya”ntiādi vuttanti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:704_4: aññamaññampi jīvitā voropentī”ti vuttattā “sabbānipi tāni pañca bhikkhusatāni jīvitā voropesī”ti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuttanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:704_5: Appakañhi ūnamadhikaṃ vā gaṇanūpagaṃ na hotīti “pañcasatānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:704_6: Tasmā ye ca attanāva attānaṃ aññamaññañca jīvitā voropesuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:704_7: te ṭhapetvā avasese puthujjanabhikkhū sabbe ca ariye ayaṃ jīvitā voropesīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:705_1: Paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitoti ettha paṭisallānanti tehi tehi sattasaṅkhārehi paṭinivattitvā apasakkitvā sallānaṃ nilīyanaṃ vivecanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:705_2: kāyacittehi tato vivittatā ekībhāvoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:705_6: Vuṭṭhitoti tato duvidhavivekato bhavaṅguppattiyā rūpārammaṇādisaṅkhārasamāyogena gahaṭṭhapabbajitādisattasamāgamena ca apeto.
tika-vin01t2:705_7: Uddesaṃ paripucchaṃ gaṇhantīti attano attano ācariyānaṃ santike gaṇhanti.
tika-vin01t2:705_9: sā pana tattha sannipatitabhikkhūsu bahūnaṃ sappāyā sātthikā ca,
tika-vin01t2:705_11: Tathā hi bhagavā tameva kammaṭṭhānaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kathesi.
tika-vin01t2:705_13: cattāro pana āruppā ādikammikānaṃ ananurūpāti tesaṃ idha aggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:706_2: Muhuttenevāti satthari saddhamme ca gāravena upagatabhikkhūnaṃ vacanasamanantarameva uṭṭhahiṃsūti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:706_3: Buddhakāle kira bhikkhū bhagavato sandesaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchituṃ ohitasotā viharanti.
tika-vin01t2:709_5: Tañhi sutvā bhikkhū “bhagavā imaṃ samādhiṃ anekehi ākārehi pasaṃsati,
tika-vin01t2:709_6: santo kirāyaṃ samādhi paṇīto ca asecanako ca sukho ca vihāro,
tika-vin01t2:709_7: pāpadhamme ca ṭhānaso antaradhāpetī”ti sañjātābhirucino ussāhajātā sakkaccaṃ anuyuñjitabbaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ maññanti.
tika-vin01t2:710_1: Bhagavā attano paccakkhabhūtaṃ samādhiṃ desanānubhāvena tesampi bhikkhūnaṃ āsannaṃ paccakkhañca karonto sampiṇḍanavasena “ayampi kho”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:710_2: Assāsapassāsapariggāhikāti dīgharassādivisesehi saddhiṃ assāsapassāse paricchijja gāhikā,
tika-vin01t2:711_1: Tattha no passāso no assāsoti so soyeva attho paṭisedhena visesetvā vutto.
tika-vin01t2:711_2: Assāsavasenāti assāsaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:711_4: Upaṭṭhānaṃ satīti asammussanatāya tameva assāsaṃ passāsañca upagantvā ṭhānaṃ sati nāmāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:711_5: Ettāvatā ānāpānesu sati ānāpānassatīti ayamattho vutto hoti.
tika-vin01t2:711_13: tassa sati passāsaṃ upagantvā tiṭṭhatīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:712_2: Purimasmiñhi atthe samādhissa satiyā sahajātādipaccayabhāvo vutto sampayuttavacanato,
tika-vin01t2:712_4: Upacārajjhānasahagatā hi sati appanāsamādhissa upanissayo hotīti ubhayathāpi sahajātādīnaṃ sattannampi paccayānaṃ vasena paccayabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:712_7: yathāpaṭipannā me sāvakā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāventī”tiādīsu uppādanavaḍḍhanaṭṭhena bhāvanāti vuccatīti
tika-vin01t2:712_8: tadubhayavasena atthaṃ dassento “bhāvitoti uppādito vaḍḍhito cā”ti āha.
tika-vin01t2:712_9: Tattha bhāvaṃ vijjamānataṃ ito gatoti bhāvito,
tika-vin01t2:712_20: samaṇo vivicceva kāmehī”ti ca evamādīsu paṭhamapade vutto eva-
tika-vin01t2:713_2: Tañhi asubhesu yogakammabhāvato yogino sukhavisesānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato ca “asubhakammaṭṭhāna”nti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:713_5: Jhānañhi bhāvanāvisesena ijjhantaṃ attano visayaṃ paṭivijjhantameva pavattati yathāsabhāvato paṭivijjhīyati cāti paṭivedhoti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:713_9: Ārammaṇasantatāyapīti anukkamena vicetabbataṃ pattārammaṇassa paramasukhumataṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-vin01t2:713_10: Sante hi sannisinne ārammaṇe pavattamāno dhammo sayampi sannisinnova hoti. Tenāha –
tika-vin01t2:713_13: Ārammaṇasantatāya tadārammaṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ santatā lokuttaradhammārammaṇāhi paccavekkhaṇāhi dīpetabbā.
tika-vin01t2:714_5: Sabbametaṃ sarasato eva santabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:714_9: Tadā hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ nirassādattā asantaṃ appaṇītaṃ siyā.
tika-vin01t2:714_10: Upacārena vā natthi ettha santatāti yojanā.
tika-vin01t2:714_11: Yathā upacārakkhaṇe nīvaraṇavigamena aṅgapātubhāvena ca paresaṃ santatā hoti,
tika-vin01t2:714_20: Cetasikasukhappaṭilābhasaṃvattanaṃ tikacatukkajjhānavasena upekkhāya vā santabhāvena sukhagatikattā sabbesampi vasena veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:714_23: Imasmiṃ pakkhe appitappitakkhaṇeti idaṃ hetumhi bhummavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:715_6: Taṃ pana jhānakattukassa idhādhippetattā pariyuṭṭhānappahānaṃ hotīti āha “vikkhambhetī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:715_8: Visesena upasamanaṃ pana sammadeva upasamanaṃ hotīti āha “suṭṭhu upasametī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:716_0: Nanu ca aññopi samādhi attano pavattikkhaṇeneva paṭipakkhadhamme antaradhāpeti vūpasameti,
tika-vin01t2:716_1: atha kasmā ayameva samādhi evaṃ visesetvā vuttoti?
tika-vin01t2:716_5: ñāṇuttarassa ca kilesappahānaṃ itarehi sātisayaṃ yathā saddhādhimuttehi diṭṭhippattassa,
tika-vin01t2:716_6: tasmā imaṃ visesaṃ sandhāya “ṭhānaso antaradhāpeti vūpasametī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:716_7: Atha vā nimittapātubhāve sati khaṇeneva aṅgapātubhāvasabbhāvato ayameva samādhi “ṭhānaso antaradhāpeti
tika-vin01t2:716_8: vūpasametī”ti vutto yathā taṃ mahato akālameghassa uṭṭhitassa dhārānipāte khaṇeneva pathaviyaṃ rajojallassa vūpasamo.
tika-vin01t2:716_12: Sāsanikassa jhānabhāvanā yebhuyyena nibbedhabhāgiyāva hotīti āha “nibbedhabhāgiyattā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:716_14: Imameva hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā sabbepi sammāsambuddhā sammāsambodhiṃ adhigacchanti,
tika-vin01t2:716_15: ariyamaggassa pādakabhūto ayaṃ samādhi anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā ariyamaggabhāvaṃ upagato viya hotīti āha “anupubbena ariyamaggavuḍḍhippatto”ti.
tika-vin01t2:716_16: Ayaṃ panattho virāganirodhapaṭinissaggānupassanānaṃ vasena sammadeva yujjati.
tika-vin01t2:717_2: sā ca upari desanaṃ āruḷhānaṃ sabbesaṃ pakāravisesānaṃ āmasanavasenāti imamatthaṃ dassento “kathanti…pe…
tika-vin01t2:717_4: Kathaṃ bahulīkatoti etthāpi ānāpānassatisamādhīti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:717_6: Bahulīkato ānāpānassatisamādhīti tathā puṭṭhadhammanidassananti imamatthaṃ “eseva nayo”ti imināyeva atidissati.
tika-vin01t2:717_7: Heṭṭhā papañcavasena vuttamatthaṃ sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ saṅgahetvā dassento “ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho”ti āha,
tika-vin01t2:718_0: Tamatthanti taṃ “kathaṃ bhāvito”tiādinā pucchāvasena saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:718_9: imasmiṃ sāsane bhikkhū”ti vatvā tamevatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “ayaṃ hī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:718_12: Bāhirakā hi jānantā ādito catuppakārameva jānanti.
tika-vin01t2:718_18: Santi hi ekapadānipi avadhāraṇāni yathā vāyubhakkhoti.
tika-vin01t2:719_2: Yathā thanehi sabbaso khīraṃ na paggharati,
tika-vin01t2:721_0: Muddhabhūtanti santatādivisesaguṇavantatāya buddhādīhi ariyehi samāsevitabhāvato ca muddhasadisaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:721_3: visesādhigamassa ceva aññakammaṭṭhānena adhigatavisesānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārassa ca padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:721_5: Bhikkhu dīpisadiso araññe ekako viharitvā paṭipakkhanimmathanena icchitatthasādhanato.
tika-vin01t2:722_1: Rukkhasamīpanti “yāvatā majjhanhike kāle samantā chāyā pharati,
tika-vin01t2:722_3: ettāvatā rukkhamūlanti vuccatī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ rukkhassa samīpaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:722_4: Avasesasattavidhasenāsananti pabbataṃ kandaraṃ giriguhaṃ susānaṃ vanappatthaṃ abbhokāsaṃ palālapuñjanti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:722_5: Ututtayānukūlaṃ dhātucariyānukūlanti gimhādiututtayassa semhādidhātuttayassa mohādicaritattayassa ca anukūlaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:722_6: Tathā hi gimhakāle araññaṃ anukūlaṃ sommasītalabhāvato,
tika-vin01t2:722_9: Semhadhātukassa semhapakatikassa araññaṃ anukūlaṃ dūraṃ gantvā bhikkhācaraṇena semhassa vūpasamanato,
tika-vin01t2:722_13: Mahāaraññe hi cittaṃ na saṅkucati vivaṭaṅgaṇabhāvato,
tika-vin01t2:723_5: Taṃ pana ujukaṭṭhapanaṃ sarūpato payojanato ca dassetuṃ “aṭṭhārasā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:723_7: Na paripatatīti na vigacchati vīthiṃ na vilaṅgheti,
tika-vin01t2:723_8: tato eva pubbenāparaṃ visesuppattiyā vuḍḍhiṃ phātiṃ upagacchati.
tika-vin01t2:723_12: bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇato nivāretvā kammaṭṭhānaṃyeva purakkhatvāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:723_15: tasmā pariggahitaniyyānanti sabbathā gahitāsammosaṃ pariccattasammosaṃ satiṃ katvā,
tika-vin01t2:723_17: Satovāti satiyā samannāgato eva saranto eva assasati,
tika-vin01t2:723_18: nāssa kāci sativirahitā assāsappavatti hotīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:723_19: Sato passasatīti etthāpi satova passasatīti eva-
tika-vin01t2:723_21: Satokārīti sato eva hutvā satiyā eva vā kātabbassa kattā,
tika-vin01t2:724_0: Bāttiṃsāya ākārehīti catūsu catukkesu āgatāni dīgharassādīni soḷasa padāni assāsapassāsavasena dvidhā
tika-vin01t2:724_1: vibhajitvā vuttehi dīghamassāsaṃ ādiṃ katvā paṭinissaggānupassipassāsapariyantehi bāttiṃsākārehi.
tika-vin01t2:724_8: tasmā ekarasaṃ desanaṃ kātukāmatāya sabbattha “satokāri”cceva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:724_12: Cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepanti vikkhepassa paṭipakkhabhāvato avikkhepoti laddhanāmaṃ cittassa ekaggabhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t2:724_13: pajānato sati upaṭṭhitā ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhitā hoti.
tika-vin01t2:724_14: Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇenāti yathāvuttāya satiyā yathāvuttena ca ñāṇena.
tika-vin01t2:724_16: dīghaṃ assāsaṃ ārammaṇabhūtaṃ avikkhittacittassa asammohato vā sampajānantassa tattha sati upaṭṭhitāva hoti,
tika-vin01t2:724_17: taṃ sampajānantassa ārammaṇakaraṇavasena asammohavasena vā sampajaññaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:724_18: tadadhīnasatisampajaññena taṃsamaṅgī yogāvacaro satokārī nāma hotīti.
tika-vin01t2:724_19: Paṭinissaggānupassī assāsavasenāti paṭinissaggānupassī hutvā assasanassa vasena.
tika-vin01t2:725_3: Suttantaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana bahi uṭṭhahitvāpi anto sasanato assāso,
tika-vin01t2:725_4: anto uṭṭhahitvāpi bahi sasanato passāsoti katvā uppaṭipāṭiyā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:725_5: Atha vā mātukucchiyaṃ bahi nikkhamituṃ aladdhokāso nāsikāvāto mātukucchito nikkhantamatte paṭhamaṃ bahi
tika-vin01t2:725_6: nikkhamatīti vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ uppattikkamena “ādimhi sāso assāso”ti bahinikkhamanavāto vutto.
tika-vin01t2:725_8: Suttantaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana pavattiyaṃ bhāvanārambhasamaye paṭhamaṃ nāsikāvātassa anto ākaḍḍhitvā pacchā
tika-vin01t2:725_9: bahi vissajjanato pavattikkamena “ādimhi sāso assāso”ti antopavisanavāto vutto.
tika-vin01t2:725_10: Suttantanayoyeva cettha “assāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ satiyā anugacchato ajjhattaṃ vikkhepagatena cittena
tika-vin01t2:725_11: kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā ca,
tika-vin01t2:725_12: passāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ satiyā anugacchato bahiddhā vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā
tika-vin01t2:725_13: ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā cā”ti imāya pāḷiyā sameti.
tika-vin01t2:725_15: Tāluṃ āhacca nibbāyatīti tāluṃ āhacca nirujjhati.
tika-vin01t2:725_16: Tena kira sampatijāto bāladārako khipitaṃ karoti.
tika-vin01t2:725_18: Keci “evaṃ tāvāti anena pavattikkamena assāso bahinikkhamanavātoti gahetabbanti adhippāyo”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:726_3: Tattha desaddhānaṃ udāharaṇabhāvena dassetvā kāladdhānassa vasena assāsapassāsānaṃ dīgharassataṃ vibhāvetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:726_8: Tasmāti saṇikaṃ pavattiyā dīghasantānatāya dīghāti vuccanti.
tika-vin01t2:726_9: Ettha ca hatthiādisarīre sunakhādisarīre ca assāsapassāsānaṃ desaddhānavisiṭṭhena kāladdhānavaseneva
tika-vin01t2:726_10: dīgharassatā vuttāti veditabbā “saṇikaṃ pūretvā saṇikameva nikkhamanti,
tika-vin01t2:726_13: Dīghaṃ assasantīti dīghaṃ assāsappabandhaṃ pavattentīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:726_15: Sunakhasasādayo viya rassaṃ assasanti passasanti cāti yojanā.
tika-vin01t2:726_16: Idaṃ pana dīghaṃ rassañca assasanaṃ passasanañca tesaṃ sattānaṃ sarīrassa sabhāvoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:726_20: Navahākārehīti bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa pubbenāparaṃ aladdhavisesassa kevalaṃ addhānavasena ādito vuttā tayo ākārā,
tika-vin01t2:726_21: te ca kho ekacco assāsaṃ suṭṭhu sallakkheti,
tika-vin01t2:726_23: ekacco tadubhayanti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena.
tika-vin01t2:726_24: Keci pana “assasatipi passasatipīti ekajjhaṃ vacanaṃ bhāvanāya nirantaraṃ pavattidassanattha”nti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:727_0: Kāmañcettha ekassa puggalassa tayo eva ākārā labbhanti,
tika-vin01t2:727_1: tantivasena pana sabbesaṃ pāḷiāruḷhattā tesaṃ vasena parikammassa kātabbattā ca “tatrāyaṃ bhikkhu navahākārehī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:727_2: Evaṃ pajānatoti evaṃ yathāvuttehi ākārehi assāsapassāse pajānato,
tika-vin01t2:727_4: Ekenākārenāti dīghaṃassāsādīsu catūsu ākāresu ekena ākārena,
tika-vin01t2:732_0: Ayaṃ bhāvanā assāsapassāsakāyānupassanāti katvā vuttaṃ “kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanā sampajjatī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:733_0: Idāni pāḷivaseneva te nava ākāre bhāvanāvidhiñca dassetuṃ “yathāhā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:733_3: Addhānasaṅkhāteti addhānanti saṅkhaṃ gate dīghe kāle,
tika-vin01t2:733_8: Chando uppajjatīti bhāvanāya pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ āvahantiyā laddhassādattā tattha sātisayo kattukāmatālakkhaṇo kusalacchando uppajjati.
tika-vin01t2:733_9: Chandavasenāti tathāpavattachandassa vasena visesabhāvanamanuyuñjantassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuḍḍhiṃ phātiṃ gamentassa.
tika-vin01t2:733_11: Bhāvanābalena hi paṭippassaddhadarathapariḷāhatāya kāyassa assāsapassāsā sukhumatarā hutvā pavattanti.
tika-vin01t2:733_12: Pāmojjaṃ uppajjatīti assāsapassāsānaṃ sukhumatarabhāvena ārammaṇassa santataratāya kammaṭṭhānassa ca
tika-vin01t2:733_13: vīthippaṭipannatāya bhāvanācittasahagato pamodo khuddikādibhedā taruṇapīti uppajjati.
tika-vin01t2:733_14: Cittaṃ vivattatīti anukkamena assāsapassāsānaṃ ativiya sukhumatarabhāvappattiyā anupaṭṭhahane vicetabbākārappattehi tehi cittaṃ vinivattatīti keci.
tika-vin01t2:733_15: Bhāvanābalena pana sukhumatarabhāvappattesu assāsapassāsesu tattha paṭibhāganimitte uppanne pakatiassāsapassāsato cittaṃ nivattati.
tika-vin01t2:733_16: Upekkhā saṇṭhātīti tasmiṃ paṭibhāganimitte upacārappanābhede samādhimhi uppanne puna jhānanibbattanatthaṃ byāpārābhāvato ajjhupekkhanaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:734_0: Imehi navahi ākārehīti imehi yathāvuttehi navahi pakārehi pavattā.
tika-vin01t2:734_1: Dīghaṃ assāsapassāsā kāyoti dīghākārā assāsapassāsā cuṇṇavicuṇṇāpi samūhaṭṭhena kāyo.
tika-vin01t2:734_2: Assāsapassāse nissāya uppannanimittampi ettha assāsapassāsasāmaññavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:734_3: Upaṭṭhānaṃ satīti taṃ ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā tiṭṭhatīti sati upaṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t2:734_4: Anupassanā ñāṇanti samathavasena nimittassa anupassanā vipassanāvasena assāsapassāse tannissayañca kāyaṃ “rūpa”nti,
tika-vin01t2:734_5: cittaṃ taṃsampayuttadhamme ca “arūpa”nti vavatthapetvā nāmarūpassa anupassanā ca ñāṇaṃ tattha yathābhūtāvabodho.
tika-vin01t2:734_6: Kāyo upaṭṭhānanti so kāyo ārammaṇakaraṇavasena upagantvā sati ettha tiṭṭhatīti upaṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t2:734_7: Ettha ca “kāyo upaṭṭhāna”nti iminā itarakāyassapi saṅgahoti tathā vuttaṃ sammasanacārassapi idha icchitattā.
tika-vin01t2:734_8: No satīti so kāyo sati nāma na hoti.
tika-vin01t2:734_9: Sati upaṭṭhānañceva sati ca saraṇaṭṭhena upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena ca.
tika-vin01t2:734_13: Anupassatīti jhānasampayuttañāṇena ceva vipassanāñāṇena ca anu anu passati.
tika-vin01t2:734_14: Tena vuccati kāye kāyānupassanā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāti tena anupassanena yathāvutte kāye ayaṃ kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanāti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:734_16: yā ayaṃ yathāvutte assāsapassāsakāye tassa nissayabhūte karajakāye ca kāyasseva anupassanā anudakabhūtāya
tika-vin01t2:734_17: marīciyā udakānupassanā viya na aniccādisabhāve kāye niccādibhāvānupassanā,
tika-vin01t2:734_18: atha kho yathārahaṃ aniccadukkhānattā subhabhāvasseva anupassanā.
tika-vin01t2:734_22: puriso”ti vā gahetabbassa kassaci abhāvato tādisaṃ ananupassitvā kāyamattasseva anupassanā kāyānupassanā,
tika-vin01t2:734_23: tāya kāyānupassanāya sampayuttā satiyeva upaṭṭhānaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:735_2: Etthāti etasmiṃ yathādassite “kathaṃ dīghaṃ assasanto”tiādinā āgate pāḷinaye.
tika-vin01t2:736_1: Cattāro vaṇṇāti cattāro ākārā te ca dīghādayo eva.
tika-vin01t2:736_2: Nāsikaggeva bhikkhunoti gāthāsukhatthaṃ rassaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:737_0: Sabbakāyappaṭisaṃvedīti sabbassa kāyassa paṭi paṭi paccekaṃ sammadeva vedanasīlo jānanasīlo,
tika-vin01t2:737_1: tassa vā paṭi paṭi sammadeva vedo etassa atthi,
tika-vin01t2:737_2: taṃ vā paṭi paṭi sammadeva vedamānoti attho.
tika-vin01t2:737_4: ggahaṇena assāsādikāyassa anavasesapariyādāne siddhepi anekakalāpasamudāyabhāvato tassa sabbesampi bhāgānaṃ saṃvedanadassanatthaṃ paṭi-
tika-vin01t2:737_8: Tattha yathā samānesupi assāsapassāsesu yogino paṭipattividhāne paccekaṃ sakkaccaṃyeva paṭipajjitabbanti dassetuṃ visuṃ desanā katā,
tika-vin01t2:737_9: evaṃ tamevatthaṃ dīpetuṃ satipi atthassa samānatāya “sakalassā”tiādinā padadvayassa visuṃ visuṃ atthavaṇṇanā katāti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:737_12: Pākaṭīkaraṇaṃ vibhāvanaṃ tattha asammuyhanañāṇeneva nesaṃ pavattanena hotīti dassento “evaṃ viditaṃ karonto”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:737_13: Tattha tasmāti yasmā ñāṇasampayuttacitteneva assāsapassāse pavatteti,
tika-vin01t2:737_15: tasmā evaṃbhūto sabbakāyappaṭisaṃvedī assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatīti vuccati buddhādīhīti yojanā.
tika-vin01t2:737_17: Ādi pākaṭo hoti satiyā ñāṇassa ca vasena katapubbābhisaṅkhārassa pavattattā.
tika-vin01t2:737_19: pageva satiṃ ñāṇañca paccupaṭṭhapetvā tīsupi ṭhānesu ñāṇasampayuttameva cittaṃ pavattetabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:738_6: Tāya satiyāti yā sā ānāpāne ārabbha pavattā sati, tāya.
tika-vin01t2:738_7: Tena manasikārenāti yo so tattha satipubbaṅgamo bhāvanāmanasikāro,
tika-vin01t2:738_13: Tatthāpi kāmaṃ ñāṇuppādanaṃ labbhateva assāsapassāsānaṃ yāthāvato dīgharassabhāvāvabodhasabbhāvato,
tika-vin01t2:738_14: tathāpi taṃ na dukkaraṃ yathāpavattānaṃ tesaṃ gahaṇamattabhāvatoti tattha vattamānakālappayogo kato.
tika-vin01t2:738_15: Idaṃ pana dukkaraṃ purisassa khuradhārāyaṃ gamanasadisaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:738_16: tasmā sātisayenettha pubbābhisaṅkhārena bhavitabbanti dīpetuṃ anāgatakālappayogo katoti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha yasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:739_1: So hi cittasamuṭṭhānopi samāno karajakāyapaṭibaddhavuttitāya tena saṅkharīyatīti kāyasaṅkhāroti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:739_2: Yo pana “kāyasaṅkhāro vacīsaṅkhāro”ti evamāgato kāyasaṅkhāro cetanālakkhaṇo satipi dvārantaruppattiyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:739_5: Passambhentotiādīsu pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ padaṃ purimassa purimassa atthavacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:739_7: tañca tathāpayoge asati uppajjanārahassa oḷārikassa kāyasaṅkhārassa payogasampattiyā anuppādananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:739_11: “Nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyā”ti hi iminā kāyapariggaho,
tika-vin01t2:739_17: Sā ca nesaṃ sadarathatā garubhāvena viya oḷārikatāya avinābhāvinīti āha “oḷārikā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:739_19: Santā hontīti cittaṃ tāva bahiddhā vikkhepābhāvena ekaggaṃ hutvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggahetvā pavattamānaṃ santaṃ hoti vūpasantaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:739_21: tadanuguṇatāya sesaṃ tisantatirūpanti evaṃ citte kāye ca vūpasante pavattamāne tannissitā assāsapassāsā
tika-vin01t2:739_27: tasmiṃyeva atthe aparāparaṃ pavattaāvajjanā tasseva atthassa manasikaraṇaṃ citte ṭhapanaṃ manasikāro,
tika-vin01t2:740_6: Kāyamhīti ettha citte cāti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:741_0: Paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya kariyamānaṃ dutiyajjhānassa nānāvajjanaṃ parikammaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ viya dūrasamussāritapaṭipakkhanti
tika-vin01t2:741_1: katvā taṃsamuṭṭhāno kāyasaṅkhāro paṭhamajjhāne ca dutiyajjhānūpacāre ca oḷārikoti sadiso vutto.
tika-vin01t2:741_3: Atha vā dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamāya paṭipajjato dukkhāpaṭipadādivasena kilamato yogino kāyakilamathacittupaghātādivasena
tika-vin01t2:741_4: vitakkādisaṅkhobhena saparipphandatāya ca cittappavattiyā dutiyajjhānādiupacāresu kāyasaṅkhārassa oḷārikatā
tika-vin01t2:741_6: Atisukhumoti aññattha labbhamāno kāyasaṅkhāro catutthajjhāne atikkantasukhumo.
tika-vin01t2:741_7: Sukhumabhāvopissa tattha natthi kuto oḷārikatā appavattanato.
tika-vin01t2:742_0: Lābhissa sato anupubbasamāpattisamāpajjanavelaṃ ekāsaneneva vā sabbesaṃ jhānānaṃ paṭilābhaṃ sandhāya
tika-vin01t2:742_2: Tattha hi sopacārānaṃ jhānānaṃ uparūpari visesavantatā santatā ca sambhaveyya,
tika-vin01t2:742_4: Evañhi heṭṭhā vuttavādena imassa vādassa avirodho siddho bhinnavisayattā.
tika-vin01t2:742_6: Yasmā te sabbepi vuccamānena vidhinā passaddhimicchantiyeva.
tika-vin01t2:742_7: Apariggahitakāle pavattakāyasaṅkhāro pariggahitakāle paṭippassambhatīti idaṃ sadisasantānatāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:742_8: Na hi te eva oḷārikā assāsādayo sukhumā honti.
tika-vin01t2:743_0: Mahābhūtapariggahe sukhumoti catudhātumukhena vipassanābhinivesaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:743_7: “Apariggahe pavatto kāyasaṅkhāro mahābhūtapariggahe paṭippassambhatī”tiādinā vipassanānayepi paṭippassaddhi yojetabbāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:744_5: taṃ kathaṃ kena pakārena kāyasaṅkhārassa passambhanaṃ yogino ca sikkhanaṃ hotīti kathetukāmatāya pucchitvā
tika-vin01t2:744_6: kāyasaṅkhāre sarūpato oḷārikasukhumato vūpasamato anuyogaparihārato ca dassetuṃ “katame kāyasaṅkhārā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:744_11: tato eva te akāyasamuṭṭhānāpi kāyena saṅkharīyantīti kāyasaṅkhārā.
tika-vin01t2:746_10: Passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāranti tathārūpaṃ ānamanādīnaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ oḷārikaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ paṭippassambhento.
tika-vin01t2:746_11: Tasmiñhi passambhite ānamanādayopi passambhitā eva honti.
tika-vin01t2:747_0: Santaṃ sukhumanti yathārūpehi kāyasaṅkhārehi kāyassa aparipphandanahetūhi ānamanādayo na honti,
tika-vin01t2:747_3: Passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāranti sāmaññato ekaṃ katvā vadati.
tika-vin01t2:747_4: Atha vā pubbe oḷārikoḷārikaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ paṭippassambhento anukkamena kāyassa aparipphandanahetubhūte
tika-vin01t2:747_5: sukhumasukhumatare uppādetvā tepi paṭippassambhetvā paramasukhumatāya koṭippattaṃ yaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ paṭippassambheti,
tika-vin01t2:747_6: taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “santaṃ sukhumaṃ passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāra”nti.
tika-vin01t2:748_4: Ayañhettha adhippāyo “vuttappakārena yadi atisukhumampi kāyasaṅkhāraṃ passambhetī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:748_5: Evaṃ santeti evaṃ sati tayā vuttākāre labbhamāne.
tika-vin01t2:748_8: assāsādivātārammaṇassa cittassa pabhāvanā uppādanā pavattanā na hoti,
tika-vin01t2:748_10: Assāsapassāsānañca pabhāvanāti oḷārike assāsapassāse bhāvanāya paṭippassambhetvā sukhumānaṃ tesaṃ pabhāvanā
tika-vin01t2:748_11: ca na hoti ubhayesaṃ tesaṃ tena paṭippassambhetabbato.
tika-vin01t2:748_12: Ānāpānassatiyāti ānāpānārammaṇāya satiyā ca pavattanaṃ na hoti ānāpānānaṃ abhāvato.
tika-vin01t2:748_13: Tato eva taṃsampayuttassa ānāpānassatisamādhissa ca pabhāvanā uppādanāpi na hoti.
tika-vin01t2:748_14: Na hi kadāci ārammaṇena vinā sārammaṇā dhammā sambhavanti.
tika-vin01t2:748_15: Na ca naṃ tanti ettha nanti nipātamattaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:748_16: Taṃ vuttavidhānaṃ samāpattiṃ paṇḍitā paññavanto na ceva samāpajjantipi tato na vuṭṭhahantipīti yojanā.
tika-vin01t2:748_17: Evaṃ codako sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvūpanayanaṃ passambhananti adhippāyena codeti.
tika-vin01t2:749_0: Puna iti kirātiādi yathāvuttāya codanāya vissajjanā.
tika-vin01t2:749_1: Tattha kirāti yadīti etassa atthe nipāto.
tika-vin01t2:749_5: Pabhāvanā hotīti yadipi oḷārikā kāyasaṅkhārā paṭippassambhanti,
tika-vin01t2:749_6: sukhumā pana atthevāti anukkamena paramasukhumabhāvappattassa vasena nimittuppattiyā ānāpānassatiyā ānāpānassatisamādhissa
tika-vin01t2:750_0: Yathā kathaṃ viyāti yathāvuttavidhānaṃ taṃ kathaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:750_17: saddanimittassa pana suggahitattā sukhumatarasaddanimittārammaṇabhāvenapi cittaṃ pavattati.
tika-vin01t2:750_18: Ādito paṭṭhāya hi tassa tassa niruddhassa saddassa nimittaṃ avikkhittena cittena upadhārentassa anukkamena
tika-vin01t2:750_19: pariyosāne atisukhumasaddanimittampi ārammaṇaṃ katvā cittaṃ pavattateva.
tika-vin01t2:750_20: Cittaṃ na vikkhepaṃ gacchati tasmiṃ yathāupaṭṭhite nimitte samādhānasabbhāvato.
tika-vin01t2:751_1: Tattha yassa suttapadassa saddhiṃ codanāsodhanāhi attho vutto,
tika-vin01t2:751_2: taṃ uddharitvā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānāni vibhāgato dassetuṃ “passambhaya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:751_3: Tattha passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāranti vuttaassāsapassāsā kāyoti yojanā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:751_4: Atha vā passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāranti ettha assāsapassāsā kāyoti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t2:751_8: bhikkhu dīghaṃ vā assasanto dīghaṃ assasāmīti pajānāti…pe…
tika-vin01t2:751_12: tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu viharatī”ti vuttattā ca “kāyānupassanāvasena vuttassa paṭhamacatukkassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:752_10: Desanāyapi hi āpannāpattito vuṭṭhānaṃ hotīti sāpi vuṭṭhāneneva saṅgahitā.
tika-vin01t2:752_11: Kilesehi ca appaṭipīḷananti kodho upanāho makkho palāso issā macchariyaṃ māyā sāṭheyyaṃ thambho sārambho
tika-vin01t2:752_12: māno atimāno mado pamādoti evamādīhi pāpadhammehi appaṭipīḷanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:753_1: Dveasīti khandhakavattāni cuddasavidhaṃ mahāvattanti ettha mahāvattaṃ nāma vattakkhandhake vuttāni āgantukavattaṃ
tika-vin01t2:753_4: Tato aññāni pana kadāci tajjanīyakammakatādikāleyeva caritabbāni dvāsīti khandhakavattāni,
tika-vin01t2:753_7: Tattha “pārivāsikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vattaṃ paññapessāmī”ti ārabhitvā “na upasampādetabbaṃ…pe…
tika-vin01t2:753_8: na chamāyaṃ caṅkamante caṅkame caṅkamitabba”nti vuttavattāni chasaṭṭhi,
tika-vin01t2:753_11: pārivāsikena bhikkhunā pārivāsikavuḍḍhatarena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanārahena,
tika-vin01t2:753_14: abbhānārahena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekacchanne āvāse vatthabba”ntiādinā vuttāni pakatatte caritabbehi anaññattā
tika-vin01t2:753_15: visuṃ tāni agaṇetvā pārivāsikavuḍḍhatarādīsu puggalantaresu caritabbattā tesaṃ vasena sampiṇḍetvā ekekaṃ
tika-vin01t2:753_17: ukkhepanīyakammakatavattesu vattapaññāpanavasena vuttaṃ “na pakatattassa bhikkhuno abhivādanaṃ…pe…
tika-vin01t2:753_18: nahāne piṭṭhiparikammaṃ sāditabba”nti idaṃ abhivādanādīnaṃ asādiyanaṃ ekaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:753_19: “na pakatatto bhikkhu sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsetabbo”tiādīni ca dasāti evametāni dvāsīti.
tika-vin01t2:753_20: Etesveva pana kānici tajjanīyakammādivattāni kānici pārivāsikādivattānīti aggahitaggahaṇena dvāsīti eva.
tika-vin01t2:753_21: Aññattha pana aṭṭhakathāpadese appakaṃ ūnamadhikaṃ vā gaṇanūpagaṃ na hotīti asīti khandhakavattānīti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:753_28: kiṃ ābhisamācārikenātiādīsu sīlanti ubhatovibhaṅgapariyāpannameva gahetabbaṃ khandhakavattapariyāpannassa ābhisamācārikaggahaṇena gahitattā.
tika-vin01t2:754_3: Tattha āvāsoti ekopi ovarako vuccati ekampi pariveṇaṃ sakalopi saṅghārāmo.
tika-vin01t2:754_7: yena kenaci vā kāraṇena apekkhavā paṭibaddhacitto,
tika-vin01t2:755_1: Ekaccassa hi upaṭṭhākakulampi “sukhite sukhito”tiādinā nayena saṃsaṭṭhassa viharato palibodho hoti,
tika-vin01t2:755_2: so kulamānusakehi vinā dhammassavanāya sāmantavihārampi na gacchati.
tika-vin01t2:755_3: Ekaccassa mātāpitaropi palibodhā na honti koraṇḍakavihāravāsittherassa bhāgineyyadaharabhikkhuno viya.
tika-vin01t2:756_2: Puññavantassa hi bhikkhuno gatagataṭṭhāne manussā mahāparivāre paccaye denti,
tika-vin01t2:756_3: so tesaṃ anumodento dhammaṃ desento samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ okāsaṃ na labhati,
tika-vin01t2:756_7: asuko upaṭṭhāko upāsako upāsikā amacco amaccadhītā tumhākaṃ dassanakāmā”ti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:756_10: Tena gaṇaṃ pahāya yattha naṃ na jānanti,
tika-vin01t2:757_1: Yo tassa uddesaṃ vā paripucchaṃ vā dento samaṇadhammassa okāsaṃ na labhati,
tika-vin01t2:757_4: sace tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahu kataṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:757_9: yojanato paraṃ agantvā antoyojanaparicchede aññaṃ gaṇavācakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “ime āyasmā uddesādīhi saṅgaṇhatū”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:757_12: tumhe yathāphāsukaṭṭhānāni gacchathā”ti gaṇaṃ pahāya attano kammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:758_4: katākate ussukkaṃ āpajjitabbanti sabbathāpi palibodho hoti.
tika-vin01t2:758_10: navakammaṃ saṅghassa vā bhārahārakabhikkhūnaṃ vā niyyātetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:759_1: Yassa hi katthaci pabbajjāpekkho vā hoti,
tika-vin01t2:759_3: Sace taṃ alabhanto na sakkoti adhivāsetuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:759_4: araññaṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontassapi gamikacittaṃ nāma duppaṭivinodayaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:759_5: tasmā gantvā taṃ kiccaṃ tīretvāva samaṇadhamme ussukkaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:760_3: Tasmā so palibodho te upaṭṭhahitvā tesaṃ pākatikakaraṇena upacchinditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:760_4: Tattha upajjhāyo tāva gilāno sace lahuṃ na vuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin01t2:760_11: Sacepi hi te rajje ṭhitā honti,
tika-vin01t2:760_17: Bhātubhaginīnaṃ pana tesaṃ santakameva yojetvā dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:760_19: attano santakaṃ tāvakālikaṃ datvā pacchā labhantena gaṇhitabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:760_21: Aññātakassa bhaginiyā sāmikassa bhesajjaṃ neva kātuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:760_23: “tuyhaṃ sāmikassa dehī”ti vatvā pana bhaginiyā dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:760_25: tesaṃ pana puttā imassa ñātakāyevāti tesaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:761_3: Sace pana katipāhaṃ bhesajjaṃ karontassapi na vūpasammati,
tika-vin01t2:761_6: taṃyevamhi posento anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe dukkhappatto”ti attabhāvaṃ garahitvā samaṇadhammo kātabbo.
tika-vin01t2:762_0: Ganthoti pariyattipariharaṇaṃ. Taṃ sajjhāyādīhi niccabyāvaṭasseva palibodho hoti, na itarassa.
tika-vin01t2:763_3: Sā hi uttānaseyyakadārako viya taruṇasassaṃ viya ca dupparihārā hoti,
tika-vin01t2:763_9: Kammaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ paribundheti uparodheti pavattituṃ na detīti palibodho, ra-
tika-vin01t2:764_3: Paricchinditvāti “imasmiṃ vihāre sabbepi bhikkhū”ti evaṃ paricchinditvā.
tika-vin01t2:764_6: Ayañca sahavāsīnaṃ cittamaddavajananādiattho “manussānaṃ piyo hotī”tiādinayappavattena mettānisaṃsasuttena dīpetabbo.
tika-vin01t2:765_0: Anolīnavuttiko hotīti sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ olīnavuttiko hīnavīriyo na hoti,
tika-vin01t2:766_1: kasiṇugghāṭimākāsakasiṇe paricchinnākāsakasiṇañca antogadhaṃ katvā pāḷiyaṃ pathavīkasiṇādīnaṃ rūpajjhānārammaṇānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:766_2: aṭṭhannaṃyeva kasiṇānaṃ sarūpato vuttattā ākāsakasiṇaṃ ālokakasiṇañca vajjetvā “aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇesū”ti
tika-vin01t2:766_4: Aṭṭhakathānayena pana ākāsakasiṇe ālokakasiṇe ca visuṃ gahite cattālīsaṃyeva kammaṭṭhānāni.
tika-vin01t2:766_13: Tattha pathavīkasiṇaṃ āpokasiṇaṃ tejokasiṇaṃ vāyokasiṇaṃ nīlakasiṇaṃ pītakasiṇaṃ lohitakasiṇaṃ odātakasiṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:766_15: Uddhumātakaṃ vinīlakaṃ vipubbakaṃ vicchiddakaṃ vikkhāyitakaṃ vikkhittakaṃ hatavikkhittakaṃ lohitakaṃ puḷavakaṃ aṭṭhikanti ime dasa asubhā.
tika-vin01t2:766_16: Buddhānussati dhamma saṅgha sīla cāga devatānussati maraṇassati kāyagatāsati ānāpānassati upasamānussatīti imā dasa anussatiyo.
tika-vin01t2:766_17: Mettā karuṇā muditā upekkhāti ime cattāro brahmavihārā.
tika-vin01t2:766_18: Ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti ime cattāro āruppā.
tika-vin01t2:767_0: Yaṃ yassa caritānukūlanti ettha rāgacaritassa tāva dasa asubhā kāyagatāsatīti ekādasa kammaṭṭhānāni anukūlāni,
tika-vin01t2:767_1: dosacaritassa cattāro brahmavihārā cattāri vaṇṇakasiṇānīti aṭṭha,
tika-vin01t2:767_2: mohacaritassa ca vitakkacaritassa ca ekaṃ ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānameva,
tika-vin01t2:767_4: buddhicaritassa maraṇassati upasamānussati catudhātuvavatthānaṃ āhāre paṭikūlasaññāti cattāri,
tika-vin01t2:767_5: sesakasiṇāni cattāro ca āruppā sabbacaritānaṃ anukūlāni.
tika-vin01t2:767_6: Kasiṇesu ca yaṃ kiñci parittaṃ vitakkacaritassa,
tika-vin01t2:768_1: tasseva vasena catukkapañcakajjhānāni nibbattetvā jhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā āsavakkhayappattassa khīṇāsavassa santike gahetabbanti āha –
tika-vin01t2:768_4: Arahantādayo hītiādi ekaccakhīṇāsavato bahussutova kammaṭṭhānadāne seyyoti dassanatthaṃ āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:768_5: Mahāhatthipathaṃ nīharanto viyāti kammaṭṭhānapathaviṃ mahāhatthipathaṃ katvā dassento viya.
tika-vin01t2:769_0: Idāni kammaṭṭhānadāyakassa santikaṃ gacchantena dhotamakkhitehi pādehi upāhanā āruhitvā chattaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin01t2:769_2: gamikavattaṃ pana pūretvā attano pattacīvaraṃ sayameva gahetvā antarāmagge yaṃ yaṃ vihāraṃ pavisati,
tika-vin01t2:769_4: nikkhamanakāle gamikavattanti yathārahaṃ taṃ taṃ vattaṃ pūrentena sallahukaparikkhārena paramasallekhavuttinā
tika-vin01t2:769_5: hutvā gantabbanti imamatthaṃ saṅkhipitvā dassento “sallahukavuttinā vinayācārasampannenā”ti āha.
tika-vin01t2:769_6: Evaṃ pana gantvā taṃ vihāraṃ pavisantena antarāyeva dantakaṭṭhaṃ kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā gahetvā pavisitabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:769_7: na ca muhuttaṃ vissamitvā pādadhovanamakkhanādīni katvā ācariyassa santikaṃ gamissāmīti aññaṃ pariveṇaṃ pavisitabbaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin01t2:769_8: Sace hissa tatra ācariyassa visabhāgā bhikkhū bhaveyyuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:769_9: taṃ te āgamanakāraṇaṃ pucchitvā ācariyassa avaṇṇaṃ pakāsetvā “naṭṭhosi,
tika-vin01t2:769_10: sace tassa santikaṃ āgato”ti vippaṭisāraṃ uppādeyyuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:769_12: tasmā ācariyassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pucchitvā ujukaṃ tattheva gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:772_0: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako”ti. –
tika-vin01t2:773_0: Evamādinā vuttappakāraṃ saddhādiguṇasamannāgataṃ ekantahitesiṃ vuḍḍhipakkhe ṭhitaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ ācariyaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:773_1: Vattapaṭipattiyā ārādhitacittassāti ettha sace ācariyo daharataro hoti,
tika-vin01t2:773_13: aññehi ābhata”nti vuttena pana yattha ācariyo na passati,
tika-vin01t2:773_14: evarūpe paṭicchanne vā okāse abbhokāsavihārassapi vā ekamante nisīditvā pādā dhovitabbā.
tika-vin01t2:773_18: “ayaṃ bhikkhu ito eva paṭṭhāya sambhogaṃ kopetī”ti ācariyassa aññathattaṃ bhaveyya.
tika-vin01t2:773_19: Gahetvā pana na āditova pādā makkhetabbā.
tika-vin01t2:773_20: Sace hi taṃ ācariyassa gattabbhañjanatelaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin01t2:773_22: tasmā paṭhamaṃ sīsaṃ makkhetvā khandhādīni makkhetabbāni.
tika-vin01t2:773_24: pādepi makkhehī”ti vuttena pana pāde makkhetvā “imaṃ telanāḷiṃ ṭhapemi,
tika-vin01t2:774_2: Dutiyadivasato pana paṭṭhāya sace ācariyassa pakatiupaṭṭhāko atthi,
tika-vin01t2:774_6: Karontena ca khuddakamajjhimamahantāni tīṇi dantakaṭṭhāni upanāmetabbāni.
tika-vin01t2:774_7: Sītaṃ uṇhanti duvidhaṃ mukhadhovanudakañca nhānodakañca paṭiyādetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:774_8: Tato yaṃ ācariyo tīṇi divasāni paribhuñjati,
tika-vin01t2:774_10: niyamaṃ akatvā yaṃ vā taṃ vā paribhuñjantassa yathāladdhaṃ upanāmetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:774_16: kālasseva vuṭṭhāya upāhanā omuñcitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā dantakaṭṭhaṃ dātabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:774_20: bhājanaṃ dhovitvā yāgu upanāmetabbā”tiādikaṃ khandhake vattaṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:774_22: Iti iminā yathāvuttena nayena paṭipajjanto vattapaṭipattiyā cittaṃ ārādhetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:775_4: Atha vā ganthato atthato ca kammaṭṭhānassa uggaṇhanaṃ uggaho,
tika-vin01t2:775_9: Kammaṭṭhānassa lakkhaṇanti gaṇanānubandhanāphusanānaṃ vasena bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ṭhapanāya sampatti,
tika-vin01t2:775_10: tato parampi vā sallakkhaṇādivasena matthakappattīti kammaṭṭhānasabhāvassa sallakkhaṇaṃ. Tenāha –
tika-vin01t2:776_0: Attanāpi na kilamati odhiso kammaṭṭhānassa uggaṇhanato,
tika-vin01t2:776_1: tato eva ācariyampi na viheṭheti dhammādhikaraṇampi bhāvanāya matthakaṃ pāpanato.
tika-vin01t2:776_5: Sappāyaṃ hotīti āvāsasappāyādilābhena manasikāraphāsutā bhāvanānukūlatā hoti.
tika-vin01t2:776_7: Yasmā pana mandapañño gāvute aḍḍhayojane yojanamatte vā vasanto kammaṭṭhānassa kismiñcideva ṭhāne sandehe
tika-vin01t2:776_8: vā satisammose vā jāte kālasseva vihāre vattaṃ katvā antarāmagge piṇḍāya caritvā bhattakiccapariyosāneyeva
tika-vin01t2:776_9: ācariyassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā taṃ divasaṃ ācariyassa santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā dutiyadivase ācariyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:776_10: vanditvā nikkhamitvā antarāmagge piṇḍāya caritvā akilamantoyeva attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ āgantuṃ sakkhissati,
tika-vin01t2:776_12: Sace tikkhapañño yojanaparame phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ na labhati,
tika-vin01t2:776_13: tena kammaṭṭhāne sabbaṃ gaṇṭhiṭṭhānaṃ chinditvā visuddhaṃ āvajjanapaṭibaddhaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ katvā yojanaparamato
tika-vin01t2:776_14: dūrampi gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti āha “tikkhapañño dūrampi gantvā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:777_12: kalyāṇamittānaṃ alābhoti imehi aṭṭhārasahi senāsanadosehi vivajjitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:777_13: Imesañhi aṭṭhārasannaṃ dosānaṃ aññatarena samannāgataṃ senāsanaṃ bhāvanāya ananurūpaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:778_2: te aññamaññaṃ paṭiviruddhatāya vattaṃ na karonti,
tika-vin01t2:778_5: Tatrāyaṃ “gocaragāme piṇḍāya carissāmī”ti pattacīvaramādāya nikkhantopi sace passati vattaṃ akataṃ,
tika-vin01t2:778_11: atidivā paviṭṭho niṭṭhitāya bhikkhāya kiñci na labhati.
tika-vin01t2:778_12: Paṭisallānagatopi sāmaṇeradaharabhikkhūnaṃ uccāsaddena saṅghakammehi ca vikkhipati.
tika-vin01t2:778_13: Yattha pana sabbaṃ vattaṃ katameva hoti,
tika-vin01t2:779_2: Yattha pana bhikkhū evaṃ vadanti “āyasmā yathāsukhaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ karotu,
tika-vin01t2:781_1: Vikāle āgatānaṃ attano senāsanaṃ datvā rukkhamūle vā pāsāṇapiṭṭhe vā vasitabbaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:781_2: punadivasepi evamevāti kammaṭṭhānassa okāso na hoti.
tika-vin01t2:781_3: Yattha pana evarūpo āgantukasambādho na hoti,
tika-vin01t2:782_3: tesaṃ bhājanadārudoṇikādīni pucchantānaṃ “asuke ca asuke ca ṭhāne”ti dassetabbāni honti.
tika-vin01t2:783_1: tatthassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā divāvihāraṃ nisinnassapi santike sākahārikā gāyamānā paṇṇaṃ uccinantiyo
tika-vin01t2:784_0: Yattha pana nānāvidhā mālāgacchā supupphitā honti, tatrāpi tādisoyeva upaddavo.
tika-vin01t2:785_4: sāyanhasamaye vihāramajjhe caṅkamantena te disvā “kiṃ upāsakā evaṃ karothā”ti vuttā yathāruci akkosanti,
tika-vin01t2:786_1: “ayaṃ arahā”ti sambhāvetvā vanditukāmā manussā samantā osaranti,
tika-vin01t2:786_4: tena divā aññattha gantvā rattiṃ vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:788_0: Dārusannissaye pana yattha kaṭṭhāni ca dabbupakaraṇarukkhā ca santi,
tika-vin01t2:788_1: tattha kaṭṭhahārikā pubbe vuttasākapupphahārikā viya aphāsukaṃ karonti.
tika-vin01t2:788_3: te “chinditvā gharāni karissāmā”ti manussā āgantvā chindanti.
tika-vin01t2:788_4: Sace sāyanhasamaye padhānagharā nikkhamitvā vihāramajjhe caṅkamanto te disvā “kiṃ upāsakā evaṃ karothā”ti vadati,
tika-vin01t2:789_0: Yo pana khettasannissito hoti samantā khettehi parivārito,
tika-vin01t2:789_1: tattha manussā vihāramajjheyeva khalaṃ katvā dhaññaṃ maddanti,
tika-vin01t2:789_7: manussā vīhisīsaṃ gahetvā “passatha tumhākaṃ ārāmikakulānaṃ kamma”nti saṅghassa dassenti.
tika-vin01t2:789_8: Tena tena kāraṇena rājarājamahāmattānaṃ gharadvāraṃ gantabbaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:790_2: evaṃ karothā”ti vāriyamānā “etassa paṃsukūlikassa āgatakālato paṭṭhāya naṭṭhāmhā”ti vattāro bhavanti.
tika-vin01t2:791_0: Yopi udakapaṭṭanaṃ vā thalapaṭṭanaṃ vā sannissito hoti,
tika-vin01t2:791_1: tattha abhiṇhaṃ nāvāhi ca satthehi ca āgatamanussā “okāsaṃ detha,
tika-vin01t2:792_0: Paccantasannissite pana manussā buddhādīsu appasannā honti.
tika-vin01t2:793_1: Tañhi padesaṃ eko rājā “na mayhaṃ vase vattatī”ti paharati,
tika-vin01t2:793_3: Tatrāyaṃ bhikkhu kadāci imassa rañño vijite vicarati,
tika-vin01t2:793_5: atha naṃ “carapuriso aya”nti maññamānā anayabyasanaṃ pāpenti.
tika-vin01t2:794_0: Asappāyatāti visabhāgarūpādiārammaṇasamosaraṇena vā amanussapariggahitatāya vā asappāyatā.
tika-vin01t2:794_3: Athassa ekā yakkhinī paṇṇasāladvāre ṭhatvā gāyi.
tika-vin01t2:794_9: atha naṃ sā vegena gantvā gahetvā “mayā, bhante, na eko,
tika-vin01t2:795_0: Yattha na sakkā hoti ācariyaṃ vā ācariyasamaṃ vā upajjhāyaṃ vā upajjhāyasamaṃ vā kalyāṇamittaṃ laddhuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:795_2: Tasmā imesaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ dosānaṃ aññatarena samannāgataṃ senāsanaṃ bhāvanāya ananurūpanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:797_0: Soṇḍiṃ paṇṇañca pupphañca, phalaṃ patthitameva ca.
tika-vin01t2:802_0: Pañcasenāsanaṅgasamannāgatanti gāmato nātidūranāccāsannatādīhi pañcahi senāsanaṅgehi samannāgataṃ.
tika-vin01t2:803_7: tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane viharantassa appakasirena uppajjanti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā,
tika-vin01t2:803_8: tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane therā bhikkhū viharanti bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā,
tika-vin01t2:803_9: te kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paripucchati paripañhati ‘idaṃ, bhante, kathaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:803_13: anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhāṭhāniyesu dhammesu kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodenti. Evaṃ kho,
tika-vin01t2:804_0: Ettha ca nātidūraṃ nāccāsannaṃ gamanāgamanasampannanti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:804_1: divā appākiṇṇaṃ rattiṃ appasaddaṃ appanigghosanti ekaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:805_0: Upacchinnakhuddakapalibodhenāti ettha pana khuddakapalibodhe upacchindantena dīghāni kesanakhalomāni chinditabbāni,
tika-vin01t2:805_1: jiṇṇacīvaresu aggaḷaanuvātaparibhaṇḍadānādinā daḷhīkammaṃ vā tantucchedādīsu tunnakammaṃ vā kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:805_7: Āhāre hi āsayaṃ paviṭṭhamatte tassa āgantukatāya yebhuyyena siyā sarīrassa koci parissamo,
tika-vin01t2:805_9: Tasmiñhi avūpasante sarīrakhedena cittaṃ ekaggataṃ na labheyyāti.
tika-vin01t2:806_0: Anubandhanāti assāsapassāsānaṃ anugamanavasena satiyā nirantaraṃ anupavattanā.
tika-vin01t2:806_1: Phusanāti assāsapassāse gaṇentassa gaṇanaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā te satiyā anubandhantassa yathā appanā hoti,
tika-vin01t2:806_2: tathā cittaṃ ṭhapentassa ca nāsikaggādiṭṭhānassa nesaṃ phusanā.
tika-vin01t2:806_3: Yasmā pana gaṇanādivasena viya phusanādivasena visuṃ manasikāro natthi,
tika-vin01t2:806_4: phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva gaṇanā kātabbāti dassetuṃ idha phusanāgahaṇanti dīpento “phusanāti phuṭṭhaṭṭhāna”nti āha.
tika-vin01t2:806_6: Tañhi sammadeva ārammaṇe cittassa ādhānaṃ ṭhapanaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:806_7: Tathā hi samādhi “cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhitī”ti niddiṭṭho.
tika-vin01t2:806_10: Pavattato nimittato ca vinivaṭṭanato vinivaṭṭanā maggo.
tika-vin01t2:807_0: Khaṇḍanti ekaṃ tīṇi pañcāti evaṃ gaṇanāya khaṇḍanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:807_3: Sikhāppattaṃ nu khoti idaṃ cirataraṃ gaṇanāya manasikarontassa vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:807_4: So hi tathā laddhaṃ avikkhepamattaṃ nissāya evaṃ maññeyya.
tika-vin01t2:807_6: taṃ gahetvāti idaṃ assāsapassāsesu yassa ekova paṭhamaṃ upaṭṭhāti,
tika-vin01t2:807_10: Yo upaṭṭhātīti iminā ca dvīsu nāsāpuṭavātesu yo pākaṭataro upaṭṭhāti,
tika-vin01t2:807_11: so gahetabboti ayampi attho dīpitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:807_12: Pavattamānaṃ pavattamānanti āmeḍitavacanena nirantaraṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ upalakkhaṇaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:807_14: Paṭhamaṃ ekekasmiṃ upaṭṭhitepi upalakkhetvāva gaṇentassa kamena ubhopi pākaṭā hontīti āha –
tika-vin01t2:807_18: Tattha pākaṭā hontīti gaṇanāvasena bahiddhā vikkhepābhāvato vibhūtā honti.
tika-vin01t2:808_5: Eko dve tīṇi cattāri pañcāti gaṇanāvidhidassanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:808_6: Tasmā aṭṭhātiādīsupi ekato paṭṭhāyeva paccekaṃ aṭṭhādīni pāpetabbāni.
tika-vin01t2:808_7: “Sīghaṃ sīghaṃ gaṇetabbamevā”ti vatvā tattha kāraṇaṃ nidassanañca dasseti “gaṇanāpaṭibaddhe hī”tiādinā.
tika-vin01t2:809_0: Nippariyāyato nirantarappavatti nāma ṭhapanāyamevāti āha “nirantarappavattaṃ viyā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:809_1: Anto pavisantaṃ manasikaronto anto cittaṃ paveseti nāma.
tika-vin01t2:809_3: Vātabbhāhatanti abbhantaragatavātaṃ bahulaṃ manasikarontassa vātena taṃ ṭhānaṃ abbhāhataṃ viya medena pūritaṃ viya ca hoti,
tika-vin01t2:809_6: Tathā pana nīharato vātassa gatisamanvesanamukhena nānārammaṇesu cittaṃ vidhāvatīti āha “puthuttārammaṇe cittaṃ vikkhipatī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:810_1: Anugamananti pavattapavattānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena satiyā anu anu pavattanaṃ anugacchanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:810_7: Tathā hi te nābhito paṭṭhāya yāva nāsikaggā sabbattha uppajjanteva.
tika-vin01t2:810_11: Hadayaṃ majjhanti hadayasamīpaṃ tassa uparibhāgo majjhaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:810_12: Nāsikaggaṃ pariyosānanti nāsikaṭṭhānaṃ tassa pariyosānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ samaññāya tadavadhibhāvato.
tika-vin01t2:810_14: na ca bahiddhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ sambhavo atthi.
tika-vin01t2:811_1: “Anubandhanāya manasikarontena phusanāvasena ṭhapanāvasena ca manasi kātabba”nti yena adhippāyena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:811_3: Tattha visuṃ manasikāro natthīti gaṇanāya anubandhanāya ca vinā yathākkamaṃ kevalaṃ phusanāvasena ṭhapanāvasena ca kammaṭṭhānamanasikāro natthi.
tika-vin01t2:811_4: Nanu phusanāya vinā ṭhapanāya viya phusanāya vinā gaṇanāyapi manasikāro natthiyevāti?
tika-vin01t2:811_6: gaṇanā pana yathā kammaṭṭhānamanasikārassa mūlabhāvato padhānabhāvena gahetabbā,
tika-vin01t2:811_7: evaṃ anubandhanā ṭhapanāya tāya vinā ṭhapanāya asambhavato.
tika-vin01t2:811_8: Tasmā satipi phusanāya nānantarikabhāve gaṇanānubandhanā eva mūlabhāvato padhānabhāvena gahetvā itarāsaṃ tadabhāvaṃ dassento āha –
tika-vin01t2:811_9: “gaṇanānubandhanāvasena viya hi phusanāṭhapanāvasena visuṃ manasikāro natthī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:811_10: Yadi evaṃ tā kasmā uddese visuṃ gahitāti āha “phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyevā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:811_11: Tattha phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva gaṇentoti iminā gaṇanāya phusanā aṅganti dasseti. Tenāha –
tika-vin01t2:811_15: Satiyā anubandhantoti gaṇanāvidhiṃ anugantvā satiyā nibandhanto,
tika-vin01t2:811_17: Appanāvasena cittaṃ ṭhapentoti yathā appanā hoti,
tika-vin01t2:811_18: evaṃ yathāupaṭṭhite nimitte cittaṃ ṭhapento samādahanto.
tika-vin01t2:811_19: Anubandhanāya cātiādīsu anubandhanāya ca phusanāya ca ṭhapanāya ca manasi karotīti vuccatīti yojanā.
tika-vin01t2:811_20: Svāyamatthoti yvāyaṃ “phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva gaṇento tattheva gaṇanaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā te satiyā anubandhanto”ti vutto,
tika-vin01t2:811_22: Yā accantāya na minoti na vinicchinati,
tika-vin01t2:811_23: sā mānassa samīpeti upamā yathā goṇo viya gavayoti.
tika-vin01t2:812_12: Satiñhi tattha sūpaṭṭhitaṃ karonto yogāvacaro tattha ṭhito nāma hoti avayavadhammena samudāyassa apadisitabbato.
tika-vin01t2:812_17: Teti nagarassa anto bahi ca gatā manussā tesaṃ saṅgahā ca hatthagatā.
tika-vin01t2:813_3: Ajānato ca tayo dhammeti nimittaṃ assāso passāsoti ime nimittādayo tayo dhamme ārammaṇakaraṇavasena avindantassa. Ca-
tika-vin01t2:813_6: Nupalabbhatīti na upalabbhati na sijjhatīti ayaṃ codanāgāthāya attho.
tika-vin01t2:814_0: Kathanti tāsaṃ codanāparihāragāthānaṃ atthaṃ vivarituṃ kathetukamyatāpucchā.
tika-vin01t2:814_1: Ime tayo dhammātiādīsu padayojanāya saddhiṃ ayamatthaniddeso –
tika-vin01t2:814_2: ime nimittādayo tayo dhammā ekacittassa kathaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na honti,
tika-vin01t2:814_3: asatipi ārammaṇabhāve na cime na ca ime tayo dhammā aviditā honti,
tika-vin01t2:814_5: tesañhi aviditatte cittañca kathaṃ vikkhepaṃ na gacchati,
tika-vin01t2:814_6: padhānañca bhāvanāya nipphādakaṃ vīriyañca kathaṃ paññāyati,
tika-vin01t2:814_7: nīvaraṇānaṃ vikkhambhakaṃ sammadeva samādhānāvahaṃ bhāvanānuyogasaṅkhātaṃ payogañca yogī kathaṃ sādheti,
tika-vin01t2:815_1: Bhūmibhāgassa visamatāya cañcale rukkhe chedanakiriyā na sukarā siyā,
tika-vin01t2:815_2: tathā ca sati kakacadantagati duviññeyyāti āha –
tika-vin01t2:815_7: Tena kakacadantehi phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva purisassa satiyā upaṭṭhānaṃ dasseti. Tenāha –
tika-vin01t2:815_8: “na āgate vā gate vā kakacadante manasi karotī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:816_2: na ca āgatā vā gatā vā kakacadantā aviditā honti sabbattha satiyā upaṭṭhitattā chinditabbaṭṭhānaṃ aphusitvā
tika-vin01t2:816_8: Teneva visuddhimagge upamāyampi “visesamadhigacchatī”ti padaṃ yojetvāva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:816_10: tena ca sādhetabbaṃ payojanavisesa”nti attho vutto.
tika-vin01t2:817_1: Upanibandhati ārammaṇe cittaṃ etāyāti sati upanibandhanā nāma,
tika-vin01t2:817_4: Evamevanti yathā so puriso kakacena rukkhaṃ chindanto āgatagate kakacadante amanasikarontopi phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva
tika-vin01t2:817_8: itaro mukhaṃ asanaṃ nimīyati chādīyati etenāti mukhanimittanti laddhanāme uttaroṭṭhe.
tika-vin01t2:818_0: Idaṃ padhānanti yena vīriyārambhena āraddhavīriyassa yogino kāyopi cittampi kammaniyaṃ bhāvanākammakkhamaṃ bhāvanākammayoggaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:818_1: idaṃ vīriyaṃ padhānanti phalena hetuṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:818_2: Upakkilesā pahīyantīti cittassa upakkilesabhūtāni nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhanavasena pahīyanti.
tika-vin01t2:818_3: Vitakkā vūpasammantīti tato eva kāmavitakkādayo micchāvitakkā upasamaṃ gacchanti,
tika-vin01t2:818_4: nīvaraṇappahānena vā paṭhamajjhānādhigamaṃ dassetvā vitakkavūpasamāpadesena dutiyajjhānādīnamadhigamamāha.
tika-vin01t2:818_5: Ayaṃ payogoti ayaṃ jhānādhigamassa hetubhūto kammaṭṭhānānuyogo payogo.
tika-vin01t2:818_6: Saṃyojanā pahīyantīti dasapi saṃyojanāni maggappaṭipāṭiyā samucchedavasena pahīyanti.
tika-vin01t2:818_7: Anusayā byantī hontīti tathā sattapi anusayā anuppattidhammatāpādanena bhaṅgamattassapi anavasesato vigatantā honti.
tika-vin01t2:818_8: Ettha ca saṃyojanappahānaṃ nāma anusayanirodheneva hoti,
tika-vin01t2:818_9: pahīnesu ca saṃyojanesu anusayānaṃ lesopi na bhavissatīti ca dassanatthaṃ “saṃyojanā pahīyanti,
tika-vin01t2:818_11: Ayaṃ visesoti imaṃ samādhiṃ nissāya anukkamena labbhamāno ayaṃ saṃyojanappahānādiko imassa samādhissa visesoti attho.
tika-vin01t2:819_5: tathā yena dīgharassapajaānanādividhinā anupubbaṃ paricitā suṭṭhu bhāvitā,
tika-vin01t2:819_6: tato eva paripuṇṇā soḷasannaṃ vatthūnaṃ pāripūriyā sabbaso puṇṇā,
tika-vin01t2:819_7: so bhikkhu imaṃ attano khandhādilokaṃ paññobhāsena pabhāseti.
tika-vin01t2:819_9: Abbhā muttova candimā abbhādiupakkilesavimutto candimā tārakarājā viyāti.
tika-vin01t2:819_10: “Abbhā muttova candimā”ti hi padassa niddese mahikādīnampi vuttattā ettha ādi-
tika-vin01t2:820_6: Na cirenevāti idaṃ katādhikāraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:820_9: vicārādīti pana vattabbaṃ nippariyāyena vitakkassa appanābhāvato.
tika-vin01t2:820_11: taṃsampayogato vā yasmā jhānaṃ appanāti aṭṭhakathāvohāro,
tika-vin01t2:820_13: tasmā taṃ appanāti dassento “avasesajjhānaṅgapaṭimaṇḍitā appanāsaṅkhātā ṭhapanā ca sampajjatī”ti āha.
tika-vin01t2:820_14: Kassaci pana gaṇanāvaseneva manasikārakālato pabhutīti ettha “anukkamato…pe…
tika-vin01t2:820_15: pattaṃ viya hotī”ti ettakova gantho parihīno,
tika-vin01t2:820_16: purāṇapotthakesu pana katthaci so gantho likhitoyeva tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin01t2:821_6: Kāyadarathavūpasamena saddhiṃ sijjhamāno oḷārikaassāsapassāsanirodho byatirekamukhena tassa sādhanaṃ viya vutto.
tika-vin01t2:821_8: Kāyadarathe vūpasanteti cittajarūpānaṃ lahumudukammaññabhāvena yo sesatisantatirūpānampi lahuādibhāvo,
tika-vin01t2:821_10: Svāyaṃ yasmā cittassa lahuādibhāvena vinā natthi,
tika-vin01t2:822_0: Oḷārike assāsapassāse niruddhetiādi heṭṭhā vuttanayamhi vicetabbākārappattassa kāyasaṅkhārassa vicayanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ ānītaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:823_0: Uparūpari vibhūtānīti bhāvanābalena uddhaṃ uddhaṃ pākaṭāni honti.
tika-vin01t2:824_0: “Kattha natthī”ti ṭhānavasena “kassa natthī”ti puggalavasena ca vīmaṃsiyamānamatthaṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā vibhāvetuṃ “antomātukucchiya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:824_1: Tattha “yathā udake nimuggassa niruddhokāsatāya assāsapassāsā na pavattanti,
tika-vin01t2:824_4: evaṃ asaññībhūtānaṃ mucchāparetānaṃ asaññīsu vā jātānaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:824_6: Mahāgaṇṭhipade pana “mucchāparetānaṃ cittappavattiyā dubbalabhāvato”ti kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:824_10: rūpabhave rūpānaṃ bhavaṅgassa ca sukhumabhāvato rūpabhavasamaṅgīnaṃ natthī”ti kāraṇaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:824_11: Atthiyeva te assāsapassāsā pārisesatoti adhippāyo yathāvuttasattaṭṭhānavinimuttassa assāsapassāsānaṃ anuppajjanaṭṭhānassa abhāvato.
tika-vin01t2:824_13: Nimittaṃ ṭhapetabbanti satiyā tattha sukhappavattanatthaṃ thirataraṃ saññāṇaṃ pavattetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:824_15: Imamevāti imaṃ eva anupaṭṭhahantassa kāyasaṅkhārassa kaṇṭakuṭṭhāpanañāyena upaṭṭhāpanavidhimeva.
tika-vin01t2:824_22: bhāventassa anukkamena anupaṭṭhahante assāsapassāse vīmaṃsitvā “ime te”ti upadhāretuṃ sammadeva jānituñca
tika-vin01t2:824_26: Sā cassa garukatā bhāvanāya sudukkarabhāvenāti āha “garukabhāvana”nti.
tika-vin01t2:825_0: Uparūpari santasukhumabhāvāpattito “balavatī suvisadā sūrā ca sati paññā ca icchitabbā”ti vatvā sukhumassa
tika-vin01t2:825_1: nāma atthassa sādhanenapi sukhumeneva bhavitabbanti dassetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:825_2: Idāni anupaṭṭhahantānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ pariyesanupāyaṃ dassento “tāhi ca panā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:825_8: Na hi upameyye bandhanayojanaṭṭhānāni visuṃ labbhanti.
tika-vin01t2:825_11: Tathā hi tūlapicuādi upamattayaṃ uggahe yujjati,
tika-vin01t2:826_2: Kathaṃ panetaṃ ekaṃyeva kammaṭṭhānaṃ anekākārato upaṭṭhātīti āha “tañca paneta”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t2:826_4: Paguṇappavattibhāvena avicchedaṃ mahāvisayatañca sandhāyāha “mahatī pabbateyyā nadī viyā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:826_5: Tattha byañjanasampattiyā samantabhaddakaṃ suttaṃ sabbabhāgamanoharā sabbapāliphullā vanaghaṭā viyāti āha “ekā vanarāji viyā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:826_6: Tenāha bhagavā “vanappagumbe yatha phussitagge”ti nānānusandhiyaṃ nānāpeyyālaṃ vividhanayanipuṇaṃ bahuvidhakammaṭṭhānamukhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:826_12: Na hi asabhāvassa kutoci samuṭṭhānaṃ atthi. Tenāha –
tika-vin01t2:827_0: Ime tayo dhammāti assāso passāso nimittanti ime tayo dhammā.
tika-vin01t2:827_1: Natthīti kammaṭṭhānavasena manasikātabbabhāvena natthi na upalabbhati.
tika-vin01t2:828_0: Idāni vuttasseva atthassa samatthanatthaṃ kakacūpamāyaṃ āgatā “nimitta”ntiādikā gāthā paccānītā.
tika-vin01t2:828_6: handāhaṃ dāni yadā vā tadā vā visesaṃ nibbattessāmī”ti saṅkocaṃ āpajjeyya.
tika-vin01t2:828_7: Visīdeyyāti “ettakaṃ kālaṃ bhāvanamanuyuttassa nimittampi na uppannaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:828_9: “Imāya paṭipadāya jarāmaraṇato muccissāmīti paṭipannassa nimitta”nti vutte kathaṃ saṅkocāpatti,
tika-vin01t2:828_14: Pubbe yaṃ vuttaṃ “anubandhanāya phusanāya ṭhapanāya ca manasi karotī”ti,
tika-vin01t2:828_15: tattha anubandhanaṃ phusanañca vissajjetvā ṭhapanāvaseneva bhāvetabbanti āha “ṭhapanāvasena bhāvanā hotī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:829_7: Nimittuppattito paṭṭhāya hi te ākārā amanasikārato antarahitā viya honti.
tika-vin01t2:829_11: Sakaṃ cittaṃ nibandhatīti tāya eva ṭhapanāya attano cittaṃ upanibandhati,
tika-vin01t2:829_17: dhitisampannattā dhīro yogī assāsapassāse nānākāraṃ vibhāvento nānākārato te pajānanto vidite pākaṭe
tika-vin01t2:829_18: karonto nānākāraṃ vā oḷārikoḷārike passambhento vūpasamento tattha yaṃ laddhaṃ nimittaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:829_19: tasmiṃ cittaṃ ṭhapento anukkamena sakaṃ cittaṃ nibandhati appetīti.
tika-vin01t2:830_0: Yadā saddhādīni indriyāni suvisadāni tikkhāni pavattanti,
tika-vin01t2:830_1: tadā assaddhiyādīnaṃ dūrībhāvena sātisayaṃ thāmappattehi sattahi balehi laddhupatthambhāni vitakkādīni
tika-vin01t2:830_3: Tato eva tesaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhūtā kāmacchandādayo saddhiṃ tadekaṭṭhehi pāpadhammehi vidūrī bhavanti paṭibhāganimittuppattiyā saddhiṃ,
tika-vin01t2:830_5: Tena vuttaṃ “nimittupaṭṭhānato pabhuti nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāneva hontī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:830_8: Vikkhambhitāneva sannisinnāvāti avadhāraṇena pana tadatthaṃ ussāho kātabboti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:830_9: Dvīhākārehīti jhānadhammānaṃ paṭipakkhadūrībhāvo thirabhāvappatti cāti imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi.
tika-vin01t2:830_10: Idāni tāni kāraṇāni avatthāmukhena dassetuṃ “upacārabhūmiyaṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:830_12: Yadipi hi tadā jhānaṅgāni paṭutarāni mahaggatabhāvappattāni nuppajjanti,
tika-vin01t2:830_13: tesaṃ pana paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ vikkhambhanena cittaṃ samādhiyati.
tika-vin01t2:830_16: Tadā hi appanāppattānaṃ jhānadhammānaṃ uppattiyā cittaṃ samādhiyati.
tika-vin01t2:831_0: Upacāre aṅgāni na thāmajātāni honti aṅgānaṃ athāmajātattā.
tika-vin01t2:831_1: Yathā nāma daharo kumārako ukkhipitvā ṭhapiyamāno punappunaṃ bhūmiyaṃ patati,
tika-vin01t2:831_2: evameva upacāre uppanne cittaṃ kālena nimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti,
tika-vin01t2:831_4: Tena vuttaṃ “upacārasamādhi kusalavīthiyaṃ javitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otaratī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:831_5: Appanāyaṃ pana aṅgāni thāmajātāni honti tesaṃ thāmajātattā.
tika-vin01t2:831_6: Yathā nāma balavā puriso āsanā vuṭṭhāya divasampi tiṭṭheyya,
tika-vin01t2:831_7: evameva appanāsamādhimhi uppanne cittaṃ sakiṃ bhavaṅgavāraṃ chinditvā kevalampi rattiṃ kevalampi divasaṃ tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin01t2:832_1: Nimitte avinassante tadārammaṇaṃ jhānaṃ aparihīnameva hoti,
tika-vin01t2:832_2: nimitte pana ārakkhābhāvena vinaṭṭhe laddhaṃ laddhaṃ jhānampi vinassati tadāyattavuttito.
tika-vin01t2:837_0: Na cireneva kālena, hoti kassaci appanā”ti. –
tika-vin01t2:838_2: yasmiṃ āvāse vasantassa anuppannaṃ vā nimittaṃ nuppajjati,
tika-vin01t2:838_7: Yattha nimittaṃ uppajjati ceva thāvarañca hoti,
tika-vin01t2:838_11: Tasmā yasmiṃ vihāre bahū āvāsā honti,
tika-vin01t2:838_12: tattha ekamekasmiṃ tīṇi tīṇi divasāni vasitvā yatthassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:839_0: Gocaragāmo pana yo senāsanato uttarena vā dakkhiṇena vā nātidūre diyaḍḍhakosabbhantare hoti sulabhasampannabhikkho,
tika-vin01t2:841_1: yaṃ nissāya asamāhitaṃ vā cittaṃ samādhiyati,
tika-vin01t2:841_5: So hi taṃ kaddamodakamiva acchaṃ udakaṃ malīnameva karoti,
tika-vin01t2:842_4: Tasmā yaṃ bhojanaṃ vā utuṃ vā sevantassa phāsu hoti,
tika-vin01t2:843_2: Tasmā taṃ āvāsaṃ viya tīṇi divasāni upaparikkhitvā yasmiṃ iriyāpathe asamāhitaṃ cittaṃ samādhiyati,
tika-vin01t2:843_6: Iti imaṃ sattavidhaṃ asappāyaṃ vajjetvā sappāyaṃ sevitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:843_7: Evaṃ paṭipannassa hi nimittāsevanabahulassa na cireneva kālena hoti kassaci appanā.
tika-vin01t2:844_0: Yassa pana evampi paṭipajjato na hoti,
tika-vin01t2:844_2: Tattha vitthuvisadakiriyā nāma ajjhattikabāhirānaṃ vatthūnaṃ visadabhāvakaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:844_5: tadā ajjhattikaṃ vatthu avisadaṃ hoti aparisuddhaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:844_6: Yadā panassa cīvaraṃ jiṇṇaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ duggandhaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:844_8: tadā bāhiraṃ vatthu avisadaṃ hoti aparisuddhaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:844_9: Ajjhattikabāhire hi vatthumhi avisade uppannesu cittacetasikesu ñāṇampi aparisuddhaṃ hoti aparisuddhāni
tika-vin01t2:844_11: Aparisuddhena ca ñāṇena saṅkhāre sammasato saṅkhārāpi avibhūtā honti,
tika-vin01t2:844_12: kammaṭṭhānamanuyuñjato kammaṭṭhānampi vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ vepullaṃ na gacchati.
tika-vin01t2:844_13: Visade pana ajjhattikabāhire vatthumhi uppannesu cittacetasikesu ñāṇampi visadaṃ hoti parisuddhāni dīpakapallikavaṭṭitelāni
tika-vin01t2:844_15: Parisuddhena ca ñāṇena saṅkhāre sammasato saṅkhārāpi vibhūtāhonti,
tika-vin01t2:844_16: kammaṭṭhānamanuyuñjato kammaṭṭhānampi vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ vepullaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin01t2:845_7: Tasmā taṃ dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena vā yathā vā manasikaroto balavaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:845_11: atha neva saddhindriyaṃ adhimokkhakiccaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin01t2:845_15: Evaṃ sesesupi ekassa balavabhāve sati itaresaṃ attano kiccesu asamatthatā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:846_0: Visesato panettha saddhāpaññānaṃ samādhivīriyānañca samataṃ pasaṃsanti.
tika-vin01t2:846_6: Balavasamādhiṃ pana mandavīriyaṃ samādhissa kosajjapakkhattā kosajjaṃ abhibhavati,
tika-vin01t2:846_8: Samādhi pana vīriyena saṃyojito kosajje patituṃ na labhati,
tika-vin01t2:846_9: vīriyaṃ samādhinā saṃyojitaṃ uddhacce patituṃ na labhati.
tika-vin01t2:846_14: samādhipaññāsu pana samādhikammikassa ekaggatā balavatī vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:846_20: Sati hi cittaṃ uddhaccapakkhikānaṃ saddhāvīriyapaññānaṃ vasena uddhaccapātato kosajjapakkhena ca samādhinā kosajjapātato rakkhati.
tika-vin01t2:846_22: sabbakammikaamacco viya ca sabbarājakiccesu sabbattha icchitabbā.
tika-vin01t2:847_0: Nimittakusalatā nāma pathavīkasiṇādikassa cittekaggatānimittassa akatassa karaṇakosallaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:848_3: tadā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādayo tayo abhāvetvā passaddhisambojjhaṅgādayo bhāveti.
tika-vin01t2:849_3: so tattha sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya,
tika-vin01t2:849_8: bhabbo nu kho so puriso taṃ mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetunti. No hetaṃ, bhante.
tika-vin01t2:850_12: so tattha allāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya,
tika-vin01t2:850_17: bhabbo nu kho so puriso taṃ mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetunti. Evaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:851_0: Ettha ca yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena passaddhisambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:852_3: tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya,
tika-vin01t2:852_4: uppannassa vā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattati.
tika-vin01t2:852_8: tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya,
tika-vin01t2:852_9: uppannassa vā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattati…pe…
tika-vin01t2:852_13: tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya,
tika-vin01t2:852_14: uppannassa vā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattatī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:853_1: taṃ ākāraṃ sallakkhetvā tesaṃ uppādanavasena pavattamanasikārova tīsu padesupi yonisomanasikāro nāma.
tika-vin01t2:854_0: Apica satta dhammā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti –
tika-vin01t2:856_6: Iti imehi ākārehi ete dhamme uppādento passaddhisambojjhaṅgādayo bhāveti nāma.
tika-vin01t2:857_3: tadā passaddhisambojjhaṅgādayo tayo abhāvetvā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādayo bhāveti.
tika-vin01t2:858_3: so tattha allāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya…pe…
tika-vin01t2:858_5: bhabbo nu kho so puriso taṃ parittaṃ aggiṃ ujjāletunti. No hetaṃ, bhante.
tika-vin01t2:859_12: so tattha sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya…pe…
tika-vin01t2:859_14: bhabbo nu kho so puriso taṃ parittaṃ aggiṃ ujjāletunti. Evaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:860_0: Etthāpi yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:861_2: kusalākusalā dhammā sāvajjānavajjā dhammā hīnappaṇītā dhammā kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgā dhammā,
tika-vin01t2:861_3: tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya,
tika-vin01t2:861_4: uppannassa vā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattati.
tika-vin01t2:861_8: tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya,
tika-vin01t2:861_9: uppannassa vā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattati.
tika-vin01t2:861_13: tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā pītisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya,
tika-vin01t2:861_14: uppannassa vā pītisambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattatī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:862_0: Tattha sabhāvasāmaññalakkhaṇappaṭivedhavasena pavattamanasikāro kusalādīsu yonisomanasikāro nāma.
tika-vin01t2:862_1: Ārambhadhātuādīnaṃ uppādavasena pavattamanasikāro ārambhadhātuādīsu yonisomanasikāro nāma.
tika-vin01t2:862_4: Parakkamadhātūti paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanato tatopi balavataraṃ.
tika-vin01t2:862_5: Pītisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammāti pana pītiyā evetaṃ nāmaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:863_0: Apica satta dhammā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti –
tika-vin01t2:864_4: so ca na sakkā kusītena gantu”nti evaṃ gamanavīthipaccavekkhaṇatā,
tika-vin01t2:864_12: tañca na sakkā kusītena gahetu”nti evaṃ dāyajjamahattapaccavekkhaṇatā,
tika-vin01t2:865_8: Iti imehi ākārehi ete dhamme uppādento dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādayo bhāveti nāma.
tika-vin01t2:866_2: Yadāssa paññāpayogamandatāya vā upasamasukhānadhigamena vā nirassādaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:867_2: Yadāssa evaṃ paṭipajjato alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ anirassādaṃ ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ samathavīthippaṭipannaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:867_3: tadā tassa paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu abyāpāraṃ āpajjati sārathi viya ca samappavattesu assesu.
tika-vin01t2:868_0: Asamāhitapuggalaparivajjanā nāma nekkhammapaṭipadaṃ anāruḷhapubbānaṃ anekakiccappasutānaṃ vikkhittahadayānaṃ puggalānaṃ ārakā pariccāgo.
tika-vin01t2:868_1: Samāhitapuggalasevanā nāma nekkhammapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannānaṃ samādhilābhīnaṃ puggalānaṃ kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:868_6: Tattha yena vidhinā appanāya kusalo hoti,
tika-vin01t2:868_7: so dasavidhopi vidhi appanākosallaṃ tannibbattaṃ vā ñāṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:868_8: evametaṃ dasavidhaṃ appanākosallaṃ sampādentassa paṭiladdhanimittasmiṃ appanā uppajjati.
tika-vin01t2:871_0: Yogo karaṇīyoti appanākosallaṃ sampādentassapi yadi appanā na hoti,
tika-vin01t2:871_1: tena kammaṭṭhānānuyogaṃ avijahitvā reṇuādīsu madhukarādīnaṃ pavatti ākāraṃ sallakkhetvā līnuddhatabhāvehi
tika-vin01t2:871_2: mānasaṃ mocetvā vīriyasamataṃ yojentena punappunaṃ yogo kātabbo.
tika-vin01t2:873_0: Tathāpi na jahe yogaṃ, vāyametheva paṇḍito.
tika-vin01t2:884_0: Yathā hi acheko madhukaro “asukasmiṃ rukkhe pupphaṃ pupphita”nti ñatvā tikkhena vegena pakkhando taṃ
tika-vin01t2:884_2: aparo acheko mandena javena pakkhando khīṇeyeva sampāpuṇāti,
tika-vin01t2:884_3: cheko pana samena javena pakkhando sukhena puppharāsiṃ sampatvā yāvadicchakaṃ reṇuṃ ādāya madhuṃ sampādetvā madhuṃ anubhavati,
tika-vin01t2:884_4: yathā ca sallakattaantevāsikesu udakathālagate uppalapatte satthakammaṃ sikkhantesu eko acheko vegena
tika-vin01t2:884_5: satthaṃ pātento uppalapattaṃ dvidhā vā chindati,
tika-vin01t2:884_7: aparo acheko chijjanapavesanabhayā satthakena phusitumpi na visahati,
tika-vin01t2:884_8: cheko pana samena payogena tattha satthapadaṃ dassetvā pariyodātasippo hutvā tathārūpesu ṭhānesu kammaṃ katvā lābhaṃ labhati,
tika-vin01t2:884_10: so cattāri sahassāni labhatī”ti raññā vutte eko achekapuriso vegena makkaṭakasuttaṃ ākaḍḍhanto tahiṃ tahiṃ chindatiyeva,
tika-vin01t2:884_11: aparo acheko chedanabhayā hatthena phusitumpi na visahati,
tika-vin01t2:884_12: cheko pana koṭito paṭṭhāya samena payogena daṇḍake veṭhetvā āharitvā lābhaṃ labhati,
tika-vin01t2:884_13: yathā ca acheko niyāmako balavavāte laṅkāraṃ pūrento nāvaṃ videsaṃ pakkhandāpeti,
tika-vin01t2:884_14: aparo acheko mandavāte laṅkāraṃ oropento nāvaṃ tattheva ṭhapeti,
tika-vin01t2:884_15: cheko pana mandavāte pūretvā balavavāte aḍḍhalaṅkāraṃ katvā sotthinā icchitaṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin01t2:884_16: yathā ca “yo telena achaḍḍento nāḷiṃ pūreti,
tika-vin01t2:884_17: so lābhaṃ labhatī”ti ācariyena antevāsikānaṃ vutte eko acheko lābhaluddho vegena pūrento telaṃ chaḍḍeti,
tika-vin01t2:884_18: aparo acheko telachaḍḍanabhayā āsiñcitumpi na visahati,
tika-vin01t2:884_19: cheko pana samena payogena pūretvā lābhaṃ labhati,
tika-vin01t2:884_20: evameva eko bhikkhu uppanne nimitte “sīghameva appanaṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti gāḷhaṃ vīriyaṃ karoti,
tika-vin01t2:884_23: Eko accāraddhavīriyatāya dosaṃ disvā “kiṃ dāni me appanāyā”ti vīriyaṃ hāpeti,
tika-vin01t2:884_27: uddhataṃ uddhaccato mocetvā samena payogena nimittābhimukhaṃ pavatteti,
tika-vin01t2:885_0: Idāni evaṃ paṭipannassa appanāpavattiṃ dassento “tassevaṃ anuyuttassā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:885_2: gahitaggahaṇena pana avisesena sabbesaṃ sabbā samaññā.
tika-vin01t2:885_6: ito pubbe parikammānaṃ upari appanāya ca anulomanato “anulomānī”tipi vuccanti.
tika-vin01t2:885_10: parittanti pavattamānaṃ abhidhānaṃ buddhiñca ekaṃsikavisayatāya rakkhatīti parittagottaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:885_11: Yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇabhūtena atthena vinā na vattati,
tika-vin01t2:885_13: tasmā so tāni tāyati rakkhatīti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:885_14: Taṃ pana mahaggatānuttaravidhuraṃ kāmataṇhāya gocarabhūtaṃ kāmāvacaradhammānaṃ āveṇikarūpaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:885_16: Iti evarūpassa parittagottassa abhibhavanato mahaggatagottassa ca bhāvanato uppādanato antimaṃ “gotrabhū”tipi vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:885_17: Catutthameva hi pañcamaṃ vāti khippābhiññadandhābhiññānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:885_20: Kasmā pana catutthaṃ pañcamaṃ vā appeti,
tika-vin01t2:885_21: na chaṭṭhaṃ vā sattamaṃ vāti āha “āsannabhavaṅgapātattā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:885_22: Yathā hi puriso chinnapapātābhimukho dhāvanto ṭhātukāmopi pariyante pādaṃ katvā ṭhātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin01t2:885_24: evaṃ chaṭṭhaṃ vā sattamaṃ vā appetuṃ na sakkoti bhavaṅgassa āsannattā.
tika-vin01t2:886_0: “Purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ āsevanapaccayena paccayo”ti
tika-vin01t2:886_1: vuttattā “āsevanapaccayena kusalā dhammā balavanto hontī”ti āha.
tika-vin01t2:886_2: Yathā aladdhāsevanaṃ paṭhamaṃ javanaṃ dubbalattā gotrabhuṃ na uppādeti,
tika-vin01t2:886_3: laddhāsevanaṃ pana balavabhāvato dutiyaṃ vā tatiyaṃ vā gotrabhuṃ uppādeti,
tika-vin01t2:886_4: evaṃ laddhāsevanatāya balavabhāvato chaṭṭhampi sattamampi appetīti therassa adhippāyo. Tenāha –
tika-vin01t2:886_7: Paṭikkhittanti suttasuttānulomaācariyavādehi anupatthambhitattā “attanomatimattaṃ therasseta”nti vatvā paṭikkhittaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:886_8: “Purimā purimā kusalā dhammā”ti pana suttapadamakāraṇaṃ āsevanapaccayalābhassa balavabhāve anekantikattā.
tika-vin01t2:886_9: Tathā hi aladdhāsevanāpi paṭhamacetanā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyā hoti,
tika-vin01t2:886_13: kathaṃ sattamajavanacetanā upapajjavedanīyā ānantariyā ca hotīti?
tika-vin01t2:886_14: Nāyaṃ viseso āsevanapaccayalābhena balavappattiyā kiñcarahi kiriyāvatthāvisesato.
tika-vin01t2:886_18: “Paṭisandhiyā anantarapaccayabhāvino vipākasantānassa anantarapaccayabhāvena tathā abhisaṅkhatattā”ti ca vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:886_19: tasmā chaṭṭhasattamānaṃ papātābhimukhatāya parikkhīṇajavatā na sakkā nivāretuṃ.
tika-vin01t2:887_5: vasippattanti ettha evaṃ tāva pañca vasiyo veditabbā –
tika-vin01t2:887_6: paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya paṭhamaṃ vitakkaṃ āvajjayato bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā uppannāvajjanānantaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:887_9: tato pana vicārārammaṇaṃ āvajjanaṃ vuttanayeneva javanānīti evaṃ pañcasu jhānaṅgesu yadā nirantaraṃ cittaṃ pesetuṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin01t2:887_11: Ayaṃ pana bhavaṅgadvayantaritā matthakappattā vasī bhagavato yamakapāṭihāriye labbhati,
tika-vin01t2:887_12: aññesaṃ vā dhammasenāpatiādīnaṃ evarūpe uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya lahutaraṃ āvajjanavasīnibbattanakāle.
tika-vin01t2:887_15: Tathā hi taṃ sāvakehi asādhāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:887_16: Ito paraṃ sīghatarā āvajjanavasī nāma natthi.
tika-vin01t2:888_0: Āyasmato pana mahāmoggallānassa nandopanandanāgarājadamane viya sīghaṃ samāpajjanasamatthatā samāpajjanavasī nāma.
tika-vin01t2:888_1: Ettha ca samāpajjitukāmatānantaraṃ dvīsu bhavaṅgesu uppannesu bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā uppannāvajjanānantaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:888_3: Ayañca matthakappattā samāpajjanavasī satthu dhammadesanāyaṃ labbhati,
tika-vin01t2:888_6: tassāyeva kathāya pariyosāne tasmiṃyeva purimasmiṃ samādhinimitte ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapemi sannisādemi ekodiṃ karomi samādahāmi,
tika-vin01t2:888_8: Ito sīghatarā hi samāpajjanavasī nāma natthi.
tika-vin01t2:889_0: Accharāmattaṃ vā dasaccharāmattaṃ vā khaṇaṃ jhānaṃ ṭhapetuṃ samatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasī nāma.
tika-vin01t2:889_1: Tatheva accharāmattaṃ vā dasaccharāmattaṃ vā lahukaṃ khaṇaṃ jhānasamaṅgī hutvā jhānato vuṭṭhātuṃ samatthatā vuṭṭhānavasī nāma.
tika-vin01t2:889_3: Ettha ca yathā “ettakameva khaṇaṃ jhānaṃ ṭhapessāmī”ti pubbaparikammavasena adhiṭṭhānasamatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasī,
tika-vin01t2:889_4: evaṃ “ettakameva khaṇaṃ jhānasamaṅgī hutvā jhānato vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti pubbaparikammavasena vuṭṭhānasamatthatā vuṭṭhānavasīti veditabbā,
tika-vin01t2:890_1: vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetīti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “katha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:890_2: Tattha jhānaṅgāni pariggahetvāti vitakkādīni jhānaṅgāni taṃsampayutte ca dhamme salakkhaṇarasādivasena pariggahetvā.
tika-vin01t2:890_4: jhānaṅgāni pana passanto taṃsampayutte ca dhamme passati.
tika-vin01t2:890_5: Tesaṃ nissayaṃ hadayavatthunti yathā nāma puriso antogehe sappaṃ disvā anubandhamāno tassa āsayaṃ passati,
tika-vin01t2:890_6: evameva kho ayampi yogāvacaro te arūpadhamme upaparikkhanto “ime dhammā kiṃ nissāya pavattantī”ti pariyesamāno tesaṃ nissayaṃ hadayavatthuṃ passati.
tika-vin01t2:890_7: Jhānaṅgāni arūpanti ettha taṃsampayuttadhammānampi gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:891_0: Arūpapubbaṅgamaṃ rūpapariggahaṃ dassetvā idāni rūpapubbaṅgamaṃ arūpapariggahaṃ dassento “atha vā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:891_2: taṃnissitarūpāni ca pariggahetvāti ettha pana kese tāva thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ pathavīdhātūti pariggahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:891_5: vitthambhanalakkhaṇaṃ vāyodhātūti evaṃ sabbakoṭṭhāsesu ekekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse cattāri cattāri mahābhūtāni pariggahetabbāni.
tika-vin01t2:891_6: Athānena yāthāvato sarasalakkhaṇato āvibhūtāsu dhātūsu kammasamuṭṭhānamhi tāva kese vuttalakkhaṇā tā
tika-vin01t2:891_7: catasso ca dhātuyo taṃnissito ca vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā jīvitaṃ kāyapasādoti evaṃ kāyadasakavasena dasa rūpāni,
tika-vin01t2:891_8: tattheva bhāvassa atthitāya bhāvadasakavasena dasa rūpāni,
tika-vin01t2:891_10: utusamuṭṭhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānanti aparānipi catuvīsatīti evaṃ catusamuṭṭhānesu catuvīsatikoṭṭhāsesu catucattālīsa rūpāni pariggahetabbāni.
tika-vin01t2:891_11: Sedo assu kheḷo siṅghāṇikāti ime pana catūsu utucittasamuṭṭhānesu dvinnaṃ ojaṭṭhamakānaṃ vasena soḷasa soḷasa rūpāni.
tika-vin01t2:891_12: Udariyaṃ karīsaṃ pubbaṃ muttanti imesu catūsu utusamuṭṭhānesu utusamuṭṭhānasseva ojaṭṭhamakassa vasena aṭṭha aṭṭha rūpāni pariggahetabbāni.
tika-vin01t2:892_0: Ye pana imasmiṃ dvattiṃsākāre āvibhūte apare cattāro tejokoṭṭhāsā,
tika-vin01t2:892_1: cha vāyokoṭṭhāsāti dasa ākārā āvi bhavanti,
tika-vin01t2:892_2: tattha asitādiparipācake tāva kammajatejokoṭṭhāsamhi ojaṭṭhamakañceva jīvitañcāti nava rūpāni,
tika-vin01t2:892_3: tathā cittaje assāsapassāsakoṭṭhāse ojaṭṭhamakañceva saddo cāti nava,
tika-vin01t2:892_4: sesesu catusamuṭṭhānesu aṭṭhasu jīvitanavakañceva tīṇi ca ojaṭṭhamakānīti tettiṃsa tettiṃsa rūpāni pariggahetabbāni.
tika-vin01t2:892_5: Evaṃ vitthārato dvācattālīsākāravasena imesu bhūtupādāyarūpesu pākaṭesu jātesu vatthudvāravasena pañca
tika-vin01t2:892_6: cakkhudasakādayo hadayavatthudasakañcāti aparānipi saṭṭhi rūpāni pariggahetabbāni.
tika-vin01t2:892_7: Sace panassa tena tena mukhena rūpaṃ pariggahetvā arūpaṃ pariggaṇhato sukhumattā arūpaṃ na upaṭṭhāti,
tika-vin01t2:892_8: tena dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā rūpameva punappunaṃ sammasitabbaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ pariggahetabbaṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:892_9: Yathā yathā hissa rūpaṃ suvikkhālitaṃ hoti nijjaṭaṃ suparisuddhaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:892_10: tathā tathā tadārammaṇā arūpadhammā sayameva pākaṭā honti.
tika-vin01t2:893_0: Yathā hi cakkhumato purisassa aparisuddhe ādāse mukhanimittaṃ olokentassa nimittaṃ na paññāyatīti na ādāsaṃ chaḍḍeti,
tika-vin01t2:893_2: tassa parisuddhe ādāse nimittaṃ sayameva pākaṭaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:893_3: evameva tena bhikkhunā dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā rūpameva punappunaṃ sammasitabbaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ pariggahetabbaṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:893_4: Yathā yathā hissa rūpaṃ suvikkhālitaṃ hoti nijjaṭaṃ suparisuddhaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:893_5: tathā tathā tadārammaṇā arūpadhammā sayameva pākaṭā honti.
tika-vin01t2:893_6: Evaṃ suvisuddharūpapariggahassa panassa arūpadhammā tīhākārehi upaṭṭhahanti phassavasena vā vedanāvasena vā viññāṇavasena vā.
tika-vin01t2:894_2: assāsapassāse pathavīdhātu kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā”tiādinā nayena dhātuyo pariggaṇhantassa paṭhamābhinipāto phasso,
tika-vin01t2:894_11: taṃsampayutto phasso ca cetanā ca saṅkhārakkhandho,
tika-vin01t2:894_18: phasso ca cetanā ca saṅkhārakkhandhoti upaṭṭhāti.
tika-vin01t2:894_20: Etenevupāyena “kammasamuṭṭhāne kese pathavīdhātu kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā”tiādinā nayena dvācattālīsāya dhātukoṭṭhāsesu
tika-vin01t2:894_21: catunnaṃ catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ vasena sesesupi vatthu cakkhādīsu dasakesu manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ nissayalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:894_22: hadayavatthu rūpābhighātārahabhūtappasādalakkhaṇaṃ cakkhūtiādinā vatthudvāravasena pariggaṇhantassa paṭhamābhinipāto phasso,
tika-vin01t2:894_23: taṃsampayuttā vedanā vedanākkhandhotiādinā phassādivasena tīhi ākārehi arūpadhammā upaṭṭhahanti.
tika-vin01t2:894_24: Tena vuttaṃ “yathāpariggahitarūpārammaṇaṃ yathāpariggahitarūpavatthudvārārammaṇaṃ vā sasampayuttadhammaṃ viññāṇañca passatī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:895_0: Idāni aññathāpi rūpapubbaṅgamaṃ arūpapariggahaṃ dassento “atha vā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:895_1: Tattha yathā hītiādi kāyassa cittassa ca assāsapassāsānaṃ samudayabhāvadassanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:895_9: karajakāyaṃ pana vinā tesaṃ appavattanato “kāyañca cittañca paṭicca assāsapassāsā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:896_1: Paccayaṃ pariyesatīti “avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayo”tiādinā avijjādikaṃ paccayaṃ pariyesati vīmaṃsati pariggaṇhāti.
tika-vin01t2:896_2: Kaṅkhaṃ vitaratīti “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhāna”ntiādinayappavattaṃ soḷasavatthukaṃ vicikicchaṃ atikkamati pajahati.
tika-vin01t2:896_5: Obhāsādayoti obhāso ñāṇaṃ pīti passaddhi sukhaṃ adhimokkho paggaho upekkhā upaṭṭhānaṃ nikantīti ime obhāsādayo dasa.
tika-vin01t2:897_1: so ca vipassanācittasamuṭṭhitaṃ santatipatitaṃ utusamuṭṭhānañca pabhassararūpaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:897_2: Tattha vipassanācittasamuṭṭhitaṃ yogino sarīraṭṭhameva pabhassaraṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati cittajarūpānaṃ sarīraṃ muñcitvā bahi appavattanato,
tika-vin01t2:897_3: itaraṃ sarīraṃ muñcitvā ñāṇānubhāvānurūpaṃ samantato pattharati,
tika-vin01t2:897_8: Dibbacakkhulābhino viya taṃ manoviññāṇaviññeyyamevāti vattuṃ yuttaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin01t2:897_9: So kho panāyaṃ obhāso kassaci bhikkhuno pallaṅkaṭṭhānamattameva obhāsento uppajjati,
tika-vin01t2:897_16: kassaci pathavītalato yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā ekālokaṃ kurumāno.
tika-vin01t2:897_18: Tasmiṃ pana uppanne yogāvacaro “na vata me ito pubbe evarūpo obhāso uppannapubbo,
tika-vin01t2:897_21: Tassa amaggaṃ “maggo”ti aphalaṃ vā “phala”nti gaṇhato vipassanāvīthi ukkantā nāma hoti.
tika-vin01t2:897_22: So attano mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā obhāsameva assādento nisīdati.
tika-vin01t2:898_1: Tassa kira rūpārūpadhamme tulayantassa tīrayantassa vissaṭṭhaindavajiramiva avihatavegaṃ tikhiṇaṃ sūraṃ ativisadaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajjati.
tika-vin01t2:899_1: Tassa kira tasmiṃ samaye khuddikā pīti khaṇikā pīti okkantikā pīti ubbegā pīti pharaṇā pītīti ayaṃ pañcavidhā pīti sakalasarīraṃ pūrayamānā uppajjati.
tika-vin01t2:900_1: Tassa kira tasmiṃ samaye rattiṭṭhāne vā divāṭṭhāne vā nisinnassa kāyacittānaṃ neva daratho,
tika-vin01t2:900_7: atha kho panassa kāyacittāni passaddhāni lahūni mudūni kammaññāni suvisadāni ujukāniyeva honti.
tika-vin01t2:900_8: So imehi passaddhādīhi anuggahitakāyacitto tasmiṃ samaye amānusiṃ nāma ratiṃ anubhavati.
tika-vin01t2:902_0: Amānusī ratī hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato.
tika-vin01t2:905_0: Evamassa imaṃ amānusiṃ ratiṃ sādhayamānā lahutādisampayuttā passaddhi uppajjati.
