tika-vin01t2:906_1: Tassa kira tasmiṃ samaye sakalasarīraṃ abhisandayamānaṃ atipaṇītaṃ sukhamuppajjati.
tika-vin01t2:907_1: Vipassanāsampayuttāyeva hissa cittacetasikānaṃ atisayappasādabhūtā balavatī saddhā uppajjati.
tika-vin01t2:908_1: Vipassanāsampayuttameva hissa asithilamanaccāraddhaṃ supaggahitaṃ vīriyaṃ uppajjati.
tika-vin01t2:909_1: Vipassanāsampayuttāyeva hissa sūpaṭṭhitā suppatiṭṭhitā nikhātā acalā pabbatarājasadisā sati uppajjati.
tika-vin01t2:909_2: So yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ āvajjati samannāharati manasi karoti paccavekkhati,
tika-vin01t2:909_3: taṃ taṃ ṭhānamassa okkantitvā pakkhanditvā dibbacakkhuno paraloko viya satiyā upaṭṭhāti.
tika-vin01t2:910_1: Tasmiñhissa samaye sabbasaṅkhāresu majjhattabhūtā vipassanupekkhā balavatī uppajjati,
tika-vin01t2:910_3: Sā hissa taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ āvajjentassa vissaṭṭhaindavajiramiva pattapuṭe pakkhandatattanārāco viya ca sūrā tikhiṇā hutvā vahati.
tika-vin01t2:911_1: Evaṃ obhāsādipaṭimaṇḍitāya hissa vipassanāya ālayaṃ kurumānā sukhumā santākārā nikanti uppajjati,
tika-vin01t2:912_1: evaṃ etesupi aññatarasmiṃ uppanne yogāvacaro “na vata me ito pubbe evarūpaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppannapubbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:912_7: addhā maggappattosmi phalappattosmī”ti amaggameva “maggo”ti aphalameva ca “phala”nti gaṇhāti,
tika-vin01t2:912_8: tassa amaggaṃ “maggo”ti aphalaṃ “phala”nti gaṇhato vipassanāvīthi ukkantā nāma hoti.
tika-vin01t2:912_9: So attano mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā nikantimeva assādento nisīdati.
tika-vin01t2:913_2: nikanti pana upakkileso ceva upakkilesavatthu ca.
tika-vin01t2:913_5: “Mama obhāso uppanno”ti gaṇhato hi diṭṭhiggāho hoti,
tika-vin01t2:913_9: Tathā sesesupīti evaṃ gāhavasena samatiṃsa upakkilesā honti.
tika-vin01t2:913_10: Tesaṃ vasena akusalo abyatto yogāvacaro obhāsādīsu kampati vikkhipati,
tika-vin01t2:914_0: “Obhāse ceva ñāṇe ca, pītiyā ca vikampati;
tika-vin01t2:915_0: Passaddhiyā sukhe ceva, yehi cittaṃ pavedhati.
tika-vin01t2:918_0: Kusalo paṇḍito byatto buddhisampanno yogāvacaro obhāsādīsu uppannesu “ayaṃ kho me obhāso uppanno,
tika-vin01t2:918_1: so kho panāyaṃ anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno khayadhammo vayadhammo virāgadhammo nirodhadhammo”ti iti vā taṃ paññāya paricchindati upaparikkhati.
tika-vin01t2:918_17: Evaṃ samanupassanto obhāsādīsu na kampati na vedhati.
tika-vin01t2:920_0: Dhammuddhaccakusalo hoti, na ca vikkhepa gacchatī”ti. ;
tika-vin01t2:921_0: So evaṃ vikkhepaṃ agacchanto taṃ samatiṃsavidhaṃ upakkilesajaṭaṃ vijaṭetvā “obhāsādayo dhammā na maggo,
tika-vin01t2:921_1: upakkilesavimuttaṃ pana vīthippaṭipannaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ maggo”ti amaggaṃ maggañca vavatthapeti.
tika-vin01t2:921_2: Yaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ “obhāsādayo dasa vipassanupakkilese pahāya upakkilesavimuttaṃ paṭipadāñāṇaṃ maggoti vavatthapetvā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:921_3: Udayaṃ pahāyāti udayabbayānupassanāya gahitaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ udayaṃ vissajjetvā tesaṃ bhaṅgasseva anupassanato
tika-vin01t2:921_5: ciṇṇapariyante uppannagotrabhuñāṇānantaraṃ uppannena maggañāṇena sabbasaṅkhāresu virajjanto vimuccanto.
tika-vin01t2:921_6: Maggakkhaṇe hi ariyo virajjati vimuccatīti ca vuccati. Tenāha –
tika-vin01t2:922_0: Visuṃ kammaṭṭhānabhāvanānayo nāma natthīti paṭhamacatukkavasena adhigatajjhānassa vedanācittadhammānupassanāvasena desitattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:922_2: Pītippaṭisaṃvedīti pītiyā paṭi paṭi sammadeva vedanasīlo,
tika-vin01t2:922_3: tassā vā paṭi paṭi sammadeva vedo etassa atthi,
tika-vin01t2:922_4: taṃ vā paṭi paṭi sammadeva vedayamāno.
tika-vin01t2:922_5: Tattha kāmaṃ saṃvedanaggahaṇeneva pītiyā sakkaccaṃ viditabhāvo bodhito hoti,
tika-vin01t2:922_6: yehi pana pakārehi tassā saṃvedanaṃ icchitaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:923_0: Tattha kathaṃ ārammaṇato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti pucchāvacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:923_1: Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjatī”ti pītisahagatāni dve paṭhamadutiyajjhānāni paṭipāṭiyā samāpajjati.
tika-vin01t2:923_3: “Paṭisaṃviditā”ti hi padaṃ apekkhitvā kattuatthe etaṃ sāmivacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:923_7: tadārammaṇajjhānapariyāpannā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti ārammaṇassa paṭisaṃviditattā.
tika-vin01t2:923_9: Yathā nāma sappapariyesanaṃ carantena tassa āsaye paṭisaṃvidite sopi paṭisaṃvidito eva hoti mantāgadabalena tassa gahaṇassa sukarattā,
tika-vin01t2:923_10: evaṃ pītiyā āsayabhūte ārammaṇe paṭisaṃvidite sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā eva hoti salakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato ca tassā gahaṇassa sukarattāti.
tika-vin01t2:924_0: Kathaṃ asammohato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:924_2: Lakkhaṇapaṭivedhenāti pītiyā salakkhaṇassa sāmaññalakkhaṇassa ca paṭivijjhanena.
tika-vin01t2:924_3: Yañhi yassa visesato sāmaññato ca lakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:924_4: tasmiṃ vidite so yāthāvato vidito eva hoti. Tenāha –
tika-vin01t2:925_7: dīghaṃassāsavasenāti dīghassa assāsassa ārammaṇabhūtassa vasena pajānato sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti sambandho.
tika-vin01t2:925_8: Cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānatoti jhānapariyāpannaṃ avikkhepoti laddhanāmaṃ cittassekaggataṃ taṃsampayuttāya paññāya pajānato.
tika-vin01t2:925_9: Yatheva hi ārammaṇamukhena pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti,
tika-vin01t2:925_10: evaṃ taṃsampayuttadhammāpi ārammaṇamukhena paṭisaṃviditā eva hontīti.
tika-vin01t2:925_11: Sati upaṭṭhitā hotīti dīghaṃassāsavasena jhānasampayuttā sati tassa ārammaṇe upaṭṭhitā ārammaṇamukhena jhānepi upaṭṭhitā nāma hoti.
tika-vin01t2:925_12: Tāya satiyāti evaṃ upaṭṭhitāya tāya satiyā yathāvuttena tena ñāṇena suppaṭividitattā ārammaṇassa tassa vasena tadārammaṇā sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti.
tika-vin01t2:926_0: Evaṃ paṭhamacatukkavasena dassitaṃ pītippaṭisaṃvedanaṃ ārammaṇato asammohato ca vibhāgaso dassetuṃ “āvajjato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:926_4: Tassa sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti sambandho.
tika-vin01t2:926_5: Passatoti dassanabhūtena ñāṇena jhānato vuṭṭhāya passantassa.
tika-vin01t2:926_7: Cittaṃ adhiṭṭhahatoti “ettakaṃ velaṃ jhānasamaṅgī bhavissāmī”ti jhānacittaṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa.
tika-vin01t2:926_8: Evaṃ pañcannaṃ vasībhāvānaṃ vasena jhānassa pajānanamukhena ārammaṇato pītiyā paṭisaṃvedanā dassitā.
tika-vin01t2:927_0: Idāni yehi dhammehi jhānaṃ vipassanā ca sijjhanti,
tika-vin01t2:927_1: tesaṃ jhānapariyāpannānaṃ vipassanāmaggapariyāpannānañca saddhādīnaṃ vasena pītippaṭisaṃvedanaṃ dassetuṃ “saddhāya adhimuccato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:927_7: Pariññeyyanti dukkhasaccaṃ tīraṇapariññāya maggapaññāya ca parijānato.
tika-vin01t2:927_8: Pahātabbanti samudayasaccaṃ pahānapariññāya maggapaññāya ca pajahato.
tika-vin01t2:927_11: Keci panettha pītiyā eva vasena abhiññeyyādīni uddharanti,
tika-vin01t2:927_12: taṃ ayuttaṃ jhānādisamudāyaṃ uddharitvā tato pītiyā niddhāraṇassa adhippetattā.
tika-vin01t2:928_0: Ettha ca “dīghaṃassāsavasenā”tiādinā paṭhamacatukkavasena ārammaṇato pītippaṭisaṃvedanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:928_3: “saddhāya adhimuccato”tiādīhi ubhayathāpi saṅkhepato samathavasena ārammaṇato vipassanāvasena asammohato pītippaṭisaṃvedanaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:928_4: Kasmā panettha vedanānupassanāyaṃ pītisīsena vedanā gahitā,
tika-vin01t2:928_6: Bhūmivibhāgādivasena vedanaṃ bhinditvā catudhā vedanānupassanaṃ dassetuṃ.
tika-vin01t2:928_7: Apica vedanākammaṭṭhānaṃ dassento bhagavā pītiyā oḷārikattā taṃsampayuttasukhaṃ sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ pītisīsena dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:929_0: Eteneva nayena avasesapadānīti sukhappaṭisaṃvedī cittasaṅkhārappaṭisaṃvedīti padāni pītippaṭisaṃvedī-
tika-vin01t2:929_3: cittasaṅkhārappaṭisaṃviditā hoti ārammaṇato”tiādinā pītiṭṭhāne sukhādipadāni pakkhipitvā “sukhasahagatāni
tika-vin01t2:929_4: tīṇi jhānāni cattāri vā jhānāni samāpajjatī”tiādinā atthaṃ viññātuṃ.
tika-vin01t2:929_12: “Imassa hi bhikkhuno apariggahitakāle”tiādinā vitthārato kāyasaṅkhāre vutto,
tika-vin01t2:930_0: Evaṃ cittasaṅkhārassa passambhanaṃ atidesena dassetvā yadaññaṃ imasmiṃ catukke vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:930_3: Pītisīsena vedanā vuttāti pītiapadesena taṃsampayuttā vedanā vuttā,
tika-vin01t2:930_6: Dvīsu cittasaṅkhārapadesūti “cittasaṅkhārappaṭisaṃvedī passambhayaṃ cittasaṅkhāra”nti cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃyuttesu dvīsu padesu.
tika-vin01t2:930_8: Tato eva kāmaṃ cittena saṅkharīyantīti cittasaṅkhārā,
tika-vin01t2:931_0: Cittappaṭisaṃvedīti ettha dvīhākārehi cittapaṭisaṃviditā hoti ārammaṇato asammohato ca.
tika-vin01t2:931_3: tassa samāpattikkhaṇe jhānapaṭilābhenātiādinā vuttanayānusārena sabbaṃ suviññeyyanti āha –
tika-vin01t2:931_5: Cittaṃ modentoti jhānasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ sampayuttāya pītiyā modayamāno,
tika-vin01t2:931_6: taṃ vā pītiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattaṃ vipassanācittaṃ tāya eva ārammaṇabhūtāya pītiyāmodayamāno.
tika-vin01t2:932_0: Sampayuttāya pītiyā cittaṃ āmodetīti jhānacittasampayuttāya pītisambojjhaṅgabhūtāya odagyalakkhaṇāya
tika-vin01t2:932_1: jhānapītiyā tameva jhānacittaṃ sahajātādipaccayavasena ceva jhānapaccayavasena ca paribrūhento haṭṭhappahaṭṭhākāraṃ
tika-vin01t2:932_3: Ārammaṇaṃ katvāti uḷāraṃ jhānasampayuttaṃ pītiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānaṃ vipassanācittaṃ tāya eva
tika-vin01t2:932_4: ārammaṇabhūtāya pītiyā yogāvacaro haṭṭhappahaṭṭhākāraṃ pāpento “āmodeti pamodetī”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:933_0: Samaṃ ṭhapentoti yathā īsakampi līnapakkhaṃ uddhaccapakkhañca anupaggamma anonataṃ anunnataṃ yathā indriyānaṃ samattapaṭipattiyā avisamaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:933_1: samādhissa vā ukkaṃsagamanena āneñjappattiyā sammadeva ṭhitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:933_3: Lakkhaṇappaṭivedhenāti aniccādikassa lakkhaṇassa paṭi paṭi vijjhanena khaṇe khaṇe avabodhena.
tika-vin01t2:933_5: Sopi hi ārammaṇe nirantaraṃ ekākārena pavattamāno paṭipakkhena anabhibhūto appito viya cittaṃ niccalaṃ ṭhapeti.
tika-vin01t2:934_3: Bhaṅgo hi nāma aniccatāya paramā koṭi,
tika-vin01t2:934_4: tasmā tāya bhaṅgānupassako yogāvacaro cittamukhena sabbaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ aniccato passati,
tika-vin01t2:934_6: aniccassa dukkhattā dukkhassa ca anattattā tadeva dukkhato anupassati,
tika-vin01t2:934_10: Yasmā pana yaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā,
tika-vin01t2:934_14: tasmā bhaṅgadassanānusārena “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā”ti saṅkhāragate diṭṭhe tasmiṃ nibbindati,
tika-vin01t2:934_18: so evaṃ nibbindanto virajjanto lokiyeneva tāva ñāṇena rāgaṃ nirodheti no samudeti,
tika-vin01t2:934_20: Atha vā so evaṃ viratto yathā diṭṭhaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ,
tika-vin01t2:934_21: taṃ tathā diṭṭhaṃ attano ñāṇena nirodheti no samudeti,
tika-vin01t2:934_26: Ayañhi aniccādianupassanā saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilesānaṃ pariccajanato saṅkhatadosadassanena
tika-vin01t2:934_27: tabbiparīte nibbāne tanninnatāya pakkhandanato ca pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo
tika-vin01t2:934_29: Tasmā tāya samannāgato yogāvacaro vuttanayena kilese ca pariccajati,
tika-vin01t2:934_31: Tena vuttaṃ “so vipassanākkhaṇe aniccānupassanāya niccasaññāto cittaṃ mocento vimocento…pe…
tika-vin01t2:934_32: paṭinissaggānupassanāya ādānato cittaṃ mocento vimocento assasati ceva passasati cā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:935_2: Tebhūmakadhammānaṃ aniccataṃ gahetvā pavattāya vipassanāya etaṃ nāmaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:935_11: Yathā saṅkhārā nirujjhantiyeva āyatiṃ punabbhavavasena nuppajjanti,
tika-vin01t2:936_1: aniccassa vā anupassanasīlo aniccānupassīti ettha kiṃ pana taṃ aniccaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:936_4: kassa vā aniccānupassanāti catukkaṃ vibhāvetabbanti taṃ dassento “aniccaṃ veditabba”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:936_5: Tattha niccaṃ nāma dhuvaṃ sassataṃ yathā taṃ nibbānaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:936_8: atthato saṅkhatā dhammāti āha aniccanti pañcakkhandhā. Kasmā?
tika-vin01t2:936_11: Tattha saṅkhatadhammānaṃ hetupaccayehi uppajjanaṃ ahutvā sambhavo attalābho uppādo,
tika-vin01t2:936_14: Yathā hi uppādāvatthāya bhinnāya bhaṅgāvatthāyaṃ vatthubhedo natthi,
tika-vin01t2:936_19: Ekaṃsena ca uppādabhaṅgāvatthāsu vatthuno abhedo icchitabbo,
tika-vin01t2:937_1: tasmiṃ lakkhaṇattaye aniccatā samaññāti “aniccatāti tesaṃyeva uppādavayaññathatta”nti vatvā visesato
tika-vin01t2:937_2: dhammānaṃ khaṇikanirodhe aniccatāvohāroti dassento “hutvā abhāvo vā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:938_4: Accantamettha etasmiṃ adhigate saṅkhārā virajjanti nirujjhantīti accantavirāgo, nibbānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:938_13: Eseva nayoti iminā yasmā virāgānupassīpade vuttanayānusārena “dve nirodhā khayanirodho ca accantanirodho cā”ti evamādiatthavaṇṇanaṃ atidissati,
tika-vin01t2:938_14: tasmā virāgaṭṭhāne nirodhapadaṃ pakkhipitvā “khayo saṅkhārānaṃ vināso”tiādinā idha vuttanayena tassa atthavaṇṇanā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:939_0: Paṭinissajjanaṃ pahātabbassa tadaṅgavasena vā samucchedavasena vā pariccajanaṃ pariccāgapaṭinissaggo.
tika-vin01t2:939_1: Tathā sabbupadhīnaṃ paṭinissaggabhūte visaṅkhāre attano nissajjanaṃ tanninnatāya vā tadārammaṇatāya vā tattha pakkhandanaṃ pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo.
tika-vin01t2:939_2: Tadaṅgavasenāti ettha aniccānupassanā tāva tadaṅgappahānavasena niccasaññaṃ pariccajati,
tika-vin01t2:939_3: pariccajantī ca tassā tathā appavattiyaṃ ye “nicca”nti gahaṇavasena kilesā tammūlakā ca abhisaṅkhārā
tika-vin01t2:939_7: “vipassanā hi tadaṅgavasena saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilese pariccajatī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:939_12: Saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilese pariccajatīti maggena kilesesu pariccattesu avipākadhammatāpādanena
tika-vin01t2:939_13: abhisaṅkhārā tammūlakā ca khandhā anuppattirahabhāvena pariccattā nāma hontīti sabbepi te maggo pariccajatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:939_15: Maggañāṇampi hi gotrabhuñāṇassa anu pacchā nibbānadassanato anupassanāti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:940_2: Evaṃ catunnaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena soḷasavatthukāya ānāpānassatiyā bhāvanā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:940_3: Evaṃ soḷasavatthuvasena ca ayaṃ ānāpānassati bhāvitā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsāti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:940_8: Ayañhi santapaṇītaasecanakasukhavihārattā samādhiantarāyakarānaṃ vitakkānaṃ vasena ito cito ca cittassa
tika-vin01t2:941_3: cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti,
tika-vin01t2:941_4: satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiṃ paripūrentī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:942_0: Apica carimakānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ viditabhāvakaraṇatopissā mahānisaṃsatā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:943_1: ānāpānassatiyā evaṃ bahulīkatāya yepi te carimakā assāsapassāsā,
tika-vin01t2:944_0: Tattha nirodhavasena tayo carimakā bhavacarimakā jhānacarimakā cuticarimakāti.
tika-vin01t2:944_7: Ye pana cuticittassa purato soḷasamena cittena saddhiṃ uppajjitvā cuticittena saha nirujjhanti,
tika-vin01t2:945_0: Ime kira imaṃ kammaṭṭhānamanuyuttassa bhikkhuno pākaṭā honti ānāpānārammaṇassa suṭṭhu pariggahitattā.
tika-vin01t2:945_1: Cuticittassa hi purato soḷasamacittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppādaṃ āvajjayato uppādopi nesaṃ pākaṭo hoti,
tika-vin01t2:945_2: ṭhitiṃ āvajjayato ṭhitipi nesaṃ pākaṭā hoti,
tika-vin01t2:945_3: bhaṅgaṃ āvajjayato bhaṅgopi nesaṃ pākaṭo hoti.
tika-vin01t2:945_4: Ito aññaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā arahattappattassa bhikkhuno hi āyuantaraṃ paricchinnaṃ vā hoti aparicchinnaṃ vā,
tika-vin01t2:945_5: imaṃ pana soḷasavatthukaṃ ānāpānassatiṃ bhāvetvā arahattappattassa āyuantaraṃ paricchinnameva hoti.
tika-vin01t2:945_7: na ito para”nti ñatvā attano dhammatāya eva sarīrapaṭijaggananivāsanapārupanādīni sabbakiccāni katvā
tika-vin01t2:946_1: dvebhātikattherānaṃ kireko puṇṇamuposathadivase pātimokkhaṃ osāretvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:946_2: gantvā caṅkame ṭhito juṇhapakkhe padosavelāyaṃ candālokena samantato āsiñcamānakhīradhāraṃ viya gaganatalaṃ
tika-vin01t2:946_3: rajatapaṭṭasadisaṃ vālikāsanthatañca bhūmibhāgaṃ disvā “ramaṇīyo vatāyaṃ kālo,
tika-vin01t2:946_5: kīva ciraṃ nu kho ayaṃ dukkhabhāro vahitabbo”ti attano āyusaṅkhāre upadhāretvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ āha –
tika-vin01t2:946_12: Tato caṅkame tiriyaṃ lekhaṃ katvā “ahaṃ ito caṅkamakoṭito parakoṭiṃ gantvā nivattamāno imaṃ lekhaṃ patvā
tika-vin01t2:946_13: parinibbāyissāmī”ti vatvā caṅkamaṃ oruyha parabhāgaṃ gantvā nivattamāno ekena pādena lekhaṃ akkantakkhaṇeyeva
tika-vin01t2:949_1: Yadipi ariyā neva attanāva attānaṃ jīvitā voropesuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:949_4: tathāpi yathāvuttehi tīhi pakārehi matānaṃ antare ariyānampi sabbhāvato “ariyapuggalamissakattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:949_5: Na hi ariyā pāṇātipātaṃ kariṃsu na samādapesuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:949_7: Atha vā puthujjanakāle attanāva attānaṃ ghātetvā maraṇasamaye vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ariyamaggaṃ paṭilabhitvā
tika-vin01t2:949_8: matānampi ariyānaṃ sabbhāvato imināva nayena attanāva attānaṃ jīvitā voropanassa ariyānampi sabbhāvato
tika-vin01t2:949_12: bhikkhū attanāpi attānaṃ jīvitā voropessantī”ti ettha “moghapurisā”ti avatvā “te bhikkhū”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:951_1: Itthīsu paṭibaddhacittatā nāma chandarāgena sārattatā sāpekkhabhāvoti āha “sārattā apekkhavanto”ti.
tika-vin01t2:951_2: Maraṇassa guṇakittanaṃ jīvite ādīnavadassanapubbaṅgamanti āha “jīvite ādīnavaṃ dassetvā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:951_3: “Kiṃ tuyhiminā pāpakena dujjīvitenā”ti idaṃ jīvite ādīnavadassanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:951_4: “Mataṃ te jīvitā seyyo”tiādi pana maraṇaguṇakittananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:951_5: Lobhādīnaṃ ativiya ussannattā anupaparikkhitvā kataṃ sāhasikakammaṃ kibbisanti vuccatīti āha –
tika-vin01t2:951_7: Kasmā idaṃ vuccatīti chabbaggiyānaṃyevedaṃ vacanaṃ. Mata-
tika-vin01t2:953_3: Sañciccāti imassa padassa “jānitvā sañjānitvā cecca abhivitaritvā”ti evaṃ pubbakālakiriyāvasena byañjanānurūpaṃ
tika-vin01t2:953_4: katvā padabhājane vattabbe tathā avatvā “jānanto sañjānanto”ti puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā “cecca abhivitaritvā
tika-vin01t2:953_5: vītikkamo”ti jīvitā voropanassa ca tadatthavasena niddiṭṭhattā vuttaṃ “byañjane ādaraṃ akatvā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:953_6: “Jānanto”ti avisesena vuttepi “sañcicca manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropeyyā”ti vuttattā pāṇavisayamettha jānananti āha “pāṇoti jānanto”ti,
tika-vin01t2:953_10: “Manussaviggahoti jānanto”ti avatvā “pāṇoti jānanto”ti vacanaṃ “manusso aya”nti ajānitvā kevalaṃ sattasaññāya
tika-vin01t2:953_12: Teneva eḷakacatukke eḷakasaññāya manussapāṇaṃ vadhantassa pārājikāpatti dassitā.
tika-vin01t2:954_4: teneva pāṇajānanākārena saddhiṃ jīvitā voropemīti jānantoti attho.
tika-vin01t2:954_5: Yadipi ekasseva cittassa ubhayārammaṇabhāvāsambhavato pāṇoti jānanena saddhiṃ jīvitā voropemīti jānanaṃ ekakkhaṇe na sambhavati,
tika-vin01t2:954_6: pāṇotisaññaṃ pana avijahitvā māremīti jānanaṃ sandhāya “teneva…pe…
tika-vin01t2:954_9: Keci pana “ñātapariññāya diṭṭhasabhāvesu dhammesu tīraṇapariññāya tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā ‘rūpaṃ anicca’ntiādinā
tika-vin01t2:954_10: sabhāvena saddhiṃ ekakkhaṇe aniccādilakkhaṇajānanaṃ viya ‘imaṃ pāṇaṃ māremī’ti attano kiriyāya saddhiṃyeva
tika-vin01t2:954_12: Apare pana ācariyā tatthāpi evaṃ na kathenti.
tika-vin01t2:955_6: Kiñcāpi “sañciccā”ti imassa vippakatavacanattā “jīvitā voropeyyā”ti imināva aparakālakiriyāvacanena sabbathā pariniṭṭhitavītikkamo vutto,
tika-vin01t2:955_7: tathāpi “sañciccā”ti iminā vuccamānaṃ apariyositavītikkamampi avasānaṃ pāpetvā dassetuṃ “vītikkamo”ti padabhājanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:955_8: Tenevāha “ayaṃ sañciccasaddassa sikhāppatto atthoti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:956_0: Ādito paṭṭhāyāti paṭisandhiviññāṇena saddhiṃ uppannakalalarūpato paṭṭhāya.
tika-vin01t2:956_4: Tesaṃ gabbhaseyyakānaṃ vasena sabbasukhumattabhāvadassanatthaṃ “yaṃ mātukucchismi”ntiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:956_7: Na cevimaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropetuṃ sakkā.
tika-vin01t2:956_8: Paṭisandhicittena hi saddhiṃ tiṃsa kammajarūpāni nibbattanti,
tika-vin01t2:956_9: tesu pana ṭhitesuyeva soḷasa bhavaṅgacittāni uppajjitvā nirujjhanti.
tika-vin01t2:956_10: Etasmiṃ antare gahitapaṭisandhikassa dārakassa vā mātuyā vā panassa antarāyo natthi.
tika-vin01t2:956_12: Ekasmiñhi soḷasacittakkhaṇe kāle dārakassa maraṇaṃ natthi tadā cuticittassa asambhavato,
tika-vin01t2:956_13: mātuyāpi tattakaṃ kālaṃ anatikkamitvā tadanantareyeva cavanadhammāya gabbhaggahaṇasseva asambhavato.
tika-vin01t2:956_14: Cittaggahaṇeneva avinābhāvato sesaarūpadhammānampi gahitattā rūpakāyupatthambhitasseva ca nāmakāyassa
tika-vin01t2:956_15: pañcavokāre pavattisabbhāvato vuttaṃ “sakalāpi pañcavokārapaṭisandhi dassitā hotī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:956_16: Tattha sakalāpi pañcavokārapaṭisandhīti paripuṇṇā anūnā rūpādipañcakkhandhānaṃ paṭisandhīti evamattho gahetabbo,
tika-vin01t2:956_22: Sukhumajātilomā eva kira keci eḷakā himavante vijjanti.
tika-vin01t2:957_1: Tathā hi “gabbhaseyyakasattānaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe pañcakkhandhā apacchā apure ekato pātubhavanti.
tika-vin01t2:957_2: Tasmiṃ khaṇe pātubhūtā kalalasaṅkhātā rūpasantati parittā hoti khuddakamakkhikāya ekavāyāmena pātabbamattā”ti vatvā puna “atibahuṃ etaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:957_3: saṇhasūciyā tele pakkhipitvā ukkhittāya paggharitvā agge ṭhitabindumatta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:957_4: Tampi paṭikkhipitvā “ekakese telato uddharitvā gahite tassa paggharitvā agge ṭhitabindumatta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:957_5: Tampi paṭikkhipitvā “imasmiṃ janapade manussānaṃ kese aṭṭhadhā phālite tato ekakoṭṭhāsappamāṇo uttarakurukānaṃ keso,
tika-vin01t2:957_6: tassa pasannatilatelato uddhaṭassa agge ṭhitabindumatta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:957_8: tassā ekaaṃsuno pasannatilatele pakkhipitvā uddhaṭassa paggharitvā agge ṭhitabindumatta”nti khuddakabhāṇakehi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:957_9: Saṃyuttabhāṇakā pana “tīhi jātiuṇṇaṃsūhi katasuttagge saṇṭhitatelabinduppamāṇaṃ kalalaṃ hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:958_7: Evaṃvidho vaṇṇappaṭibhāgo rūpato saṇṭhānato ca sadisatāpatti etassāti evaṃvaṇṇappaṭibhāgaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:958_8: Kalalanti pavuccatīti bhūtupādārūpasaṅkhāto santānavasena pavattamāno attabhāvo kalalaṃ nāmāti kathīyati.
tika-vin01t2:959_0: Kalalakālepīti paṭhamasattāhabbhantare yaṃ santativasena pavattamānaṃ kalalasaṅkhātaṃ attabhāvaṃ jīvitā voropetuṃ sakkā,
tika-vin01t2:959_2: Tato vā uddhanti dutiyasattāhādīsu abbudādibhāvappattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:959_3: Nanu ca uppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ sarasanirodheneva nirujjhanato antarā upacchedo na sakkā kātuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:959_5: jīvitindriyaṃ upacchindati uparodhetī”ti kasmā vuttanti āha –
tika-vin01t2:960_1: khaṇe khaṇe nirujjhanasabhāvesu saṅkhāresu ko hanti,
tika-vin01t2:960_7: so acetanatāya kaṭṭhakaliṅgarūpamoti na tattha chedanādinā pāṇātipāto labbhati yathā matasarīre.
tika-vin01t2:960_8: Payogopi pāṇātipātassa yathāvutto paharaṇappahārādiko atītesu vā saṅkhāresu bhaveyya anāgatesu vā paccuppannesu vā,
tika-vin01t2:960_9: tattha na tāva atītānāgatesu sambhavati tesaṃ abhāvato,
tika-vin01t2:960_10: paccuppannesu ca saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikattā saraseneva nirujjhanasabhāvatāya vināsābhimukhesu nippayojano payogo siyā,
tika-vin01t2:960_11: vināsassa ca kāraṇarahitattā na paharaṇappahārādippayogahetukaṃ maraṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:960_12: nirīhakatāya ca saṅkhārānaṃ kassa so payogo,
tika-vin01t2:960_13: khaṇikattā vadhādhippāyasamakālabhijjanakassa kiriyāpariyosānakaālānavaṭṭhānato kassa vā pāṇātipātakammabaddhoti?
tika-vin01t2:961_4: kevalo vā cittacetasikasantāno vadhappayogāvisayabhāvepi tassa pañcavokārabhave rūpasantānādhīnavuttitāya
tika-vin01t2:961_6: vihate vicchedo hotīti na pāṇātipātassa asambhavo,
tika-vin01t2:961_8: na ca payogo nippayojano paccuppannesu saṅkhāresu katappayogavasena tadanantaraṃ uppajjanārahassa saṅkhārakalāpassa tathā anuppattito.
tika-vin01t2:961_9: Khaṇikānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikamaraṇassa idha maraṇabhāvena anadhippetattā santatimaraṇassa ca yathāvuttanayena sahetukabhāvato na ahetukaṃ maraṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:961_10: na ca katturahito pāṇātipātappayogo nirīhakesupi saṅkhāresu sannihitatāmattena upakārakesu attano attano
tika-vin01t2:961_11: anurūpaphaluppādane niyatesu kāraṇesu kattuvohārasiddhito yathā “padīpo pakāseti,
tika-vin01t2:961_13: Na ca kevalassa vadhādhippāyasahabhuno cittacetasikakalāpassa pāṇātipāto icchito santānavasena avaṭṭhitasseva paṭijānanato,
tika-vin01t2:961_14: santānavasena pavattamānānañca padīpādīnaṃ atthakiriyāsiddhi dissatīti attheva pāṇātipātena kammunā baddho.
tika-vin01t2:962_0: Voropetuṃ na sakkāti upakkamena voropetuṃ na sakkā.
tika-vin01t2:962_2: Saṃyuttabhāṇakā pana “rūpasantati arūpasantatī”ti dve santatiyo vatvā “udakaṃ akkamitvā gatassa yāva tīre akkantaudakalekhā na vippasīdati,
tika-vin01t2:962_3: addhānato āgatassa yāva kāye usumabhāvo na vūpasammati,
tika-vin01t2:962_4: ātapā āgantvā gabbhaṃ paviṭṭhassa yāva andhakārabhāvo na vigacchati,
tika-vin01t2:962_5: antogabbhe kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karitvā divā vātapānaṃ vivaritvā olokentassa yāva akkhīnaṃ phandanabhāvo na vūpasammati,
tika-vin01t2:962_7: Dve tayo javanavārā arūpasantati nāmā”ti vatvā “tadubhayampi santatipaccuppannaṃ nāmā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:962_9: Tattha andhakāre nisīditvā ālokaṭṭhānaṃ gatassa na ca tāva ārammaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:962_11: etthantare pavattā rūpasantati arūpasantati vā ekadvesantativārā nāmāti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:962_12: Ālokaṭṭhāne caritvā ovarakaṃ paviṭṭhassapi na tāva sahasā rūpaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:962_14: etthantare pavattā rūpasantati arūpasantati vā ekadvesantativārā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:962_15: Dūre ṭhatvā pana rajakānaṃ hatthavikāraṃ ghaṇṭibheriākoṭanavikārañca disvāpi na tāva saddaṃ suṇāti.
tika-vin01t2:962_18: Ettha ca ālokaṭṭhānato ovarakaṃ paviṭṭhassa pageva tattha nisinnassa yāva rūpagataṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:962_22: ekaccassa sīghampi pākaṭaṃ hotīti “ekadvesantativārā”ti ekaggahaṇampi kataṃ.
tika-vin01t2:963_6: Yāva vā uṇhato āgantvātiādinā pana rūpasantatiṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:963_10: Tathā hi bhaddekarattasutte addhāpaccuppannaṃ sandhāya “yo cāvuso mano,
tika-vin01t2:963_13: tasmiṃ ce paccuppanne chandarāgapaṭibaddhaṃ hoti viññāṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:963_20: Ubhayametaṃ paccuppannanti addhāpaccuppannaṃ etaṃ ubhayaṃ hotīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:963_22: Tañhi tasmiṃ paccuppanne chandarāgavasena paṭibaddhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:963_24: Tathābhūto ca vatthupariññāya abhāvato tesu paccuppannesu dhammesu saṃhīrati,
tika-vin01t2:963_26: Ettha ca “dvādasāyatanāni ekaṃ paccuppanna”nti āgatattā tattha pavatto chandarāgo addhāpaccuppannārammaṇo,
tika-vin01t2:964_3: Rūpajīvitindriye hi vikopite itarampi taṃsambandhatāya vinassatīti.
tika-vin01t2:964_4: Taṃ vuttappakāramevāti taṃ jīvitindriyātipātanavidhānaṃ heṭṭhā vuttappakārameva.
tika-vin01t2:964_5: Saraseneva patanasabhāvassa antarā eva atīva pātanaṃ atipāto,
tika-vin01t2:964_7: Atikkamma vā satthādīhi abhibhavitvā pātanaṃ atipāto,
tika-vin01t2:964_9: Yāya cetanāya pavattamānassa jīvitindriyassa nissayabhūtesu mahābhūtesu upakkamakaraṇahetu taṃmahābhūtapaccayā uppajjanamahābhūtā nuppajjissanti,
tika-vin01t2:966_2: Idāni aṭṭhakathāsu vitthāritamatthaṃ dassento āha “aṭṭhakathāsu panā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:966_4: Āthabbaṇaṃ payojentīti āthabbaṇavedavihitaṃ mantaṃ tattha vuttavidhinā payojenti.
tika-vin01t2:966_5: Āthabbaṇikā hi sattāhaṃ aloṇakaṃ bhuñjitvā dabbe attharitvā pathaviyaṃ sayamānā tapaṃ caritvā sattame
tika-vin01t2:966_6: divase susānabhūmiṃ sajjetvā sattame pade ṭhatvā hatthaṃ vaṭṭetvā vaṭṭetvā mukhena vijjaṃ parijappanti,
tika-vin01t2:966_8: Paṭisenāyāti idaṃ heṭṭhā upari vā padadvayena sambandhamupagacchati.
tika-vin01t2:966_9: Ītiṃ uppādentīti ḍaṃsitvā māraṇatthāya vicchikādīnaṃ vissajjanavasena pīḷaṃ uppādenti.
tika-vin01t2:966_13: Sūcikanti aṅgapaccaṅgāni sūcīhi viya vijjhitvā pavattamānaṃ sūlaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:966_16: Vijjaṃ parivattetvāti gandhāravijjādikaṃ attano vijjaṃ katupacāraṃ parijappitvā mantapaṭhanakkamena paṭhitvā.
tika-vin01t2:967_2: Dvattibyāmasatappamāṇanāguddharaṇeti dvattibyāmasatappamāṇe mahākāye nimminitvā ṭhitānaṃ nāgānaṃ uddharaṇe.
tika-vin01t2:967_5: rahassaṅgampi ca nesaṃ kumbho viya mahantaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:967_7: Vessavaṇassa yakkhādhipatibhāvepi nayanāvudhena kumbhaṇḍānaṃ maraṇassa idha vuttattā tesupi tassa āṇāpavatti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:968_1: “Aho vata yaṃ taṃ kucchigataṃ gabbhaṃ na sotthinā abhinikkhameyyā”ti pāṭho sundarataro.
tika-vin01t2:968_3: “Ayaṃ itthī taṃ kucchigataṃ gabbhaṃ na sotthinā abhinikkhāmeyyā”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:968_11: iddhi nāma cesā adhiṭṭhāniddhi vikubbaniddhi manomayiddhi ñāṇavipphāriddhi samādhivipphāriddhi ariyiddhi
tika-vin01t2:968_12: kammavipākajiddhi puññavatoiddhi vijjāmayiddhi tattha tattha sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhīti
tika-vin01t2:968_18: Yathā hi ādittagharassa upari udakabharite ghaṭe khitte ghaṭopi bhijjati,
tika-vin01t2:968_23: na dve vāre parūpaghātakammaṃ hotī”ti vatvā saññattiṃ āgacchantā pucchitabbā “bhāvanāmayiddhi kiṃ kusalā, akusalā, abyākatā,
tika-vin01t2:969_1: te evaṃ vakkhanti “bhāvanāmayiddhi kusalā vā hoti abyākatā vā,
tika-vin01t2:969_5: Te vattabbā “pāṇātipātacetanā kusalākusalādīsu kataraṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ bhajatī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:969_10: Evaṃ sante “tumhākaṃ kathā neva kusalattikena sameti,
tika-vin01t2:969_14: Kiṃ pana evaṃ mahantaṃ suttaṃ niratthakanti?
tika-vin01t2:969_17: Iddhimā cetovasippattoti ettha hi na bhāvanāmayiddhi adhippetā,
tika-vin01t2:970_2: Jīvitaharaṇakaṃ upanikkhipitabbaṃ vā satthaṃ satthahārakanti vikappadvayenāha.
tika-vin01t2:970_3: “Hārakasattha”nti ca vattabbe satthahārakanti visesanassa paranipātaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:970_7: Itarathāti “pariyeseyyā”ti imassa upanikkhipeyyāti evamatthaṃ aggahetvā yadi pariyesanamattameva adhippetaṃ siyāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:970_9: “Satthahārakaṃ vāssa pariyeseyyā”ti iminā vuccamānassa atthassa byañjanānurūpato paripuṇṇaṃ katvā avuttattā āha “byañjanaṃ anādiyitvā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:970_11: sasanti hiṃsanti tenāti vā satthanti laguḷapāsāṇādīnampi satthasaṅgahitattā āha –
tika-vin01t2:971_3: tasmā dvidhā bhinditvā padabhājanaṃ vuttanti īdisaṃ heṭṭhā vuttavibhaṅganayabhedadassananti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:971_5: saddena “papāte vā papatā”ti parato vuttaṃ avuttañca “rukkhato vā papatā”tiādi sabbaṃ maraṇūpāyaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin01t2:971_6: Tenevāha “na hi sakkā sabbaṃ sarūpeneva vattu”nti.
tika-vin01t2:971_7: Parato vuttanayattāti parato nigamanavasena vuttassa dutiyapadassa padabhājane vuttanayattā.
tika-vin01t2:971_9: tato ekadese dassite sabbaṃ vuttameva hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:971_11: vattunti “rukkhato vā papatā”tiādinā sarūpato sabbaṃ maraṇūpāyaṃ pariyosānaṃ pāpetvā na sakkā vattunti attho.
tika-vin01t2:972_0: Mataṃ te jīvitā seyyoti ettha vuttamaraṇaṃ yasmā iti-
tika-vin01t2:972_3: saddassa atthoti tampi gahetvā atthaṃ dassento āha –
tika-vin01t2:972_7: saddo idha aññasmiṃ atthe vattamāno daṭṭhabbo,
tika-vin01t2:972_8: api tu viññāṇasmiṃyeva vattamāno veditabboti tassa atthassa niyamanatthaṃ vutto.
tika-vin01t2:972_10: Na tāva attho vuttoti “iti cittamano”ti uddharitvāpi iti-
tika-vin01t2:972_12: saddena pana parato “cittasaṅkappo”ti imassa padabhājane “maraṇasaññī”tiādinā itisaddatthassa vakkhamānataṃ vibhāveti.
tika-vin01t2:972_14: saddanidassitaṃ maraṇasaṅkhātamatthaṃ gahetvā “maraṇasaññī maraṇacetano maraṇādhippāyo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:972_24: Cittasaddassa panettha vicittavacanatā saṅkappasaddassa saññācetanādhippāyavasena tidhā atthaṃ dassentena vibhāvitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:972_29: Na idaṃ vitakkassa nāmanti idaṃ pana na kevalaṃ vitakkasseva nāmanti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:973_7: Yo koci maratūti ettha yassa kassaci ekasseva jīvitindriyavisayā vadhakacetanā pavattati,
tika-vin01t2:973_11: Vadhakacittaṃ paccuppannārammaṇampi jīvitindriyaṃ pabandhavicchedanavasena ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattatīti āha “pacchā vā teneva rogenā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:973_13: tādisaṃ payogaṃ nibbattentaṃ tadā vadhakacittaṃ pavattantaṃ paharitamatteyeva kammunā bajjhati.
tika-vin01t2:973_14: Manussaarahantassa ca puthujjanakāleyeva satthappahāre vā vise vā dinnepi yadi so arahattaṃ patvā teneva marati,
tika-vin01t2:973_16: Yaṃ pana puthujjanakāle dinnaṃ dānaṃ arahattaṃ patvā paribhuñjati,
tika-vin01t2:974_0: Nanu ca yathā arahattaṃ patvā paribhuttampi puthujjanakāle dinnaṃ puthujjanadānameva hoti,
tika-vin01t2:974_1: evaṃ maraṇādhippāyena puthujjanakāle pahāre dinne arahattaṃ patvā teneva pahārena mate kasmā arahantaghātakoyeva hoti,
tika-vin01t2:974_5: Tathā hi dānacetanā cajitabbaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā cajanamattameva hoti,
tika-vin01t2:974_10: So hi pāṇo pāṇasaññitā vadhakacetanā upakkamo tena maraṇanti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ aṅgānaṃ pāripūriyāva hoti,
tika-vin01t2:974_12: Tasmā arahattaṃ pattasseva maraṇanti arahantaghātakoyeva hoti,
tika-vin01t2:974_14: Yasmā pana “imaṃ māremī”ti yaṃ santānaṃ ārabbha māraṇicchā,
tika-vin01t2:974_15: tassa puthujjanakhīṇāsavabhāvena payogamaraṇakkhaṇānaṃ vasena satipi santānabhede abhedoyeva,
tika-vin01t2:975_2: Kiñcāpi paṭhamappahāro na sayameva sakkoti māretuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:975_3: dutiyaṃ pana labhitvā sakkonto jīvitavināsanahetu hoti,
tika-vin01t2:975_4: tasmā “payogo tena ca maraṇa”nti iminā saṃsandanato paṭhamappahāreneva kammabaddho yutto,
tika-vin01t2:975_6: Tena vuttaṃ “ubhayehi matepi paṭhamappahāreneva kammunā baddho”ti.
tika-vin01t2:976_1: “Eḷakaṃ māremī”ti pavattacetanāya pubbabhāgattā “imaṃ māremī”ti sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāya tadā sannihitattā
tika-vin01t2:976_2: yathāvatthukaṃ kammabaddho hotiyevāti āha “imaṃ vatthuṃ māremīti cetanāya atthibhāvato”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:976_3: Sabbattha hi purimaṃ abhisandhicittaṃ appamāṇaṃ tena atthasiddhiyā abhāvato,
tika-vin01t2:976_4: vadhakacittaṃ pana tadārammaṇañca jīvitindriyaṃ anantariyādibhāve pamāṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:976_7: Pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbanti yathākkamaṃ pārājikathullaccayapācittiyāni veditabbāni.
tika-vin01t2:976_8: “Mātāpituarahantānaṃ aññataraṃ māremī”ti guṇamahantesu pavattapubbabhāgacetanāya dāruṇabhāvato tathāvidhapubbabhāgacetanāparivārā
tika-vin01t2:976_11: Iminā ca “eḷakaṃ māressāmī”ti mātāpituādīnaṃ māraṇepi pubbabhāgacetanāya adāruṇattā aññathā pavattaānantariyakammato
tika-vin01t2:976_12: evaṃ pavattānantariyassa nātidāruṇatā vuttāva hotīti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-vin01t2:977_2: Yathādhippāyaṃ gateti yodhaṃ vijjhitvā pitari viddhe.
tika-vin01t2:977_4: Ayathādhippāyaṃ pana ujukameva gantvā pitari viddhepi maraṇādhippāyena attanāva katappayogattā nevatthi visaṅketoti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:977_5: Ānantariyaṃ pana natthīti pitaraṃ uddissa katappayogābhāvato.
tika-vin01t2:979_0: Evaṃ vijjhāti evaṃ dhanuṃ kaḍḍhetvā vijjha.
tika-vin01t2:979_1: Evaṃ paharāti evaṃ daḷhaṃ asiṃ gahetvā pahara.
tika-vin01t2:979_2: Evaṃ ghātehīti evaṃ kammakāraṇaṃ katvā mārehi.
tika-vin01t2:980_3: evaṃ ghātehī”ti kiriyāvisesassa parāmaṭṭhattā ācariyaparamparāya ābhataṃ kiriyāvisesaṃ pāḷiyā saṃsandanato gahetvā dassento “aparo nayo”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:980_10: Taṃ karontā uttaroṭṭhaubhatokaṇṇacūḷikagalavāṭakaparicchedena cammaṃ chinditvā sabbakese ekato gaṇṭhiṃ katvā daṇḍakena paliveṭhetvā uppāṭenti,
tika-vin01t2:980_12: tato sīsakaṭāhaṃ thūlasakkharāhi ghaṃsitvā dhovantā saṅkhavaṇṇaṃ karonti.
tika-vin01t2:980_14: saddena bilaṅgathālikaṃ rāhumukhaṃ jotimālikaṃ hatthapajjotikaṃ erakavattikaṃ cīrakavāsikaṃ eṇeyyakaṃ
tika-vin01t2:980_15: baḷisamaṃsikaṃ kahāpaṇikaṃ khārāpatacchikaṃ palighaparivattikaṃ palālapīṭhakanti evamādiṃ sabbaṃ kammakāraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:981_1: Taṃ kammaṃ karontā sīsakapālaṃ uppāṭetvā tattaṃ ayoguḷaṃ saṇḍāsena gahetvā tattha pakkhipanti,
tika-vin01t2:981_4: Taṃ karonto saṅkunā mukhaṃ vivaritvā antomukhe dīpaṃ jālenti,
tika-vin01t2:981_5: kaṇṇacūḷikāhi vā paṭṭhāya mukhaṃ nikhādanena khaṇanti,
tika-vin01t2:981_8: Hatthapajjotikanti hatthe telapilotikāya veṭhetvā dīpaṃ viya pajjālenti.
tika-vin01t2:981_10: Taṃ karontā heṭṭhāgīvato paṭṭhāya cammavaṭṭe kantitvā gopphake pātenti,
tika-vin01t2:981_14: Taṃ karontā tatheva cammavaṭṭe kantitvā kaṭiyaṃ ṭhapenti,
tika-vin01t2:981_18: Taṃ karontā ubhosu kapparesu ca jaṇṇukesu ca ayavalayāni datvā ayasūlāni koṭṭenti,
tika-vin01t2:981_21: taṃ kālena kālaṃ sandhito sūlāni apanetvā catūhi aṭṭhikoṭīhiyeva ṭhapenti.
tika-vin01t2:982_0: Baḷisamaṃsikanti ubhatomukhehi baḷisehi paharitvā cammamaṃsanahārūni uppāṭenti.
tika-vin01t2:982_1: Kahāpaṇikanti sakalasarīraṃ tikhiṇāhi vāsīhi koṭito paṭṭhāya kahāpaṇamattaṃ kahāpaṇamattaṃ pātentā koṭṭenti.
tika-vin01t2:982_2: Khārāpatacchikanti sarīraṃ tattha tattha āvudhehi paharitvā kocchehi khāraṃ ghaṃsanti,
tika-vin01t2:982_4: Palighaparivattikanti ekena passena nipajjāpetvā kaṇṇachidde ayasūlaṃ koṭṭetvā pathaviyā ekābaddhaṃ karonti,
tika-vin01t2:982_6: Palālapīṭhakanti cheko kāraṇiko chavicammaṃ acchinditvā nisadapotehi aṭṭhīni bhinditvā kesesu gahetvā ukkhipati,
tika-vin01t2:982_8: atha naṃ keseheva pariyonandhitvā gaṇhantā palālavaṭṭiṃ viya katvā paliveṭhenti.
tika-vin01t2:983_0: Vatthuṃ visaṃvādetvā tato aññaṃ māretīti sambandho.
tika-vin01t2:983_1: Purimapassādīnampi vatthusabhāgato vatthuggahaṇeneva gahaṇanti āha “purato paharitvā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:983_2: Cittena “purato vā”ti niyamaṃ katvā vā akatvā vā “purato paharitvā mārehī”ti vutte sace aññattha paharitvā māreti,
tika-vin01t2:983_4: Cittena pana yattha katthaci paharitvā māraṇaṃ icchantopi sace “purato paharitvā mārehī”ti vadati,
tika-vin01t2:983_5: tassa lesaṃ oḍḍetvā tathā vuttamatthaṃ ṭhapetvā teneva cittena samuṭṭhāpitaviññattikattā manussaviggahapārājikato
tika-vin01t2:983_6: pariyāyena amuccanato “aññattha paharitvā māritepi nevatthi visaṅketo”ti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:984_2: tasmā okāsaṃ aniyametvā puggalasseva niyamitattā natthi visaṅketo.
tika-vin01t2:984_3: “Gāmeye vā”tiādīsu pana okāsassa niyamitattā aññattha mārite visaṅketo vutto.
tika-vin01t2:987_0: “Dīghaṃ mārehī”ti vuttepi dīghasaṇṭhānānaṃ bahubhāvato itthannāmaṃ evarūpañca dīghanti aññesaṃ asādhāraṇalakkhaṇena
tika-vin01t2:987_3: Ettha ca “cittena bahūsu dīghasaṇṭhānesu ekaṃ niyametvā vuttepi vācāya aniyamitattā aññasmiṃ tādise mārite natthi visaṅketo”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:987_4: Parapāṇimhi pāṇasaññitālakkhaṇassa aṅgassa abhāvato nevatthi pāṇātipātoti āha “āṇāpako muccatī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:987_5: Yadi evaṃ okāsaniyame sati kathaṃ pāṇātipātoti?
tika-vin01t2:987_6: Okāsaṃ niyamentassa tasmiṃ okāse nisinnassa jīvitindriyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hotīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:987_7: Okāsañhi niyametvā niddisanto tasmiṃ okāse nisinnaṃ mārāpetukāmo hoti,
tika-vin01t2:987_9: tasmā okāsena saha attano jīvitindriyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na hotīti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:990_0: Evaṃ āṇāpentassa ācariyassa tāva dukkaṭanti sace sā āṇatti yathādhippāyaṃ na gacchati,
tika-vin01t2:990_2: Sace pana sā āṇatti yathādhippāyaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin01t2:990_7: tato imassa taṅkhaṇeyeva pārājikaṃ hotīti evamettha attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin01t2:990_8: Ācariyena pana heṭṭhā adinnādānakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva ayamattho sakkā viññātunti idha na vutto.
tika-vin01t2:990_9: Vuttañhi tattha “āpatti dukkaṭassāti evaṃ āṇāpentassa ācariyassa tāva dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:990_10: Sace pana sā āṇatti yathādhippāyaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin01t2:990_13: Atha taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avassaṃ hāriyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:990_15: tato imassa taṅkhaṇeyeva pārājikaṃ hotīti ayaṃ yutti sabbattha veditabbā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:990_20: Kasmā panassa thullaccayanti āha “mahājano hi tena pāpe niyojito”ti.
tika-vin01t2:991_3: evaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayena atthe satīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:991_4: Paṭiggahaṇe āpattiyeva na siyāti vadhakassa “sādhu suṭṭhū”ti māraṇapaṭiggahaṇe dukkaṭāpatti na siyā,
tika-vin01t2:991_6: kimaṅgaṃ pana māraṇapaṭiggahaṇeti dassanatthaṃ sañcarittapaṭiggahaṇādi nidassitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:991_7: “Aho vata itthannāmo hato assā”ti evaṃ maraṇābhinandanepi dukkaṭe sati pageva māraṇapaṭiggahaṇeti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:991_8: Paṭiggaṇhantassevetaṃ dukkaṭanti avadhāraṇena visaṅketattā imassa paṭiggahaṇapaccayā mūlaṭṭhassa nattheva āpattīti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:991_9: Keci pana “idha vuttadukkaṭaṃ paṭiggaṇhantassevāti ettakameva avadhāraṇena dassitaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:991_10: na pana mūlaṭṭhassa mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttadukkaṭaṃ paṭikkhitta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:991_13: Yadi evaṃ kasmā pāḷiyaṃ na vuttanti āha “okāsābhāvenā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:991_14: Tattha mūlaṭṭhassa thullaccayavacanato paṭiggaṇhantassa dukkaṭaṃ vattuṃ okāso natthīti okāsābhāvena na vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:992_0: Āṇattikkhaṇe puthujjanoti ettha anāgate voropetabbajīvitindriyavasena atthasādhikacetanāya pavattattā arahantaghātako jātoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:994_2: Vācāya vācāya dukkaṭanti “yo koci mama vacanaṃ sutvā imaṃ dhāretū”ti iminā adhippāyena avatvā kevalaṃ
tika-vin01t2:994_3: maraṇābhinandanavaseneva vuttattā “corāpi nāma taṃ na hanantī”tiādivācāsupi dukkaṭameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:994_4: Ayamattho etena vuttoti yathā so jānātīti sambandho.
tika-vin01t2:994_8: Ubho uddissa maraṇaṃ saṃvaṇṇentassa cetanāya ekattepi “dve pāṇātipātā”ti vattabbabhāvato balavabhāvaṃ
tika-vin01t2:994_9: āpajjitvā paṭisandhivipākasamanantaraṃ pavattiyaṃ anekāsupi jātīsu aparāpariyacetanāvasena dukkhuppādanato
tika-vin01t2:995_0: Evanti “sīsaṃ vā chinditvā papāte vā papatitvā”tiādinā.
tika-vin01t2:995_2: Yathā ariyamaggakkhaṇe cattāro satipaṭṭhānā cattāro sammappadhānā ca kiccavasena ijjhanti,
tika-vin01t2:995_3: evaṃ cetanāya ekattepi kiccavasena anekā pāṇātipātā ijjhantīti āha “tattakā pāṇātipātā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:995_4: Yathā hi attānaṃ sataṃ katvā dassetukāmassa “sataṃ homi sataṃ homī”ti kataparikammavasena laddhapaccuppannaparittārammaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:995_5: abhiññācittaṃ satantogadhānaṃ vaṇṇesu ekassa vaṇṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvāpi sataṃ nipphādeti,
tika-vin01t2:995_6: yathā ca ekassa maraṇe pavattamānāpi vadhakacetanā sakalasarīre uppajjamānaṃ nirujjhamānañca sakalampi
tika-vin01t2:995_7: jīvitindriyaṃ ekappahāreneva ālambitumasakkuṇeyyattā ṭhānappattaṃ ekadesappavattaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:995_9: evameva paccuppannaparittārammaṇāya vadhakacetanāya māretukāmatāya pariggahitasattesu ekasseva jīvitindriye
tika-vin01t2:995_10: ārammaṇe katepi kiccanipphattivasena sabbepi māritāva honti.
tika-vin01t2:996_2: Tesaṃ mūlaṃ datvā muccatīti idaṃ tena katapayogassa puna pākatikabhāvāpādanaṃ avasānaṃ pāpetvā dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:996_3: “Mūlena kītaṃ pana potthakaṃ potthakasāmikānaṃ datvā muccatiyevā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:996_4: Kenaci pana “sace potthakaṃ sāmikānaṃ datvā mūlaṃ na gaṇhāti,
tika-vin01t2:996_5: na muccati attaniyabhāvato amocitattā”ti vatvā bahudhā papañcitaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:996_7: Potthakasāmikānañhi potthake dinne aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā attanā katapayogassa nāsitattā kathaṃ so na mucceyya,
tika-vin01t2:996_12: tesaṃ mūlaṃ datvā muccatīti kasmā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:996_14: Yadi hi potthakasāmikassa potthakaṃ datvā sayameva mūlaṃ gaṇheyya,
tika-vin01t2:996_16: Athāpi potthakasāmikassa santikā mūlaṃ aggahetvā sayameva taṃ potthakaṃ jhāpeyya,
tika-vin01t2:996_21: “Maraṇavaṇṇaṃ likhissāmā”ti ekajjhāsayā hutvāti idaṃ tathā karonte sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:996_22: evaṃ pana asaṃvidahitvāpi maraṇādhippāyena tasmiṃ potthake vuttavidhiṃ karontassa pārājikameva.
tika-vin01t2:997_5: Mahāaṭṭhakathācariyatthereyeva sandhāya “vinayaṃ te na jānantīti upahāsavasena suttantikattherāti vutta”ntipi vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:997_6: Ettha ca mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “āvāṭe niṭṭhite patitvā marantu,
tika-vin01t2:997_7: aniṭṭhite mā marantū”ti iminā adhippāyena karontaṃ sandhāya sabbantimā sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā vuttā,
tika-vin01t2:997_8: mahāpaccarisaṅkhepaṭṭhakathāsu pana paṭhamappahārato paṭṭhāya “imasmiṃ āvāṭe patitvā marantū”ti iminā
tika-vin01t2:997_9: adhippāyena karontassa yasmiṃ yasmiṃ payoge kate tattha patitā maranti,
tika-vin01t2:997_10: taṃtaṃpayogasādhikaṃ sanniṭṭhāpakacetanaṃ sandhāya “ekasmimpi kudālappahāre dinne”tiādi vuttanti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:997_11: Tasmā tena tena pariyāyena aṭṭhakathāvādānaṃ aññamaññāvirodho yutto.
tika-vin01t2:997_12: Atha vā mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ekasmiṃyeva divase avūpasanteneva payogena khaṇitvā niṭṭhāpentaṃ sandhāya sabbantimā sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā vuttā,
tika-vin01t2:997_13: itarāsu pana “imasmiṃ patitvā marantū”ti adhippāyena ekasmiṃ divase kiñci khaṇitvā aparasmimpi divase
tika-vin01t2:997_14: tatheva kiñci kiñci khaṇitvā niṭṭhāpentaṃ sandhāya vuttanti.
tika-vin01t2:997_15: Evampi aṭṭhakathānaṃ aññamaññāvirodho yuttoti amhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin01t2:998_1: Arahantāpi saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti aññehi pātiyamānānaṃ amaritukāmānampi arahantānaṃ maraṇaṃ sambhavatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:998_3: Tattha patitaṃ bahi nīharitvāti ettha “imasmiṃ āvāṭeyeva marantūti niyamābhāvato bahi nīharitvā māritepi pārājikaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:998_4: Āvāṭe patitvā thokaṃ cirāyitvā gacchantaṃ gahetvā mārite āvāṭasmiṃyeva aggahitattā pārājikaṃ na hotī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:998_5: taṃ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “patitappayogena gahitattā”ti vuttahetussa idhāpi sambhavato vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:998_6: Amaritukāmā vātipi adhippāyassa sambhavato opapātike uttarituṃ asakkuṇitvā matepi pārājikaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:998_7: Nibbattitvāti vuttattā patanaṃ na dissatīti ce?
tika-vin01t2:998_8: Opapātikassa tattha nibbattiyeva patananti natthi virodho.
tika-vin01t2:998_9: Yasmā mātuyā patitvā parivattitaliṅgāya matāya so mātughātako hoti,
tika-vin01t2:998_11: tasmā patitasseva vasena āpattīti adhippāyena “patanarūpaṃ pamāṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:998_13: “Manussabhūtaṃ mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā api parivattaliṅgaṃ jīvitā voropentassa kammaṃ ānantariyaṃ hotī”ti ettakameva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:999_0: Tattha ca liṅge parivattepi so eva ekakammanibbatto bhavaṅgappabandho jīvitindriyappabandho ca,
tika-vin01t2:999_2: Yo hi liṅge aparivatte tasmiṃ attabhāve bhavaṅgajīvitindriyappabandho,
tika-vin01t2:999_3: so eva parivattepi liṅge taṃyeva ca upādāya ekajātisamaññā.
tika-vin01t2:999_4: Na cettha bhāvakalāpagatajīvitindriyassa vasena codanā kātabbā tadaññasseva adhippetattā.
tika-vin01t2:999_7: Tasmā parivattepi liṅge tasseva ekakammanibbattassa santānassa jīvitā voropanato vohārabhedato so itthighātako vā hotu purisaghātako vā,
tika-vin01t2:999_8: ānantariyakammato na muccatīti ettakameva tattha vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:999_10: te maraṇasamaye attano attano jātirūpeneva maranti,
tika-vin01t2:999_13: Tasmā nāgo vā supaṇṇo vā yakkharūpena vā petarūpena vā patitvā attano tiracchānarūpena marati,
tika-vin01t2:1000_0: Imināva nayena manussaviggahe nāgasupaṇṇasadise tiracchānagate patitvā attano rūpena mate pācittiyena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1000_1: Evaṃ sante pāḷiyaṃ “yakkho vā peto vā tiracchānagatamanussaviggaho vā tasmiṃ patati,
tika-vin01t2:1000_7: yakkho vā peto vāti paṭhamaṃ sakarūpeneva ṭhite yakkhapete dassetvā puna aññarūpenapi ṭhite teyeva yakkhapete
tika-vin01t2:1000_9: na pana tādisaṃ tiracchānagataṃ visuṃ dassetuṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1000_10: Tasmā tiracchānagataviggaho vā manussaviggaho vā yakkho vā peto vāti evamettha yojanā kātabbāti.
tika-vin01t2:1000_11: Gaṇṭhipadesu pana tīsupi “pāḷiyaṃ manussaviggahena ṭhitatiracchānagatānaṃ āveṇikaṃ katvā thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ viya dissatī”ti kathitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1000_12: Yakkharūpapetarūpena matepi eseva nayoti iminā maraṇarūpasseva pamāṇattā thullaccayaṃ atidissati.
tika-vin01t2:1001_2: So niddosoti tena tattha katapayogassa abhāvato.
tika-vin01t2:1001_3: Yadi pana sopi tattha kiñci kiñci karoti,
tika-vin01t2:1001_5: Tattha evanti evaṃ mayā kateti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1001_9: Yadi pana pacchimopi labhitvā tattha vuttappakāraṃ kiñci katvā puna vippaṭisāre uppanne evaṃ karoti,
tika-vin01t2:1001_11: Paṃsumhi patitvā maratīti abhinavapūrite paṃsumhi pāde pavesetvā uddharituṃ asakkonto tattheva patitvā marati.
tika-vin01t2:1001_12: Jātapathavī jātāti idaṃ sabbathā matthakappattaṃ thirabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1001_13: Paṃsunā pūrentena pana pādadaṇḍādīhi maddanatāḷanādinā suṭṭhutaraṃ thirabhāvaṃ āpādetvā pakatipathaviyā
tika-vin01t2:1002_1: Vatiṃ katvāti ettha yadi so pāse vuttappakāraṃ kañci visesaṃ na karoti,
tika-vin01t2:1002_3: Thaddhataraṃ vā pāsayaṭṭhiṃ ṭhapetīti thirabhāvatthaṃ aparāya pāsayaṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ bandhitvā vā tameva
tika-vin01t2:1002_5: Daḷhataraṃ vā thirataraṃ vāti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-vin01t2:1003_1: na muccatīti ettha “pubbe katappayogaṃ vināsetvā pacchā kusalacittena payoge katepi na muccatīti idaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1003_4: āditoyeva māraṇatthāya katappayogattā katapariyositāya pāsayaṭṭhiyā tappaccayā ye ye sattā marissanti,
tika-vin01t2:1003_5: tesaṃ tesaṃ vasena paṭhamataraṃyeva pāṇātipātakammasiddhito pacchā kusalacittena aññathā katepi na muccatīti.
tika-vin01t2:1003_7: Sayaṃ vaṭṭitanti bahurajjuke ekato katvā attanā vaṭṭitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1003_8: Ubbaṭṭetvāti te rajjuke visuṃ visuṃ katvā.
tika-vin01t2:1003_10: Pariyesitvā katanti araññaṃ gantvā rukkhaṃ chinditvā tacchetvā kataṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1004_4: Vatvā asiṃ upanikkhipatīti ettha mukhena avatvā vuttappakāraṃ manasā cintetvā upanikkhipanepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin01t2:1004_7: jīvitappavattiyā vā asabhāgattā ananukūlattā gaṇḍapiḷakādi yo koci jīvitappavattipaccanīko visabhāgarogo.
tika-vin01t2:1005_1: Paraṃ vā amanāparūpanti ettha amanāpaṃ rūpaṃ etassāti amanāparūpoti bāhiratthasamāso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1005_2: Manāpiyepi eseva nayoti etena manāpikaṃ rūpaṃ upasaṃharatīti ettha paraṃ vā manāparūpaṃ tassa samīpe ṭhapeti,
tika-vin01t2:1005_3: attanā vā manāpiyena rūpena samannāgato tiṭṭhatītiādi yojetabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1007_0: Duṭṭhacitto sace yāti, hoti so itthimārako.
tika-vin01t2:1009_0: Anatthiko hi so tassā, maraṇena upekkhako”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1011_0: “Viyogena ca me jāyā, jananī ca na jīvati;
tika-vin01t2:1012_0: Iti jānaṃ viyuñjanto, tadatthī hoti mārako.
tika-vin01t2:1014_0: Anatthiko hi so tesaṃ, maraṇena upekkhako”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1015_0: Alaṅkaritvā upasaṃharatīti “alābhakena sussitvā maratū”ti iminā adhippāyena upasaṃharati.
tika-vin01t2:1015_3: Alābhakena sussitvā maratīti ettha ca pārājikanti pāṭhaseso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1016_1: Asañciccāti idaṃ maraṇasaṃvattanikaupakkamassa asallakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttanti āha “iminā upakkamenā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1016_2: Ajānantassāti idaṃ pana maraṇasaṃvattanikaupakkamakaraṇassa ajānanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti āha “iminā ayaṃ marissatī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1016_3: Namaraṇādhippāyassāti idaṃ upakkamaṃ jānantassapi maraṇādhippāyassa abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttanti āha “maraṇaṃ anicchantassā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1019_0: Domanassacitteneva bhaṇatīti iminā sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā dukkhavedanāya sampayuttā evāti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1019_2: hāso pana nesaṃ anatthavūpasamādiaññavisayoti sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā dukkhavedanāya sampayuttā eva.
tika-vin01t2:1019_3: Sati pana domanasse kathaṃ taṃ nappakāsatīti āha “sukhavokiṇṇattā”tiādi,
tika-vin01t2:1019_4: pubbāpariyavasena ubhosu passesu uppajjanakasukhehi ākiṇṇattā uppannassa ca domanassassa anuppabandhanena
tika-vin01t2:1019_5: pavattiyā abhāvato tadā uppannampi domanassaṃ nappakāsatīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1021_1: Maraṇatthikāva hutvāti imassa kāyassa bhedena saggapāpanādhippāyattā atthato maraṇatthikāva hutvā.
tika-vin01t2:1021_2: Maraṇatthikabhāvaṃ ajānantāti evaṃ adhippāyino maraṇatthikā nāma hontīti attano maraṇatthikabhāvaṃ ajānantā.
tika-vin01t2:1021_3: Na hi te attano cittappavattiṃ na jānanti.
tika-vin01t2:1021_5: maraṇādhippāyassa sanniṭṭhāpakacetanākkhaṇe karuṇāya abhāvato kāruññena pāse baddhasūkaramocanaṃ viya na hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1021_9: yāva tasmiṃ bhave santānassa anuppabandho avicchinnappavatti hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1022_1: Uddhaṃ vā adho vā saṅkamantīti pacchā āgatānaṃ okāsadānatthaṃ nisinnapāḷiyā uddhaṃ vā adho vā gacchanti.
tika-vin01t2:1022_2: Paccavekkhaṇakiccaṃ natthīti pacchā āgatehi upaparikkhaṇakiccaṃ natthi.
tika-vin01t2:1022_3: Heṭṭhā kismiñci vijjamāne sāṭakaṃ vali na gaṇhātīti āha “tasmiṃ vali na paññāyatī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1023_0: Pāḷiyaṃ musale ussiteti aññamaññaṃ upatthambhetvā dvīsu musalesu ussitesūti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1024_2: saddassa bhāvavacanattā “aggakiriya”nti atthaṃ vatvāpi yasmā kiriyaṃ dātuṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin01t2:1024_3: tasmā dānasaṅkhātāya aggakiriyāya yuttaṃ piṇḍapātameva idha upacāravuttiyā “aggakiriyā”ti gahetabbanti āha “paṭhamaṃ laddhapiṇḍapāta”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1025_3: Visesādhigamoti samādhi vipassanā ca ativiya pākaṭattā “hatthappatto viya dissatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1025_4: Upacchindatīti “visesādhigamassa vikkhepo mā hotū”ti āhāraṃ upacchindati.
tika-vin01t2:1025_8: na vaṭṭatīti yasmā sabhāgānaṃ lajjibhikkhūnaṃyeva ariyā attanā adhigatavisesaṃ tādise kāraṇe sati ārocenti,
tika-vin01t2:1025_9: te ca bhikkhū appatirūpāya anesanāya paccayaṃ na pariyesanti,
tika-vin01t2:1025_10: tasmā tehi pariyesitapaccaye kukkuccaṃ uppādetvā āhāraṃ upacchindituṃ na vaṭṭatīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1025_14: na vaṭṭatī”ti imassa kāraṇaṃ dassentena vuttanti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1026_0: Atha vā visesādhigamaṃ byākaritvāti idaṃ visesassa adhigatabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1026_1: Adhigamantarāyaṃ asaṅkanteneva ca āhārupacchedo kātabboti anuññātattā adhigatena na kātabboti dassetuṃ
tika-vin01t2:1026_4: Kiṃ pana ariyā attanā adhigatavisesaṃ aññesaṃ ārocentīti imissā codanāya “sabhāgānañhi lajjibhikkhūnaṃ kathetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1027_1: Ahaṃ kukkuccakoti “mama kiriyāya mareyya nu kho,
tika-vin01t2:1027_3: Sabbatthāpi panettha evarūpesu vatthūsu amate thullaccayassa vuttattā tena katappayogena dukkhavedanā uppajjatu vā mā vā,
tika-vin01t2:1027_4: pārājikāya abhāvato bhagavato vacanena thullaccayamevāti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1028_4: “Maraṇavaṇṇaṃ vā saṃvaṇṇeyyā”ti vuttattā pariyāyato āpattimokkho na hotīti āha “pariyāyo nāma natthī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1029_0: Gabbhaṃ na gaṇhātīti gabbhaṃ na dhāreti.
tika-vin01t2:1029_1: Vātena pāṇakehi vā gabbho vinassanto kammaṃ vinā na nassatīti adhippāyena “dvīhākārehī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1029_2: Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “gabbho hi vātena pāṇakehi kammunā cāti tīhi kāraṇehi vinassatī”ti vatvā
tika-vin01t2:1029_3: “kammunā vinassante pana buddhāpi paṭibāhituṃ na sakkontī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1029_4: Tattha vātena pāṇakehi vā gabbhe vinassante na purimakammunā okāso kato,
tika-vin01t2:1029_6: sayameva pana kammunā okāse kate na ekantena vāto pāṇakā vā apekkhitabbāti iminā adhippāyena kammassa visuṃ kāraṇabhāvo vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1029_8: Avijāyanatthāya bhesajjaṃ dentassa kucchiyaṃ uppajjitvā vinassissantīti iminā adhippāyena dinne opātakkhaṇanādīsu viya kammabaddho,
tika-vin01t2:1029_9: kucchiyaṃ na uppajjissantīti iminā pana adhippāyena dinne nevatthi kammabaddho.
tika-vin01t2:1030_3: Gilānassatthāya appavāritaṭṭhānatopi viññattiyā anuññātattā katāpi akatā viyāti akataviññatti, “vada, bhante,
tika-vin01t2:1030_4: paccayenā”ti evaṃ akatapavāraṇaṭṭhāne ca viññatti akataviññatti.
tika-vin01t2:1031_1: Akātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha dukkaṭaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1031_2: Sahadhammikesu vuttanayenevāti “imesampi pañcannaṃ akataviññattiyāpi bhesajjaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā kathitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1031_3: Yāva ñātakā passantīti yāva tassa ñātakā passanti.
tika-vin01t2:1031_7: Sacepi na yācantīti “yācituṃ dukkha”nti adhippāyena yadi na yācanti.
tika-vin01t2:1031_9: “ābhogaṃ pana akatvāpi dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu likhitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1031_10: Ete dasa ñātake ṭhapetvāti tesaṃ puttanattādayopi tappaṭibaddhattā ñātakā evāti tepi ettheva saṅgahitā.
tika-vin01t2:1031_11: Tena aññesanti iminā aññātakānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1031_15: “Mayhaṃ dassanti karissantī”ti paccāsāya karontassapi yācitvāpi gahetabbaṭṭhānatāya ñātakesu vejjakammaṃ vā kuladūsakāpatti vā na hotīti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1031_16: Sabbapadesupi vinicchayo veditabboti cūḷamātuyātiādīsu sabbapadesu “cūḷamātuyā sāmiko”tiādinā yojetvā heṭṭhā vuttanayena vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1032_0: Vuttanayena pariyesitvāti iminā “ñātisāmaṇerehi vā”tiādinā vuttamatthaṃ atidissati.
tika-vin01t2:1032_1: Apaccāsīsantenāti “mayhaṃ dassanti karissantī”ti evaṃ attano atthāya apaccāsīsantena.
tika-vin01t2:1032_2: Bhikkhusaṅghassa pana upakārakattaṃ paccāsīsantena kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1032_3: “Bhesajjaṃ ācikkhathā”ti vuttepi yathā “aññamaññaṃ pana kathā kātabbā”ti idaṃ pariyāyattā vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:1032_4: evaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena “idañcidañca gahetvā karontī”ti iminā pariyāyena kathentassapi nevatthi dosoti ācariyā.
tika-vin01t2:1033_0: Vinayalakkhaṇaṃ ajānantassa anācariyassa tadanurūpavohārāsambhavato īdisassa lābhassa uppatti nāma natthīti “ācariyabhāgo nāmāya”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1033_1: vinaye pakataññunā ācariyena labhitabbabhāgo ayanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1033_2: Pupphapūjanatthāya dinnepi akappiyavohārena vidhānassa ayuttattā “kappiyavasenā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1034_3: “bhaṇathā”ti vutte pana dhammakathāya ajjhesanaṭṭhāne ṭhitattā “kātabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1034_6: Cāletvā suttaṃ parimajjitvāti parittaṃ karontena kātabbavidhiṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1034_9: No ce jānantīti yadi evaṃ vattuṃ na jānanti.
tika-vin01t2:1034_11: Pādesu apanītesu avamaṅgalasaññino hontīti āha “na pādā apanetabbā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1034_12: Gantuṃ vaṭṭatīti “parivāratthāya āgacchantū”ti vuttepi evaṃ sallakkhetvā gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1035_0: Anāmaṭṭhapiṇḍapātoti apabbajitassa hatthato laddho attanā aññena vā pabbajitena aggahitaaggo piṇḍapāto.
tika-vin01t2:1035_3: Coranāgavatthūti ettha “coranāgassa kira āmaṭṭhaṃ dento kujjhissati,
tika-vin01t2:1035_4: anāmaṭṭhaṃ na vaṭṭatīti thero pattaggahaṇahattheneva aggaṃ gahetvā patte bhattaṃ sabbamadāsi,
tika-vin01t2:1035_6: ‘Ettakaṃ mayha’nti bhattassa ekapasseyeva thokaṃ ṭhapetvāpi puna tena saddhiṃ sabbampi dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cūḷagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1036_0: Āmisassa dhammassa ca alābhena attano parassa ca antare sambhavantassa chiddassa vivarassa bhedassa paṭisantharaṇaṃ pidahanaṃ gaṇhanaṃ paṭisanthāro.
tika-vin01t2:1036_1: Ayañhi lokasannivāso alabbhamānena āmisena ca dhammena cāti dvīhi chiddo,
tika-vin01t2:1036_2: tassa taṃ chiddaṃ yathā na paññāyati,
tika-vin01t2:1036_3: evaṃ pīṭhassa viya paccattharaṇena āmisena ca dhammena ca paṭisantharaṇaṃ āmisapaṭisanthāro dhammapaṭisanthāro cāti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:1036_4: Tattha dhammapaṭisanthāro kassaci na kātabbo natthi.
tika-vin01t2:1036_5: Yassa kassaci hi gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vā dhammena saṅgaho kātabboyeva.
tika-vin01t2:1036_7: kassa na kātabbo”ti idaṃ pana āmisapaṭisanthāraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1036_8: Ubbāsetvāti samantato tiyojanaṃ vilumpanto manusse palāpetvā aññesaṃ avāsaṃ katvā.
tika-vin01t2:1037_1: Sattarasavaggiyesu pubbe ekassa aṅgulipatodena māritattā sesasoḷasajanesu udaraṃ āruhitvā nisinnamekaṃ ṭhapetvā “sesāpi pannarasa janā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1038_1: Yo rukkhena otthatopi na maratītiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1039_0: “Manussaviggahapārājikavaṇṇanāyaṃ pana sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu ‘sace bhikkhu rukkhena vā ajjhotthato hoti opāte vā patito,
tika-vin01t2:1039_1: sakkā ca hoti ekena passena rukkhaṃ chinditvā bhūmiṃ vā khaṇitvā nikkhamituṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1039_3: aññena pana bhikkhunā bhūmiṃ vā khaṇitvā rukkhaṃ vā chinditvā allarukkhato vā daṇḍakaṃ chinditvā taṃ rukkhaṃ pavaṭṭetvā nikkhamāpetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:1039_8: davaḍāhe ḍayhamāne paṭaggiṃ dātuṃ parittaṃ kātu’nti idaṃ pana ekameva suttaṃ dissati.
tika-vin01t2:1039_11: aññassa vaṭṭatīti idaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ na sakkā laddhuṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1039_12: Attano atthāya karonto attasinehena akusalacitteneva karoti,
tika-vin01t2:1039_17: sabbaṭṭhakathāsu pana vuttattā na sakkā paṭisedhetuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1040_0: Tasmā yaṃ ettha ito aññathā kenaci papañcitaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1041_1: pācittiyanti sukkhaṭṭhānepi aggiṃ pātetvā iminā adhippāyena ālimpentassa pācittiyameva.
tika-vin01t2:1041_2: Dukkaṭanti sukkhaṭṭhāne vā sukkhaṃ “asukkha”nti avavatthapetvā vā aggiṃ pātentassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1041_7: Sayaṃ vā uṭṭhitanti vāteritānaṃ veḷuādīnaṃ aññamaññasaṅghaṭṭanena samuṭṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1042_1: Khettameva otiṇṇattā pārājikanti “dvīhī”ti vutte dvīhipi pahārehi maraṇassa paccāsīsanato ekena vinā dvinnaṃ abhāvato ca pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1042_2: “Dvīhiyevāti niyamite pana ekena pahārena mārite natthi pārājika”nti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1042_3: Paṭhamaṃ āhitabalavegassa pubbānuciṇṇavasena dhammānaṃ desantaruppattiyā gamanamattaṃ ṭhapetvā jīvitindriyassa
tika-vin01t2:1047_2: Satipi sāvakānaṃ paccekabuddhānañca catusaccavidubhāve anaññapubbakattā bhagavato catusaccadassanassa
tika-vin01t2:1047_3: tattha ca sabbaññutāya balesu ca vasībhāvassa pattito parasantānesu pasāritabhāvena pākaṭattā ca bhagavāva
tika-vin01t2:1049_2: Dūtakammanti gihīnaṃ paṇṇaṃ vā sāsanaṃ vā gahetvā tattha tattha gamanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1049_6: Anāgatasambandhe pana asatīti “bhāsito bhavissatī”ti pāṭhasesaṃ katvā anāgatasambandhe asati.
tika-vin01t2:1049_7: “Bhāsito”ti atītavacanaṃ kathaṃ anāgatavacanena sambandhamupagacchatīti āha “lakkhaṇaṃ pana saddasatthato pariyesitabba”nti.
tika-vin01t2:1049_8: Īdise hi ṭhāne “dhātusambandhe paccayā”ti iminā lakkhaṇena dhātvatthasambandhe sati ayathākālavihitāpi
tika-vin01t2:1050_2: Pasannamukhavaṇṇāti iminā sakalasarīravaṇṇatopi adhikataraṃ mukhavaṇṇassa manāpatā vuttā.
tika-vin01t2:1050_3: Vippasannachavivaṇṇāti iminā pana vijjamānasseva sarīravaṇṇassa ativiya pasannatā vuttā.
tika-vin01t2:1050_4: Yasmā indriyānaṃ ūnattaṃ vā pūraṇattaṃ vā natthi,
tika-vin01t2:1050_7: pañcapasādānaṃ abhiniviṭṭhokāsassa paripuṇṇatāvacaneneva hadayavatthuādisakalasarīrassa paripuṇṇatā dassitāyeva hotīti āha –
tika-vin01t2:1051_2: saṃvijjamānāti iminā pana tesaṃ upalabbhamānataṃ dasseti. Tenāha –
tika-vin01t2:1051_15: Atha vā pacantoti gāmesu aggipātanavasena gehādīni jhāpetvā tattha ajeḷakādīni pacanto.
tika-vin01t2:1052_0: Ye sikkhāpadesu bahulagāravā na honti āpattivītikkamabahulā,
tika-vin01t2:1052_2: Uddhateti akappiye kappiyasaññitāya kappiye akappiyasaññitāya avajje vajjasaññitāya vajje avajjasaññitāya ca uddhaccapakatike.
tika-vin01t2:1052_13: Ācariyupajjhāyehi pariccattaketi dhammena āmisena ca asaṅgahetvā ācariyupajjhāyehi pariccatte anāthe appatiṭṭhe.
tika-vin01t2:1053_3: Tattha pāpicchasseva sato sambhāvanādhippāyakatena iriyāpathena vimhāpanaṃ iriyāpathasaṇṭhapanasaṅkhātaṃ kuhakavatthu.
tika-vin01t2:1053_4: Tathā cīvarādīhi nimantitassa tadatthikasseva sato pāpicchataṃ nissāya paṭikkhepanena te ca gahapatike
tika-vin01t2:1053_5: attani suppatiṭṭhitasaddhe ñatvā puna tesaṃ “aho ayyo appiccho,
tika-vin01t2:1053_8: sace appamattakampi kiñci paṭiggaṇheyyā”ti nānāvidhehi upāyehi paṇītāni cīvarādīni upanentānaṃ tadanuggahakāmataṃyeva
tika-vin01t2:1053_9: āvikatvā paṭiggahaṇena ca tato pabhuti asītisakaṭabhārehi upanāmanahetubhūtaṃ vimhāpanaṃ paccayapaṭisevanasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1053_11: Pāpicchasseva pana sato uttarimanussadhammādhigamaparidīpanavācāya tathā tathā vimhāpanaṃ sāmantajappanasaṅkhātaṃ kuhakavatthūti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1053_16: Suddhacittena attano ganthadhurādikammaṃ katvā vicarantānaṃ tammūlakapaccayaparibhoge dosābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “ye panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1053_17: Bhikkhācāre asampajjamāneti gocaragāme bhikkhāya caritvā labhitabbapiṇḍapāte asampajjante.
tika-vin01t2:1054_2: pāramīpūraṇakāle pana sarāgadosamohasseva sato āgatānaṃ yācakānaṃ alaṅkatappaṭiyattaṃ sīsaṃ kantitvā
tika-vin01t2:1054_3: galalohitaṃ nīharitvā suañjitāni akkhīni uppāṭetvā kulavaṃsappatiṭṭhāpakaṃ puttaṃ manāpacāriniṃ bhariyanti
tika-vin01t2:1054_4: evamādīni dentassa aññānipi khantivādīsadisesu attabhāvesu chejjabhejjādīni pāpuṇantassa āgamanīyapaṭipadaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1055_3: Saṅgaṇhāti upalāpetīti idaṃ atheyyacittaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1055_7: Garubhaṇḍañhi kulasaṅgahatthāya vissajjento vibhajanto ca tassa avissajjiyaavaebhaṅgiyabhāvaṃ theneti.
tika-vin01t2:1055_9: āpatti thullaccayassā”ti vuttattā vissajjanapaccayā thullaccayenapi na muccati.
tika-vin01t2:1056_9: thenetvā gahitā hontīti ettha asantasambhāvanāya raṭṭhapiṇḍassa thenetvā gahitattā lokuttaradhammopi thenitoyeva hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1056_14: tasmā samaṇāti gottamattaṃ anubhavanti dhārentīti gotrabhuno,
tika-vin01t2:1059_1: Heṭṭhimamaggehi ñātamariyādāya eva jānanato aññā aggamaggapaññā,
tika-vin01t2:1059_2: tassā phalabhāvato aggaphalapaññā taṃsahagatā sammāsaṅkappādayo ca aññāti vuttāti āha “aññaṃ byākariṃsūti arahattaṃ byākariṃsū”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1059_8: Suddhasamathalābhī vipassanāya kammaṃ akatvāpi kilesasamudācāraṃ apassanto kevalaṃ aññāṇabalena “ariyohamasmī”ti
tika-vin01t2:1060_0: Talaṅgaravāsī dhammadinnatthero kira nāma eko pabhinnappaṭisambhido mahākhīṇāsavo mahato bhikkhusaṅghassa ovādadāyako ahosi.
tika-vin01t2:1060_1: So ekadivasaṃ attano divāṭṭhāne nisīditvā “kinnu kho amhākaṃ ācariyassa uccavālaṅkavāsīmahānāgattherassa samaṇabhāvakiccaṃ matthakappattaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1060_2: no”ti āvajjento puthujjanabhāvamevassa disvā “mayi agacchante puthujjanakālakiriyameva karissatī”ti ca
tika-vin01t2:1060_3: ñatvā iddhiyā vehāsaṃ uppatitvā divāṭṭhāne nisinnassa therassa samīpe orohitvā vanditvā vattaṃ dassetvā
tika-vin01t2:1060_10: Thero pucchitaṃ pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ asajjamānova kathesi.
tika-vin01t2:1060_12: kadā tumhehi ayaṃ dhammo adhigato”ti vutto “ito saṭṭhivassakāle,
tika-vin01t2:1060_18: Thero sabbasetaṃ hatthiṃ māpesi. Idāni, bhante,
tika-vin01t2:1060_19: yathā ayaṃ hatthī añjitakaṇṇo pasāritanaṅguṭṭho soṇḍaṃ mukhe pakkhipitvā bheravaṃ koñcanādaṃ karonto tumhākaṃ abhimukhaṃ āgacchati,
tika-vin01t2:1060_21: Thero tathā katvā vegena āgacchato hatthissa bheravaṃ ākāraṃ disvā uṭṭhāya palāyituṃ āraddho.
tika-vin01t2:1060_22: Tamenaṃ khīṇāsavatthero hatthaṃ pasāretvā cīvarakaṇṇe gahetvā “bhante,
tika-vin01t2:1060_24: So tasmiṃ kāle attano puthujjanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “avassayo me, āvuso,
tika-vin01t2:1060_25: dhammadinna hohī”ti vatvā pādamūle ukkuṭikaṃ nisīdi. “Bhante,
tika-vin01t2:1060_28: Thero kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā caṅkamaṃ oruyha tatiye padavāre aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
tika-vin01t2:1063_1: Yasmā panātiādi “asantaṃ abhūtaṃ asaṃvijjamāna”nti etesaṃ kāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1063_4: Samudācaratīti “atthi mayhaṃ esa dhammo”ti katheti jānāpeti vā.
tika-vin01t2:1063_6: Ñāṇena ca asacchikatoti idaṃ pana “asaṃvijjamāna”nti etassa kāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1063_7: Pakatimanussehi uttaritarānaṃ buddhādiuttamapurisānaṃ adhigamadhammo uttarimanussadhammoti āha “uttarimanussāna”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1063_9: Atha padabhājane bahuvacananiddeso kasmā katoti āha “padabhājane panā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1063_11: ārogyaṭṭhena pana bāhitikasutte viya “kusale dhamme”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1063_15: idha pana khaṇapariyāyavaseneva “taṃ khaṇaṃ taṃ layaṃ taṃ muhutta”nti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1064_6: Katamesaṃ tvaṃ dhammānaṃ lābhīti idaṃ pana pubbe “kiṃ te adhigata”nti aniddhāritabhedā jhānādivisesā
tika-vin01t2:1065_0: Tasmāti yasmā yathāvuttehi chahākārehi adhigamabyākaraṇaṃ sodhetabbaṃ, tasmā.
tika-vin01t2:1065_3: Imesu pana chasu ṭhānesu sodhanatthaṃ vattabboti yathā nāma jātarūpapatirūpakampi jātarūpaṃ viya khāyatīti
tika-vin01t2:1065_5: evameva imesu idāneva vuttesu chasu ṭhānesu pakkhipitvā sodhanatthaṃ vattabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1065_9: Sesapucchāsupi pākaṭo hotīti pade eseva nayo.
tika-vin01t2:1066_0: Sabbesañhi attanā adhigatamaggena pahīnakilesā pākaṭā hontīti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1066_1: Kassaci hi attanā adhigatamaggavajjhakilesesu sandeho uppajjatiyeva mahānāmassa sakkassa viya.
tika-vin01t2:1066_2: So hi sakadāgāmī samānopi “tassa mayhaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin01t2:1066_3: evaṃ hoti ‘ko su nāma me dhammo ajjhattaṃ appahīno,
tika-vin01t2:1066_4: yena me ekadā lobhadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti,
tika-vin01t2:1066_6: mohadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhantī”’ti bhagavantaṃ pucchi.
tika-vin01t2:1066_7: Ayaṃ kira rājā sakadāgāmimaggena lobhadosamohā niravasesā pahīyantīti saññī ahosi.
tika-vin01t2:1066_11: “Ayaṃ kileso asukamaggavajjho”ti imissā paṇṇattiyā akovidassa hi ariyasāvakassa evaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1066_13: sā pana na sabbesaṃ paripuṇṇā hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1066_19: Imāsu pana pañcasu paccavekkhaṇāsu ekaṃ vā dve vā no laddhuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1067_2: Sodhetabbāti suddhā udāhu na suddhāti vicāraṇavasena sodhetabbā.
tika-vin01t2:1067_6: Paññāyatīti etthāpi “yadī”ti padaṃ ānetvā yadi so bhikkhu tāya paṭipadāya paññāyatīti sambandho.
tika-vin01t2:1067_7: Catūsu paccayesu alaggattā “ākāse pāṇisamena cetasā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1067_8: Vuttasadisanti tassa bhikkhuno byākaraṇaṃ imasmiṃ sutte vuttena sadisaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1068_2: na hotīti pahīnavipallāsattā jīvitanikantiyā ca abhāvato na hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1068_3: Puthujjanassa pana appahīnavipallāsattā jīvitanikantisabbhāvato ca appamattakenapi hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1069_1: dīghabhāṇakaabhayatthero kira ekaṃ piṇḍapātikaṃ pariggahetuṃ asakkonto daharassa saññaṃ adāsi.
tika-vin01t2:1069_2: So taṃ nahāyamānaṃ kalyāṇīnadīmukhadvāre nimujjitvā pāde aggahesi.
tika-vin01t2:1069_5: Candamukhatissarājakāle pana mahāvihāre saṅghatthero khīṇāsavo dubbalacakkhuko vihāreyeva acchati.
tika-vin01t2:1069_6: Taṃ rājā “theraṃ pariggaṇhissāmī”ti bhikkhūsu bhikkhācāraṃ gatesu appasaddo upasaṅkamitvā sappo viya pāde aggahesi.
tika-vin01t2:1069_7: Thero silāthambho viya niccalo hutvā “ko etthā”ti āha. Ahaṃ, bhante, tissoti.
tika-vin01t2:1069_10: Ekacco pana puthujjanopi atisūro hoti nibbhayo,
tika-vin01t2:1069_12: Vasabharājāpi hi ekaṃ theraṃ pariggaṇhamāno ghare nisīdāpetvā tassa santike badarasāḷavaṃ maddamāno nisīdi.
tika-vin01t2:1069_16: dibbesupi rasesu nikanti nāma na hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1069_17: Tasmā imehi upāyehi pariggahetvā sacassa bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vā rasataṇhā vā uppajjati,
tika-vin01t2:1070_3: saddena “assaddho samāno ‘saddhoti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchati,
tika-vin01t2:1070_4: appassutova samāno ‘bahussutoti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchati,
tika-vin01t2:1070_5: saṅgaṇikārāmova samāno ‘pavivittoti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchati,
tika-vin01t2:1070_6: kusītova samāno ‘āraddhavīriyoti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchati,
tika-vin01t2:1070_7: muṭṭhassatīva samāno ‘upaṭṭhitassatīti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchati,
tika-vin01t2:1070_8: asamāhitova samāno ‘samāhitoti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchati,
tika-vin01t2:1070_9: duppaññova samāno ‘paññavāti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchati,
tika-vin01t2:1070_10: akhīṇāsavova samāno ‘khīṇāsavoti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchati,
tika-vin01t2:1070_11: yā evarūpā icchā icchāgatā pāpicchatā rāgo sārāgo cittassa sārāgo,
tika-vin01t2:1070_12: ayaṃ vuccati pāpicchatā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ pāḷipadesaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin01t2:1070_14: Apakatoti pāpikāya icchāya sammāājīvato apeto katoti icchāya apakato.
tika-vin01t2:1070_15: Tathābhūto ca micchājīvena abhibhūto parājito nāma hotīti āha “abhibhūto parājito”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1071_0: Sāmaññaṃ dupparāmaṭṭhaṃ nirayāyupakaḍḍhatīti yathā kuso yena duggahito,
tika-vin01t2:1071_2: evameva samaṇadhammasaṅkhātaṃ sāmaññampi khaṇḍasīlāditāya dupparāmaṭṭhaṃ nirayāya upakaḍḍhati,
tika-vin01t2:1071_6: Bhiyyo ākirate rajanti abbhantare vijjamānaṃ rāgarajādiṃ evarūpo samaṇadhammo apanetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin01t2:1071_7: atha kho tassa upari aparampi rāgarajādiṃ ākiratīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1071_8: Bhikkhubhāvoti pārājikaṃ āpajjitvā “samaṇo aha”nti paṭijānanato vohāramattasiddho bhikkhubhāvo.
tika-vin01t2:1071_10: Ajānamevanti pāṭhe pana evaṃ jānāmi evaṃ passāmīti avacanti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1073_3: Tena “kāyagatāsatijjhānaṃ pathavīkasiṇajjhānaṃ samāpajji”ntiādiṃ vadantopi pārājikova hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1073_5: saddo visesattho vividhattho vāti dassento āha “suṭṭhu mutto”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1073_7: Tassa saguṇato suññatādināmalābhaṃ dassento āha “so panāya” ntiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1073_8: Maggo hi nāma pañcahi kāraṇehi nāmaṃ labhati sarasena vā paccanīkena vā saguṇena vā ārammaṇena vā āgamanena vā.
tika-vin01t2:1073_9: Sace hi saṅkhārupekkhā aniccato saṅkhāre sammasitvā vuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin01t2:1073_16: Yasmā panesa aniccānupassanāya saṅkhārānaṃ ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā niccanimittadhuvanimittasassatanimittāni pajahanto āgato,
tika-vin01t2:1073_18: Dukkhānupassanāya pana sukhasaññaṃ pahāya paṇidhiṃ patthanaṃ sukkhāpetvā āgatattā appaṇihito.
tika-vin01t2:1073_19: Anattānupassanāya attasattapuggalasaññaṃ pahāya saṅkhārānaṃ suññato diṭṭhattā suññatoti idaṃ paccanīkato nāmaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t2:1074_2: Rāgādipaṇidhiādīnaṃ abhāvato appaṇihitoti idamassa saguṇato nāmaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1074_3: Svāyaṃ suññataṃ animittaṃ appaṇihitañca nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karotīti suññato animitto appaṇihitoti vuccati,
tika-vin01t2:1074_12: Idaṃ pana nāmaṃ na abhidhammapariyāyena labbhati.
tika-vin01t2:1074_13: Tathā hi taṃ saṅkhāranimittassa avijahanato na nippariyāyena animittaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1074_15: Tatra hi gotrabhuñāṇaṃ animittaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā animittanāmakaṃ hutvā sayaṃ āgamaniyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā maggassa nāmaṃ detīti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:1074_18: Dukkhānupassanā saṅkhāresu paṇidhiṃ sukkhāpetvā āgatattā appaṇihitā nāma,
tika-vin01t2:1074_21: Evaṃ vipassanā attano nāmaṃ maggassa deti,
tika-vin01t2:1074_25: uparūpari uppajjanakarāgādīnaṃ kāraṇattā rāgādayo nimittanti āha “rāgadosamohanimittehī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1075_0: Vatthuvijjādiṃ sandhāya avacanato “vijjānaṃ lābhīmhī”ti vuttepi hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1076_1: Na hi kilesānaṃ pahānamattaṃ uttarimanussadhammo hotīti yo vadeyya,
tika-vin01t2:1076_2: taṃ sandhāya kilesappahānassa maggakiccattā kiccavasena maggo dīpitoti dassetuṃ “taṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1076_3: Kāmarāgaṃ sandhāya “tatiyamaggena hi rāgadosānaṃ pahāna”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1076_5: Na hi te tena pahīyanti catutthamaggena pahātabbattā.
tika-vin01t2:1077_0: Rāgā cittaṃ vinīvaraṇatāti rāgā cittassa vinīvaraṇatāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1077_1: Rāgā vimuttassa cittassa tasseva rāganīvaraṇassa abhāvena vigatanīvaraṇattā vinīvaraṇatāti attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1078_4: evamidhāpi “atthapaṭisambhidāya lābhīmhīti vuttepi hotiyevā”ti vattuṃ yujjati.
tika-vin01t2:1078_6: atha kho mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vibhāgena vuttattā na sakkā evamidaṃ vattunti dassetuṃ “mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana…pe…
tika-vin01t2:1078_7: na sakkā aññaṃ pamāṇaṃ kātu”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1080_3: Puna ānetvā paṭhamajjhānādīhi na yojitanti ettha “paṭhamajjhānenā”ti pāṭhoti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1081_3: teneva cittena na sakkā “musā bhaṇāmī”ti jānituṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1081_4: antarantarā pana aññena cittena “musā bhaṇāmī”ti jānātīti vuttaṃ “bhaṇantassa hoti musā bhaṇāmī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1081_5: Ayamettha attho dassitoti tīhi aṅgehi samannāgato musāvādoti ayamettha attho dassito.
tika-vin01t2:1081_6: Na sakkā na bhavitunti pubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya ābhogaṃ katvā bhaṇitattā na sakkā na bhavituṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1081_7: Āpattiyā na kāretabboti pubbabhāgakkhaṇe “musā bhaṇissāmī”ti ābhogaṃ vinā sahasā bhaṇantassa vacanakkhaṇe
tika-vin01t2:1081_8: “musā eta”nti upaṭṭhitepi nivattetumasakkuṇeyyatāya avisayabhāvato āpattiyā na kāretabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1082_12: Tasmiṃ pubbabhāge sati “sesadvayaṃ na hessatī”ti etaṃ natthi,
tika-vin01t2:1082_14: bhaṇissāmīti pubbabhāge sati “bhaṇāmi bhaṇita”nti etaṃ dvayaṃ na na hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1082_16: Ekaṃ viya pakāsatīti anekakkhaṇe uppannampi cittaṃ ekakkhaṇe uppannasadisaṃ hutvā pakāsati.
tika-vin01t2:1082_21: samāpannoti imesaṃ asatipi kālanānatte vacanavisesaṃ sandhāya visuṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1083_2: Magguppattito pubbe viya “sarāgo sadoso”ti vattabbatābhāvato cattampi keci gaṇhanti,
tika-vin01t2:1083_10: Muttampi kiñci muttabandhanaṃ viya phalaṃ kuhiñci tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin01t2:1083_13: Yathā kiñci dunnissaṭṭhaṃ puna ādāya sammadeva nissaṭṭhaṃ paṭinissaṭṭhanti vuccati,
tika-vin01t2:1083_14: evaṃ vipassanāya nissaṭṭhaṃ ādinnasadisaṃ maggena pahīnaṃ paṭinissaṭṭhaṃ nāma hotīti dassanatthaṃ “paṭinissaṭṭho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1083_19: na puna so taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchatīti āha “puna anallīyanabhāvadassanavasenā”ti,
tika-vin01t2:1083_20: puna āgantvā santāne anuppattibhāvadassanavasenāti attho. Khiṭa-
tika-vin01t2:1086_3: Taṅkhaṇaññeva jānātīti “paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajji”ntiādimhi vutte tadatthassa pakatiyā vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1086_4: Evaṃ pana vacībhedaṃ akatvā pakkamanādīsu aññataro bhikkhu “maṃ arahāti jānātū”ti tamhā āvāsā paṭhamaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1086_5: pakkamatīti āgatavatthumhi viya tasmiṃ khaṇe aviditepi nikkhantamatte pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1086_8: pakaticakkhunā pakatisotena ca daṭṭhuṃ sotuñca arahaṭṭhāneti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1086_9: Tena viññattipathaṃ atikkamitvā ṭhito ce koci dibbena cakkhunā dibbāya ca sotadhātuyā disvā sutvā ca jānāti,
tika-vin01t2:1086_12: Paṭhamaṃ vacanamattaṃ assutapubbenapi “paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajji”nti vutte “kimida”nti sandehaṃ anuppādetvā
tika-vin01t2:1086_13: “jhānaṃ nāma kiresa samāpajjī”ti ettakamattepi ñāte pārājikaṃ hotiyeva.
tika-vin01t2:1088_3: Sarūpato pana “anāpatti bhikkhu anullapanādhippāyassā”ti vinītavatthūsu tattha tattha āgatavatthuvasena veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1088_4: “Uttarimanussadhammo aya”nti asallakkhetvā vadantopi vohārato aññaṃ byākaronto nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “aññaṃ byākarontassā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1090_0: Bhāyantopīti “imassa mayi natthibhāvaṃ aññepi jānantā atthi nu kho”ti bhāyantopi.
tika-vin01t2:1092_0: 223. Sekkhabhūmiyanti iminā jhānabhūmimpi saṅgaṇhāti. Tiṇṇaṃ vivekānanti kāyacittaupadhivivekānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1093_1: Bhutvā āgacchantassapi puna vuttanayeneva sambhāvanicchāya cīvarasaṇṭhapanādīni karontassa dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin01t2:1094_2: dhammo āraddhavīriyenāti vatthudvayaṃ ekasadisampi dvīhi bhikkhūhi visuṃ visuṃ ārocitattā bhagavatā vinicchinitaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1095_4: Yadi pana “ete sabhāvato arahantoyevā”ti maññamāno “āyantu bhonto arahanto”tiādīni vadati,
tika-vin01t2:1096_1: Padasā gamanaṃ sandhāya katikāya katattā “yānena vā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:1096_3: Aññamaññaṃ rakkhantīti “yo imamhā āvāsā paṭhamaṃ pakkamissati,
tika-vin01t2:1096_4: taṃ mayaṃ ‘arahā’ti jānissāmā”ti evaṃ katikāya katattā apubbācarimaṃ asuddhacittena gacchantāpi saha nikkhantabhāvato aññamaññaṃ rakkhanti.
tika-vin01t2:1096_5: Keci pana “hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā aññamaññassa hatthaṃ gaṇhanto viya gacchantopi ‘uṭṭhetha gacchāma,
tika-vin01t2:1096_6: etha gacchāmā’ti evaṃ saṃvidahitvā gamane pubbāparaṃ gacchantopi nāpajjatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1096_7: Etaṃ pana adhammikaṃ katikavattanti “idha arahantoyeva vasantūti yadi bhikkhū katikaṃ karonti,
tika-vin01t2:1096_9: Heṭṭhā vuttaṃ pana sabbampi katikavattaṃ sandhāya etaṃ vuttanti amhākaṃ khanti,
tika-vin01t2:1096_13: Ayañca paṭikkhepo imināva nīhārena bahisīmaṭṭhānaṃ avisesena saṅghalābhassa sāmibhāvāpādanaṃ sandhāya kato.
tika-vin01t2:1096_14: Visesato pana bahisīmaṭṭhānampi paricchinditvā ekekakoṭṭhāsato “ettakaṃ dātuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1096_17: īdisassa vā dātuṃ ruccati saṅghassā”ti apalokanakammaṃ katvā dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1097_1: Āyasmā ca lakkhaṇotiādīsu ko panāyasmā lakkhaṇo,
tika-vin01t2:1097_4: kasmā ca sitaṃ pātvākāsīti taṃ sabbaṃ pakāsetuṃ “yvāya”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1097_9: atha kho eko petoti āha “petaloke nibbattaṃ satta”nti.
tika-vin01t2:1097_11: Na āpāthaṃ āgacchantīti devattabhāvā viya pakatiyā āpāthaṃ na āgacchanti.
tika-vin01t2:1097_13: Manussānaṃ dukkhābhibhūtānaṃ anāthabhāvadassanapadaṭṭhānā karuṇāti āha “kāruññe kattabbe”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1097_14: Attano ca sampattiṃ buddhañāṇassa ca sampattinti paccekaṃ sampatti-
tika-vin01t2:1097_17: Tattha “attano ca sampattiṃ anussaritvā sitaṃ pātvākāsī”ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1097_24: Dussaddhāpayāti idañca na lakkhaṇattheraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1098_1: asidhārūpamehi tikhiṇehi lohatuṇḍakehi vijjhitvā vijjhitvā ito cito ca gacchantīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1098_7: Pasādussadāti iminā aṭṭhisaṅghātamattaṃ hutvā paññāyamānānampi kāyappasādassa balavabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1098_8: Pakkagaṇḍasadisāti iminā pana ativiya mudusabhāvataṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1099_1: lokassa cakkhubhūtāti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1099_4: te ca kho vibhāgena kāmabhavādibhede bhave,
tika-vin01t2:1099_7: tathārūpe sattāvāse ca sabbaññutaññāṇañca me upanetuṃ paccakkhaṃ karontena.
tika-vin01t2:1100_4: Balavatā goghātakakammena vipāke dīyamāne aladdhokāsaṃ aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1100_8: Yādise hi ārammaṇe pubbe taṃ kammaṃ tassa ca vipāko pavatto,
tika-vin01t2:1100_9: tādiseyeva ārammaṇe idaṃ kammaṃ imassa vipāko ca pavattoti katvā vuttaṃ “tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesenā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1100_10: Bhavati hi taṃsadisepi tabbohāro yathā so eva tittiro,
tika-vin01t2:1100_12: Yasmā kammasarikkhakavisaye “kammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā”ti dvayameva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1100_13: yasmā ca gatinimittaṃ viya kammaṃ kammanimittañca kammato bhinnaṃ visuṃ hutvā na tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin01t2:1100_14: tasmā sarikkhakavipākadānassa kāraṇabhāvato yattha kammasarikkhakena vipākena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1100_15: tattha kammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā gahetvā paṭisandhi hotīti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1100_19: Tattha nimittaṃ ahosīti pubbe katūpacitassa petūpapattinibbattanavasena katokāsassa tassa kammassa nimittabhūtaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1100_20: idāni tathā upaṭṭhahantaṃ tassa vipākassa nimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ahosi.
tika-vin01t2:1101_1: Pesiyo katvāti gāviṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā gomaṃsaṃ phāletvā pesiyo katvā.
tika-vin01t2:1101_7: Nivāpapuṭṭheti attanā dinnanivāpena posite asinā vadhitvā vadhitvā vikkiṇanto.
tika-vin01t2:1101_12: amutra vā sutaṃ idha sūcetīti sūcako.
tika-vin01t2:1102_1: So hi gāmajanakāyaṃ kūṭaṭṭhena vañcetīti “gāmakūṭo”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:1103_1: Anissaroti mātugāmo sasāmiko attano phasse anissaro.
tika-vin01t2:1105_0: Asīsakaṃ kabandhaṃ hutvā nibbatti kammāyūhanakāle tathā nimittaggahaṇaparicayato.
tika-vin01t2:1106_1: Nissevālapaṇakakaddamoti tilabījakādibhedena sevālena nīlamaṇḍūkapiṭṭhivaṇṇena udakapiṭṭhaṃ chādetvā nibbattapaṇakena kaddamena ca virahito.
tika-vin01t2:1106_2: Sundarehi titthehīti sukhāvagāhaṇaṭṭhānatāya kaddamādidosavirahato ca sundarehi titthehi.
tika-vin01t2:1106_5: Nāgabhavanagatopi hi so rahado tato uparimanussaloke jalāsayena sambandho hoti.
