tika-vin01t2:1303_3: samannāgatā dve tayo bhikkhū uccinitvā tattheva vuttāya ñattidutiyakammavācāya sammannitabbā.
tika-vin01t2:1303_4: Evaṃ sammatehi pana tehi bhikkhūhi visuṃ vā nisīditvā tassāyeva vā parisāya “aññehi na kiñci kathetabba”nti sāvetvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchinitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1304_1: Kimhi nampi na jānāsīti kimhi nanti vacanampi na jānāsi.
tika-vin01t2:1304_2: Nāssa anuyogo dātabboti nāssa pucchā paṭipucchā dātabbā.
tika-vin01t2:1304_9: Saññaṃ datvāti tesaṃ kathaṃ pacchinditvā attano vacanaṃ sādhetuṃ saññaṃ katvā.
tika-vin01t2:1304_11: Ekasambhogaparibhogāti idaṃ attano santikā tesaṃ mocanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1304_13: Vinicchayo na kātabboti “amhākaṃ vacane aṭṭhātabbasabhāvā ete alajjino”ti jānantena vinicchayo na kātabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1305_0: Viraddhaṃ hotīti attanā katadosappaṭicchādanatthaṃ kañci musāvādaṃ katvā viraddhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1305_1: Paṭiññaṃ na detīti sace mayā katadosaṃ vakkhāmi,
tika-vin01t2:1305_2: mayhaṃ anuvattakā bhijjissantīti “kataṃ mayā”ti paṭiññaṃ na deti.
tika-vin01t2:1305_3: Suddho hotūti tesaṃ vacanena suddho nāma hotu,
tika-vin01t2:1305_4: tesaṃ vacanena ekadvevāramassa vinicchayo dātabboti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1305_5: Ṭhāne na tiṭṭhatīti lajjiṭṭhāne na tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin01t2:1305_6: Vinicchayo na dātabboti alajjibhāvamāpannattā na dātabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1306_0: Amūlakampi samūlakampi mūlaṃ gahetvā vadantīti āha “dve mūlānī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1306_1: Kālena vakkhāmītiādīsu eko ekaṃ okāsaṃ kāretvā codento kālena vadati nāma.
tika-vin01t2:1306_2: Saṅghamajjhe gaṇamajjhe salākaggayāguaggavitakkamāḷakabhikkhācāramaggaāsanasālādīsu upaṭṭhākehi parivāritakkhaṇe vā codento akālena vadati nāma.
tika-vin01t2:1306_8: patirūpaṃ tava ida”nti vadanto pharusena vadati nāma.
tika-vin01t2:1306_11: patirūpaṃ tumhākaṃ ida”nti vadanto saṇhena vadati nāma.
tika-vin01t2:1306_12: Kāraṇanissitaṃ katvā vadanto atthasañhitena vadati nāma.
tika-vin01t2:1306_27: Iminā karuṇā ca karuṇāpubbabhāgo ca dassito.
tika-vin01t2:1306_30: Dvīhipi mettā ca mettāpubbabhāgo ca dassito.
tika-vin01t2:1306_32: Vatthuṃ codetvā sāretvā paṭiññaṃ āropetvā yathāpaṭiññāya kammakaraṇaṃ vinayapurekkhāratā nāma.
tika-vin01t2:1306_33: Sacce ca akuppe cāti vacīsacce ca akuppatāya ca.
tika-vin01t2:1307_7: Atha vā samanatthāya pavattamānehi samathehi adhikātabbānīti adhikaraṇāni.
tika-vin01t2:1307_8: Yathā hi samanavasena samathānaṃ vivādādīsu adhikattubhāvo,
tika-vin01t2:1308_0: Tasmā paṇṇatti adhikaraṇanti aṭṭhakathāsu katasanniṭṭhānaṃ dassetvā idāni tampi na yuttanti dassetuṃ “taṃ paneta”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:1308_7: Adhikaraṇe pavattattā ca adhikaraṇanti mañcaṭṭhesu mañcavohāro viya.
tika-vin01t2:1308_8: Yasmā amūlakena codento cuditake puggale taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ natthīti sallakkheti,
tika-vin01t2:1308_9: tasmā tassa vacanaṃ abhidheyyasuññanti āha “sabhāvato natthī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1308_10: Tañca kho idhevāti tañca yathāvuttapariyāyena paṇṇattiyā adhikaraṇabhāvo idheva imasmiṃyeva sikkhāpade.
tika-vin01t2:1308_11: “Mātāpi puttena vivadatī”tiādinayappavattassa vivādassa adhikaraṇabhāvo na sambhavati samathehi anadhikaraṇīyattāti āha “idhekacco vivādo”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1309_0: Aṭṭhārasabhedakaravatthūnīti lakkhaṇavacanametaṃ yathā “yadi me byādhitā daheyyuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1309_2: tasmā tesu aññataraññataraṃ nissāya uppanno vivādo “aṭṭhārasabhedakaravatthūni nissāya uppanno”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:1309_5: Pañcapi āpattikkhandhāti mātikāya āgatā pañca āpattikkhandhā.
tika-vin01t2:1310_0: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ ṭhapetvā sesādhikaraṇehi codanāyeva natthīti āha “imasmiṃ panatthe…pe…
tika-vin01t2:1311_4: Aññatra āgatesūti ito aññatra omasavādādisikkhāpadapāḷiyaṃ āgatesu.
tika-vin01t2:1311_7: Asucisaṅkassarasamācāroti aparisuddhakāyakammāditāya asuci hutvā saṅkāya saritabbasamācāro.
tika-vin01t2:1311_8: Dussīlo hi kiñcideva asāruppaṃ disvā “idaṃ asukena kataṃ bhavissatī”ti paresaṃ āsaṅkanīyo hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1311_9: kenacideva vā karaṇīyena mantayante bhikkhū disvā “kacci nu kho ime mayā katakammaṃ jānitvā mantentī”ti attanoyeva saṅkāya saritabbasamācāro.
tika-vin01t2:1311_15: Pūtinā kammena sīlavipattiyā anto anupaviṭṭhattā antopūti.
tika-vin01t2:1312_4: Taṃ pana vataṃ samādiyitvā pūrento sakalasarīre masiṃ makkhetvā kākapattāni muṭṭhiyaṃ katvā kalideviṃ
tika-vin01t2:1312_5: phalake likhāpetvā taṃ kājakoṭiyaṃ bandhitvā thomento vicarati.
tika-vin01t2:1312_8: No kappetītiādi vematikabhāvadīpanatthameva vuttanti mahāpadumattherassa adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1312_11: pamuṭṭho”ti etehi vematikabhāvāvatthāya adīpanato añño vematikabhāvo,
tika-vin01t2:1312_12: aññāni no kappanādīnīti catunnampi vibhāgena atthaṃ dasseti,
tika-vin01t2:1312_13: tasmā tassa vādo yuttataroti pacchā vutto.
tika-vin01t2:1312_14: Dassane vematiko hotīti puggale ñātepi tassa kiriyāya sammā adiṭṭhabhāvato cirakālātikkamato vā taṃ kiriyaṃ karonto “esa mayā diṭṭho vā,
tika-vin01t2:1312_16: Puggale vematiko hotīti tena katakamme ñātepi taṃ kammaṃ karontassa sammā adiṭṭhabhāvato kālantarabhāvato vā “tassa kammassa kārako ayaṃ vā,
tika-vin01t2:1313_1: “Tajjanīyakammādisattavidhampi kammaṃ karissāmā”ti āpattiyā codentassa adhippāyo kammādhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1313_4: Akkosādhippāyena vadantassa pācittiyanti akkosādhippāyena sattahipi āpattikkhandhehi sammukhā vadantassa pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1314_0: “Evaṃ saṃvaddhā hi tassa bhagavato parisā yadidaṃ aññamaññavacanena aññamaññavuṭṭhāpanenā”ti vacanato
tika-vin01t2:1314_6: Uposathassa ñattikammabhāvato ñattiyā samattāya uposatho kato nāma hotīti āha “yya-
tika-vin01t2:1315_1: “Asuko ca asuko ca assamaṇo anupāsako”ti akkosādhippāyena parammukhā vadantassa dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1315_3: Yathā “asūriyaṃ passati kaññā”ti ettha “sūriyaṃ na passati kaññā”ti ayamattho labbhati,
tika-vin01t2:1315_4: evaṃ “anokāsaṃ kārāpetvā”ti etthāpi “okāsaṃ akārāpetvā”ti ayamattho labbhatīti āha “yaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1318_1: Navame disvāti ajikāya vippaṭipajjantaṃ chagalakaṃ disvā.
tika-vin01t2:1318_2: Mettiyaṃ bhikkhuninti tassā bhikkhunikālaṃ gahetvā bhūtapubbavohārena voharanti.
tika-vin01t2:1318_3: Veḷuvaneyevāti therassa bhikkhācāravelaṃ aggahetvā tehi vuttabhattuddesavelaṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1318_5: Etamatthaṃ ārocesunti aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kañcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsitabhāvaṃ ārocesuṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1319_1: therassa manussajātibhikkhubhāvato aññassa tiracchānajātichagalakabhāvasaṅkhātassa koṭṭhāsassāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1319_13: Tiracchānajātichagalakabhāvañca ṭhapetvā paramatthato visuṃ chagalake asatipi “paṭimāya sarīra”ntiādīsu
tika-vin01t2:1320_0: Idāni dvīhipi viggahehi vuttamatthaṃ vitthāretvā dassento “yo hi so”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:1320_8: vatthu adhiṭṭhāna”nti heṭṭhā vuttamatthaṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ “yasmā cā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:1320_11: Nāmakaraṇasaññāyāti nāmakaraṇasaṅkhātāya saññāya so chagalako adhikaraṇanti veditabboti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1320_14: kiṃ passitthā”ti anuyuttehi tehi bhikkhūhi “chagalakassa vippaṭipattiṃ disvā dabbassa nāmaṃ tassa karimhā”ti
tika-vin01t2:1320_15: vuttattā tassa nāmakaraṇasaññāya adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ taṃ chagalakaṃ sandhāya.
tika-vin01t2:1320_17: Āpattilesampi puggalasmiṃyeva āropetvā vuttattā “puggalānaṃyeva lesā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1320_19: veditabbanti iminā nāmakaraṇasaññāya ādhārabhūtassa chagalakasaṅkhātassa adhikaraṇassa avacane kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1321_1: “Aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassā”ti ettha pāḷiāgataadhikaraṇasaddapatirūpakaṃ aññaṃ adhikaraṇasaddaṃ pāḷiāgatatadaññasādhāraṇatāya
tika-vin01t2:1321_2: ubhayapadatthaṃ uddharitvā “adhikaraṇaṃ nāma cattāri adhikaraṇānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1321_3: Atthuddhāravasena hi atthaṃ dassentena pāḷiyaṃ āgatasaddapatirūpako añño saddo ubhayapadattho uddharitabbo,
tika-vin01t2:1321_4: na ca aññaṃ uddharitvā aññassa attho vattabbo,
tika-vin01t2:1321_5: tasmā pāḷiāgataadhikaraṇasaddapatirūpako aññoyeva ubhayapadatthasādhāraṇo adhikaraṇasaddo uddhaṭoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1321_6: Tenevāha “adhikaraṇanti vacanasāmaññato atthuddhāravasena pavattāni cattāri adhikaraṇānī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1321_8: codanā vuttāti bhikkhu saṅghādisesaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1322_1: itarāsaṃ pana adinnādānādiāpattīnaṃ samānepi pārājikāpattibhāve vatthuto visabhāgāti āha “sabhāgavisabhāgavatthuto”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1322_6: siyā aññabhāgiya”nti vuttattā uddesānukkamena tabbhāgiyataṃ aniddisitvā aññabhāgiyatā paṭhamaṃ kasmā niddiṭṭhāti āha “ādito paṭṭhāyā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1323_0: “Saṅghakammāni nissāya uppanna”nti vuttattā saṅghakammato kiccādhikaraṇaṃ visuṃ viya dissatīti āha “kiṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1323_2: Yadi evaṃ “saṅghakammāni nissāya uppanna”nti kasmā vuttanti āha “evaṃ santepī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1323_3: Tassa tassa saṅghakammassa bhagavatā vuttaṃ itikattabbatālakkhaṇaṃyeva tato saṅghakammassa nipphajjanato
tika-vin01t2:1323_4: phalūpacārena saṅghakammanti vattabbataṃ arahatīti āha “yaṃ kammalakkhaṇaṃ manasi karoti,
tika-vin01t2:1323_6: Parivāsādisaṅghakammaṃ nissāya mānattādīnaṃ uppajjanato ukkhepanīyakammasīmāsammutikammādīni issāya osāraṇasīmāsamūhananādikammānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1324_6: idha pana kañcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādiyanā adhikā.
tika-vin01t2:1327_2: na sakkonti araññakādīni sevantā dukkhassantaṃ kātuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1327_4: Adhivāsanakhantisampannoti “khamo hoti sītassā”tiādinā vuttasītuṇhādisahanalakkhaṇāya khantiyā samannāgato.
tika-vin01t2:1327_6: Yassa hi puggalassa bahumpi suṇato bahumpi bhaṇato bahumpi dhārayato bahumpi vācayato na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1327_10: araññavāsaṃ sampādetuṃ na sakkotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1327_12: Asabbaññū assāti tesaṃ anurūpassa ajānanato asabbaññū bhaveyya. “Na,
tika-vin01t2:1327_16: Idameva vacanaṃ sandhāya pāḷiyampi “aṭṭha māse kho mayā devadatta rukkhamūlasenāsanaṃ anuññāta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1328_2: Tadubhayavimuttaparisaṅkitanti diṭṭhaṃ sutanti idaṃ ubhayaṃ anissāya “kiṃ nu kho idaṃ bhikkhuṃ uddissa vadhitvā sampādita”nti kevalameva parisaṅkitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1328_5: Kappatīti yadi tesaṃ vacanena āsaṅkā upacchinnā hoti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1328_9: Bhikkhūnaṃyeva atthāyāti ettha aṭṭhānappayutto eva- saddo,
tika-vin01t2:1328_12: maṅgalādīnañca atthāya bhavissatī”ti missetvā katampi na vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1328_13: Keci pana “bhikkhūnaṃyevāti avadhāraṇena bhikkhūnañca aññesañca atthāya kataṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:1328_15: Yattha ca nibbematiko hotīti bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya katepi sabbena sabbaṃ parisaṅkitābhāvamāha.
tika-vin01t2:1328_20: Uddisakatamaṃsaparibhogato akappiyamaṃsaparibhogassa visesaṃ dassetuṃ “akappiyamaṃsaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1328_24: “Paribhogakāle pucchitvā paribhuñjissāmīti vā gahetvā pucchitvā paribhuñjitabba”nti vacanato akappiyamaṃsaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1328_27: Vattanti vadantīti iminā āpatti natthīti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1329_4: Saṅghabhedako hi ekaṃ kappaṃ asītibhāge katvā tato ekabhāgamattaṃ kālaṃ niraye tiṭṭheyyāti āyukappaṃ sandhāya “kappaṃ nirayamhi paccatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1329_5: Kappaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “saṇṭhahante hi kappe kappavemajjhe vā saṅghabhedaṃ katvā kappavināseyeva muccati.
tika-vin01t2:1329_6: Sacepi hi sve kappo vinassissatīti ajja saṅghabhedaṃ karoti,
tika-vin01t2:1329_9: Tatthāpi kappavināseyevāti āyukappavināseyevāti atthe sati natthi virodho.
tika-vin01t2:1329_10: Saṇṭhahanteti idampi “sve vinassissatī”ti viya abhūtaparikappanavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1329_11: “Ekadivasameva niraye paccatī”ti etthāpi tato paraṃ kappābhāve āyukappassapi abhāvatoti avirodhato atthayojanā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-vin01t2:1330_4: Aññathā nānāsaṃvāsakena sahitassa samānasaṃvāsakassapi saṅghassa asamānasaṃvāsakattaṃ āpajjeyya.
tika-vin01t2:1330_6: So hi attano laddhiyā nānāsaṃvāsako jātoti “laddhinānāsaṃvāsako”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:1330_8: So hi ukkhepanīyakammavasena nānāsaṃvāsako hotīti “kammanānāsaṃvāsako”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:1330_10: Kāyasāmaggīdānaṃ tesu tesu saṅghakammesu hatthapāsūpagamanavasena veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1331_0: “Bhedāya parakkameyyā”ti visuṃ vuttattā bhedanasaṃvattanikassa adhikaraṇassa samādāya paggaṇhato pubbepi
tika-vin01t2:1331_1: pakkhapariyesanādivasena saṅghabhedāya parakkamantassa samanubhāsanakammaṃ kātabbanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1331_3: Kammenāti apalokanādīsu catūsu kammesu aññatarena kammena.
tika-vin01t2:1331_6: Anussāvanāyāti “nanu tumhe jānātha mayhaṃ uccākulā pabbajitabhāvaṃ bahussutabhāvañca,
tika-vin01t2:1331_7: mādiso nāma uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthusāsanaṃ gāheyyāti cittampi uppādetuṃ tumhākaṃ yuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1331_8: kiṃ mayhaṃ avīci nīluppalavanaṃ viya sītalo,
tika-vin01t2:1331_9: kimahaṃ apāyato na bhāyāmī”tiādinā nayena kaṇṇamūle vacībhedaṃ katvā anussāvanena.
tika-vin01t2:1331_10: Salākaggāhenāti evaṃ anussāvetvā tesaṃ cittaṃ upatthambhetvā anivattidhamme katvā “gaṇhatha imaṃ salāka”nti salākaggāhena.
tika-vin01t2:1331_11: Pañcahi kāraṇehi saṅghabhedo hotīti ettha kammameva uddeso vā saṅghabhede padhānakāraṇanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1331_13: Aṭṭhārasavatthudīpanavasaena hi voharantena tattha rucijananatthaṃ anussāvetvā salākāya gahitāyapi abhinnova hoti saṅgho.
tika-vin01t2:1331_14: Yadā pana evaṃ cattāro vā atirekā vā salākaṃ gahetvā āveṇikakammaṃ vā uddesaṃ vā karonti,
tika-vin01t2:1332_0: “Lajjī rakkhissatī”ti vacanato āpattibhayena ārocanaṃ lajjīnaṃyeva bhāroti āha “lajjīhi bhikkhūhī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1332_4: Ekībhāvo ca samānaladdhivasena hotīti āha “ekaladdhiko hotū”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1332_7: Appaṭinissajjato dukkaṭanti visuṃ visuṃ vadantānaṃ gaṇanāya dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1332_9: Saṅghabhedassa garukabhāvato avassaṃ kattabbatādassanatthaṃ “dūrepi bhāroyevā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1332_10: āpatti pana addhayojanabbhantare gantuṃ samatthassa agilānasseva veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:1333_2: Tatiyakammavācāya paṭinissajjanto ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccaye ca āpajjatiyevāti āha “paṭinissajjantassa saṅghādisesena anāpattī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1333_5: Attano rucimattena vadeyyātiādikammikattā appaṭinissajjantassapi anāpattīti adhippāyena vadeyya.
tika-vin01t2:1333_6: Apaññatte sikkhāpade samanubhāsanakammasseva abhāvato “na hi paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamantassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1333_10: romanthakassa romanthana”ntiādiṃ uddissa anuññātaṃ sandhāya vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1333_12: Āpattiṃ ropetabboti anissajjanapaccayā āpannapācittiyāpattiṃ ukkhepanīyakammakaraṇatthaṃ āropetabboti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1334_0: Āpattiyeva na jātāti saṅghādisesāpatti na jātāyevāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1334_1: Sā panesāti sā pana esā anāpatti.
tika-vin01t2:1337_1: Ekādasame yaṃ vacanaṃ samaggepi vagge avayavabhūte karoti bhindati,
tika-vin01t2:1337_2: taṃ kalahakārakavacanaṃ idha vagganti vuccatīti āha “vaggaṃ asāmaggipakkhiyavacanaṃ vadantī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1337_7: tasmā “na hi saṅgho saṅghassa kammaṃ karotī”ti idaṃ niggahavasena kattabbakammaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1337_8: Aṅgāni panettha bhedāya parakkamanaṃ pahāya anuvattanaṃ pakkhipitvā heṭṭhā vuttasadisāneva.
tika-vin01t2:1340_6: Visesanassa ca paranipātaṃ katvā tiṇakaṭṭhapaṇṇasaṭanti vuttanti āha “tattha tattha patitaṃ tiṇakaṭṭhapaṇṇa”nti.
tika-vin01t2:1341_1: Vattuṃ asakkuṇeyyoti kismiñci vuccamāne asahanato ovadituṃ asakkuṇeyyo.
tika-vin01t2:1341_2: Dukkhaṃ vaco etasmiṃ vippaṭikūlaggāhe vipaccanīkavāde anādare puggaleti dubbaco.
tika-vin01t2:1341_9: asantaguṇasambhāvanatā paṭiggahaṇe ca amattaññutā pāpicchatāti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:1341_10: Attukkaṃsakā ca te paravambhakā cāti attukkaṃsakaparavambhakā.
tika-vin01t2:1341_11: Ye attānaṃ ukkaṃsanti ukkhipanti ucce ṭhāne ṭhapenti,
tika-vin01t2:1341_12: parañca vambhenti garahanti nīce ṭhāne ṭhapenti,
tika-vin01t2:1342_12: Codakaṃ paṭippharaṇatāti codakassa paṭiviruddhena paccanīkena hutvā avaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1342_13: Codakaṃ apasādanatāti “kiṃ nu kho tuyhaṃ bālassa abyattassa bhaṇitena,
tika-vin01t2:1342_14: tvampi nāma bhaṇitabbaṃ maññissasī”ti evaṃ codakassa ghaṭṭanā.
tika-vin01t2:1342_15: Codakassa paccāropanatāti “tvampi khosi itthannāmaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno,
tika-vin01t2:1342_16: taṃ tāva paṭikarohī”ti evaṃ codakassa upari paṭiāropanatā.
tika-vin01t2:1343_3: Paṭicchādanattho eva vā carasaddo anekatthattā dhātūnanti paṭicchādanatāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1343_4: Tāya samannāgato hi puggalo yaṃ codakena dosavibhāvanakāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1343_6: taṃ tato aññeneva codanāya amūlikabhāvadīpanena kāraṇena,
tika-vin01t2:1343_12: kiṃ bhaṇathā”ti vā vatvā “evarūpaṃ kiñci tayā diṭṭha”nti vutte “na suṇāmī”ti sotaṃ vā upanāmetvā vikkhepaṃ karontopi aññenaññaṃ paṭicchādeti.
tika-vin01t2:1343_13: “Itthannāmaṃ āpattiṃ āpannosī”ti puṭṭhe “pāṭaliputtaṃ gatomhī”ti vatvā puna “na tava pāṭaliputtagamanaṃ pucchāma,
tika-vin01t2:1343_14: āpattiṃ pucchāmā”ti vutte tato “rājagahaṃ gatomhī”ti vatvā “rājagahaṃ vā yāhi brāhmaṇagahaṃ vā,
tika-vin01t2:1343_15: āpattiṃ āpannosī”ti vutte “tattha me sūkaramaṃsaṃ laddha”ntiādīni vatvā bahiddhā kathāvikkhipanampi atthato
tika-vin01t2:1344_6: kaṃ nissāya vasasī”ti vā “yaṃ tvaṃ vadesi ‘mayā esa āpattiṃ āpajjanto diṭṭho’ti,
tika-vin01t2:1344_10: kattha aya”nti vā ādinā nayena cariyaṃ puṭṭhena sampādetvā akathanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1345_2: Tādiso puggalo agāriyo anagāriyo vā samāno paresaṃ sukatakaraṇaṃ vināseti.
tika-vin01t2:1345_3: Agāriyopi hi kenaci anukampakena daliddo samāno uccaṭṭhāne ṭhapito,
tika-vin01t2:1345_4: aparena samayena “kiṃ tayā mayhaṃ kata”nti tassa sukatakaraṇaṃ vināseti.
tika-vin01t2:1345_5: Anagāriyopi sāmaṇerakālato pabhuti ācariyena vā upajjhāyena vā catūhi paccayehi uddesaparipucchādīhi
tika-vin01t2:1345_7: aparena samayena rājarājamahāmattādīhi sakkato garukato ācariyupajjhāyesu acittīkato caramāno “ayaṃ amhehi daharakāle eva anuggahito saṃvaddhito ca,
tika-vin01t2:1345_8: atha ca panidāni nissineho jāto”ti vuccamāno “kiṃ mayhaṃ tumhehi kata”nti tesaṃ sukatakaraṇaṃ vināseti.
tika-vin01t2:1346_0: “Bahussutepi puggale ajjhottharitvā īdisassa ceva bahussutassa aniyatā gati,
tika-vin01t2:1346_1: tava vā mama vā ko viseso”tiādinā nayena uppajjamāno yugaggāhalakkhaṇo paḷāso.
tika-vin01t2:1346_3: Tathā hesa paresaṃ guṇe ḍaṃsitvā viya attano guṇehi same karotīti paḷāsoti vuccati,
tika-vin01t2:1346_7: Atthato pana makkho ceva paḷāso ca.
tika-vin01t2:1347_7: Ānandamaccho nāma kira macchānaṃ naṅguṭṭhaṃ dasseti,
tika-vin01t2:1347_9: evameva kerāṭiko puggalo yaṃ yaṃ suttantikaṃ vā ābhidhammikaṃ vā upasaṅkamati,
tika-vin01t2:1347_10: taṃ taṃ evaṃ vadati “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ antevāsī,
tika-vin01t2:1347_12: nāhaṃ tumhe muñcāmī”ti “evamete ‘sagāravo ayaṃ amhesu sappatisso’ti maññissantī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1347_13: Sāṭheyyena hi samannāgatassa puggalassa asantaguṇasambhāvanena cittānurūpakiriyāviharato “evaṃcitto evaṃkiriyo”ti
tika-vin01t2:1347_14: duviññeyyattā kucchiṃ vā piṭṭhiṃ vā jānituṃ na sakkā. Yato so –
tika-vin01t2:1350_0: Evaṃ vuttayakkhasūkarasadiso hoti. Katapāpapaṭicchādanalakkhaṇā māyā, sā assa atthīti māyāvī.
tika-vin01t2:1351_2: Yena samannāgato puggalo gilitanaṅgalasadiso viya ajagaro,
tika-vin01t2:1351_3: vātabharitabhastā viya ca thaddho hutvā garuṭṭhāniye disvā onamitumpi na icchati,
tika-vin01t2:1352_0: Saṃ attano diṭṭhiṃ parāmasati sabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā parato āmasatīti sandiṭṭhiparāmāsī.
tika-vin01t2:1352_4: Yuttaṃ kāraṇaṃ disvāva laddhiṃ paṭinissajjatīti paṭinissaggī,
tika-vin01t2:1352_5: dukkhena kicchena kasirena bahumpi kāraṇaṃ dassetvā na sakkā paṭinissaggiṃ kātunti duppaṭinissaggī,
tika-vin01t2:1352_6: yo attano diṭṭhiṃ “idameva sacca”nti daḷhaṃ gaṇhitvā api buddhādīhi kāraṇaṃ dassetvā vuccamāno na paṭinissajjati,
tika-vin01t2:1352_8: Tādiso hi puggalo yaṃ yadeva dhammaṃ vā adhammaṃ vā suṇāti,
tika-vin01t2:1352_10: evaṃ amhehi suta”nti kummova aṅgāni sake kapāle antoyeva samodahati.
tika-vin01t2:1352_11: Yathā hi kacchapo attano pādādike aṅge kenaci ghaṭṭite sabbāni aṅgāni attano kapāleyeva samodahati,
tika-vin01t2:1352_14: chaḍḍehi na”nti vutto taṃ na vissajjeti,
tika-vin01t2:1352_15: antoyeva attano hadaye eva ṭhapetvā vicarati.
tika-vin01t2:1352_19: Makkhipaḷāsitādiyugaḷattayena dassite makkhapaḷāsādayo cha dhamme visuṃ visuṃ gahetvā “ekūnavīsati dhammā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1352_20: Anumānasuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana makkhapaḷāsādayopi yugaḷavasena ekaṃ katvā “soḷasa dhammā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1353_4: ahaṃ attano kappiyākappiyaṃ sāvajjānavajjaṃ atthānatthaṃ jānāmī”ti vadati,
tika-vin01t2:1354_1: Atha sabbāneva sikkhāpadāni kathaṃ pātimokkhuddesapariyāpannānīti āha “yassa siyā āpatti,
tika-vin01t2:1354_3: “Yassa siyā āpattī”ti hi iminā sabbāpi āpattiyo nidānuddese saṅgahitāyeva honti.
tika-vin01t2:1357_2: Tañhi sandhāya parato “na assajipunabbasukehi bhikkhūhi kīṭāgirismiṃ vatthabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1357_3: Tena pana yogato so janapadopi “kīṭāgiri”icceva saṅkhyaṃ gatoti āha “evaṃnāmake janapade”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1357_11: Nivāso nivāsamattaṃ etesaṃ atthīti nevāsikāti āha “ye pana kevala”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1357_13: Cha janāti paṇḍuko lohitako mettiyo bhūmajako assaji punabbasukoti ime cha janā.
tika-vin01t2:1357_17: Vassāne hemante cāti dvīsu utūsu vassanato “dvīhi meghehī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1357_18: Diyaḍḍhabhikkhusahassato gaṇācariyānaṃ channaṃ janānaṃ adhikattā “samadhika”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1358_4: Āḷiyā bandhananti yathā gacchamūle udakaṃ santiṭṭhati,
tika-vin01t2:1358_8: Nanu “udakassa secanaṃ secāpana”nti imināva sāmaññato kappiyākappiyaudakasiñcanādiṃ sakkā saṅgahetuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1358_10: “Ārāmādiatthaṃ ropite akappiyavohāresupi kappiyaudakasiñcanādi vaṭṭatī”ti vakkhamānattā idhāpi vibhāgaṃ katvā kappiyaudakasiñcanādi visuṃ dassitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1358_13: Akappiyanti voharīyatīti akappiyavohāroti akappiyabhūtaṃ karaṇakārāpanādi sabbameva saṅgahitaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1358_16: Sukkhamātikāya ujukaraṇanti iminā purāṇapaṇṇādiharaṇampi saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1358_17: Kudālādīni bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā ṭhānato hatthena gahetvā ṭhānameva pākaṭataranti “obhāso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1359_3: Akappiyavohārepi ekaccaṃ vaṭṭatīti dassetuṃ “na kevalañca sesa”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:1359_4: Yaṃ kiñci mātikanti sukkhamātikaṃ vā asukkhamātikaṃ vā.
tika-vin01t2:1359_5: “Kappiyaudakaṃ siñcitu”nti iminā “kappiyaudakaṃ siñcathāti vattumpi vaṭṭatī”ti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1359_6: Sayaṃ ropetumpi vaṭṭatīti iminā “ropehīti vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”tipi siddhaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1359_8: Kasmā na anāpattīti vatthupūjanatthāya ganthanādīsu kasmā na anāpatti.
tika-vin01t2:1359_9: Anāpattiyevāti paṭivacanaṃ datvā idāni tameva anāpattibhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “yathāhī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1359_11: Tathā vatthupūjanatthāyapi anāpattiyevāti ratanattayapūjanatthāyapi kappiyavohārena pariyāyādīhi ca ganthāpane anāpattiyevāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1360_0: “Tathā vatthupūjanatthāyā”ti hi sāmaññato vuttepi “yathā hi tattha kappiyavohārena pariyāyādīhi cā”ti
tika-vin01t2:1360_1: vuttattā kappiyavohārādīhi ganthāpane eva anāpatti viññāyati,
tika-vin01t2:1360_3: teneva paro sayaṃ ganthanampi kasmā na vaṭṭatīti codento “nanu cā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:1360_4: Yathā ārāmādiatthaṃ kappiyapathaviyaṃ sayaṃ ropetumpi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:1360_5: tathā vatthupūjanatthāya sayaṃ ganthanepi kasmā na vaṭṭatīti codakassa adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1360_8: Mahāpaccariādīsu vuttampi hi pamāṇamevāti nāyaṃ virodho,
tika-vin01t2:1360_9: mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ avuttampi tattheva vuttena saṃsanditvā pamāṇamevāti patiṭṭhāpetuṃ vuttattā.
tika-vin01t2:1360_13: Kiñcāpi mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ ārāmādiatthāya kappiyapathaviyaṃ sayaṃ ropanaṃ na vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1360_15: tasmā yathā ārāmādiatthāya kappiyaudakaṃ sayaṃ siñcitumpi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:1360_16: tathā vatthupūjanatthāya sayaṃ ganthanampi kasmā na vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin01t2:1360_17: Tampi na virujjhatīti yadetaṃ ārāmādiatthāya sayaṃ ropanaṃ kappiyaudakasiñcanañca vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1360_20: Etaṃ vuttanti mālāvacchaṃ ropentipi ropāpentipi siñcantipi siñcāpentipīti etaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1360_21: Aññatra pana pariyāyo atthīti “mālāvacchaṃ ropentipi ropāpentipi siñcantipi siñcāpentipī”ti kulasaṅgahatthāya
tika-vin01t2:1360_22: ropanasiñcanaṃ sandhāya vuttattā tato aññatra ārāmādiatthāya mālāvaccharopane pariyāyo atthi.
tika-vin01t2:1360_23: Tattha pariyāyaṃ idha ca pariyāyābhāvaṃ ñatvāti tattha “mālāvacchaṃ ropentī”tiādīsu “mālāvaccha”nti visesavacanasabbhāvato pariyāyaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1361_0: Nanu ca yathā “ganthentī”ti sāmaññato vuttattā pariyāyo na labbhatīti yassa kassaci atthāya sayaṃ ganthanaṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:1361_1: evaṃ “ganthāpentī”ti sāmaññato vuttattā pariyāyena ganthāpanampi na vaṭṭatīti āpajjati.
tika-vin01t2:1361_5: tathā karohītiādinā kappiyavacanena kāretuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ virujjhatīti?
tika-vin01t2:1361_7: pariyāyena hi kārāpanaṃ ganthāpanameva na hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1361_9: Sabbaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbanti heṭṭhā vuttaṃ vinicchayameva saṅkhepato nigameti.
tika-vin01t2:1361_10: Haraṇādīsu kasmā anāpattīti vatthupūjanatthāya haraṇādīsu kasmā anāpatti.
tika-vin01t2:1361_11: Kulitthiādīnaṃ atthāya haraṇatoti kulitthiādīnaṃ haraṇassa tattha vuttattāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1362_10: Dukkaṭanti kulasaṅgahatthāya sayaṃ siñcane kappiyavohārena akappiyavohārena vā siñcāpane ca dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1362_11: paribhogatthāya pana sayaṃ siñcane akappiyavohārena siñcāpane ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1362_12: Āpattibahulatā veditabbāti ettha sayaṃ siñcane dhārāpacchedagaṇanāya āpattigaṇanā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t2:1362_13: Siñcāpane pana punappunaṃ āṇāpentassa vācāya vācāya āpatti,
tika-vin01t2:1364_2: Na vaṭṭatīti kulasaṅgahatthāya vatthupūjādiatthāya vā vuttanayena karontassa ca kārāpentassa ca dukkaṭanti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1364_4: Dhammāsanavitāne baddhakaṇṭakesu pupphāni vijjhitvā ṭhapentīti sambandho.
tika-vin01t2:1364_5: Uparūpari vijjhitvā chattasadisaṃ katvā āvuṇanato “chattātichattaṃ viyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1364_7: sayaṃ karontassa akappiyavacaneneva kārāpentassa ca dukkaṭamevāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1364_8: Pupphavijjhanatthanti vuttattā pupphāni vijjhituṃyeva kaṇṭakaṃ bandhituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:1364_10: Kaṇṭakampi bandhituṃ na vaṭṭatīti ca idaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyappamāṇena gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1364_11: Pavesetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti vuttattā pupphacchidde apavesetvā uparūpari ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1364_17: “Dhammarajju nāma cetiyaṃ vā bodhiṃ vā pupphapavesanatthaṃ āvijjhitvā baddharajjū”ti mahāgaṇṭhipade majjhimagaṇṭhipade ca vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1364_18: tasmā tathābaddhāya rajjuyā cetiyassa ca antare pupphāni pavesetuṃ vaṭṭatīti viññāyati.
tika-vin01t2:1364_19: Gaṇṭhipade pana “dhammarajjunti sithilaṃ vaṭṭikaṃ rajjuṃ katvā bodhiṃ vā cetiyaṃ vā parikkhipitvā dhammāsane
tika-vin01t2:1364_20: vā lambitvā tattha pupphāni pavesentī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1364_21: tasmā sithilavaṭṭikāya rajjuyā antarepi pupphāni pavesetuṃ vaṭṭatīti viññāyati,
tika-vin01t2:1364_23: Ubhayatthāpi panettha nevatthi virodhoti amhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin01t2:1365_3: Vākena vā daṇḍakena vāti visuṃ acchinnena pupphasahiteneva vākena vā daṇḍakena vā.
tika-vin01t2:1365_4: Khandhe ṭhapitakāsāvassāti khandhe ṭhapitasaṅghāṭiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1365_6: Imināva aññampi tādisaṃ kāsāvaṃ vā vatthaṃ vā vuttanayena bandhitvā tattha pupphāni pakkhipituṃ vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1365_7: Aṃsabhaṇḍikaṃ pasibbake pakkhittasadisattā veṭhimaṃ nāma na jātaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1365_8: tasmā sithilabandhassa antarantarā pakkhipituṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1366_0: Pupphapaṭe ca daṭṭhabbanti pupphapaṭaṃ karontassa dīghato pupphadāmassa haraṇapaccāharaṇavasena pūraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1366_1: Tiriyato haraṇaṃ pana vāyimaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1366_3: Purimaṭṭhānaṃ atikkāmetīti ettha “aphusāpetvāpi atikkāmentassa āpattiyevā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1366_5: Keci pana “aññamaññaṃ aphusāpetvā anekakkhattuṃ parikkhipituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadantīti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1366_7: Bandhituṃ vaṭṭatīti puppharahitāya suttakoṭiyā vākakoṭiyā vā bandhituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1366_8: Ekavāraṃ haritvā vā parikkhipitvā vāti idaṃ pubbe vuttacetiyādiparikkhepaṃ pupphapaṭakaraṇañca sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1366_9: tasmā cetiyaṃ vā bodhiṃ vā parikkhipantena ekavāraṃ parikkhipitvā purimaṭṭhānaṃ sampatte aññassa dātabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1366_11: Pupphapaṭaṃ karontena ca ekavāraṃ haritvā aññassa dātabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1366_13: Sacepi dveyeva bhikkhū ubhosu passesu ṭhatvā pariyāyena haranti,
tika-vin01t2:1367_1: Vāyituṃ na labhatīti dīghato pasārite tiriyato haraṇaṃ vāyanaṃ nāma hotīti ekavārampi pupphaguṇaṃ tiriyato harituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1367_3: Pupphadāmaṃ pana pūjanatthāya bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapentena phusāpetvā vā aphusāpetvā vā diguṇaṃ katvā ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1367_5: Ekekaṃ pana dāmaṃ nikkhantasuttakoṭiyāva bandhitvā olambituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:1367_6: pupphadāmadvayaṃ saṅghaṭitukāmenapi nikkhantasuttakoṭiyāva suttakoṭiṃ saṅghaṭituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1367_7: Aḍḍhacandākārena mālāguṇaparikkhepoti aḍḍhacandākārena mālāguṇassa punappunaṃ haraṇapaccāharaṇavasena pūretvā parikkhipanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1367_9: tasmā etampi aḍḍhacandākāraṃ punappunaṃ haraṇapaccāharaṇavasena pūritaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1367_10: Ekavāraṃ pana aḍḍhacandākārena mālāguṇaṃ harituṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1367_11: Pupphadāmakaraṇanti ettha suttakoṭiyaṃ gahetvāpi ekato kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1367_12: Geṇḍukakharapattadāmānaṃ paṭikkhittattā celādīhi katadāmampi na vaṭṭati akappiyānulomattāti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1368_0: “Lāsiyanāṭakaṃ nāṭentī”ti vatvā tameva pariyāyantarena dassetuṃ “recakaṃ dentī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1368_2: attano adhippāyaṃ pakāsetvā “evaṃ naccitabba”nti paṭhamaṃ uṭṭhahitvā naccanākāraṃ dassentīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1368_3: Keci pana “mukhe aṅguliyo pakkhipitvā saddaṃ karontā cakkamiva attānaṃ bhamayamānā recakaṃ denti nāmā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1368_4: Ekekāya pantiyā aṭṭha aṭṭha padāni assāti aṭṭhapadaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1368_8: Dasapadaṃ nāma dvīhi pantīhi vīsatiyā padehi kīḷanajūtaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1368_9: Ākāseyeva kīḷantīti “ayaṃ sārī asukapadaṃ mayā nītā,
tika-vin01t2:1368_10: ayaṃ asukapada”nti kevalaṃ mukheneva vadantā ākāseyeva jūtaṃ kīḷanti.
tika-vin01t2:1368_12: Pāsakakīḷāya kīḷantīti pāsakaṃ vuccati chasu passesu ekekaṃ yāva chakkaṃ dassetvā katakīḷanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1368_13: taṃ vaḍḍhetvā yathāladdhaekakādivasena sāriyo apanentā upanentā ca kīḷanti.
tika-vin01t2:1369_0: Mañjaṭṭhiyā vāti mañjaṭṭhirukkhasāraṃ gahetvā pakkakasāvaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin01t2:1369_2: Bahūsu salākāsu visesarahitaṃ ekaṃ salākaṃ gahetvā tāsu pakkhipitvā puna taṃyeva uddharantā salākahatthena kīḷantīti keci.
tika-vin01t2:1369_5: Pucchantassa mukhāgataṃ akkharaṃ gahetvā naṭṭhamuṭṭhilābhālābhādijānanakīḷā akkharikātipi vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1369_9: “Usseḷenti apphoṭentī”ti dvinnaṃ padānaṃ attho pākaṭoyevāti na vutto.
tika-vin01t2:1369_12: “Ajānaṃ saññaṃ dentā ajapālakā viya mukhena vātaṃ nicchārentā sukhumaṃ abyattanādaṃ pavattentī”tipi vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1369_14: vāmahatthaṃ ure ṭhapetvā dakkhiṇena pāṇinā tattha tāḷanena saddaṃ karontīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1370_7: Ito cito ca dassanenāti anudisāpekkhanaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1370_11: Aññānipi heṭṭhā upari pacchato pekkhanavasena olokitaullokitāpalokitāni nāma honti.
tika-vin01t2:1370_15: “Pabbasaṅkocanenā”ti hi vuttattā pabbāni tattha guṇībhūtāni saṅkocanassa padhānattā.
tika-vin01t2:1370_16: Satisampajaññehīti sātthakatādipariggāhikāya satiyā tathāpavattasampajaññena ca samantato pakārehi,
tika-vin01t2:1370_22: Khandhaṃ nāmetvā hi heṭṭhāvalokanaṃ na samaṇasāruppaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1371_3: Yā sā vācā nelā kaṇṇasukhā”tiādinā nayena vuttasākhalyena samannāgatā,
tika-vin01t2:1371_9: sūcinā vijjhanaṃ viya kaṇṇasūlaṃ na janeti.
tika-vin01t2:1372_0: “Sāriputtamoggallāne āmantesī”ti vatvā “gacchatha tumhe sāriputtā”ti vacanato “sāriputtā”ti idaṃ ekasesanayena
tika-vin01t2:1372_2: “Sāriputtā”ti hi idaṃ ekasesanayena vuttaṃ virūpekasesassapi icchitattā,
tika-vin01t2:1372_4: Saddhassa pasannassāti ratanattayassa saddhāya samannāgatassa tatoyeva ca pasannassa,
tika-vin01t2:1372_5: kammaphalasaddhāya vā samannāgatattā saddhassa ratanattayappasādabahulatāya pasannassa.
tika-vin01t2:1373_2: Tasmiṃ vihāreti bahigāme vihāraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1373_3: Antogāme vihāro pana “tasmiṃ gāme na vasitabba”nti imināva saṅgahito gāmaggahaṇeneva gahitattā.
tika-vin01t2:1373_4: “Tasmiṃ vihāre”ti vacanato tassa gāmassa sāmantā aññasmiṃ vihāre vasituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1373_5: Sāmantagāme piṇḍāya na caritabbanti tasmiṃ vihāre vāsassa paṭikkhittattā yadi tattha vasati,
tika-vin01t2:1373_6: tena sāmantagāmepi piṇḍāya na caritabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1373_7: Tasmiṃ gāme piṇḍāya na caritabbanti yasmiṃ gāme kuladūsakakammaṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1373_9: Yasmiñhi gāme vā nigame vā kuladūsakakammaṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1373_11: neva tasmiṃ gāme vā nigame vā carituṃ labbhati,
tika-vin01t2:1373_13: Sāmantavihāre vasantena pana sāmantagāme carituṃ vaṭṭati tattha vāsassa appaṭikkhittattā.
tika-vin01t2:1374_6: yāya āpattiyā saṅghena pabbājanīyakammaṃ kataṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1374_7: na sā āpatti āpajjitabbā aññā vā tādisikā tato vā pāpiṭṭhatarā,
tika-vin01t2:1374_17: na bhikkhūhi sampayojetabba”nti evamāgatāni aṭṭhārasa vattāni.
tika-vin01t2:1375_2: yena vattena ciṇṇena saṅgho anulomiko hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1375_4: Na pannalomā hontīti patitalomā na honti,
tika-vin01t2:1375_6: Nittharaṇamaggaṃ na paṭipajjantīti anulomavattasaṅkhātaṃ nittharaṇūpāyaṃ na paṭipajjanti,
tika-vin01t2:1375_7: yena vattena ciṇṇena sāpattikabhāvato nittiṇṇā honti,
tika-vin01t2:1375_9: āpattivuṭṭhānatthaṃ turitaturitā chandajātā na hontīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1375_12: kāro “sayaṃ abhiññā”tiādīsu viya luttaniddiṭṭhoti āha “chandagāmitāyapi pāpentī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1376_3: dukkaṭamevāti vissāsaggāhena parasantakaṃ gahetvā dentaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1376_4: Tañca kho vatthupūjanatthāyāti mātāpitūnampi dentena vatthupūjanatthāya eva dātabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1376_5: “Maṇḍanatthāya pana sivaliṅgādipūjanatthāyāti ettakameva vuttattā imaṃ vikkiṇitvā jīvikampi kappessantīti mātuādīnaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1376_8: Sampattānaṃ sāmaṇerānaṃ upaḍḍhabhāgaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti saṅghikassa lābhassa upacārasīmagatānaṃ sāmaṇerānampi
tika-vin01t2:1376_9: santakattā tesampi upaḍḍhabhāgo labbhatevāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1377_1: ṭhapentī”ti idaṃ vassaggena abhājiyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1377_2: Tattha tatthāti magge vā cetiyaṅgaṇe vā.
tika-vin01t2:1377_3: Dāpetuṃ na labhantīti sāmaṇerehi dāpetuṃ ananucchavikattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1377_4: Na hi taṃ pupphadānaṃ nāma siyā.
tika-vin01t2:1377_5: Yadi hi tathā āgatānaṃ tesaṃ dānaṃ pupphadānaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-vin01t2:1377_8: Yāgubhattādīni ādāyāti idaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya yāgubhattādisampādanaṃ sandhāya vuttattā “na vaṭṭatī”ti avisesena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1378_0: Vuttanayenevāti mātāpitūnaṃ tāva haritvāpi harāpetvāpi pakkositvāpi pakkosāpetvāpi dātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:1378_4: vaṭṭatīti imaṃ pupphe vuttanayaṃ phalepi atidisati,
tika-vin01t2:1378_5: tasmā phalampi mātāpitūnaṃ haraṇaharāpanādinā dātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:1378_8: issaravatāya dadato thullaccaya”nti imaṃ pupphe vuttanayaṃ phalepi saṅkhipitvā dassento “kulasaṅgahatthāya panā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:1378_10: Phalaparicchedena vāti “ettakāni phalāni dātabbānī”ti evaṃ phalaparicchedena vā.
tika-vin01t2:1378_11: Rukkhaparicchedena vāti “imehi rukkhehi dātabbānī”ti evaṃ rukkhaparicchedena vā.
tika-vin01t2:1378_13: ito gaṇhathā”ti vadantena kulasaṅgaho kato nāma hotīti āha “evaṃ pana na vattabba”nti.
tika-vin01t2:1379_1: Tesaṃ tesaṃ gihīnaṃ gāmantaradesantarādīsu sāsanapaṭisāsanaharaṇaṃ jaṅghapesanikaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1379_5: pade pade dukkaṭanti idaṃ tassa sāsanaṃ ārocessāmīti iminā adhippāyena gamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1379_6: tassa pana sāsanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā sayameva kāruññe ṭhito gantvā attano patirūpaṃ sāsanaṃ āroceti, anāpatti.
tika-vin01t2:1379_7: Pubbe vuttappakāranti “mama vacanena bhagavato pāde vandathā”tiādinā vuttappakāraṃ sikkhāpade paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1379_9: Puna pakkamatāyasmāti idaṃ pana pabbājanīyakammakatassa vattavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1379_10: Paṭhamasaṅghabhedasadisānevāti ettha aṅgesupi yathā tattha parakkamanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1382_2: Tattakāni ahānīti paṭicchāditadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva ārocitadivaso,
tika-vin01t2:1382_5: Akāmena avasenāti ettha appaṭikammakatāya āpattiyā saggamokkhāvaraṇabhāvato anicchantenapi parivasitabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1382_7: Te ca bhikkhū gārayhāti ettha ye ūnabhāvaṃ ñatvā abbhenti,
tika-vin01t2:1382_8: te bhikkhū ca garahitabbā sātisārā sadosā,
tika-vin01t2:1382_9: dukkaṭaṃ āpajjantīti ayamattho pākaṭoyevāti na vutto.
tika-vin01t2:1387_1: Puttasaddena sāmaññaniddesato ekasesanayena vā puttīpi gahitāti āha “bahū dhītaro cā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1387_2: Dānappadānesūti khuddakesu ceva mahantesu ca dānesu.
tika-vin01t2:1387_3: Chaṇaṃ nāma attano gehe kattabbamaṅgalanti āha “āvāhavivāhamaṅgalādīsū”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1387_5: saddena phagguṇamāsādīsu uttaraphagguṇādiabhilakkhitadivasesu saparijanānaṃ manussānaṃ maṅgalakaraṇampi saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin01t2:1387_10: saddena yasmiṃ nakkhatte gāmanigamavāsino tayo satta vā divase nakkhattaghosanaṃ katvā yathāvibhavaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1387_13: Imepi dārakāti attano dārake sandhāya vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1388_2: Bhikkhu nisinneti ettha bhikkhūti bhummatthe paccattavacanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1388_3: bhummavacanassa vā lopaṃ katvā niddesoti āha “bhikkhumhi nisinne”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1388_5: “paṭicchanne āsane”ti pana vacanato “sakkā hoti methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitu”nti ca vuttattā cakkhussa
tika-vin01t2:1388_7: Paricchedo veditabboti raho nisajjāpattiyā paricchedo vavatthānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1388_8: Idāni cakkhussa raheneva āpattiṃ paricchinditvā dassento “sacepi hī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:1388_9: Pihitakavāṭassāti iminā paṭicchannabhāvato cakkhussa rahosabbhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1388_11: Appaṭicchanne ca dutiyasikkhāpade āgatanayena sotassa rahavasenapi paricchedo veditabboti āha “antodvādasahatthepi okāse”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1388_12: “Antodvādasahatthe”ti hi idaṃ sotassa rahābhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1388_13: Yadi hi cakkhusseva rahābhāvaṃ sandhāya vadeyya,
tika-vin01t2:1388_14: “antodvādasahatthe”ti na vadeyya appaṭicchanne tato dūratare nisinnepi cakkhussa rahāsambhavato.
tika-vin01t2:1388_15: Yasmā nisīditvā niddāyanto kapimiddhapareto kañci kālaṃ cakkhūni ummīleti,
tika-vin01t2:1388_19: Nipajjitvā niddāyanto pana tādiso na hotīti āha “nipajjitvā niddāyanto na karotī”ti,
tika-vin01t2:1389_2: Tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena kāretabboti nisajjaṃ paṭijānamānassa tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarasamāyogo hotiyevāti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1389_3: Pārājikena pana saṅghādisesena ca pācittiyena ca tenākārena nisajjaṃ paṭijānamānova kāretabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1389_4: Na appaṭijānamānoti alajjīpi appaṭijānamāno āpattiyā na kāretabboti avisesena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1390_0: “Paṭiññā lajjīsu katā, alajjīsu evaṃ na vijjati;
tika-vin01t2:1392_0: Yena vā sā saddheyyavacasā upāsikā vadeyya,
tika-vin01t2:1392_1: tena so bhikkhu kāretabboti ettha “paṭijānamāno”ti avuttepi adhikārattā “paṭijānamānova tena so bhikkhu kāretabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1392_2: Tathārūpāya upāsikāya vacanena aññathattābhāvato diṭṭhaṃ nāma tathāpi hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1392_5: vadāpethāti idaṃ “evaṃ mahiddhikāpi tumhe evarūpe āsaṅkanīye ṭhāne kasmā anupaparikkhitvā nisinnattha,
tika-vin01t2:1392_6: tumhādisehi nāma antaraghare nisīdantehi upaparikkhitvā patirūpe ṭhāne nisīditabba”nti theraṃ ovadanto āha,
tika-vin01t2:1392_8: Thero attano anupaparikkhitvā anisinnabhāvaṃ dassento “antaragharasseveso āvuso doso”ti āha.
tika-vin01t2:1392_9: Evamakāsinti attano nigūhitabbampi guṇaṃ pakāsento evaṃ viya iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ akāsiṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1392_10: Rakkheyyāsi manti “mā maṃ aññepi evaṃ jānantū”ti attano guṇaṃ ajānāpetukāmo vadati.
tika-vin01t2:1393_1: Mātugāmassa methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantoti ettha “magge”ti pāṭhaseso daṭṭhabboti āha “mātugāmassa magge”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1393_2: Raho nisajjassādassa asatipi methunarāgabhāve tappaṭibaddhakilesattā vuttaṃ “methunadhammasannissitakileso vuccatī”ti,
tika-vin01t2:1393_4: Taṃ sandhāya agatepi asuddhacittena gatattā “assāde uppanne pācittiya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1393_5: Rahassādo uppajjati anāpattīti suddhacittena gantvā nisinnattā cittuppādamattenettha āpatti na hotīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1393_6: Ayaṃ dhammo aniyatoti ettha tiṇṇaṃ āpattīnaṃ yaṃ āpattiṃ vā vatthuṃ vā paṭijānāti,
tika-vin01t2:1393_7: tassa vasena kāretabbatāya aniyatoti ayamattho pākaṭoyevāti na vutto.
tika-vin01t2:1396_1: “Eko”ti vuttattā “nisajjaṃ kappetuṃ paṭikkhitta”nti iminā sambandho na ghaṭatīti āha “yaṃ eko…pe…
tika-vin01t2:1397_3: Itthīpi purisopīti ettha paṭhame kasmā itthisatampi anāpattiṃ na karoti,
tika-vin01t2:1397_4: idha ekāpi kasmā anāpattiṃ karotīti? Vuccate –
tika-vin01t2:1397_5: paṭhamasikkhāpadaṃ “sakkā hoti methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitu”nti vuttattā methunadhammavasena āgataṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1397_6: na ca methunassa mātugāmo dutiyo hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1397_8: teneva vesāliyaṃ mahāvane dvāraṃ vivaritvā nipanne bhikkhumhi sambahulā itthiyo yāvadatthaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu,
tika-vin01t2:1397_9: tasmā tattha “itthisatampi anāpattiṃ na karotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1397_10: Idaṃ pana sikkhāpadaṃ duṭṭhullavācāvasena āgataṃ “alañca kho hoti mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsitu”nti vuttattā.
tika-vin01t2:1397_12: Teneva duṭṭhullavācāsikkhāpade yā tā itthiyo hirimanā,
tika-vin01t2:1397_16: tattha paṭicchannattā itthisatampi anāpattiṃ na karotīti ca vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1398_4: Tasmā dvādasahatthato bahi nisinno anāpattiṃ na karoti satipi cakkhussa rahābhāve sotassa rahasabbhāvato.
tika-vin01t2:1398_5: Imasmiñhi sikkhāpade appaṭicchannattā sotassa rahoyeva adhippeto.
tika-vin01t2:1398_7: Kenaci pana “dvepi rahā idha adhippetā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1398_9: Na hi appaṭicchanne okāse cakkhussa raho sambhavati dvādasahatthato bahi dassanavisaye dūratare nisinnassapi daṭṭhuṃ sakkuṇeyyabhāvato.
tika-vin01t2:1398_10: Niddāyantopīti iminā “nipajjitvā niddāyantopi gahitoyevā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1398_11: “Nipajjitvā niddāyantepi satipi cakkhussa rahe abadhirattā sotassa raho natthī”ti gaṇṭhipadakārānaṃ adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1398_12: Yathā pana nipajjitvā niddāyanto andho viya kiñci na passatīti cakkhussa raho sambhavati,
tika-vin01t2:1398_13: tathā badhiro viya kiñci saddaṃ na suṇātīti sotassa rahopi sambhavatīti sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1398_14: Aṭṭhakathāyañca ṭhito vā nisinno vāti ettakameva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1398_15: paṭhamasikkhāpade viya “nipajjitvā niddāyantopi anāpattiṃ na karotī”ti idaṃ pana na vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1399_0: Sotassa rahasseva idhādhippetattā “badhiro pana cakkhumāpī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1399_1: Andhassa appaṭicchannampi paṭicchannapakkhaṃ bhajatīti paṭhamasikkhāpadassa visayattā vuttaṃ “andho vā abadhiropi na karotī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1399_2: Yatheva hi tattha apihitakavāṭassa gabbhassa anto samīpepi ṭhito andho anāpattiṃ na karoti,
tika-vin01t2:1399_5: Yasmā dvīhi sikkhāpadehi udāyittheraṃ ārabbha visuṃ paññattā kāci āpatti nāma natthi,
tika-vin01t2:1399_6: tasmā tassa tassa sikkhāpadassa ādikammike sandhāya ādikammikānaṃ anāpatti vuttā.
tika-vin01t2:1399_8: Bhagavatā pana paṭhamaṃ paññattasikkhāpadāniyeva gahetvā upanandavatthusmiṃ aniyatakkamo dassito.
tika-vin01t2:1399_9: Yadi imehi sikkhāpadehi visuṃ paññattā āpatti nāma natthi,
tika-vin01t2:1399_11: Evarūpāyapi upāsikāya vuccamāno paṭijānamānoyeva āpattiyā kāretabbo,
tika-vin01t2:1399_12: na appaṭijānamānoti dassentena bhagavatā yāya kāyaci āpattiyā yena kenaci codite paṭiññātakaraṇaṃyeva daḷhaṃ katvā vinayavinicchayalakkhaṇaṃ ṭhapitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1399_13: Atha bhikkhunīnaṃ aniyataṃ kasmā na vuttanti?
tika-vin01t2:1399_14: Idameva lakkhaṇaṃ sabbattha anugatanti na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1406_2: Gotamake cetiyeti gotamayakkhassa cetiyaṭṭhāne katavihāro vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:1406_3: Paribhuñjituṃ anuññātaṃ hotīti bhagavatā gahapaticīvare anuññāte bahūni cīvarāni labhitvā bhaṇḍikaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t2:1406_4: sīsepi khandhepi kaṭiyāpi ṭhapetvā āgacchante bhikkhū disvā cīvare sīmaṃ bandhantena ticīvaraṃ paribhogatthāya
tika-vin01t2:1407_1: Eko kira brāhmaṇo cintesi “buddharatanassa ca saṅgharatanassa ca pūjā paññāyati,
tika-vin01t2:1407_2: kathaṃ nu kho dhammaratanaṃ pūjitaṃ nāma hotī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1407_8: So bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā “bahussutaṃ bhante ācikkhathā”ti āha.
tika-vin01t2:1407_12: saddo nipphannapariyāyopi hotīti taṃ paṭikkhipanto āha “no nipphattivasenā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1408_0: Therassa santike upajjhaṃ gāhāpetvā sayaṃ anussāvanakammaṃ karotīti ettha sāriputtattheropi tatheva karotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1408_1: Evaṃ ekamekena attano pattacīvaraṃ datvā pabbājetvā upajjhaṃ gaṇhāpitāni pañca pañca bhikkhusatāni ahesuṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1408_2: Āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ativiya mamāyatīti ānandatthero tāva mamāyatu akhīṇāsavabhāvato,
tika-vin01t2:1408_6: Navamaṃ vā divasaṃ dasamaṃ vāti bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1408_7: navame vā dasame vā divaseti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1408_8: Sace bhaveyyāti sace kassaci evaṃ siyā.
tika-vin01t2:1409_1: Niṭṭhitacīvarasminti bhummavacanassa lopaṃ katvā niddesoti āha “niṭṭhite cīvarasmi”nti,
tika-vin01t2:1409_5: Sūciyā paṭisāmananti idaṃ sūcikammassa sammā pariniṭṭhitabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1410_0: Kathine ca ubbhatasminti yaṃ saṅghassa kathinaṃ atthataṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1410_2: Dutiyassa palibodhassa abhāvaṃ dassetīti āvāsapalibodhassa abhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1410_3: Ettha ca “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ ubbhatasmiṃ kathine”ti imehi dvīhi padehi dvinnaṃ palibodhānaṃ abhāvadassanena
tika-vin01t2:1410_4: atthatakathinassa pañcamāsabbhantare yāva cīvarapalibodho āvāsapalibodho ca na upacchijjati,
tika-vin01t2:1410_5: tāva anadhiṭṭhitaṃ avikappitaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dasāhato parampi ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpeti.
tika-vin01t2:1410_6: Atthatakathinassa hi yāva kathinassa ubbhārā anāmantacāro asamādānacāro yāvadatthacīvaraṃ gaṇabhojanaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1410_7: yo ca tattha cīvaruppādoti ime pañcānisaṃsā labbhanti.
tika-vin01t2:1411_3: Bhaṅganti khomasuttādīni sabbāni ekaccāni vā missetvā katacīvaraṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1411_5: Dukūlaṃ paṭṭuṇṇaṃ somārapaṭaṃ cīnapaṭaṃ iddhijaṃ devadinnanti imāni pana cha cīvarāni etesaṃyeva anulomānīti visuṃ na vuttāni.
tika-vin01t2:1411_10: Paṭṭuṇṇādīni tīṇi koseyyassa anulomāni pāṇakehi katasuttamayattā.
tika-vin01t2:1411_12: taṃ khomādīnaṃ aññataraṃ hotīti tesaṃ eva anulomaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1411_14: taṃ kapparukkhe nibbattaṃ jāliniyā devakaññāya anuruddhattherassa dinnavatthasadisaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1411_15: tampi khomādīnaṃyeva anulomaṃ hoti tesu aññatarabhāvato.
tika-vin01t2:1412_0: Majjhimassa purisassa vidatthiṃ sandhāya “dve vidatthiyo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1412_1: Iminā dīghato vaḍḍhakīhatthappamāṇaṃ vitthārato tato upaḍḍhappamāṇaṃ vikappanupaganti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1412_2: Tathā hi “sugatavidatthi nāma idāni majjhimassa purisassa tisso vidatthiyo,
tika-vin01t2:1412_3: vaḍḍhakīhatthena diyaḍḍho hattho hotī”ti kuṭikārasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1412_4: tasmā sugataṅgulena dvādasaṅgulaṃ vaḍḍhakīhatthena diyaḍḍho hatthoti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1412_5: Evañca katvā sugataṅgulena aṭṭhaṅgulaṃ vaḍḍhakīhatthappamāṇanti idaṃ āgatamevāti.
tika-vin01t2:1413_0: Taṃ atikkāmayatoti ettha tanti cīvaraṃ kālaṃ vā parāmasati.
tika-vin01t2:1413_1: Tassa yo aruṇoti tassa cīvaruppādadivasassa yo atikkanto aruṇo.
tika-vin01t2:1413_2: Cīvaruppādadivasena saddhinti cīvaruppādadivasassa atikkantaaruṇena saddhinti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1414_1: Aññathāpi vattabbanti ettha “yāya kāyaci bhāsāya padapaṭipāṭiyā avatvāpi atthamatte vutte vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1414_3: Paṭiggāhakena “passasī”ti vutte desakena vattabbavacanaṃ dasseti “āma passāmī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1414_5: Evaṃ vutte puna desakena vattabbavacanaṃ “sādhu suṭṭhu saṃvarissāmī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1414_6: Iminā attano āyatiṃ saṃvare patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1414_7: Dvīsu pana sambahulāsu vāti dvīsu sambahulāsu vā āpattīsu purimanayeneva vacanabhedo veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1414_8: Ñattiyaṃ āpattiṃ sarati vivaratīti ettha dve āpattiyoti vā sambahulā āpattiyoti vā vattabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1414_11: Gaṇassa vuttā pāḷiyevettha pāḷīti dvīsu imāhaṃ āyasmantānaṃ nissajjāmīti vacane visesābhāvato vuttaṃ. Evaṃ…pe…
tika-vin01t2:1414_12: vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti vatvā tattha kāraṇamāha “ito garukatarānī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1415_1: Na idha saññā rakkhatīti idaṃ vematikaṃ anatikkantasaññañca sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1415_5: “Na idha saññā rakkhatī”tiādinā vuttamatthaṃ sesattikepi atidisati.
tika-vin01t2:1415_6: Esa nayo sabbatthāti esa nayo avinaṭṭhādīsupīti aññesaṃ cīvaresu upacikādīhi khāyitesu “mayhampi cīvaraṃ
tika-vin01t2:1415_11: Anāpatti aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjatīti idaṃ nisīdanasanthataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1415_12: Yaṃ yena hi purāṇasanthatassa sāmantā sugatavidatthiṃ anādiyitvā aññaṃ navaṃ nisīdanasanthataṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1415_14: Tasmā “anāpatti aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjatī”ti idaṃ parassa nissaggiyaṃ aparassa paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti imamatthaṃ sādheti.
tika-vin01t2:1415_15: Paribhogaṃ sandhāya vuttanti anatikkante atikkantasaññissa vematikassa ca paribhuñjantasseva dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1416_2: Na vikappetunti nāmaṃ vatvā na vikappetuṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1416_4: Tasmā ticīvarādīni adhiṭṭhahantena “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”tiādinā nāmaṃ vatvā adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1416_5: Vikappentena pana “imaṃ saṅghāṭi”ntiādinā tassa tassa cīvarassa nāmaṃ aggahetvāva “imaṃ cīvaraṃ tuyhaṃ vikappemī”ti vikappetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1416_7: yadi taṃ taṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā vikappeti,
tika-vin01t2:1416_10: Tato paraṃ vikappetunti “catumāsato paraṃ vikappetvā paribhuñjituṃ anuññāta”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1416_11: Keci pana “tato paraṃ vikappetvā yāva āgāmisaṃvacchare vassānaṃ cātumāsaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1416_13: “Tato paraṃ vikappetuṃ anujānāmīti ettāvatā vassikasāṭikaṃ kaṇḍuppaṭicchādiñca taṃ taṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā
tika-vin01t2:1416_14: vikappetuṃ anuññātanti evamattho na gahetabbo tato paraṃ vassikasāṭikādināmasseva abhāvato.
tika-vin01t2:1416_15: Tasmā tato paraṃ vikappentenapi nāmaṃ gahetvā na vikappetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1416_16: Ubhinnampi tato paraṃ vikappetvā paribhogassa anuññātattā tathā vikappitaṃ aññanāmena adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitabba”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1417_2: Imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmīti ettha “imaṃ cīvaraṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmīti evampi vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1417_3: tampi “imaṃ cīvaraṃ parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti iminā sameti.
tika-vin01t2:1417_4: Kāyavikāraṃ karontenāti hatthena cīvaraṃ parāmasantena vā cālentena vā.
tika-vin01t2:1417_8: Tato paraṃ “eta”nti vatvā adhiṭṭhātabbanti keci vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1417_12: Sāmantavihāro nāma yattha tadaheva gantvā nivattituṃ sakkā.
tika-vin01t2:1417_14: tasmā ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvā dūre ṭhitampi adhiṭṭhātabbanti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1417_15: Ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvāti ca idaṃ ṭhapitaṭṭhānasallakkhaṇaṃ anucchavikanti katvā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1418_1: Adhiṭṭhānato pubbe saṅghāṭiādivohārassa abhāvato “imaṃ paccuddharāmī”ti parikkhāracoḷassa visuṃ paccuddhāravidhiṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1418_2: Parikkhāracoḷanāmena pana adhiṭṭhitattā “imaṃ parikkhāracoḷaṃ paccuddharāmī”ti vuttepi nevatthi dosoti viññāyati.
tika-vin01t2:1418_3: Paccuddharitvā puna adhiṭṭhātabbānīti idañca saṅghāṭiādicīvaranāmena adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitukāmaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1418_4: Parikkhāracoḷanāmeneva adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjantassa pana pubbekataadhiṭṭhānameva adhiṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1418_5: Adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ natthīti iminā kappabindudānakiccampi natthīti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1418_8: Baddhasīmāyaṃ avippavāsasīmāsammutisabbhāvato cīvaravippavāsepi nevatthi dosoti na tattha dupparihāratāti āha “abaddhasīmāyaṃ dupparihāra”nti.
tika-vin01t2:1419_0: Anatirittappamāṇāti sugatavidatthiyā dīghaso cha vidatthiyo tiriyaṃ aḍḍhateyyavidatthiñca anatikkantappamāṇāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1419_5: Tasmā “tato paraṃ paccuddharitvā vikappetabbā”ti kasmā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1419_7: Ettha tāva tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu idaṃ vuttaṃ “paccuddharitvāti idaṃ paccuddharaṇaṃ sandhāya na vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1419_8: paccuddharitvāti pana vassikasāṭikabhāvato apanetvāti evamattho gahetabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1419_9: Tasmā hemantassa paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya antodasāhe vassikasāṭikabhāvato apanetvā vikappetabbāti imamatthaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1420_0: Keci pana “yathā kathinamāsabbhantare uppannacīvaraṃ kathinamāsātikkame nissaggiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1420_2: tasmā kattikapuṇṇamadivase paccuddharitvā tato paraṃ hemantassa paṭhamadivase vikappetabbāti evamattho gahetabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1420_3: Paccuddharitvā tato paraṃ vikappetabbāti padayojanā veditabbā”ti ca vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:1420_5: Kathinamāse uppannañhi cīvaraṃ atirekacīvaraṭṭhāne ṭhitattā avasānadivase anadhiṭṭhitaṃ kathinamāsātikkame nissaggiyaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1420_6: Ayaṃ pana vassikasāṭikā adhiṭṭhahitvā ṭhapitattā na tena sadisāti vassānātikkame kathaṃ nissaggiyā hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1420_8: tasmā hemantepi vassikasāṭikā dasāhaṃ parihāraṃ labhatiyeva.
tika-vin01t2:1420_10: tasmā tato paraṃ dasāhaṃ parihāraṃ labhati,
tika-vin01t2:1421_1: kaṇḍuppaṭicchādi ābādhe vūpasantepi adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahati,
tika-vin01t2:1421_2: tasmā ‘tato paraṃ paccuddharitvā vikappetabbā’ti idaṃ vutta”nti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:1421_6: kaṇḍuppaṭicchādi ābādhavūpasamenapi adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatī”ti idaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ natthi,
tika-vin01t2:1421_8: no gimhe”ti ettha idaṃ vuttaṃ “kattikapuṇṇamāsiyā pacchime pāṭipadadivase vikappetvā ṭhapitaṃ vassikasāṭikaṃ nivāsento hemante āpajjati.
tika-vin01t2:1421_9: Kurundiyaṃ pana ‘kattikapuṇṇamadivase apaccuddharitvā hemante āpajjatī’ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1422_2: Tasmā kurundiyaṃ vuttanayeneva vassikasāṭikā vassānamāsātikkamepi adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatīti paññāyati.
tika-vin01t2:1422_4: tato paraṃ vikappetu”nti vacanato yadi kattikapuṇṇamāyaṃ na paccuddhareyya,
tika-vin01t2:1422_5: avijahitādhiṭṭhānā vassikasāṭikā hemantaṃ sampattā vikappanakkhette adhiṭṭhānasabbhāvato dukkaṭaṃ janeti,
tika-vin01t2:1422_6: tasmā kattikapuṇṇamāyaṃ eva paccuddharitvā hemante vikappetabbāti iminā adhippāyena “kattikapuṇṇamadivase apaccuddharitvā hemante āpajjatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1423_1: Dve pana na vaṭṭantīti dvinnaṃ adhiṭṭhānābhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1423_3: purimavassikasāṭikaṃ paccuddharitvā vikappetvā ca adhiṭṭhātabbā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1423_13: Apare pana “ekavacanenapi vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ ‘sakiṃ adhiṭṭhitaṃ adhiṭṭhitamevā’ti vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1423_14: Ubhayatthāpi assa vacanassa idha vacane apubbaṃ payojanaṃ na dissati,
tika-vin01t2:1423_15: teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne “sakiṃ adhiṭṭhitaṃ adhiṭṭhitameva hotī”ti idaṃ padaṃ na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1424_0: “Attano santakabhāvato mocetvā ṭhapitaṃ sandhāya mahāpaccariyaṃ anāpatti vuttā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1424_4: idaṃ mātuyāti vissajjetvā sakasantakabhāvato mocite adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ natthīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1424_5: Senāsanaparikkhāratthāya dinnapaccattharaṇeti ettha “anivāsetvā apārupitvā ca kevalaṃ mañcapīṭhesuyeva
tika-vin01t2:1424_6: attharitvā paribhuñjiyamānaṃ paccattharaṇaṃ attano santakampi anadhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1424_7: Heṭṭhā pana “paccattharaṇampi adhiṭṭhātabbamevā”ti avisesena vuttattā attano santakaṃ adhiṭṭhātabbamevāti amhākaṃ khanti,
tika-vin01t2:1425_0: “Hīnāyāvattanenāti sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya gihibhāvūpagamanenā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1425_1: taṃ yuttaṃ aññassa dāne viya cīvare nirālayabhāveneva pariccattattā.
tika-vin01t2:1425_2: Keci pana “hīnāyāvattanenāti bhikkhuniyā gihibhāvūpagamanenā”ti evamatthaṃ gahetvā “bhikkhu pana vibbhamantopi yāva sikkhaṃ na paccakkhāti,
tika-vin01t2:1425_3: tāva bhikkhuyevāti adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:1425_4: taṃ na gahetabbaṃ “bhikkhuniyā hīnāyāvattanenā”ti visesetvā avuttattā.
tika-vin01t2:1425_5: Bhikkhuniyā hi gihibhāvūpagamane adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ visuṃ vattabbaṃ natthi tassā vibbhamaneneva assamaṇībhāvato.
tika-vin01t2:1425_6: Sikkhāpaccakkhānenāti pana idaṃ sace bhikkhuliṅge ṭhitova sikkhaṃ paccakkhāti,
tika-vin01t2:1425_7: tassa kāyalaggampi cīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1425_10: Dve cīvarāni pārupantassāti antaragharappavesanatthāya suppaṭicchannasikkhāpade vuttanayena saṅghāṭiṃ uttarāsaṅgañca ekato katvā pārupantassa.
tika-vin01t2:1425_12: Esa nayoti iminā pamāṇayuttesu yattha katthaci chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahati,
tika-vin01t2:1425_13: mahantesu pana tato parena chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatīti ayamattho dassito.
tika-vin01t2:1426_0: Aññaṃ pacchimappamāṇaṃ nāma natthīti sutte āgataṃ natthīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1426_2: “Taṃ atikkamayato chedanakaṃ pācittiya”nti vuttattā āha “tato uttari paṭisiddhattā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1426_3: Taṃ na sametīti parikkhāracoḷassa vikappanupagapacchimaṃ pacchimappamāṇanti gahetvā itaresaṃ ticīvarādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1426_4: muṭṭhipañcakādibhedaṃ pacchimappamāṇaṃ sandhāya “esa nayo”tiādivacanaṃ na sameti tādisassa pacchimappamāṇassa
tika-vin01t2:1426_6: Andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttavacanaṃ na sametīti imināva paṭikkhepena vikappanupagapacchimassa anto yattha
tika-vin01t2:1426_7: katthaci chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatīti ayampi nayo paṭikkhittoyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1426_8: Ticīvarañhi ṭhapetvā sesacīvaresu chiddena adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ nāma natthi,
tika-vin01t2:1426_9: tasmā adhiṭṭhahitvā ṭhapitesu sesacīvaresu vikappanupagapacchimaṃ appahontaṃ katvā khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chinnesupi adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ natthi.
tika-vin01t2:1426_10: Sace pana adhiṭṭhānato pubbeyeva tādisaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1426_13: Mahantaṃ vā khuddakaṃ karotīti ettha tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ catūsu passesu yasmiṃ padese chiddaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahati,
tika-vin01t2:1426_14: tasmiṃ padese samantato chinditvā khuddakaṃ karontassa adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1427_0: Sammukhāvikappanā parammukhāvikappanāti ettha sammukhena vikappanā parammukhena vikappanāti evamattho gahetabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1427_3: Paribhogādayopi vaṭṭantīti ettha adhiṭṭhānassapi antogadhattā sace saṅghāṭiādināmena adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjitukāmo hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1427_10: Vikappitavikappanā nāmesā vaṭṭatīti adhiṭṭhitaadhiṭṭhānaṃ viyāti adhippāyo avisesena vuttavacananti ticīvarādiṃ adhiṭṭheti,
tika-vin01t2:1427_11: vassikasāṭikaṃ kaṇḍuppaṭicchādiñca vikappetīti avatvā sabbacīvarānaṃ avisesena vikappetīti vuttavacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1428_0: Tuyhaṃ demītiādīsu “tasmiṃ kāle na gaṇhitukāmopi sace na paṭikkhipati,
tika-vin01t2:1428_1: puna gaṇhitukāmatāya sati gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1428_4: sudinnaṃ suggahitañcāti ettha “yathā parato ‘tava santakaṃ karohī’ti vutte duddinnampi ‘sādhu, bhante,
tika-vin01t2:1428_6: evamidhāpi ‘tuyhaṃ gaṇhāhī’ti vutte sudinnattā ‘mayhaṃ gaṇhāmī’ti avuttepi ‘sudinnamevā”’ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1428_7: “Gaṇhāhīti ca āṇattiyā gahaṇassa tappaṭibaddhatākaraṇavasena pavattattā tadā gaṇhāmīti citte anuppādite pacchā gahetuṃ na labhatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1429_0: Taṃ na yujjatīti vinayakammassa karaṇavasena gahetvā dinnattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1429_1: Sace pana paro saccatoyeva vissāsaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin01t2:1429_2: puna kenaci kāraṇena tena dinnaṃ tassa na vaṭṭatīti natthi.
tika-vin01t2:1429_3: Nissaggiyaṃ pana cīvaraṃ jānitvā vā ajānitvā vā gaṇhantaṃ “mā gaṇhāhī”ti nivāraṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1429_4: Kāyavācāhi kattabbaadhiṭṭhānavikappanānaṃ akatattā hotīti āha “kāyavācāto samuṭṭhātī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1432_2: kiṃ karonto ca āhiṇḍatīti āha “thero kirā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1433_1: Evaṃ chinnapalibodhoti evaṃ imehi cīvaraniṭṭhānakathinubbhārehi chinnapalibodho.
tika-vin01t2:1433_4: paṭo daḍḍho”tiādīsu viya avayavepi samudāyavohāro labbhatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1434_1: Parikhāya vā parikkhittoti iminā ca samantā nadītaḷākādiudakena parikkhittopi parikkhittoyevāti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1434_3: Ākāse aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetīti gharassa upari ākāse aḍḍhateyyaratanappamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpeti.
tika-vin01t2:1434_5: na pana pāṭiyekkaṃ gharaṃ nāma atthīti āha “ettha cā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1435_4: saddo napuṃsakaliṅgayutto idha vuttoti imamatthaṃ dassento “liṅgabyattayena sabhā vuttā”ti āha.
tika-vin01t2:1435_5: Cīvarahatthapāse vasitabbaṃ natthīti cīvarahatthapāseyeva vasitabbanti natthi.
tika-vin01t2:1435_7: na vijahitabbanti ettha tassā vīthiyā sammukhaṭṭhāne sabhāyadvārānaṃ gahaṇeneva tattha sabbānipi gehāni sā ca antaravīthi gahitāyeva hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1435_8: Atiharitvā ghare nikkhipatīti taṃ vīthiṃ muñcitvā ṭhite aññasmiṃ ghare nikkhipati.
tika-vin01t2:1435_9: Purato vā pacchato vā hatthapāseti gharassa hatthapāsaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin01t2:1436_2: Nivesanādīni gāmato bahi sanniviṭṭhāni gahitānīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1437_1: Ovarako nāma gabbhassa abbhantare añño gabbhotipi vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1438_5: Tattha antopaviṭṭhenāti gāmassa nadiyā vā antopaviṭṭhena.
tika-vin01t2:1438_6: Nadīparihāro ca labbhatīti ettha “visuṃ nadīparihārassa avuttattā gāmādīhi aññattha viya cīvarahatthapāsoyeva
tika-vin01t2:1438_9: Vihāraṃ gantvā vasitabbanti antosīmāya yattha katthaci vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1438_12: satthe cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā hatthapāsā na vijahitabbanti ettha hatthapāso nāma satthassa hatthapāsoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1439_2: Yasmā “nānākulassa parikkhitte khette cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā khettadvāramūle vā tassa hatthapāse vā vatthabba”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1439_3: tasmā dvāramūlato aññattha antokhettepi vasantena cīvaraṃ hatthapāse katvāyeva vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1440_1: “Vihāro nāma saparikkhitto vā aparikkhitto vā sakalo āvāso”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1440_2: Yasmiṃ vihāreti ettha pana ekaṃ gehameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1440_4: Chāyāya phuṭṭhokāsassa anto evāti yadā mahāvīthiyaṃ ujukameva gacchantaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ majjhanhikaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin01t2:1440_7: Agamanapatheti yaṃ tadaheva gantvā puna āgantuṃ sakkā na hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1441_4: Aparibhogārahattāti imināva nissaggiyacīvaraṃ anissajjetvā paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṃ acittakanti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1441_5: Ekaṃ pārupitvā ekaṃ aṃsakūṭe ṭhapetvā gantabbanti idaṃ bahūnaṃ sañcāraṭṭhāne evaṃ akatvā gamanaṃ na sāruppanti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1441_7: vinayakammaṃ kātabbanti vuttattā adhiṭṭhāne viya parammukhā ṭhitampi nissaggiyaṃ cīvaraṃ nissajjituṃ nissaṭṭhacīvarañca dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1442_0: Gamane saussāhattā “nissayo pana na paṭippassambhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1442_2: nissayo ca paṭippassambhatīti ettha “ussāhe apariccattepi gamanassa upacchinnattā puna uṭṭhāya saussāhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1442_3: gacchantānampi antarā aruṇe uṭṭhite nissayo paṭippassambhatiyevā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1442_4: Parato muhuttaṃ ṭhatvāti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-vin01t2:1442_5: Aññamaññassa vacanaṃ aggahetvā gatāti ettha sace evaṃ gacchantā “purāruṇā aññamaññaṃ passissāmā”ti ussāhaṃ vināva gatā honti,
tika-vin01t2:1442_6: aruṇuggamane nissayapaṭippassaddhi na vattabbā paṭhamataraṃyeva paṭippassambhanato.
tika-vin01t2:1442_9: Evañca sati “saha aruṇuggamanā nissayo paṭippassambhatī”ti kasmā vuttaṃ? Vuccate –
tika-vin01t2:1442_11: Satipi ca ussāhabhāve ekato gamanassa upacchinnattā “muhuttaṃ ṭhatvā”ti ettha viya saha aruṇuggamanā paṭippassaddhiyeva vuttā.
tika-vin01t2:1443_0: Antosīmāyaṃ gāmanti avippavāsasīmāsammutiyā pacchā patiṭṭhāpitagāmaṃ sandhāya vadati gāmaṃ anto katvā avippavāsasīmāsammutiyā abhāvato.
tika-vin01t2:1443_1: Neva cīvarāni nissaggiyāni hontīti avippavāsasīmābhāvato vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1443_3: Antarāmaggeyeva ca nesaṃ aruṇaṃ uggacchatīti dhammaṃ sutvā āgacchantānaṃ aruṇaṃ uggacchati.
tika-vin01t2:1443_4: Assatiyā gacchatīti assatiyā attano cīvaraṃ apaccuddharitvā therassa cīvaraṃ apaccuddharāpetvā gacchati.
tika-vin01t2:1443_5: Evaṃ gate tasmiṃ pacchā therena saritvā paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ dasseti “attano cīvaraṃ paccuddharitvā daharassa
tika-vin01t2:1443_7: Gantvā vattabboti āgatakiccaṃ niṭṭhapetvā vihāraṃ gatena paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1446_1: Tatiye pāḷiyaṃ cīvarapaccāsā nikkhipitunti ettha cīvarapaccāsāya satiyā nikkhipitunti evamattho gahetabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1446_4: Niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunāti ettha purimasikkhāpade viya sāmivaseneva karaṇavacanassa attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1447_1: Anatthate kathine cīvaramāse bhikkhuno uppannacīvaraṃ anadhiṭṭhitaṃ avikappitaṃ tasmiṃ māse ṭhapetuṃ
tika-vin01t2:1447_4: etaṃ akālacīvaranti vacanato anatthate kathine pacchimakattikamāsasaṅkhāte cīvaramāse uppannacīvarassapi paccāsācīvare asati dasāhaparihāroyeva,
tika-vin01t2:1447_5: tato paraṃ ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:1447_7: Tathā hi accekacīvarasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “pavāraṇamāsassa juṇhapakkhapañcamiyaṃ uppannassa accekacīvarassa
tika-vin01t2:1447_9: atthate kathine ekādasadivasādhikā pañca māsā parihāro”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1447_10: Tameva ca parihāraṃ sandhāya “chaṭṭhito paṭṭhāya pana uppannaṃ anaccekacīvarampi paccuddharitvā ṭhapitacīvarampi etaṃ parihāraṃ labhatiyevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1447_11: Tasmā cīvaramāse dasāhato parampi anadhiṭṭhitaṃ avikappitampi ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1448_1: etaṃ akālacīvara”nti idaṃ kasmā vuttanti ce?
tika-vin01t2:1448_2: Akālacīvarasāmaññato atthuddhāravasena vuttaṃ paṭhamāniyate sotassa raho viya.
tika-vin01t2:1448_3: Ekādasamāse sattamāse ca uppannañhi cīvaraṃ vutthavassehi sesehi ca sammukhībhūtehi bhājetuṃ labbhatīti akālacīvaraṃ nāma jātaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1448_4: Kāle pana “saṅghassa idaṃ akālacīvaraṃ dammī”ti anuddisitvā “saṅghassa dammī”ti dinnaṃ vutthavassehiyeva bhājetabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1448_6: Ādissa dinnaṃ pana sammukhībhūtehi sabbehiyeva bhājetabbanti akālacīvaraṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1448_7: tasmā kālepi ādissa dinnassa vutthavassehi sesehi ca sampattehi bhājanīyattā akālacīvarasāmaññato “kālepi ādissa dinnaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1448_9: Yadi evaṃ “ekapuggalassa vā idaṃ tuyhaṃ dammīti dinna”nti kasmā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1448_10: Na hi puggalassa ādissa dinnaṃ kenaci bhājanīyaṃ hotīti?
tika-vin01t2:1448_11: Nāyaṃ virodho ādissa vacanasāmaññato labbhamānamatthaṃ dassetuṃ tathā vuttattā.
tika-vin01t2:1449_0: Evaṃ pana avatvāti “tato ce uttari”nti imassa “māsaparamato uttari”nti padabhājanaṃ avatvā.
tika-vin01t2:1449_1: Tāva uppannaṃ paccāsācīvaranti paccattavacanaṃ “attano gatikaṃ karotī”ti karaṇakiriyāya kattubhāvato.
tika-vin01t2:1449_2: Antarā uppannañhi paccāsācīvaraṃ māsaparamaṃ mūlacīvaraṃ ṭhapetuṃ adatvā attano dasāhaparamatāya eva paricchindatīti attano gatikaṃ karoti.
tika-vin01t2:1449_3: Tato uddhaṃ mūlacīvaranti ettha pana mūlacīvaranti paccattavacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1449_4: Vīsatimadivasato uddhañhi uppannaṃ paccāsācīvaraṃ dasāhaparamaṃ gantuṃ adatvā mūlacīvaraṃ attanā saddhiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1449_5: karaṇasambandhatāmattena sakakālavasena paricchindatīti attano gatikaṃ karoti.
tika-vin01t2:1449_6: Paccāsācīvare pana labhitvā visuṃ ṭhapentassa dasāhaṃ anatikkante natthi tappaccayā āpatti.
tika-vin01t2:1449_7: Pāḷiyaṃ dasāhā kāretabbanti ettha dasāhāti karaṇatthe nissakkavacanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1449_11: navāhā kāretabbantiādi paccāsācīvarassa uppannadivasaṃ ṭhapetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1450_1: kāretabbanti idaṃ satiyā eva paccāsāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1450_2: Sace pana “ito paṭṭhāya cīvaraṃ na labhissāmī”ti paccāsā upacchinnā,
tika-vin01t2:1450_5: Paccāsācīvarampi parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhātabbanti paṭhamataraṃ uppannaṃ visabhāgapaccāsācīvaraṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin01t2:1453_1: Catutthe bhattavissagganti pāḷipadassa bhattakiccanti attho veditabbo,
tika-vin01t2:1453_3: Tattha nāma tvanti imassapi so nāma tvanti attho veditabbo,
tika-vin01t2:1454_4: tasmā yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā pitāmahadvandāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1454_6: “Yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā”ti vacanato heṭṭhā ca uddhañca aṭṭhamayugo ñāti nāma na hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1454_12: Ettha kiñcāpi pañcasatasākiyānīnaṃ vasena bhikkhubhāve ṭhatvā parivattaliṅgāya bhikkhuniyā ca vasena ekatoupasampannā bhikkhunī labbhati,
tika-vin01t2:1454_13: tathāpi pakatiniyāmeneva dassetuṃ “bhikkhunī nāma ubhatosaṅghe upasampannā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1454_14: “Kappaṃ katvāti vacanato dinnakappameva pācittiyaṃ janetī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1454_15: “Purāṇacīvaraṃ nāma sakiṃ nivatthampi sakiṃ pārutampī”ti idaṃ nidassanamattanti āha “antamaso paribhogasīsenā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1454_16: “Kāyena phusitvā paribhogoyeva paribhogo nāmā”ti kurundiyaṃ adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1455_1: Kāyavikāraṃ katvāti idaṃ yāva “orato ṭhapetī”ti padaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1455_5: “Kāyavikāraṃ katvā”ti vacanato kāyavācāhi kañci vikāraṃ akatvā hatthena hatthe dentassapi anāpatti.
tika-vin01t2:1455_6: Antodvādasahatthe okāseti idaṃ visesanaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1455_7: Tathā hi hatthena hatthe dentassa pādamūle ca ṭhapetvā dentassa “antodvādasahatthe okāse”ti idaṃ vattabbanti natthi aññathā asambhavato.
tika-vin01t2:1455_8: Sati hi sambhave byabhicāre ca visesanaṃ sātthakaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1455_9: Upari “khipatī”tiādīni pana sandhāya idaṃ visesanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1455_10: tasmā antodvādasahatthe okāse ṭhatvā upari khipantassa aññassa hatthe pesentassa ca āpatti.
tika-vin01t2:1455_11: Upacāraṃ pana muñcitvā kāyavācāhi vikāraṃ katvā āṇāpentassapi anāpatti.
tika-vin01t2:1456_0: Ekena vatthunāti paṭhamaṃ katvā niṭṭhāpitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1456_1: Rajane anāpattīti rajanaṃ paccāsīsantassapi “dhovitvā ānehī”ti vuttattā anāpatti anāṇattiyā katattā.
tika-vin01t2:1456_3: avuttā ākoṭetī”ti idampi vuttameva hotīti āha –
tika-vin01t2:1456_5: Sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjatīti pācittiyena saddhiṃ dve dukkaṭāni āpajjati.
tika-vin01t2:1457_2: āṇāpentassāti ettha tāya dhovanaṃ paccāsīsantassapi anāpatti.
tika-vin01t2:1457_5: tassā dhovanādīni cāti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin01t2:1460_1: Pañcame apaññatte sikkhāpadeti gaṇamhā ohīyanasikkhāpade apaññatte.
tika-vin01t2:1460_4: Sabbapariyantanti chaṭṭhassa aññacīvarassa abhāvā pañcannaṃ cīvarānaṃ ekamekaṃ sabbesaṃ pariyantanti sabbapariyantaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1460_5: Antaravāsakādīsu hi pañcasu ekamekaṃ aññassa chaṭṭhassa abhāvā pañcannaṃ antameva hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1460_6: Athavā pañcasu cīvaresu ekamekaṃ attano aññassa dutiyassa abhāvā antameva hotīti sabbameva pariyantanti sabbapariyantaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1460_10: Yathā tassa manoratho na pūratīti “sarīrapāripūriṃ passissāmī”ti tassa uppanno manoratho yathā na pūrati.
tika-vin01t2:1460_11: Evaṃ hatthataleyeva dassetvāti sarīraṃ adassetvāva dātabbacīvaraṃ hatthatale “handā”ti dassetvā.
tika-vin01t2:1462_2: Upacāraṃ vā muñcitvā khipantīti dvādasahatthaṃ muñcitvā orato ṭhapenti,
tika-vin01t2:1462_4: Aññatra pārivattakāti yaṃ antamaso harītakakhaṇḍampi datvā vā dassāmīti ābhogaṃ katvā vā pārivattakaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin01t2:1462_6: Acittakabhāvena na sametīti yathā aññātikāya ñātikasaññissa vematikassa ca gaṇhato acittakattā āpatti,
tika-vin01t2:1462_7: evamidhāpi “bhikkhuniyā santakaṃ ida”nti ajānitvā gaṇhatopi āpattiyevāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1462_9: Paṃsukūlaṃ attano atthāya ṭhapitabhāvaṃ jānitvā gaṇhantenapi aññassa santakaṃ gahitaṃ nāma na hotīti āha –
tika-vin01t2:1462_13: Evaṃ pana paṃsukūlasaññaṃ anuppādetvā gaṇhituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1464_2: “Cīvaraṃ nāma channaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ vikappanupagaṃ pacchima”nti hi vuttattā adhiṭṭhānupagaṃ yaṃkiñci na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1464_5: Yasmā bhisicchavi mahantāpi senāsanasaṅgahitattā cīvarasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchatīti neva adhiṭṭhānupagā na vikappanupagā ca,
tika-vin01t2:1464_9: Ko pana vādo pattatthavikādīsūti mahatiyāpi tāva bhisicchaviyā anadhiṭṭhānupagattā anāpatti,
tika-vin01t2:1464_10: tato khuddakataresu anadhiṭṭhānupagesu pattatthavikādīsu kimeva vattabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1464_15: aññātikāya hatthato gahaṇanti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin01t2:1467_6: Kismiṃ viyāti ettha “kismiṃ viyā”ti nipātavasena samānatthaṃ “kiṃsu viyā”ti nipātapadanti āha “kiṃsu viyā”ti,
tika-vin01t2:1467_10: Dhammavasena upacāravasena nimantanā dhammanimantanāti pāḷipadassa attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1467_14: Yasmā pana pavāretvāpi adātukāmo appavāritaṭṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin01t2:1467_15: tasmā bhagavā pavāritāpavāritabhāvaṃ avicāretvā “ñātako te, upananda,
tika-vin01t2:1468_2: Sesaparikkhārānaṃ saddhivihārikehi gahitattā nivāsanapārupanamattameva avasiṭṭhanti āha “nivāsanapārupanamattaṃyeva haritvā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1468_3: Saddhivihārikānaṃ tāva āgamanassa vā anāgamanassa vā ajānanatāya vuttaṃ “therehi neva tāva…pe…
tika-vin01t2:1468_5: Paresampi atthāya labhantīti attano cīvaraṃ dadamānā sayaṃ sākhābhaṅgena paṭicchādentīti tesaṃ atthāyapi bhañjituṃ labhanti.
tika-vin01t2:1468_6: “Tiṇena vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādetvā āgantabba”nti vacanato īdisesu bhūtagāmapātabyatāpi anuññātāyeva hotīti āha –
tika-vin01t2:1468_8: Na tesaṃ dhāraṇe dukkaṭanti tesaṃ titthiyaddhajānaṃ dhāraṇepi dukkaṭaṃ natthi.
tika-vin01t2:1469_0: Yāni ca nesaṃ vatthāni dentīti sambandho.
tika-vin01t2:1469_6: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti iminā antarāmagge paviṭṭhavihārato nikkhamitvā aññattha attano abhirucitaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1469_7: Iminā ca “yaṃ āvāsaṃ paṭhamaṃ upagacchatī”ti vuttaṃ antarāmagge ṭhitavihārampi sace naggo hutvā gacchati,
tika-vin01t2:1469_9: Yadi evaṃ tattha kasmā na vuttanti ce?
tika-vin01t2:1469_14: cīvaraṃ viññāpetu”nti iminā sambandhena saṅghikampi cīvaraṃ nivāsetuṃ pārupituñca anujānanto “yaṃ āvāsaṃ paṭhamaṃ…pe…
tika-vin01t2:1469_16: tasmā tattha anokāsattā dukkaṭaṃ na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1470_5: ṭhapetabbanti ettha “lesena gahetvā agatattā ṭhapentena ca saṅghikaparibhogeneva ṭhapitattā aññasmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1470_6: senāsane niyamitampi aññattha ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1471_1: Paribhogajiṇṇanti yathā tena cīvarena sarīraṃ paṭicchādetuṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin01t2:1471_5: Attano dhanena hi viññāpanaṃ nāma parivattanamevāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1471_6: Saṅghavasena pavāritānaṃ viññāpane vattaṃ dasseti “pamāṇameva vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1471_7: Saṅghavasena hi pavārite sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇattā adhikaṃ viññāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1471_8: Yaṃ yaṃ pavāretīti yaṃ yaṃ cīvarādiṃ dassāmīti pavāreti.
tika-vin01t2:1471_9: Viññāpanakiccaṃ natthīti vinā viññattiyā dīyamānattā viññāpetvā kiṃ karissatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1471_10: Aññassatthāyāti etthāpi “ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti idaṃ anuvattatiyevāti āha “attano ñātakapavārite”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1471_14: tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin01t2:1474_0: 522. Sattame pāḷiyaṃ paggāhikasālanti dussavāṇijakānaṃ āpaṇaṃ. “Paggāhitasāla”ntipi paṭhanti.
tika-vin01t2:1475_4: Daṭṭhu khematoti ettha gāthābandhavasena anunāsikalopo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1475_8: Acchinnasabbacīvarenāti acchinnāni sabbāni tīṇi cīvarāni assāti acchinnasabbacīvaro,
tika-vin01t2:1475_10: Yassa hi acchindanasamaye tīṇi cīvarāni sannihitāni honti,
tika-vin01t2:1475_13: Ticīvarakenāti hi acchindanasamaye ticīvarassa sannihitabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1475_14: na pana vinayatecīvarikabhāvaṃ dhutaṅgatecīvarikabhāvaṃ vā sandhāya.
tika-vin01t2:1475_15: Evaṃ paṭipajjitabbanti “santaruttaraparamaṃ tena bhikkhunā tato cīvaraṃ sāditabba”nti vuttavidhinā paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1475_17: Yassa tīsu cīvaresu ekaṃ vā dve vā cīvarāni acchinnāni honti,
tika-vin01t2:1475_20: Yassa hi tīsu dve cīvarāni acchinnāni honti,
tika-vin01t2:1475_22: Ekasmiṃ acchinne na sāditabbanti na tassa santaruttaraparamasādiyanaṃ sambhavati,
tika-vin01t2:1476_0: Keci pana “ticīvarakenāti vuttattā ticīvaraṃ parikkhāracoḷavasena adhiṭṭhahitvā paribhuñjato tasmiṃ naṭṭhe bahūnipi gahetuṃ labhatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:1476_2: Padabhājanassa hi adhippāyaṃ dassentena yasmā pana “acchinnasabbacīvarena…pe…
tika-vin01t2:1476_4: padabhājane ca na tādiso attho upalabbhati,
tika-vin01t2:1476_6: Yampi mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “yassa adhiṭṭhitacīvarassa tīṇi naṭṭhānī”ti,
tika-vin01t2:1476_8: na pana ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhitacīvarassevāti evamattho gahetabbo pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāyañca tathā atthassa asambhavato.
tika-vin01t2:1476_9: Na hi ticīvarādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhitacīvarasseva idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattanti sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1476_10: Purimasikkhāpadena hi acchinnacīvarassa aññātakaviññattiyā anuññātattā pamāṇaṃ ajānitvā viññāpanavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin01t2:1476_11: pamāṇato sādiyanaṃ anujānantena bhagavatā idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1476_12: tasmā “parikkhāracoḷikassa bahumpi sādituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ayamattho neva pāḷiyā sameti,
tika-vin01t2:1477_1: tena dve sāditabbānīti ettha yassa ticīvarato adhikampi cīvaraṃ aññattha ṭhitaṃ atthi,
tika-vin01t2:1477_2: tadātassa cīvarassa alabbhanīyabhāvato tenapi sādituṃ vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1477_3: Pakatiyāva santaruttarena caratīti sāsaṅkasikkhāpadavasena vā avippavāsasammutivasena vā tatiyassa alābhena vā carati.
tika-vin01t2:1477_5: Ekaṃ sādiyanteneva samo bhavissatīti tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ dvīsu naṭṭhesu ekaṃ sādiyantena samo bhavissati ubhinnampi santaruttaraparamatāya avaṭṭhānato.
tika-vin01t2:1477_6: Yassa ekaṃyeva hotīti aññena kenaci kāraṇena vinaṭṭhasesacīvaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1478_2: sesakaṃ āharissāmā”ti vatvā gahetvā gamanasamayepi “sesakampi tumhākaññeva hotū”ti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:1478_5: Pāḷiyā na sametīti santaruttaraparamato uttari sādiyane anāpattidassanatthaṃ “anāpatti ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti vuttattā na sameti.
tika-vin01t2:1478_7: sati ca sikkhāpadena āpattippasaṅge anāpatti yuttā dassetunti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1478_8: Keci pana “pamāṇameva vaṭṭatīti idaṃ sallekhadassanatthaṃ vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1479_2: “aññassatthāyā”ti vuccamāne aññesaṃ atthāya pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvāpi gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatīti āpajjati,
tika-vin01t2:1479_3: tañca aññassatthāya viññāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattattā vatthunā saṃsandiyamānaṃ na sameti.
tika-vin01t2:1479_4: Na hi yaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1479_6: Gaṇṭhipadesu pana tīsupi “imassa sikkhāpadassa attano sādiyanapaṭibaddhatāvasena pavattattā ‘aññassatthāyā’ti vattuṃ okāsoyeva natthi,
tika-vin01t2:1479_8: Idha “aññassatthāyā”ti avuttattā aññesaṃ atthāya ñātakapavāritesu adhikaṃ viññāpentassa āpattīti ce? Na,
tika-vin01t2:1479_13: tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin01t2:1482_0: 527. Aṭṭhame api mayyāti pāṭhepi soyevattho. Ayyāti pana bahuvacanena āmantanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1483_3: Uddissāti ettha yo kattāti “uddissā”ti iminā vuttauddisanakiriyāya yo kattā.
tika-vin01t2:1483_4: Cīvaraṃ cetāpenti parivattenti etenāti cīvaracetāpannaṃ. Na-
tika-vin01t2:1483_8: Yebhuyyavasena hi gharasāmikaṃ daṭṭhukāmā tassa gharaṃ gacchantīti tatheva bahulaṃ vohāro.
tika-vin01t2:1484_1: Samakepi pana anāpattīti yadagghanakaṃ so dātukāmo hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1484_2: tadagghanake anāpatti mūlaṃ vaḍḍhetvā adhikavidhānaṃ anāpannattā.
tika-vin01t2:1484_3: Ettha ca “dātukāmomhī”ti attano santike avuttepi dātukāmataṃ sutvā yadagghanakaṃ so dātukāmo hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1484_5: Agghavaḍḍhanakañhi idaṃ sikkhāpadanti ettha agghavaḍḍhanaṃ etassa atthīti agghavaḍḍhanakaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1484_6: agghavaḍḍhanaṃ sandhāya idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1484_7: Cīvaraṃ dehīti saṅghāṭiādīsu yaṃkiñci cīvaraṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin01t2:1484_10: tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin01t2:1488_3: Yaṃ vuttaṃ mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “iminā cīvaracetāpannena cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ cīvarena
tika-vin01t2:1488_5: Sace hi ‘idaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dehī’ti peseyya,
tika-vin01t2:1488_6: āgamanassa asuddhattā akappiyavatthuṃ ārabbha bhikkhunā kappiyakārakopi niddisitabbo na bhaveyyā”ti,
tika-vin01t2:1488_7: tattha āgamanassa suddhiyā vā asuddhiyā vā visesappayojanaṃ na dissati.
tika-vin01t2:1488_8: Satipi hi āgamanassa asuddhabhāve dūto attano kusalatāya kappiyavohārena vadati,
tika-vin01t2:1488_10: na ca dūtena kappiyavohāravasena vutte dāyakena idaṃ kathaṃ pesitanti īdisī vicāraṇā upalabbhati,
tika-vin01t2:1488_11: avicāretvā ca taṃ na sakkā jānituṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1488_12: yadi pana āgamanassa asuddhattā kappiyakārako niddisitabbo na bhaveyya,
tika-vin01t2:1488_13: cīvarānaṃ atthāya dūtassa hatthe akappiyavatthusmiṃ pesite sabbattha dāyakena kathaṃ pesitanti pucchitvāva kappiyakārako niddisitabbo bhaveyya.
tika-vin01t2:1488_14: Tasmā asatipi āgamanasuddhiyaṃ sace so dūto attano kusalatāya kappiyavohāravasena vadati,
tika-vin01t2:1488_17: mūlasāmikena kappiyavohāravasena pesitassa dūtassa akappiyavohāravasena vadatopi kappiyakārako niddisitabbo bhaveyya,
tika-vin01t2:1489_1: kappiya vasena āgatampi cīvaramūlaṃ īdisena dūtavacanena akappiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1489_4: “tena bhikkhunā so dūto evamassa vacanīyo”tiādi. Suvaṇṇaṃ, rajataṃ, kahāpaṇo,
tika-vin01t2:1489_5: māsakoti imāni hi cattāri nissaggiyavatthūni, muttā, maṇi, veḷuriyo, saṅkho, silā, pavāḷaṃ,
