tika-vin01t2:1489_10: pupphārāmaphalārāmādayoti imāni dukkaṭavatthūni ca attano vā cetiyasaṅghagaṇapuggalānaṃ vā atthāya sampaṭicchituṃ na vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin01t2:1489_11: tasmā taṃ sādituṃ na vaṭṭatīti dassanatthaṃ “na kho mayaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin01t2:1489_13: “cīvarañca kho mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmā”ti idaṃ pana attānaṃ uddissa ābhatattā vattuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:1489_15: “Veyyāvaccakaro niddisitabbo”ti idaṃ “atthi panāyasmato koci veyyāvaccakaro”ti kappiyavacanena vuttattā anuññātaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1489_16: Sace pana dūto “ko imaṃ gaṇhātī”ti vā “kassa demī”ti vā vadati,
tika-vin01t2:1489_18: “Ārāmiko vā upāsako vā”ti idaṃ sāruppatāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1489_19: ṭhapetvā pana pañca sahadhammike yo koci kappiyakārako vaṭṭati. “Eso kho, āvuso,
tika-vin01t2:1489_20: bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccakaro”ti idaṃ bhikkhussa kappiyavacanadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1489_23: So vā cetāpessati vāti ettha eko vā-
tika-vin01t2:1489_25: “saññatto so mayā”tiādi pana dūtena evaṃ ārociteyeva taṃ codetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:1489_26: nevāssa hatthe datvā gatamattakāraṇenāti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1490_1: na vattabboti ettha “evaṃ vadanto paṭikkhittassa katattā vattabhede dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin01t2:1490_2: codanā pana hotiyevā”ti mahāgaṇṭhipade majjhimagaṇṭhipade ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1490_4: Pucchiyamānoti ettha pucchiyamānenāti attho gahetabboti āha “karaṇatthe paccattavacana”nti.
tika-vin01t2:1491_1: taṃ bhañjatīti vuttattā puna taṃ cīvaraṃ yena kenaci ākārena gahetuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1491_3: taṃ bhañjatīti vuttattā puna taṃ yena kenaci ākārena codetuṃ na labhati.
tika-vin01t2:1491_8: taṃ bhañjatīti vuttattā yathā ‘attho me, āvuso,
tika-vin01t2:1491_9: cīvarenā’ti ekāya codanāya dve ṭhānāni bhañjati,
tika-vin01t2:1491_15: dhammadesanāsikkhāpade vuttaparicchedāya ekāya vācāya dve ṭhānāni bhañjatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1491_16: Imesaṃ pana sabbesampi vādaṃ “ayutta”nti paṭikkhipitvā tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu idaṃ vuttaṃ “āgatakāraṇaṃ nāma ṭhānameva,
tika-vin01t2:1491_17: tasmā ‘na kattabba’nti vāritassa katattā nisajjādīsu katesu chasu ṭhānesu ekaṃ ṭhānaṃ bhañjatī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1492_0: Tatra tatra ṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti idaṃ codakassa ṭhitaṭṭhānato apakkamma tatra tatra uddissa ṭhānaṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1492_2: dūto vā pāhetabbo”ti idaṃ sabhāvato codetuṃ anicchantenapi kātabbamevāti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1492_3: Mukhaṃ vivaritvā sayameva kappiyakārakattaṃ upagatoti mukhavevaṭikakappiyakārako.
tika-vin01t2:1492_4: Avicāretukāmatāyāti imasmiṃ pakkhe “natthamhākaṃ kappiyakārako”ti idaṃ “tādisaṃ karonto kappiyakārako natthī”ti iminā adhippāyena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1493_0: “Meṇḍakasikkhāpade vuttanayena paṭipajjitabba”nti vatvā idāni taṃ meṇḍakasikkhāpadaṃ dassento “vuttañheta”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:1493_3: saddhā pasannā”tiādivacanaṃ bhesajjakkhandhake meṇḍakavatthusmiṃ vuttattā “meṇḍakasikkhāpada”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1494_2: na sukarā apātheyyena gantuṃ, sādhu, bhante,
tika-vin01t2:1498_3: te kappiyakārakānaṃ hatthe hiraññaṃ upanikkhipanti ‘iminā ayyassa yaṃ kappiyaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1498_9: na tvevāhaṃ bhikkhave kenaci pariyāyena jātarūparajataṃ sāditabbaṃ pariyesitabbanti vadāmī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1499_0: Hiraññaṃ upanikkhipantīti etthāpi bhikkhussa ārocanaṃ atthiyevāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1499_1: Aññathā aniddiṭṭhakappiyakārakattaṃ bhajatīti na codetabbo siyā.
tika-vin01t2:1500_0: “Aññātakaappavāritesu viya paṭipajjitabbanti idaṃ attanā codanāṭhānañca na kātabbanti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1500_1: Aññaṃ pana kappiyakārakaṃ pesetvā lokacārittavasena anuyuñjitvāpi kappiyavatthuṃ āharāpetuṃ vaṭṭati attānaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1500_2: uddissa nikkhittassa attano santakattā”ti keci vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:1500_6: kiñci na vattabbā”ti daḷhaṃ katvā vuttattā na gahetabbanti amhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin01t2:1500_7: Na hi aññātakaappavāritaṃ sayaṃ aviññāpetvā aññena viññāpetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:1500_8: na ca yattha aññaṃ pesetvā āharāpetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:1500_9: tattha sayaṃ gantvā na āharāpetabbanti sakkā vatthuṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1500_14: Piṇḍapātādīnaṃ atthāyāti iminā pana “cīvaracetāpanna”nti imassa byabhicāraṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1500_15: “Eseva nayo”ti vuttattā piṇḍapātādīnaṃ atthāya dinnepi ṭhānacodanādi sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1501_4: “Parassa niddosabhāvadassanatthaṃ sveva sāpattiko sadosoti vuttaṃ hotī”tipi vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1501_5: “Codetīti vuttattā pana āpattiyā codetīti katvā sveva sāpattikoti idaṃ dukkaṭaṃyeva sandhāya vattuṃ yutta”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1501_6: Paṭiggahaṇepi paribhogepi āpattiyevāti dukkaṭameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1501_7: Taḷākassapi khettasaṅgahitattā tassa paṭiggahaṇepi āpatti vuttā.
tika-vin01t2:1501_8: Cattāro paccaye saṅgho paribhuñjatūti detīti ettha “bhikkhusaṅgho cattāro paccaye paribhuñcatu,
tika-vin01t2:1501_9: taḷākaṃ dammī”ti vā “catupaccayaparibhogatthaṃ taḷākaṃ dammī”ti vā vadati,
tika-vin01t2:1501_11: “Ito taḷākato uppanne cattāro paccaye dammī”ti vutte pana vattabbameva natthi.
tika-vin01t2:1502_0: Amhākaṃ ekaṃ kappiyakārakaṃ ṭhapethāti vutteti idaṃ īdisaṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1502_1: Kappiyakkamena sampaṭicchitesu khettataḷākādīsu pana avuttepi kappiyakārakaṃ ṭhapetuṃ labbhatiyeva.
tika-vin01t2:1502_2: Yasmā parasantakaṃ nāsetuṃ bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:1502_4: “Janapadassa sāmikoti imināva yo taṃ janapadaṃ vicāreti,
tika-vin01t2:1502_13: Aparicchinnabhāgeti “ettake bhūmibhāge ettako bhāgo dātabbo”ti evaṃ aparicchinnabhāge.
tika-vin01t2:1503_0: Rajjuyā vā daṇḍena vāti ettha “pādehipi minituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1503_1: Khale vā ṭhatvā rakkhatīti ettha pana thenetvā gaṇhante disvā “mā gaṇhathā”ti nivārento rakkhati nāma.
tika-vin01t2:1503_2: Sace pana avicāretvā kevalaṃ tuṇhībhūtova rakkhaṇatthāya olokento tiṭṭhati, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1503_4: “mayaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa ārocessāmā”ti evaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1503_7: Apubbassa anuppāditattā aññesaṃ vaṭṭatīti āha “tasseva taṃ akappiya”nti.
tika-vin01t2:1504_0: Nanu ca dubbicāritamattena tasseva taṃ akappiyaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1504_2: Vuttañhi tattha “yo pana rūpiyaṃ asampaṭicchitvā ‘therassa pattaṃ kiṇitvā dehī’ti pahitakappiyakārakena
tika-vin01t2:1504_3: saddhiṃ kammārakulaṃ gantvā pattaṃ disvā ‘ime kahāpaṇe gahetvā imaṃ dehī’ti kahāpaṇe dāpetvā gahito,
tika-vin01t2:1504_4: ayaṃ patto etasseva bhikkhuno na vaṭṭati dubbicāritattā,
tika-vin01t2:1504_9: Ettha keci vadanti “kahāpaṇe sādiyitvā vicāritaṃ sandhāya evaṃ vutta”nti.
tika-vin01t2:1504_11: tasmā sabbesaṃ na kappatīti tesaṃ adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1504_12: Keci pana “asādiyitvāpi kahāpaṇānaṃ vicāritattā rūpiyasaṃvohāro kato hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1504_15: Gaṇṭhipadesu pana tīsupi idaṃ vuttaṃ “catutthapatto gihisantakānaṃyeva kahāpaṇānaṃ vicāritattā aññesaṃ kappati,
tika-vin01t2:1504_16: idha pana saṅghikānaṃ vicāritattā sabbesaṃ na kappatī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1504_17: Sabbesampi vādo tena tena pariyāyena yujjatiyeva.
tika-vin01t2:1505_1: Pariyāyena kathitattāti “gaṇhā”ti avatvā “sīmā gatā”ti pariyāyena kathitattā.
tika-vin01t2:1505_3: Dāsaṃ dammīti ettha “manussaṃ dammīti vutte vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1505_5: vaṭṭatīti ettha kukkuṭasūkaresu dīyamānesu “imehi amhākaṃ attho natthi,
tika-vin01t2:1505_8: “Khettavatthupaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato hotī”tiādivacanato khettādīnaṃ paṭiggahaṇe ayaṃ sabbo vinicchayo vutto.
tika-vin01t2:1505_12: tena vāyāmena paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin01t2:1510_1: Pāḷiyaṃ “kosiyakārake”ti ettha kosaṃ karontīti kosakārakāti laddhavohārānaṃ pāṇakānaṃ kosato nibbattaṃ kosiyaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1510_8: Anāpatti vitānaṃ vātiādinā vitānādīnaṃ atthāya karaṇepi tenākārena paribhogepi anāpatti vuttā.
tika-vin01t2:1511_0: Evampi missetvā katameva hotīti iminā vātena āharitvā pātitepi acittakattā āpattiyevāti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1515_1: Dvebhāgasikkhāpade pana dve bhāgāti ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo kāḷakānaṃ adhikaggahaṇassa paṭikkhepavasena sikkhāpadassa paññattattā.
tika-vin01t2:1515_2: Tatiyaṃ odātānaṃ catutthaṃ gocariyānanti ayaṃ heṭṭhimaparicchedo tesaṃ adhikaggahaṇe paṭikkhepābhāvato,
tika-vin01t2:1515_3: tasmā kāḷakānaṃ bhāgadvayato adhikaṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:1515_5: “Kāḷakānaṃyeva ca adhikaggahaṇassa paṭikkhittattā kāḷakānaṃ upaḍḍhaṃ odātānaṃ vā gocariyānaṃ vā upaḍḍhaṃ gahetvāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:1515_6: “anāpatti bahutaraṃ odātānaṃ bahutaraṃ gocariyānaṃ ādiyitvā karoti,
tika-vin01t2:1515_7: suddhaṃ odātānaṃ suddhaṃ gocariyānaṃ ādiyitvā karotī”ti iminā taṃ sameti.
tika-vin01t2:1515_8: “Kāḷake odāte ca ṭhapetvā sesā gocariyesuyeva saṅgahaṃ gacchantī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1515_9: Dve koṭṭhāsā kāḷakānanti ettha pana “ekassapi kāḷakalomassa atirekabhāve nissaggiyaṃ hotī”ti mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ ttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1515_10: taṃ “dhārayitvā dve tulā ādātabbā”ti vacanato tulādhāraṇāya na sameti.
tika-vin01t2:1515_11: Na hi lome gaṇetvā tulādhāraṇā karīyati,
tika-vin01t2:1515_15: acittakattā sikkhāpadassa pubbe tulāya dhārayitvā ṭhapitesu ekampi lomaṃ tattha pateyya,
tika-vin01t2:1518_1: Chabbassasikkhāpade pana “yesaṃ no santhate dārakā uhadantipi ummihantipi,
tika-vin01t2:1518_2: yesaṃ no santhatā undūrehipi khajjantī”ti evaṃ pāḷipadānaṃ sambandho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1518_4: miha secaneti panimassatthaṃ sandhāyāha “vaccampi passāvampi karontī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1518_5: Pavāraṇāuposathapāṭipadadivasesu santhataṃ karitvā puna chaṭṭhe vasse paripuṇṇe pavāraṇāuposathapāṭipadadivasesu
tika-vin01t2:1518_7: Dutiyadivasato paṭṭhāya karonto pana atirekachabbassāni karoti nāma.
tika-vin01t2:1521_1: Nisīdanasanthatasikkhāpade pana paññāyissatīti sace sā katikā manāpā bhavissati,
tika-vin01t2:1522_1: Nisīdanasanthatattā nivāsanapārupanakiccaṃ natthīti āha “sakiṃ nisinnañceva nipannañcā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1522_4: “Vitānādīnaṃyeva atthāya karaṇe anāpattivacanato sace nipajjanatthāya karonti,
tika-vin01t2:1522_9: Nisīdanasikkhāpadepi nisīdanaṃ nāma sadasaṃ vuccatīti ca aṭṭhakathāyañcassa “santhatasadisaṃ santharitvā
tika-vin01t2:1522_10: ekasmiṃ ante sugatavidatthiyā vidatthimatte padese dvīsu ṭhānesu phāletvā tisso dasā karīyanti,
tika-vin01t2:1522_11: tāhi dasāhi sadasaṃ nāma vuccatī”ti vacanato idhāpi “nisīdanaṃ nāma sadasaṃ vuccatī”ti ca “santhate catutthacīvarasaññitāyā”ti
tika-vin01t2:1522_12: ca vacanato taṃ yuttaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin01t2:1522_13: Keci pana “nisīdanasanthataṃ eḷakalomāni santharitvā santhataṃ viya karonti,
tika-vin01t2:1522_15: nisīdanacīvaraṃ pana channaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññatarena karoti adhiṭṭhānupagaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1522_16: taṃ karontā ca nantakāni santharitvā santhatasadisaṃ karontī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:1525_2: Kilantāti iminā kilantatāya te onamitvā pātetuṃ na sakkontīti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1525_4: Yattha katthaci pana dhammena labhitvā gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin01t2:1525_5: Tiyojanaparamanti ca gahitaṭṭhānato tiyojanappamāṇaṃ desanti evamattho gahetabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1526_2: Asante hāraketi pāḷiyaṃ bhikkhuno anurūpatādassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1526_3: na pana hārake vijjamāne tiyojanabbhantare sahatthā harantassa āpattidassanatthaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1526_4: Tiyojanato bahi bahitiyojananti āha “tiyojanato bahi pātetī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1526_5: Tena haritepi āpattiyevāti saussāhattā anāṇattiyā haṭattā ca.
tika-vin01t2:1526_6: Satipi hi saussāhabhāve āṇattiyā ce harati,
tika-vin01t2:1526_10: Idañca “añño harissatī”ti asuddhacittena ṭhapitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1526_11: acittakattāti idaṃ pana suddhacittena ṭhapitaṃ sandhāya.
tika-vin01t2:1526_13: visesato “aññaṃ harāpetī”ti pāḷiyā ca na sameti.
tika-vin01t2:1527_7: Suṅkaghāte āpatti hotīti aññaṃ harāpentassa āpatti.
tika-vin01t2:1528_1: “Taṃ harantassāti puna tiyojanaṃ harantassā”ti mahāgaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1528_2: Taṃ pana mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ aṅgesu “paṭhamappaṭilābho sati iminā vacanena na sameti.
tika-vin01t2:1528_3: “Paṭhamappaṭilābho”ti hi idaṃ dutiyappaṭilābho āpattiyā aṅgaṃ na hotīti dīpeti,
tika-vin01t2:1528_4: tasmā pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāyañca visesābhāvato acchinnaṃ paṭilabhitvā harantassa puna tiyojanātikkamepi anāpatti vuttāti amhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin01t2:1528_5: Aññathā acchinnaṃ paṭilabhitvā puna tiyojanaṃ haratīti vadeyya.
tika-vin01t2:1528_11: Nidhānamukhaṃ nāmāti iminā katabhaṇḍasaṅkhyaṃ na gacchatīti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1528_14: attanā ādāya vā aññassa ajānantassa yāne pakkhipitvā vā tiyojanātikkamanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1532_3: satthuvaṇṇo viya vaṇṇo assāti satthuvaṇṇoti majjhapadalopīsamāso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1532_6: Iccetaṃ sabbampīti yathāvuttabhedaṃ sabbampi catubbidhaṃ nissaggiyavatthu hotīti sambandho.
tika-vin01t2:1533_0: Gaṇheyyāti attano atthāya dīyamānaṃ vā katthaci ṭhitaṃ vā nippariggahaṃ disvā sayaṃ gaṇheyya.
tika-vin01t2:1533_1: “Idaṃ ayyassa hotū”ti evaṃ sammukhā vā “asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne mama hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ atthi,
tika-vin01t2:1533_2: taṃ tuyhaṃ hotū”ti evaṃ parammukhā ṭhitaṃ vā kevalaṃ vācāya vā hatthamuddāya vā “tuyha”nti vatvā pariccattassa
tika-vin01t2:1533_3: kāyavācāhi appaṭikkhipitvā cittena sādiyanaṃ upanikkhittasādiyanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t2:1533_6: “Idha nikkhipāhī”ti vutte “uggaṇhāpeyya vā”ti vuttalakkhaṇena nissaggiyaṃ hotīti āha –
tika-vin01t2:1533_8: Parato “imaṃ gaṇhā”ti na vattabbanti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-vin01t2:1533_9: Kappiyañca akappiyañca nissāya ṭhitameva hotīti yasmā tato uppannapaccayaparibhogo kappati,
tika-vin01t2:1533_11: Yasmā pana dubbicāraṇāya tato uppannapaccayaparibhogopi na kappati,
tika-vin01t2:1534_0: Na tena kiñci kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ cetāpitanti ettha cetāpitaṃ ce,
tika-vin01t2:1534_3: Akappiyañhi nissaggiyaṃ vatthuṃ uggaṇhitvā taṃ anissajjitvāva cetāpitaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ saṅghassa nissaṭṭhampi sabbesaṃ na kappati.
tika-vin01t2:1534_4: Keci pana “yasmā nissaggiyaṃ vatthuṃ paṭiggahetvā cetāpitaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ saṅghassa nissajjāmīti nissaṭṭhaṃ vināva upāyaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:1534_5: tasmā ‘na tena kiñci kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ cetāpita’nti vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1534_6: “Ārāmikānaṃ vā pattabhāganti idaṃ gihīnaṃ hatthagatopi soyeva bhāgoti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1534_7: Sace pana tena aññaṃ parivattetvā ārāmikā denti,
tika-vin01t2:1534_8: paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti majjhimagaṇṭhipade cūḷagaṇṭhipade ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1534_11: Mañcapīṭhādīni vāti ettha “tato gahitamañcapīṭhādīni parivattetvā aññaṃ ce gahitaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1534_15: chāyāya gatagataṭṭhānaṃ gehaṃ nāma na hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1534_19: Upanikkhepaṃ ṭhapetvā saṅgho paccaye paribhuñjatīti sace upāsako “atibahu etaṃ hiraññaṃ, idaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin01t2:1534_20: ajjeva na vināsetabba”nti vatvā sayaṃ upanikkhepaṃ ṭhapeti,
tika-vin01t2:1534_22: etaṃ upanikkhepaṃ ṭhapetvā tato udayaṃ paribhuñjanto saṅgho paccaye paribhuñjati,
tika-vin01t2:1535_1: Patitokāsaṃ asamannāharantena pātetabbanti idaṃ nirapekkhabhāvadassanaparanti veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1535_2: tasmā patitaṭṭhāne ñātepissa gūthaṃ chaḍḍentassa viya nirapekkhabhāvoyevettha pamāṇanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1535_5: Bhagavatā hi attano sāsane sīlavato paccayā anuññātā,
tika-vin01t2:1535_8: na dussīlassa attano kārānaṃ mahapphalabhāvassa paccāsīsanato.
tika-vin01t2:1535_9: Iti satthārā ananuññātattā dāyakehi ca apariccattattā dussīlassa paribhogo theyyaparibhogo.
tika-vin01t2:1535_11: paṭiggāhakato dakkhiṇāvisuddhiyā abhāvato iṇaṃ gahetvā paribhogo viyāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1535_13: Cīvaraṃ paribhoge paribhogeti kāyato mocetvā mocetvā paribhoge.
tika-vin01t2:1535_16: Tathā asakkontena yathāvuttakālavisesavasena ekasmiṃ divase catukkhattuṃ tikkhattuṃ dvikkhattuṃ sakiṃyeva vā paccavekkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1536_1: iṇaparibhogaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti ettha “hiyyo yaṃ mayā cīvaraṃ paribhuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1536_5: so neva davāyātiādinā sace atītaparibhogapaccavekkhaṇaṃ na kareyya,
tika-vin01t2:1536_10: Taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva sakkā viññātunti idha visuṃ na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1536_12: paṭiggahaṇassa paribhogassa ca paccavekkhaṇasatiyā paccayabhāvo yujjati,
tika-vin01t2:1536_15: Evaṃ santepīti yadipi dvīsupi ṭhānesu paccavekkhaṇā yuttā,
tika-vin01t2:1536_17: Apare panāhu “satipaccayatāti satibhesajjaparibhogassa paccayabhāve paccayeti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1537_0: Nanu ca “paribhoge karontassa anāpattī”ti iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1537_1: tasmā paccayasannissitasīlassa pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlassa ca ko visesoti? Vuccate –
tika-vin01t2:1537_2: purimesu tāva tīsu paccayesu viseso pākaṭoyeva,
tika-vin01t2:1537_3: gilānapaccaye pana yathā vatiṃ katvā rukkhamūle gopite tassa phalānipi rakkhitāniyeva honti,
tika-vin01t2:1537_4: evameva paccavekkhaṇāya paccayasannissitasīle rakkhite tappaṭibaddhaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlampi nipphannaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1537_5: Gilānapaccayaṃ apaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjantassa sīlaṃ bhijjamānaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlameva bhijjati,
tika-vin01t2:1537_6: paccayasannissitasīlaṃ pana pacchābhattapurimayāmādīsu yāva aruṇuggamanā apaccavekkhantasseva bhijjati.
tika-vin01t2:1538_0: Evaṃ paccayasannissitasīlassa visuddhiṃ dassetvā teneva pasaṅgena sabbāpi suddhiyo dassetuṃ “catubbidhā hi suddhī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:1538_3: Vuṭṭhānassapi cettha desanāya eva saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1538_6: Dhammena samena paccayānaṃ pariyeṭṭhi eva suddhi pariyeṭṭhisuddhi.
tika-vin01t2:1538_7: Catūsu paccayesu vuttavidhinā paccavekkhaṇāva suddhi paccavekkhaṇasuddhi.
tika-vin01t2:1538_9: Suddhimantesu sīlesu desanā suddhi etassāti desanāsuddhi.
tika-vin01t2:1538_11: Na puna evaṃ karissāmīti ettha evanti saṃvarabhedaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-vin01t2:1538_16: ananuññātesu sabbena sabbaṃ paribhogābhāvato anuññātesuyeva ca paribhogasabbhāvabhāvato bhikkhūhi paribhuñjitabbapaccayā bhagavato santakā.
tika-vin01t2:1540_0: Evaṃ pavattaṃ dhammadāyādasuttañca ettha etasmiṃ atthe sādhakaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1541_1: tadabhāvena vītarāgānaṃ tattha sāmibhāvo yathāruci paribhogasabbhāvato.
tika-vin01t2:1541_2: Tathā hi te paṭikūlampi appaṭikūlākārena appaṭikūlampi paṭikūlākārena tadubhayampi vajjetvā ajjhupekkhanākārena paccaye paribhuñjanti,
tika-vin01t2:1541_4: “te hi taṇhāya dāsabyaṃ atītattā sāmino hutvā paribhuñjantī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1541_6: so iṇaparibhogassa paccanīkattā āṇaṇyaparibhogo nāma hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1541_7: Yathā hi iṇāyiko attano ruciyā icchitadesaṃ gantuṃ na labhati,
tika-vin01t2:1541_8: evaṃ iṇaparibhogayutto lokato nissarituṃ na labhatīti tappaṭipakkhattā sīlavato paccavekkhitaparibhogo āṇaṇyaparibhogoti vuccati,
tika-vin01t2:1541_9: tasmā nippariyāyato catuparibhogavinimutto visuṃyevāyaṃ paribhogoti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1541_12: Sīlavāpi hi imāya sikkhāya samannāgatattā sekkhotveva vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:1542_2: Yo hi puthujjanassapi sallekhappaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitassa paccayagedhaṃ pahāya tattha anupalittena cittena paribhogo,
tika-vin01t2:1542_4: Sīlavato pana paccavekkhitaparibhogo dāyajjaparibhogo viya hoti dāyakānaṃ manorathassa avirādhanato.
tika-vin01t2:1542_6: Kalyāṇaputhujjanassa paribhoge vattabbameva natthi tassa sekkhasaṅgahato.
tika-vin01t2:1543_0: Lajjinā saddhiṃ paribhogo nāma lajjissa santakaṃ gahetvā paribhogo.
tika-vin01t2:1543_2: Ādito paṭṭhāya hi alajjī nāma natthīti iminā diṭṭhadiṭṭhesuyeva āsaṅkā na kātabbāti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1543_7: tasmā āpatti nāma natthi ubhinnampi alajjībhāvato,
tika-vin01t2:1543_8: “alajjīparibhogo”ti idaṃ nāmamattameva na labbhatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1543_9: “Āpatti pana atthiyevāti vadantī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1544_2: Saṅghasseva detīti bhattaṃ aggahetvā attanā laddhasalākaṃyeva deti.
tika-vin01t2:1544_4: antaradhāpetīti ettha kevalaṃ paggaṇhitukāmatāya evaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:1544_5: dhammassa pana sāsanassa sotūnañca anuggahatthāya vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1544_6: Purimanayena “so āpattiyā kāretabbo”ti vuttattā imassa āpattiyevāti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1544_8: Dhammānuggahena gaṇhantassa āpattiyā abhāvepi thero tassa alajjibhāvaṃyeva sandhāya “pāpo kirāya”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:1545_2: Assatiyā dinnanti ettha assatiyā dinnaṃ nāma apariccattaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1545_3: tasmā dasante baddhakahāpaṇādi assatiyā dinnaṃ bhikkhunā vatthasaññāya paṭiggahitañca,
tika-vin01t2:1545_5: nāpi paṭiggahitañca hotīti ettha āpattidesanākiccaṃ natthi,
tika-vin01t2:1545_7: Tena akappiyavatthunā te ce dāyakā sappiādīni kiṇitvāna saṅghassa tassa ca bhikkhuno denti,
tika-vin01t2:1545_9: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana puññakāmehi pariccajitvā dinnameva sandhāya “puññakāmā…pe…
tika-vin01t2:1545_10: rūpiye arūpiyasaññī rūpiyaṃ paṭiggaṇhātīti veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1545_11: tasmā pariccajitvā dinnaṃ vatthasaññāya gaṇhatopi nissaggiyameva.
tika-vin01t2:1545_12: Tena yadi te dāyakā no āgantvā gaṇhanti,
tika-vin01t2:1545_13: dāyake pucchitvā attano atthāya ce pariccattaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1545_15: Tava coḷakaṃ passāhīhi iminā gihisantakepi “idaṃ gaṇhathā”tiādiakappiyavohārena vidhānaṃ bhikkhuno na kappatīti dīpeti.
tika-vin01t2:1548_1: Rūpiyasaṃvohārasikkhāpade jātarūpādicatubbidhampi nissaggiyavatthu idha rūpiyaggahaṇeneva gahitanti āha “jātarūparajataparivattana”nti.
tika-vin01t2:1549_5: ye ca vohāraṃ gacchantī”ti evaṃ sabbattha samuccayo veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1549_8: “Nissaggiyavatthunā dukkaṭavatthuṃ vā kappiyavatthuṃ vā cetāpentassapi eseva nayo”ti idaṃ kasmā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1549_10: nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”ntiādittiko pāḷiyaṃ vuttoti āha “yo hī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1549_12: rūpiyasaṃvohāro nāma na kevalaṃ rūpiyena rūpiyaparivattanameva,
tika-vin01t2:1549_13: atha kho “arūpiye rūpiyasaññī rūpiyaṃ cetāpetī”ti vuttattā arūpiyena rūpiyacetāpanampi rūpiyasaṃvohāro
tika-vin01t2:1549_14: nāma hotīti etasmiṃ pakkhepi rūpiye sati rūpiyasaṃvohāroyeva hotīti ayamattho avuttopi viññāyatīti.
tika-vin01t2:1549_16: Ekantena rūpiyapakkheti ekena antena rūpiyapakkheti ayaṃ attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1550_0: Kappiyavatthunā kappiyavatthuno kayavikkayepi tāva nissaggiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1550_1: dukkaṭavatthunā dukkaṭavatthuno kayavikkaye kasmā na hotīti andhakaṭṭhakathāya adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1550_3: arūpiyena ca rūpiyacetāpanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti sambandho.
tika-vin01t2:1551_0: Puna kappiyabhāvaṃ netuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā “mahāakappiyo nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1551_1: “Na sakkā kenaci upāyena kappiyo kātunti idaṃ pañcannaṃyeva sahadhammikānaṃ antare parivattanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1551_2: gihīhi pana gahetvā attano santakaṃ katvā dinnaṃ sabbesaṃ kappatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1551_3: “Na sakkā kenaci upāyena kappiyo kātu”nti pana imināva paṭiggahitarūpiyaṃ anissajjitvāva tena cetāpitaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1551_4: kappiyabhaṇḍampi saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1552_0: Ye pana “paṭiggahitarūpiyaṃ anissajjitvāpi tena parivattitaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:1552_1: tesaṃ “na sakkā kenaci upāyena kappiyo kātu”nti idaṃ na yujjati.
tika-vin01t2:1552_2: Te panettha evaṃ vadanti “yasmā nissajjitabbavatthuṃ anissajjitvāva uparūpari aññaṃ aññaṃyeva kataṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1552_3: tasmā paricchedābhāvato idha nissajjituṃ avatvā ‘na sakkā kenaci upāyena kappiyo kātu’nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1552_5: patte ca pattasāmikānaṃ dinne kappiyo hotī’ti ca na vutta”nti.
tika-vin01t2:1552_6: Yadi paṭiggahitarūpiyaṃ anissajjitvā cetāpitaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍampi saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:1552_7: evaṃ sante idhāpi avasānavatthuṃ gahetvā saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ kasmā na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:1552_9: patte ca pattasāmikānaṃ dinne kappiyo hotī”ti imināpi paṭiggahitarūpiyaṃ anissajjitvā cetāpitaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍampi
tika-vin01t2:1552_10: saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1552_13: patte ca pattasāmikānaṃ dinne kappiyo hotī”ti na vadeyya.
tika-vin01t2:1552_14: Apare panettha evaṃ vadanti “yadi saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1553_0: Dutiyapattasadisoyevāti iminā pañcannampi sahadhammikānaṃ na kappatīti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1553_2: Atha mūlassa sampaṭicchitattā rūpiyapaṭiggāhakassa tāva akappiyo hotu,
tika-vin01t2:1553_3: sesānaṃ pana kasmā na kappatīti maññamāno pucchati “kasmā sesānaṃ na kappatī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1553_5: Pattassa kappiyabhāvepi sampaṭicchitamūlassa nissajjitabbassa anissaṭṭhattā tena gahitapatto sesānampi na kappati.
tika-vin01t2:1553_6: Yadi hi tena sampaṭicchitamūlaṃ saṅghamajjhe nissaṭṭhaṃ siyā,
tika-vin01t2:1553_7: tena kappiyena kammena ārāmikādīhi gahetvā dinnapatto rūpiyapaṭiggāhakaṃ ṭhapetvā sesānaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1553_8: Apare pana “mūlaṃ sampaṭicchitvā gahitapattopi yadi saṅghassa nissaṭṭho,
tika-vin01t2:1554_0: Dubbicāritattāti iminā rūpiyasaṃvohāro anena katoti dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1554_1: Aññesaṃ pana vaṭṭatīti yasmānena rūpiyasaṃvohāramattameva kataṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1554_3: tasmā vinayakammavasena saṅghassa nissaṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya aññesaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1554_4: Imasmiṃyeva ca atthe pamāṇaṃ dassento “mahāsumattherassa kirā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t2:1554_5: Apare pana “dubbicāritattāti iminā kevalaṃ gihisantakabhāvena ṭhite dubbicāritamattaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1554_7: tasmā rūpiyasaṃvohārābhāvato so patto nissajjituṃ na sakkāti tassa na kappati,
tika-vin01t2:1554_9: Anissaṭṭhasseva ca aññesaṃ kappiyabhāvadassanatthaṃ ‘mahāsumattherassa kirā’tiādivatthūni udāhaṭāni.
tika-vin01t2:1554_10: Saṅghassa nissajjīti idañca aññesaṃ kappiyattā kevalaṃ saṅghassa pariccattabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1554_12: Imassa ca atthassa sappissa pūretvāti idaṃ vacanaṃ sādhaka”nti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1555_8: āpatti dukkaṭassā’tiādittikassa avasānapade anāpattiyā vuttattā kappiyavatthuvaseneva idaṃ tikaṃ vutta”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1555_9: Keci pana “arūpiyaggahaṇena kappiyavatthudukkaṭavatthūnaṃ saṅgahoti purimapadadvayaṃ kappiyavatthudukkaṭavatthūnaṃ vasena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1555_11: taṃ na yujjati anāpattimissite avasānattike saññānānattaṃ ṭhapetvā vatthunānattassa abhāvato.
tika-vin01t2:1555_12: Dukkaṭavatthunā pana dukkaṭavatthuno cetāpanaṃ neva idha,
tika-vin01t2:1555_13: na tattha pāḷiyaṃ vuttanti vacanamettha sādhakaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1555_15: tassa vā dhanassa vā rūpiyabhāvo ceva,
tika-vin01t2:1558_1: Kayavikkayasikkhāpade pāḷiyaṃ jānāhīti ettha upadhārehīti attho,
tika-vin01t2:1558_3: idaṃ na manāpanti puna dātuṃ na sakkhissasīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1559_4: Yasmā kayitaṃ nāma parassa hatthato gahitaṃ vuccati,
tika-vin01t2:1559_6: tasmā “kayitañca hoti parabhaṇḍaṃ attano hatthagataṃ karontena,
tika-vin01t2:1559_7: vikkītañca attano bhaṇḍaṃ parahatthagataṃ karontenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1559_8: Yadi evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ parato “kayitañca hoti vikkayitañcā”ti vatvā “attano bhaṇḍaṃ parahatthagataṃ parabhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1559_9: attano hatthagata”nti kasmā vuttanti āha “iminā imantiādivacanānurūpato panā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1559_11: Tadanurūpato pāḷiyaṃ paṭhamaṃ attano bhaṇḍaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1560_0: Kāmaṃ sesañātakepi “imaṃ dehī”ti vadato viññatti na hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1560_1: saddhādeyyavinipātanassapi pana abhāvaṃ dassetukāmo “mātaraṃ pana pitaraṃ vā”ti āha.
tika-vin01t2:1560_2: Viññatti na hotīti idaṃ visuṃ viññāpanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1560_3: Aññaṃ kiñci avatvā evaṃ vadanto aññātakaṃ viññāpeti nāmāti āha –
tika-vin01t2:1560_5: Aññaṃ kiñci avatvā “imaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti dinnaṃ aññātakassa dinnaṃ nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “saddhādeyyavinipātana”nti.
tika-vin01t2:1561_2: idāni kasmā na karosīti vatthumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1561_3: “Nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti kiñcāpi satiyeva nissaggiyavatthumhi pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1561_4: asatipi pana tasmiṃ pācittiyanti idaṃ aṭṭhakathāpamāṇena gahetabbanti dassetuṃ “kiñcāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1567_0: “Na harāmi na bhañjāmi, ārā siṅghāmi vārijaṃ;
tika-vin01t2:1568_0: Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, gandhatthenoti vuccatī”ti. –
tika-vin01t2:1569_2: “Kadā saññuḷhā pana te gahapati ime samaṇassa gotamassa vaṇṇā”tiādīsu guṇo.
tika-vin01t2:1569_4: Tasmā vuttaṃ “tayo pattassa vaṇṇāti tīṇi pattassa pamāṇānī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1570_0: Aḍḍhaterasapalā hotīti ettha “māsānaṃ aḍḍhaterasapalāni gaṇhātī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1570_3: Tattha purimānaṃ matena tipasatāya nāḷiyā dve nāḷiyo ekā magadhanāḷi hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1570_4: pacchimānaṃ catupasatāya nāḷiyā dve nāḷiyo ekā magadhanāḷi.
tika-vin01t2:1570_8: taṃ pana magadhanāḷiyā dvādasa nāḷiyo hontī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1570_9: tasmā tena nayena “magadhanāḷi nāma pañca kuḍuvāni ekañca muṭṭhiṃ ekāya muṭṭhiyā tatiyañca bhāgaṃ gaṇhātī”ti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1571_1: Ālopassa ālopassa anurūpanti ettha “byañjanassa mattā nāma odanacatuttho bhāgo”ti brahmāyusuttassa aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1571_2: vuttattā ālopassa catutthabhāgappamāṇaṃ byañjanaṃ ālopassa anurūpanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1571_3: Idha pana sūpasseva odanacatutthabhāgappamāṇataṃ dassetvā etassa lakkhaṇe dassite itarassapi dassitameva
tika-vin01t2:1571_4: hotīti byañjanassa tathā visesetvā pamāṇaṃ na dassitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1572_0: Magadhanāḷiyā upaḍḍhappamāṇo idha patthoti āha “patthodananti magadhanāḷiyā upaḍḍhanāḷikodana”nti.
tika-vin01t2:1573_2: na pana dhoteyeva dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati tato puretaraṃ paribhogakāleyeva āpajjanato.
tika-vin01t2:1574_1: Pañcahi dvīhīti idaṃ “ettāvatā kāḷavaṇṇatā sampajjatī”ti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1574_5: Iminā ca dūre ṭhitampi adhiṭṭhātuṃ vikappetuñca labhati,
tika-vin01t2:1574_7: Sutvā vāti pattakārakena pesitabhikkhunā anāṇatto kevalaṃ tassa kathentassa vacanamattaṃ sutvā.
tika-vin01t2:1574_13: Patte vā chiddaṃ hotīti mukhavaṭṭito heṭṭhā dvaṅgulamattokāsato paṭṭhāya yattha katthaci chiddaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1577_1: Dutiyasikkhāpade hatthesu piṇḍāya caratīti pāḷipadassa hatthesu labhitabbapiṇḍatthāya caratīti attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1578_1: “Tassa so apattoti vacanato so patto adhiṭṭhānampi vijahati apattattā.
tika-vin01t2:1578_2: Apattabhāvatoyeva hi ‘pañcabandhanaṃ pattaṃ cetāpetī’ti pāḷiyaṃ na vutta”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1578_3: Keci pana “apattoti idaṃ ‘aññaṃ pattaṃ viññāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1578_4: so pana patto adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:1578_5: taṃ yuttaṃ viya dissati “yassa pañca ekāyeva vā dasaṅgulā,
tika-vin01t2:1578_7: Na hi mukhavaṭṭiyā pañcasu ṭhānesu dvaṅgulamattāhi rājīhi adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatīti sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1578_8: ekāya pana rājiyā dasaṅgulāya sace tattha vuttappamāṇo chiddo paññāyati,
tika-vin01t2:1578_10: Bandhanokāse sati asati vā bandhanavirahito patto abandhanoti vutto,
tika-vin01t2:1579_0: Tipusuttakena vā bandhitvāti ettha “bandhitabbo”ti pāṭho gahetabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1579_3: na vaṭṭatīti idaṃ uṇhabhojane pakkhitte vilīyamānattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1579_4: Phāṇitaṃ jhāpetvā pāsāṇacuṇṇena bandhituṃ vaṭṭatīti pāsāṇacuṇṇena saddhiṃ phāṇitaṃ pacitvā tathāpakkena pāsāṇacuṇṇena bandhituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1580_1: Anukampāya na gaṇhantassa dukkaṭanti vuttattā yassa so patto na ruccati,
tika-vin01t2:1580_3: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “sace therassa patto na ruccati,
tika-vin01t2:1580_8: “Saṅghamajjhe pattaṃ gāhāpentena alajjiṃ agāhāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1580_9: “Anujānāmi bhikkhave ādhārakanti vuttattā pīṭhādīsu yattha katthaci ādhāraṃ ṭhapetvā tattha pattaṃ ṭhapetuṃ
tika-vin01t2:1581_7: catubandhanokāsaṃ pattaṃ cetāpetī”ti evaṃ ekekena pattena dasadhā dasavidhaṃ pattaṃ cetāpanavasena ekanissaggiyapācittiyasataṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1581_8: Imasmiṃ sikkhāpade pamāṇayuttaṃ aggahitakāḷavaṇṇampi pattaṃ viññāpentassa āpattiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1581_12: tāya ca paṭilābhoti imānettha cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin01t2:1584_1: Tatiyasikkhāpade yesaṃ maṃsaṃ kappatīti idaṃ nissaggiyavatthudassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1584_2: na pana yesaṃ maṃsaṃ na kappati,
tika-vin01t2:1584_5: kuto sasassa sappīti āha “yesañhi khīraṃ atthi,
tika-vin01t2:1584_8: Uggahitakaṃ katvā nikkhittanti appaṭiggahitaṃ sayameva gahetvā nikkhittaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1584_9: Sayaṃkataṃ nirāmisameva vaṭṭatīti tadahupurebhattameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1584_10: Atha sayaṃkataṃ nirāmisaṃ bhuñjantassa kasmā sāmaṃpāko na hotīti āha –
tika-vin01t2:1584_15: Purebhattampi ca uggahitakehi kataṃ abbhañjanādīsu upanetabbanti sambandho.
tika-vin01t2:1584_16: Ubhayesampīti pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitakhīradadhīhi ca purebhattaṃ uggahitakehi ca katānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1584_19: Kāraṇapatirūpakaṃ vatvāti sajātiyānaṃ sappibhāvatoti kāraṇapatirūpakaṃ vatvā.
tika-vin01t2:1585_0: Sappinayeneva veditabbanti nirāmisameva sattāhaṃ vaṭṭatīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1585_4: tasmā dhotaṃ paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṃ nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭatīti therānaṃ adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1585_5: Takkato uddhaṭamattameva khādiṃsūti ettha takkato uddhaṭamattaṃ adhotampi paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjantā
tika-vin01t2:1585_6: dhovitvā pacitvā vā paribhuñjiṃsūti evamattho gahetabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1585_7: Therassa hi dadhiguḷikādisahitampi paṭiggahitaṃ pacchā dhovitvā pacitvā vā paribhuñjantassa savatthukapaṭiggahaṇe doso natthīti adhippāyo,
tika-vin01t2:1585_8: teneva therassa adhippāyaṃ dassentena “tasmā navanītaṃ paribhuñjantena…pe…
tika-vin01t2:1585_10: Keci pana “takkato uddhaṭamattameva khādiṃsū”ti vacanassa adhippāyaṃ ajānantā “takkato uddhaṭamattaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1585_11: adhotampi dadhiguḷikādisahitaṃ vikālepi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:1585_13: Na hi dadhiguḷikādiāmisena saṃsaṭṭharasaṃ navanītaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1585_16: Khayaṃ gamissatīti vacanato khīraṃ pakkhipitvā pakkasappiādipi vikāle kappatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1585_17: Kukkuccāyanti kukkuccakāti iminā attanāpi tattha kukkuccasabbhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin01t2:1585_18: Teneva mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ “nibbaṭṭitasappi vā navanītaṃ vā pacituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1586_3: apica alajjinā ajjhoharitabbaṃ yaṃ kiñci abhisaṅkharāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:1586_5: Tile paṭiggahetvā katatelanti attanā bhajjanādīni akatvā gahitatelaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1586_8: Ubhayampīti attanā ca parena ca kataṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1586_10: nissaggiyanti sattamadivase katatelaṃ sace yāva aruṇuggamanā tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin01t2:1587_1: Acchavasanti dukkaṭavatthuno vasāya anuññātattā taṃsadisānaṃ dukkaṭavatthūnaṃyeva akappiyamaṃsasattānaṃ vasā anuññātā,
tika-vin01t2:1587_2: na thullaccayavatthūnaṃ manussānaṃ vasāti āha “ṭhapetvā manussavasa”nti.
tika-vin01t2:1587_4: “Kāle paṭiggahitaṃ vikāle anupasampannenapi nippakkaṃ saṃsaṭṭhañca paribhuñjantassa dvepi dukkaṭāni hontiyevā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1587_11: Etaṃ vaṭṭatīti nanu etaṃ dadhiguḷikādīhi pakkaṃ navanītaṃ vaṭṭatīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1588_0: “Madhukarīhi nāma madhumakkhikāhīti ayaṃ khuddakamakkhikānaṃ bhamaramakkhikānañca sāmaññaniddeso”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1588_1: Keci pana “daṇḍakesu madhukarā madhukarī makkhikā nāmā”ti vatvā “tāhi madhukarīādīhi tīhi makkhikāhi kataṃ madhu nāmā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1588_7: paṭalassa bhājanaṭṭhāniyattā madhuno vasena sattāhātikkame nissaggiyaṃ hotī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:1588_8: “madhumakkhitaṃ pana madhugatikamevā”ti iminā taṃ na sameti.
tika-vin01t2:1589_0: “Phāṇitaṃ nāma ucchumhā nibbatta”nti pāḷiyaṃ avisesena vuttattā aṭṭhakathāyañca “ucchurasaṃ upādāya…pe…
tika-vin01t2:1589_1: avatthukā ucchuvikati ‘phāṇita’nti veditabbā”ti vacanato ucchurasopi nikkasaṭo sattāhakālikoti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1589_2: Kenaci pana “madhumhi cattāro kālikā yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbā,
tika-vin01t2:1589_7: tathā ucchu vā raso vā sakasaṭo yāvakāliko,
tika-vin01t2:1589_10: suddhakasaṭaṃ yāvajīvika”nti ca vatvā uttaripi bahudhā papañcitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1589_11: Tattha “udakasambhinnaṃ madhu vā ucchuraso vā udakasambhinno yāmakāliko”ti idaṃ neva pāḷiyaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1589_13: “Yāvakālikaṃ samānaṃ garutarampi muddikājātirasaṃ attanā saṃsaṭṭhaṃ lahukaṃ yāmakālikabhāvaṃ upanentaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1589_14: udakaṃ lahutaraṃ sattāhakālikaṃ attanā saṃsaṭṭhaṃ garutaraṃ yāmakālikabhāvaṃ upanetī”ti ettha kāraṇaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1589_16: sabbattha pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāyañca udakasambhedena garutarassapi lahubhāvopagamanaṃyeva dassitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1589_20: agilānassa guḷodaka”nti vadantena agilānena paribhuñjituṃ ayuttopi guḷo udakasambhinno agilānassapi vaṭṭatīti anuññāto.
tika-vin01t2:1590_3: taco ce yāvajīviko”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ dassetvā “ucchuraso udakasambhinno yāmakāliko”ti aññena kenaci vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1590_4: tampi tathāvidhassa aṭṭhakathāvacanassa imissā samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya abhāvato na sārato paccetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1590_5: Tatoyeva ca “ucchuraso udakena sambhinnopi asambhinnopi sattāhakālikoyevā”ti keci ācariyā vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1590_8: ucchurasa”nti ettha tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu avisesena vuttaṃ “ucchuraso sattāhakāliko”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1591_0: Sayaṃkataṃ nirāmisameva vaṭṭatīti ettha aparissāvitaṃ paṭiggahitampi karaṇasamaye parissāvetvā kasaṭaṃ apanetvāva attanā katanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1591_1: Jhāmaucchuphāṇitanti agginā daḍḍhe ucchukhette jhāmaucchunā kataphāṇitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1591_2: Koṭṭitaucchuphāṇitanti khuddānukhuddakaṃ chinditvā koṭṭetvā nippīḷetvā pakkaṃ yebhuyyena ca sakasaṭaṃ phāṇitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1591_3: Tādisassa ca kasaṭassa abbohārikattā “taṃ yutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1591_4: Sītudakena katanti madhukapupphāni sītodake pakkhipitvā madditvā puppharase udakagate sati taṃ udakaṃ gahetvā pacitvā kataphāṇitaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1591_5: Khīraṃ pakkhipitvā kataṃ madhukaphāṇitaṃ yāvakālikanti ettha khīraṃ pakkhipitvā pakkatelaṃ kasmā vikāle vaṭṭatīti ce?
tika-vin01t2:1591_7: aññaṃ pana khīraṃ pakkhipitvā kataṃ khīrabhāvaṃ gaṇhātīti idamettha kāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1591_8: Yadi evaṃ khaṇḍasakkharampi khīraṃ pakkhipitvā karonti,
tika-vin01t2:1592_0: Bhesajjodissaṃ dassentena “sattavidhañhi odissaṃ nāmā”tiādinā itarānipi atthuddhāravasena vuttāni.
tika-vin01t2:1592_4: Oḷārikānampi āhāratthaṃ pharituṃ samatthānaṃ sappiādīnaṃ bhesajjanāmena anuññātattā “bhesajjodissa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1592_5: “Pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya sati paccayeti vuttattā paṭiggahitabhesajjāni dutiyadivasato paṭṭhāya purebhattampi sati paccaye paribhuñjitabbāni,
tika-vin01t2:1593_2: Kasāve pakkhittāni tāni attano sabhāvaṃ pariccajanti,
tika-vin01t2:1593_8: “sappiñca telañca vasañca muddhani telaṃ vā abbhañjanaṃ vā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1594_1: Sace dvinnaṃ santakaṃ ekena paṭiggahitaṃ avibhattaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1594_2: paribhuñjituṃ pana na vaṭṭatīti ettha majjhe pāṭho parihīno,
tika-vin01t2:1594_3: evaṃ panettha pāṭho veditabbo “sace dvinnaṃ santakaṃ ekena paṭiggahitaṃ avibhattaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1594_8: Tattha dvinnampi anāpattīti yathā aññassa santakaṃ ekena paṭiggahitaṃ sattāhātikkamena nissaggiyaṃ na hoti parasantakabhāvato,
tika-vin01t2:1594_9: evamidampi avibhattattā ubhayasādhāraṇampi avinibbhogabhāvato nissaggiyaṃ na hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1594_10: Paribhuñjituṃ pana na vaṭṭatīti bhikkhunā paṭiggahitattā sattāhātikkame yassa kassaci bhikkhuno paribhuñjituṃ
tika-vin01t2:1594_11: na vaṭṭati paṭiggahitasappiādīnaṃ paribhogassa sattāheneva paricchinnattā.
tika-vin01t2:1594_12: “Tāni paṭiggahetvā sattāhaparamaṃ sannidhikārakaṃ paribhuñjitabbānī”ti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1594_13: Gaṇṭhipadesu pana tīsupi idha pāṭhassa parihīnabhāvaṃ asallakkhetvā “paribhuñjituṃ pana na vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin01t2:1594_14: idaṃ antosattāhe paribhogaṃ sandhāya vuttanti saññāya vissāsaggāhābhāvato paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-vin01t2:1595_1: imaṃ telaṃ sattāhamattaṃ paribhuñja tvanti iminā yena paṭiggahitaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1595_3: Kassa āpattīti paṭhamaṃ tāva ubhinnaṃ sādhāraṇattā anāpatti vuttā.
tika-vin01t2:1595_4: Idāni pana ekena itarassa vissaṭṭhabhāvato ubhayasādhāraṇatā natthīti vibhattasadisaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1595_5: tasmā ettha paṭiggahitassa sattāhātikkame ekassa āpattiyā bhavitabbanti maññamāno “kiṃ paṭiggahaṇapaccayā paṭiggāhakassa āpatti,
tika-vin01t2:1595_8: Nissaṭṭhabhāvatoyeva ca idha “avibhattabhāvato”ti kāraṇaṃ avatvā “yena paṭiggahitaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1595_10: Idañca vissaṭṭhabhāvato ubhayasādhāraṇataṃ pahāya ekassa santakaṃ hontampi yena paṭiggahitaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1595_12: tasmā parasantakapaṭiggahaṇe viya paṭiggāhakassa paṭiggahaṇapaccayā natthi āpattīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1595_14: tena vissajjitattā”ti vacanato avissajjite sati avibhattepi sattāhātikkame āpattīti dassanatthaṃ avissajjite
tika-vin01t2:1595_20: Iminā tassa santakabhāvepi aññena paṭiggahitasakasantake viya tena appaṭiggahitabhāvato anāpattīti dīpeti.
tika-vin01t2:1595_21: Idaṃ pana adhippāyaṃ ajānitvā ito aññathā gaṇṭhipadakārādīhi papañcitaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1596_0: Aparibhogaṃ hotīti kassaci amanuññassa patitattā paribhogārahaṃ na hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1596_2: “Antosattāhe”ti adhikārattā “antosattāhe anapekkho datvā paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjatī”ti imaṃ sambandhaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1596_4: Mahāpadumatthero pana yadi evaṃ “vissajjetī”ti imināva taṃ siddhaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1596_5: sattāhātikkantaṃ pana nissaṭṭhaṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:1596_8: Aññena bhikkhunāti ettha suddhacittena dinnattā sayampi āharāpetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin01t2:1599_1: Catutthe sibbanarajanakappapariyosānena niṭṭhāpetvāti sūcikammaniṭṭhānena sakimpi vaṇṇabhedamattarajanena kappabindukaraṇena ca niṭṭhāpetvā.
tika-vin01t2:1600_3: Etasmiñhi antare vassikasāṭikaṃ aladdhaṃ pariyesituṃ laddhaṃ kātuñca vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:1600_4: nivāsetuṃ adhiṭṭhātuñca na vaṭṭatī”ti potthakesu pāṭho dissati,
tika-vin01t2:1600_6: Evaṃ panettha pāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ “ayameko aḍḍhamāso pariyesanakkhettaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1600_7: Etasmiñhi antare vassikasāṭikaṃ aladdhaṃ pariyesituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t2:1600_8: laddhaṃ kātuṃ nivāsetuṃ adhiṭṭhātuñca na vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1600_9: Na hi gimhānaṃ pacchimamāsassa paṭhamo aḍḍhamāso karaṇakkhettaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1600_10: “Aḍḍhamāso seso gimhānanti katvā nivāsetabba”nti vacanato pana gimhānaṃ pacchimamāsassa pacchimo aḍḍhamāso karaṇakkhettañceva nivāsanakkhettañca hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1600_13: Tasmā pāḷiyā mātikāṭṭhakathāya ca avirodhaṃ icchantena vuttanayeneva pāṭho gahetabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1601_0: “Viññattiṃ katvā nipphādentassa aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadena anāpattī”ti vadantena “piṭṭhisamayattā iminā sikkhāpadena āpattī”ti dīpitā hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1601_1: Na hi ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānato piṭṭhisamaye satuppādakaraṇamattenapi sambhavantī āpatti tato garukatarāya viññattiyā na hotīti sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1605_0: Tesuyeva ca viññattiṃ, katvā nipphādane tathā”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1606_0: Kenassa hoti āpattīti assa mātaraṃ cīvaraṃ yācantassa kena sikkhāpadena āpattīti pucchati.
tika-vin01t2:1606_1: “Pariṇataṃ viññāpentassa pariṇāmanasikkhāpadena āpattī”ti codanābhāvaṃ dasseti no ca saṅghe pariṇatanti.
tika-vin01t2:1606_5: Imamatthaṃ sandhāyāti piṭṭhisamaye vassikasāṭikatthaṃ ñātakapavāritaṭṭhāne satuppādakaraṇena āpattiṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1607_1: dukkaṭanti idaṃ vassikasāṭikaṃ adinnapubbe sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1607_8: Viññattiṃ katvā nipphādentassāti aññātakaappavāritaṭṭhānato viññattiṃ katvā nipphādentassa.
tika-vin01t2:1607_9: Pakatiyā vassikasāṭikadāyakā nāma saṅghavasena vā puggalavasena vā apavāretvā anusaṃvaccharaṃ vassikasāṭikānaṃ dāyakā.
tika-vin01t2:1607_10: Aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadena anāpattīti ettha imināpi sikkhāpadena anāpattīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1607_11: Kucchisamaye hi attano ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānato “detha me vassikasāṭika”ntiādinā viññāpentassapi anāpatti.
tika-vin01t2:1607_13: “na vattabbā detha meti idañhi pariyesanakāle aññātakaappavārite eva sandhāya vutta”nti.
tika-vin01t2:1607_14: Mātikāṭṭhakathāyañhi vuttaṃ “attano ñātakapavāritaṭṭhānato pana ‘detha me vassikasāṭikacīvara’ntiādikāya viññattiyāpi pariyesitabba”nti.
tika-vin01t2:1608_1: “Ākāsato patitaudakenevāti vacanato chadanakoṭiyā patitaudakena nahāyantassa anāpattī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1609_1: Cha māse parihāraṃ labhatīti etena antovassepi yāva vassānassa pacchimadivasā akatā parihāraṃ labhatīti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1609_2: Yasmā mūlacīvaraṃ karontena hemantassa pacchimuposathadivaseyeva kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1609_4: evaṃ santepi appakaṃ ūnamadhikaṃ vā gaṇanūpagaṃ na hotīti katvā “tato parampi…pe…
tika-vin01t2:1609_7: laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā cāti iminā ekāhānāgatāya vassūpanāyikāya laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca,
tika-vin01t2:1609_9: dasāhānāgatāya vassūpanāyikāya laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca,
tika-vin01t2:1609_10: antovasse vā laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā cāti ayamattho dassito.
tika-vin01t2:1609_11: Tattha āsāḷhimāsassa juṇhapakkhapuṇṇamiyaṃ laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca vassikasāṭikā “ekāhānāgatāya vassūpanāyikāya laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā cā”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:1609_12: Eteneva nayena juṇhapakkhassa chaṭṭhiyaṃ laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca “dasāhānāgatāya vassūpanāyikāya laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā cā”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:1609_14: tāva antotemāse laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca “antovasse laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā cā”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t2:1609_15: Paṭhamakattikatemāsapuṇṇamito parañhi laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca yāva cīvarakālo nātikkamati,
tika-vin01t2:1609_16: tāva anadhiṭṭhahitvā ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatīti na tatrāyaṃ vicāraṇā sambhavati.
tika-vin01t2:1610_0: Tasmiṃyeva antodasāhe adhiṭṭhātabbāti avisesena vuttepi vassānato pubbe ekāhadvīhādivasena anāgatāya
tika-vin01t2:1610_1: vassūpanāyikāya laddhā tehi divasehi saddhiṃ dasāhaṃ anatikkamantena vassūpanāyikadivasato paṭṭhāya adhiṭṭhānakkhettaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1610_4: Antovasse pana laddhā tasmiṃyeva antovasse laddhadivasato paṭṭhāya dasāhaṃ anatikkāmetvā adhiṭṭhātabbā.
tika-vin01t2:1611_0: Nanu ca vassānato pubbe anadhiṭṭhahitvā dasāhaṃ atikkāmetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva,
tika-vin01t2:1611_1: tasmā adhiṭṭhānassa akhettabhūtepi divase gahetvā “antodasāhe adhiṭṭhātabba”nti kasmā vuttaṃ?
tika-vin01t2:1611_3: tāva anadhiṭṭhahitvā dasāhaṃ atikkāmetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti akatāya anadhiṭṭhānakkhettasadisāpi atikkantadivasā
tika-vin01t2:1611_4: dasāhaṃ atikkāmetvā niṭṭhitāya gaṇanūpagā hontīti niṭṭhitadivaseyeva adhiṭṭhātabbā,
tika-vin01t2:1611_5: evamidhāpi vassānato pubbe anadhiṭṭhānakkhettabhūtāpi divasā laddhadivasato paṭṭhāya gaṇanūpagā hontīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1611_6: Yadi evaṃ “tasmiṃyeva antodasāhe”ti avisesena vuttattā dasāhānāgatāya vassūpanāyikāya chaṭṭhiyaṃ laddhā puṇṇamiyaṃ adhiṭṭhātabbāti āpajjatīti?
tika-vin01t2:1611_8: Evaṃ sante “dasāhānāgatāyā”ti iminā kiṃ payojananti ce?
tika-vin01t2:1611_9: Vassānato pubbeyeva dasāhe atikkante vassūpanāyikadivase niṭṭhitā tadaheva adhiṭṭhātabbāti dassanatthaṃ vuttanti idamettha payojanaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1612_0: Dasāhe appahonte cīvarakālaṃ nātikkametabbāti temāsabbhantare dasāhe appahonte laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca cīvarakālaṃ nātikkametabbāti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1612_1: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “paṭhamakattikatemāsapuṇṇamito pubbe sattamito paṭṭhāya laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca vassikasāṭikā
tika-vin01t2:1612_2: dasāhe anatikkanteyeva cīvarakālaṃ otiṇṇattā tattha anadhiṭṭhahitvāpi ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1612_6: katāya pana dasāhaparamasikkhāpadaṃ avikopetvā parihāro vattabboti.
tika-vin01t2:1613_0: Yadā vā tadā vā adhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭatīti cātumāsabbhantare dasāhe atikkantepi natthi dosoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t2:1613_3: yāva kattikapuṇṇamā parihāraṃ labhatī”ti imināpi kurundivacanena akatāya vassikasāṭikāya cātumāsaṃ parihāro,
tika-vin01t2:1613_4: katāya dasāhameva parihāroti ayamattho dīpitoyevāti āha “apicā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1614_0: Pāḷiyaṃ acchinnacīvarassa naṭṭhacīvarassātiādinā nissaggiyena anāpatti vuttā,
tika-vin01t2:1614_1: udāhu naggassa nahāyato dukkaṭena anāpatti vuttāti?
tika-vin01t2:1614_3: Sabbasikkhāpadesu hi yattha yattha mūlasikkhāpadena āpattippasaṅgo,
tika-vin01t2:1614_4: tattha tattha anāpattidassanatthaṃ anāpattivāro ārabhīyatīti idhāpi nissaggiyena anāpattidassanatthanti yuttaṃ vattuṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1614_5: Na hi mūlāpattiyā anāpattiṃ adassetvā antarā vuttāya eva āpattiyā anāpattidassanatthaṃ anāpattivāro ārabhīyatīti.
tika-vin01t2:1614_6: Teneva tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu idaṃ vuttaṃ “acchinnacīvarassa naṭṭhacīvarassa cāti ettha acchinnasesacīvarassa
tika-vin01t2:1614_7: naṭṭhasesacīvarassa ca asamaye nivāsentassa pariyesantassa ca anāpatti.
tika-vin01t2:1614_8: Āpadāsūti ettha anivatthaṃ corā harantīti asamaye nivāsentassa anāpattī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1614_9: Mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi vuttaṃ “acchinnacīvarassa vā naṭṭhacīvarassa vā anivatthaṃ corā harantīti evaṃ āpadāsu
tika-vin01t2:1614_11: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana naggassa nahāyato dukkaṭeneva anāpattiṃ sandhāya “acchinnacīvarassāti etaṃ vassikasāṭikameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1614_13: Ettha ca mahagghavassikasāṭikaṃ nivāsetvā nahāyantassa corupaddavo āpadā nāmā”ti yaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1615_0: Atha ubhayenapi anāpattidassanatthaṃ “acchinnacīvarassā”tiādi āraddhanti evamadhippāyo siyā,
tika-vin01t2:1615_1: evampi “acchinnacīvarassāti etaṃ vassikasāṭikameva sandhāya vutta”ntiādinā visesetvā na vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1615_2: Evañhi vattabbaṃ siyā “acchinnasesacīvarassa naṭṭhasesacīvarassa vā asamaye nivāsentassa pariyesantassa ca nissaggiyena anāpatti,
tika-vin01t2:1615_3: acchinnavassikasāṭikassa naṭṭhavassikasāṭikassa vā naggassa nahāyato dukkaṭena anāpatti,
tika-vin01t2:1615_4: āpadāsu anivatthaṃ corā harantīti asamaye nivāsayato nissaggiyena anāpatti,
tika-vin01t2:1616_2: tāya ca paṭilābhoti imāni tāva pariyesanāpattiyā tīṇi aṅgāni.
tika-vin01t2:1616_6: asamaye nivāsananti imāni nivāsanāpattiyā cattāri aṅgāni.
tika-vin01t2:1619_1: Pañcame yampi tyāhanti ettha yanti kāraṇavacanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1619_3: mayā saddhiṃ janapadacārikaṃ pakkamissatīti yaṃ kāraṇaṃ nissāya ahaṃ te, āvuso,
tika-vin01t2:1619_5: taṃ na karosīti kupito anattamano acchindīti.
tika-vin01t2:1619_7: tattha “mayā saddhiṃ janapadacārikaṃ pakkamissatīti yampi te ahaṃ cīvaraṃ adāsiṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1619_8: taṃ cīvaraṃ gaṇhissāmīti kupito anattamano acchindī”ti sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1620_2: ekaṃ pācittiyanti “cīvaraṃ gaṇhā”ti āṇattiyā ekacīvaravisayattā ekameva pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1620_3: Vācāya vācāya dukkaṭanti ettha acchinnesu vatthugaṇanāya pācittiyāni.
tika-vin01t2:1620_4: Ekavācāya sambahulā āpattiyoti idaṃ acchinnesu vatthugaṇanāya āpajjitabbaṃ pācittiyāpattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1621_2: Eseva nayoti sithilaṃ gāḷhañca pakkhittāsu āpattiyā bahuttaṃ ekattañca atidissati.
tika-vin01t2:1622_1: mayantiādīsu gaṇhitukāmatāya evaṃ vuttepi teneva dinnattā anāpatti.
tika-vin01t2:1622_2: Amhākaṃ santike upajjhaṃ gaṇhissatīti idaṃ sāmaṇerassapi dānaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin01t2:1622_3: Tasmā kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ “bhikkhussa sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1622_4: tathāpi anupasampannakāle datvāpi upasampannakāle acchindantassa pācittiyamevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1622_6: Detīti tuṭṭho vā kupito vā deti.
tika-vin01t2:1622_8: Evaṃ pana dātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha evaṃ dinnaṃ na tāva tassa santakanti anadhiṭṭhahitvāva paribhuñjitabbanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1622_9: Āharāpetuṃ pana vaṭṭatīti evaṃ dinnaṃ bhatisadisattā āharāpetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1622_10: Cajitvā dinnanti vuttanayena adatvā anapekkhena hutvā tasseva dinnaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1622_11: Bhaṇḍagghena kāretabboti sakasaññāya vinā gaṇhanto bhaṇḍaṃ agghāpetvā āpattiyā kāretabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1622_16: kodhavasena acchindanaṃ acchindāpanaṃ vāti imānettha pañca aṅgāni.
tika-vin01t2:1625_1: Chaṭṭhe pāḷiyaṃ cīvarakārasamayeti iminā vassaṃvutthabhikkhūnaṃ cīvarakammasamayattā cīvaramāso vutto,
tika-vin01t2:1625_2: athaññopi pana cīvarakammakālo cīvarakārasamayoti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1626_4: Suttaṃ pavesetvā yena ākoṭentā ghanabhāvaṃ sampādenti,
tika-vin01t2:1626_7: Tantūnaṃ attano santakattā vītavītaṭṭhānaṃ paṭiladdhameva hotīti āha “dīghato…pe…
tika-vin01t2:1626_9: Pāḷiyampi hi imināva adhippāyena “paṭilābhena nissaggiya”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1627_1: Pubbe vuttanayena nissaggiyanti dīghaso vidatthimatte tiriyaṃ hatthamatte ca vīte nissaggiyaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1627_6: Tante ṭhitaṃyeva adhiṭṭhātabbanti ettha “pacchā vītaṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhitagatikameva hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1627_8: Sace pana paricchedaṃ dassetvā antarantarā avītaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1627_10: Eseva nayoti vikappanupagappamāṇamatte vīte tante ṭhitaṃyeva adhiṭṭhātabbanti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1628_0: Mātikāṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vāyāpeyyāti ettha “cīvaraṃ me, āvuso,
tika-vin01t2:1628_1: vāyathāti akappiyaviññattiyā vāyāpeyyā”ti atthaṃ vatvā aṅgesupi “akappiyatantavāyena akappiyaviññattiyā vāyāpana”nti visesetvā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1628_5: aṭṭhakathāyañca suttatantavāyānameva kappiyākappiyabhāvena bahudhā nayo dassito,
tika-vin01t2:1628_7: “Akappiyaviññattiyā vāyāpeyyā”ti ca visesetvā vadantena ayaṃ nāma kappiyaviññattīti visuṃ na dassitaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1631_1: Sattame kiñcimattaṃ anupadajjeyyāti idaṃ tassa kattabbākāramattadassanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1631_2: dānaṃ panettha aṅgaṃ na hoti suttavaḍḍhanavaseneva āpajjitabbattā.
tika-vin01t2:1631_3: Teneva padabhājanepi “tassa vacanena āyataṃ vā vitthataṃ vā appitaṃ vā karoti,
tika-vin01t2:1631_5: paṭilābhena nissaggiya”nti suttavaḍḍhanākārameva dassetvā āpatti vuttā.
tika-vin01t2:1631_6: Mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi vuttaṃ “na bhikkhuno piṇḍapātadānamattena taṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1631_7: Sace pana te tassa vacanena cīvarasāmikānaṃ hatthato suttaṃ gahetvā īsakampi āyataṃ vā vitthataṃ vā appitaṃ vā karonti,
tika-vin01t2:1631_10: Āyatādīsu sattasu ākāresu ādimhi tayo ākāre suttavaḍḍhanena vinā na sakkā kātunti āha “suttavaḍḍhanaākārameva dassetī”ti.
tika-vin01t2:1631_11: Suvītādayo hi ākāre vināpi suttavaḍḍhanena sakkā kātuṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1634_4: Uppajjeyyāti saṅghato vā gaṇato vā ujukaṃ attanoyeva vā uppajjeyya.
tika-vin01t2:1634_5: Pañcamitoti ettha vassaṃ vasantassa saṅghassa pañcamito pubbe uppannaṃ accekacīvaraṃ pañcamiyaṃ vibhajitvā gahitaṃ accekacīvaraparihārameva labhati.
tika-vin01t2:1635_2: Chaṭṭhiyaṃ uppannacīvarassa ekādasamo aruṇo cīvarakāle uṭṭhātīti āha “chaṭṭhito paṭṭhāyā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t2:1635_4: Atha “cīvaramāsepi atirekacīvaraṃ nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ kuto laddhanti ce?
tika-vin01t2:1635_5: “Visuṃ ananuññātepi imasmiṃ sikkhāpade ‘cīvarakālasamayo nāma anatthate kathine vassānassa pacchimo māso,
tika-vin01t2:1635_6: atthate kathine pañca māsā’ti vadantena tatiyakathinasikkhāpade ‘akālacīvaraṃ nāma anatthate kathine ekādasamāse uppannaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1635_7: atthate kathine sattamāse uppanna’nti vadantena ca anuññātameva hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1636_1: Idāni paṭhamakathinādisikkhāpadehi tassa tassa cīvarassa labbhamānaṃ parihāraṃ idheva upasaṃharitvā dassento
tika-vin01t2:1636_4: atthate kathine ekādasadivasādhikā pañca māsā”ti ayameva pāṭho gahetabbo.
tika-vin01t2:1636_5: Keci panettha “kāmañcesa ‘dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabba’nti imināva siddho,
tika-vin01t2:1636_6: aṭṭhuppattivasena pana apubbaṃ viya atthaṃ dassetvā sikkhāpadaṃ ṭhapita”nti pāṭhaṃ vatvā “dasadivasādhiko māso,
tika-vin01t2:1636_7: dasadivasādhikā pañca māsāti pāṭhena bhavitabba”nti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:1636_9: Na hi dasāhena asampattāya kattikatemāsikapuṇṇamāya cīvarakālato pubbe dasa divasā adhikā honti.
tika-vin01t2:1637_0: Mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi “pavāraṇamāsassa juṇhapakkhapañcamito paṭṭhāya uppannassa cīvarassa nidhānakālo
tika-vin01t2:1637_1: dassito hotī”ti vatvā “kāmañcesa ‘dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabba’nti imināva siddho,
tika-vin01t2:1637_2: aṭṭhuppattivasena pana apubbaṃ viya atthaṃ dassetvā sikkhāpadaṃ ṭhapita”nti pāṭho dassito,
tika-vin01t2:1637_4: “Juṇhapakkhapañcamito paṭṭhāyā”ti ca vuttattā tattheva pubbāparavirodhopi siyā,
tika-vin01t2:1637_7: Imameva ca pamādapāṭhaṃ gahetvā bhadantabuddhadattācariyena ca –
tika-vin01t2:1643_1: “Pañcamiyaṃ uppannaṃ anaccekacīvaraṃ dasāhaṃ atikkāmayato cīvarakālato pubbeyeva āpatti hoti,
tika-vin01t2:1643_3: tasmā cīvarakālātikkame puna āpajjitabbāya āpattiyā abhāvaṃ sandhāya ‘anaccekacīvare anaccekacīvarasaññī
tika-vin01t2:1646_4: Pāḷiyaṃ vippavasantīti idaṃ yasmiṃ vihāre vasantā antaraghare cīvaraṃ nikkhipiṃsu,
tika-vin01t2:1646_6: Tasmiñhi vihāre antaraghare cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā vasituṃ anuññātattā tattha vāso vippavāso nāma na hoti.
tika-vin01t2:1647_1: “Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti imassa vibhaṅge “upasampajjā”ti uddharitabbe “upasampajja”nti
tika-vin01t2:1647_2: uddharitvā “yo paṭhamassa jhānassa lābho paṭilābho”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1648_0: Ettāvatā ca purimikāya upagantvā akhaṇḍaṃ katvā vutthavassena āraññakesu senāsanesu viharantena sakalaṃ
tika-vin01t2:1648_2: Anatthatakathinassa hi cīvaramāse vippavāso na vaṭṭati atthatakathinānaṃyeva asamādānacārassa anuññātattā.
tika-vin01t2:1648_3: Keci pana “anatthatakathinānaṃ cīvaramāsepi asamādānacāro labbhatī”ti vatvā bahudhā papañcenti,
tika-vin01t2:1649_0: Parikkhepārahaṭṭhānatoti ettha “parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃ nāma dve leḍḍupātā”ti vadanti,
tika-vin01t2:1649_2: Aparikkhittassa pana gāmassa pariyante ṭhitagharūpacārato paṭṭhāya eko leḍḍupāto parikkhepārahaṭṭhānanti idamettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1649_5: Taṃ paricchedaṃ katvāti taṃ paṭhamasenāsanādiṃ paricchedaṃ katvā.
tika-vin01t2:1649_7: majjhimabhāṇakānaṃ matena pana “senāsanādīnaṃ upacāre ṭhitassa ekaleḍḍupātaṃ muñcitvā minitabba”nti majjhimabhāṇakā vadanti.
tika-vin01t2:1649_8: Teneva majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vihārassapi gāmasseva upacāraṃ nīharitvā ubhinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ antarā minitabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1649_10: Tato tato maggaṃ pidahatīti tattha tattha khuddakamaggaṃ pidahati.
tika-vin01t2:1649_11: Dhutaṅgacoroti iminā imassapi sikkhāpadassa aṅgasampattiyā abhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin01t2:1650_1: Sannihitabalavabhayānīti corehi manussānaṃ hataviluttākoṭitabhāvadassanato sannihitabalavabhayānīti attho.
tika-vin01t2:1650_3: Yatra hi piṇḍāyātiādinā vuttappamāṇameva visesetvā dasseti.
tika-vin01t2:1650_4: Sāsaṅkasappaṭibhayamevāti ettha sāsaṅkaṃ vā sappaṭibhayaṃ vā hotu,
tika-vin01t2:1651_0: Pāḷiyaṃ “siyā ca tassa bhikkhuno kocideva paccayo tena cīvarena vippavāsāya,
tika-vin01t2:1651_1: chārattaparamaṃ tena bhikkhunā tena cīvarena vippavasitabba”nti iminā antaraghare cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā
tika-vin01t2:1651_2: tasmiṃ vihāre vasantassa aññattha gamanakicce sati vihārato bahi chārattaṃ vippavāso anuññāto.
tika-vin01t2:1651_3: Vasanaṭṭhānato hi aññattha chārattaṃ vippavāso vutto,
tika-vin01t2:1651_5: Tena ca “puna gāmasīmaṃ okkamitvāti ettha sace gocaragāmato puratthimāya disāya senāsanaṃ,
tika-vin01t2:1651_7: Tatoyeva ca mātikāṭṭhakathāyampi “tato ce uttari vippavaseyyā”ti ettha “chārattato uttari tasmiṃ senāsane sattamaṃ aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpeyyā”ti attho vutto.
tika-vin01t2:1651_8: Bhadantabuddhadattācariyena pana pākaṭataraṃ katvā ayamevattho vutto.
tika-vin01t2:1652_0: “Yaṃ gāmaṃ gocaraṃ katvā, bhikkhu āraññake vase;
tika-vin01t2:1653_0: Tasmiṃ gāme ṭhapetuṃ taṃ, māsamekantu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1656_0: “Kosambiyaṃ aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hotī”ti āgatattā “kosambakasammuti anuññātā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1656_2: Senāsanaṃ āgantvāti vusitavihārasseva sandhāya vuttattā tasmiṃ gāmūpacārepi aññasmiṃ vihāre aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1659_1: Dasame uddissa ṭhapitabhāgeti attano gharepi uddisitvā visuṃ ṭhapitakoṭṭhāse.
tika-vin01t2:1659_3: ekaṃ imassa dehī”ti evaṃ ekavācāya āpajjitabbattā “āpajjeyya ekato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1659_4: Tumhākaṃ sappiādīni ābhatānīti tumhākaṃ atthāya ābhatāni sappiādīni.
tika-vin01t2:1659_5: Pariṇatabhāvaṃ jānitvāpi vuttavidhinā viññāpentena tesaṃ santakameva viññāpitaṃ nāma hotīti āha –
tika-vin01t2:1660_1: Pupphampi āropetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti idaṃ pariṇataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1660_2: Sace pana ekasmiṃ cetiye pūjitaṃ pupphaṃ gahetvā aññasmiṃ cetiye pūjeti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1660_3: Ṭhitaṃ disvāti sesakaṃ gahetvā ṭhitaṃ disvā.
tika-vin01t2:1660_6: Tiracchānagatassa pariccajitvā dinne pana taṃ palāpetvā aññaṃ bhuñjāpetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t2:1660_8: evaṃ pana apucchitepi apariṇataṃ idanti jānantena attano ruciyā yattha icchati,
tika-vin01t2:1660_9: tattha dāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t2:1660_11: tattha dethāti etthāpi “tumhākaṃ ruciyā”ti vuttattā yattha icchati,
